eng_prompt: As the sun set over the town, a hush fell over the crowd gathered at the memorial. It was a day that changed everything, leaving an indelible mark on the hearts of those who witnessed it.

eng_prompt: After months of preparation and community engagement, the transition team has finalized their plans. With a clear vision and strong support, the new leaders are ready to serve.

ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki tam I kom ngo ma otimme, langol kop omoko tamme me weko en bedo tye I pido ne. Moko tam man oweko en otamo I kom gin ma en twero timone labongo winyo ni myero en bene obed tye.

eng_prompt: Governments rely on various sources of revenue to fund their operations. One of the primary sources of this revenue is taxation.

ach_prompt: Gamente jenge I kom yoo mapatpat me nongo lim me culu pi tic gi. Yo acel madit loyo me nongo cente en aye mucoro.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit apugan aitosom iponesio luegelegela luka ikapun kanu aigang aswamukec. Idiopet koboro lu iswamaere ikapun lu erai isolosinei.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing environmental threats, local and national groups have come together to address the urgent need for conservation. Their collaborative efforts aim to ensure the long-term sustainability of the region's natural resources.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulabe bw'obutonde bw'ensi obweyongera, ebibiina by'ebitundu n'eby'eggwanga bikwataganye okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukuuma obutonde. Kaweefube waabwe ow'awamu agenderera kukuuma eby'obugagga by'ekitundu okumala ebbanga eddene.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me balo cwec ma orumuwa, dul mapat-pat me tedero ki lobo guribbe kacel me tyeko peko me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Gitye ka tic kacelo me neno ni lonyo ma aa ki icwec ma orumuwa tye maber pi kare malac.

eng_prompt: The team gathered in the conference room to discuss the upcoming project. As the clock struck ten, she took her seat, ready to contribute.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve transportation for officials, the government has announced a new initiative. This plan aims to provide essential resources to enhance the efficiency of parliamentary duties.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as the crowd grew increasingly aggressive, throwing objects and shouting demands. In an attempt to regain control of the situation, law enforcement made the difficult decision to intervene.

eng_prompt: Deforestation poses a significant threat to our planet's biodiversity and climate stability. As we face the consequences of environmental degradation, it's crucial to reconsider our relationship with nature.
lug_prompt: Okusaanyaawo ebibira kikosa nnyo obutonde bw'ensi n'embeera y'obudde. Nga twolekaganye n'ebiva mu kwonoona obutonde bw'ensi, kikulu nnyo okuddamu okulowooza ku nkolagana yaffe n'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Tongo yadi tye ki peko madit tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki kit ma piny tye kwede. I kare ma watye ka neno adwogi me balo cwec ma orumuwa, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom wat ma watye kwede ki cwec ma orumuwa.

lgg_prompt: Pati eyi ma ogaza eri e'yo azi okporu ni eyi eji angu amavile 'di ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu tualu angu amavile 'di ma alea 'diyi pie. Amani e'yo angu ama agei ri ezazuri ma drilea, eri orodriru ama ma ega ama ma esele coza angu ama agei ri pie ri ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the evidence against him became undeniable. The jury reached a unanimous verdict, confirming his guilt beyond a reasonable doubt.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a decline in consumer spending and investment. As a result, many analysts are concerned about the overall health of the economy.

eng_prompt: In recent years, concerns about electoral integrity and voter suppression have intensified. As a result, lawmakers have recognized the need for comprehensive reforms.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweraliikirira ku bwenkanya mu kulonda n'okunyigirizibwa kw'abalonzi kweyongedde. N'ekivuddemu, ababaka ba palamenti bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka ez'omuggundu.

lug_prompt: Bwe yajjukira eby'omu buto bwe, akamwenyumwenyu kaabuna mu maaso ge. Essanyu n'obunkenke bw'olunaku olwo byamujjira, ne bimuleetera okuwulira nga byabaddewo jjo.

eng_prompt: The team has been practicing diligently for weeks. Fans are eagerly anticipating the first game of the season.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and anticipation, the team finally set off on their long journey to Botswana. Despite their excitement, the extensive travel took a toll on everyone’s energy levels.

eng_prompt: After a hard-fought season filled with challenges and determination, the players finally achieved their goal. The atmosphere was electric as the final whistle blew, signaling their victory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa sizoni eyali ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obumalirivu, abazannyi baasobola okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa kyabwe. Embeera yabadde ya masannyalaze nga enfuufu esembayo ewuluguma, ekiraga obuwanguzi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I ngee kare me pyem matek ma opong ki peko ki keto cwiny, lutuku ne dong gucobo miti gi. Kwo obedo ma yom-cwiny tutwal I kare ma ki goyo whistle me agiki, ma nyutu locgi.

eng_prompt: Many entrepreneurs enter the market with a focus on growth and innovation, often overlooking the complexities of financial regulations. As a result, they may find themselves unprepared for the intricacies of tax obligations.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi bangi bayingira akatale nga essira balitadde ku nkulaakulana n'obuyiiya, nga tebategedde buzibu obuli mu mateeka g'ebyensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, bayinza okwesanga nga tebeetegese ku buzibu bw'emisolo.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara mapol donyo I cuk kun giketo cwinygi I kom dongo lobo ki diro manyen, pol kare gi cayo cik matek tutwal makwako lim. Macalo adwogi ne, giromo nongo ni pe guyubbe pi peko me culu mucoro.
teo_prompt: Agwelanarak luipu elomanarete osokoni keda apodokinit apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak, mam epodokinitos nuka ikisila luka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kesi adumun ebe mam kes ekapakina aitodolikin atiokisio nuka isolosinei.

eng_prompt: As the market fluctuated, the traders found themselves increasingly frustrated with the government's policies. Their profits were dwindling, and the looming tax season only added to their discontent.
lug_prompt: Akatale bwe kaali kakyukakyuka, abasuubuzi beeyongera okunyiiga olw'enkola za gavumenti. Amagoba gaabwe gaali gakendeera, era ekiseera ky'omusolo ekyali kinaatera okutuuka kyayongera ku butabeera bamativu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma cuk tye ka lokke, lucat wil onongo cwinygi pe yom ki cik pa gamente. Magoba gi obedo kadok piny, ki kare me culu mucoro matye kabino ni omedo cwer cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Keda aijulanakineta nuka esokoni, apotu agwelanarak kongurianata noi kanu ainapeta nuka apugan. Apotu ameda kec kibiroros, ido apakio nuka isolosinei lu ebunit abu iyatakin amamut aiyalama kec.
lgg_prompt: Cu ni i ojazu tualurisi, 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi esu yi ma asi ezaza e'yo azita gamete ni 'diyisi tutu. Eyi ma orodri eyi ri esi esi esi, dika sa'wa musoro ofeza ni emupi 'disi ri fe eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku.
nyn_prompt: Obu akatare kaabaire nikahindahinduka, abashuubuzi bakeesharinga ahabw'ebiragiro bya gavumenti. Amagoba gaabo gakaba nigakyendeera, kandi obwire bw'okushorooza emishoro obwabaire nibugyenda omu maisho bukongyera okwetomboita kwabo.

eng_prompt: As the digital landscape continues to evolve, many nations are recognizing the importance of integrating modern tools into their development strategies. This shift is particularly evident in various sectors, from education to agriculture.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi ya digito egenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, amawanga mangi gategeera obukulu bw'okugatta ebikozesebwa eby'omulembe mu nteekateeka zaago ez'enkulaakulana. Enkyukakyuka eno yeeyolekera nnyo mu bitongole eby'enjawulo, okuva ku by'enjigiriza okutuuka ku byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Lobo mapol tye ka niang ber pa tic ki nyonyo manyen I yubgi me dongo lobo. Alokaloka man nen tutwalle I tenge mapat-pat, cakke ki I lok kom pwony me oo I lok kom pur.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi akiro nuka elago aijulanakin, ejenete akwapin luipu ajokis naka aimorikikin iboro luakwana toma aitemonokineta kec nuka apol. Ewanyunitai aijulanakineta ngun kotoma iriongeta luegelegela, anyoun kotoma asioman kitoni akoru.
lgg_prompt: Angu e'yo oyuza ni 'diyi ni mu drile e'doria, kari karakara eyi e'yo orodriru afa ayuzaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi 'bazu otita eyini angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ojata 'diri e'da kililiru esele ndundu eyi ma alea, e'dozu onita vu kpere agirikica vu.

eng_prompt: Leaders and experts from various fields are gathering to discuss pressing global issues. This event promises to foster collaboration and exchange of ideas on an international scale.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze n'abakugu okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo bakungaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga z'ensi yonna ez'amangu. Omukolo guno gusuubiza okutumbula enkolagana n'okuwanyisiganya ebirowoozo ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.

eng_prompt: Journalists have gathered in the capital to cover the unfolding events. As the situation develops, updates are coming in from various sources.

lgg_prompt: Drile suza e'yo lonyi ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri ni tutuni aa e'yo tujari ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma alea, angu kililiru 'bani angu yi ma dria 'diyi 'bazu kililiru azini geri kililiru 'bani angu yi ma dria 'diyi 'bazu kililiru 'diyi azi okporu ni nga.

lug_prompt: Enkuba ey'amaanyi yatonnya okumala ennaku, ekyaviirako emigga okubooga. Amazzi bwe gaayitiridde mu nguudo, abatuuze baatya nnyo.

lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi nzizaruri 'de o'du karakara erini fezu yi ara yini yi tizu. Yi ni acizu nzila eyi ma alea risi, ori ere 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: The weather forecast had predicted severe storms for the weekend. As the dark clouds gathered overhead, the townspeople braced themselves for the impending deluge.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obudde yali etegeezezza nti wajja kubaawo omuyaga ogw'amaanyi ku wiikendi. Ebire ebiddugavu bwe byajja waggulu, abantu b'omu kibuga beetegekera amataba agaali gagenda okujja.
ach_prompt: Lok kom piny owaco ni kot bibedo magwar tutwal I tum pa cabit. I kare ma pol macol ocung iwi wigi, dano me boma ne guyube pi pong pa pii matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Abu ekwam kotema ebe ebuni ekwam aipor noi kosabiti. Kwape apolor akwap nairionon, apotu itunga luka eibuga itemonokinos kanuka ebulone loebunit.
lgg_prompt: Angu mile ma o'duko ece kini ozo okporu 'diyi nga ovu sabitini i deria ci. Ozoo iniru 'diyi ni yi trazu dria, 'ba tawuni'a 'diyi otu yi yi yi tiza emupi 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ebiteekateeko by'obwire bikaba nibyoreka ngu nihaija kubaho omuyaga gw'amaani aha wiikendi. Obwire bw'omwirima ku bwabaire nibutandika, abantu b'omururembo bakeeteekateekyera omwegyemure ogwabaire guri haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: After the devastating fire swept through the neighborhood, families were forced to evacuate their homes. Despite their efforts to salvage belongings, the destruction left them with nowhere to go.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuliro ogwakutte ekitundu kyonna, amaka gawalirizibwa okuva mu maka gaago. Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka okutaasa ebintu byabwe, okuzikirizibwa kwabalese nga tebalina gye bayinza kugenda.
ach_prompt: Inge mac ma okelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa, odi mapol ki diyo gi me weko gangi gi. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me laro jamigi, bal ne oweko gi peke ki kama gitwero cito iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akim naenyamit aiboisit, aponi kobuikinai ikalia anyoun koreriakec. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu ayuwar iborokec, abu amunar ngin kojalak kesi komamei ne epedorete kesi alosit.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporu 'da ma vutia, familia eyi fu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi ra. Yi ma okpo 'ba tro afa yini 'diyi opazu ra ti, e'yo ezaza 'da ku yi pari muzu yo.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'omuriro gw'amaani kurabira omu byaro, amaka gakagyemeserezibwa kuruga omu maka gaago. Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okucungura ebintu, okusisikara kukabareka bateine ahu barikubaasa kugyenda.

eng_prompt: After weeks of heavy rainfall, the riverbanks overflowed, inundating the surrounding fields. Farmers watched helplessly as their hard work was washed away.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwerako ng'enkuba etonnya nnyo, amazzi g'omugga gajjula ne gabuutikira ennimiro ezaali zeetoolodde. Abalimi baatunuulira nga tebalina kye basobola kukola nga omulimu gwabwe ogw'amaanyi gukulukutiddwa amazzi.
ach_prompt: Inge kare ma kot ocwe matek pi cabit mapol, pii opong ma opongo poto matye cok. Lupur gubedo kaneno labongo kony kit ma tic matek ma gutiyo orweny kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luka edou loepol noi, abu ecilet kilelebun kosodi ailelebun amisirin nueyapiete. Apotu akoriok kosesenata mam epedorete aingarakin naarai aponi kolemunai aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti ozo okporu 'diyiniri ma vutia, yi ara yi ti azini yi ti amvu yi ma ageia 'diyi ma alia. Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ndre e'yo kokoru yini azi okporu yini ngazuri ni yi 'duzurisi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent natural disaster, many communities are struggling to recover and meet their basic needs. It is crucial that we take action to support those affected by this crisis.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku katyabaga k'obutonde akaakagwawo gyebuvuddeko, ebitundu bingi birwana okudda engulu n'okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu. Kikulu nnyo okubaako kye tukola okuyamba abo abakoseddwa ekizibu kino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki, kabedo mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Pire tek tutwal ni omyero watim gin mo me konyo jo ma peko man okelo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka isuban, eutasi itunga luka atutubena nuipu ainingosit kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aswam agangat nejaas ngul luetirorit ationis na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma e'yosi, ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma edri esuzu dika eyi ma afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. Eri orodriru amani e'yo 'yezu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'di ma alia 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi eby'obuhangwa ebyabaireho obwahati, abantu baingi nibarwana kugaruka omu mbeera n'okureeba ngu baahikiiriza ebyetengo byabo. N'eky'omugasho ngu tukore kyona ekirikubaasika okuhwera abo abateganisiibwe oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: Many kids find the confines of their home stifling and crave adventure outside. For some, the allure of playgrounds and friends outweighs the comforts of home.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi basanga enkomerero y'amaka gaabwe nga nzibu era baagala okulambula ebweru. Eri abamu, okusikiriza kw'ebisaawe by'okuzannyiramu n'emikwano kusinga obuweerero bw'awaka.
ach_prompt: Lutino mapol ginongo ni ganggi pe ber tutwal dok gimito cito ka limo piny woko. Ki jo mukene, yomcwiny ma aa ki bot lutuku kacel ki lurem kato yomcwiny ma aa ki gang.

lug_prompt: Okukulaakulanya obukugu bwo kisobola okukuleetera okumatizibwa mu bulamu bwo n'obw'ekikugu. Okwaniriza emikisa gy'enkulaakulana kya nkizo eri obuwanguzi.

eng_prompt: Investing in athletic talent can lead to numerous benefits for society, including improved health and increased national pride. By fostering a culture of sports excellence, we can inspire future generations to pursue their passions.

E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma adriza otuzu e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma alea, ama eco 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma ava enga e'yo eyini le 'diyi 'yezu ra.

eng_prompt: In an effort to increase revenue, the government has decided to implement new tax measures. As a result, various everyday items will now be subject to taxation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku musolo, gavumenti esazeewo okussa mu nkola emisolo emipya. N'ekyavaamu, ebintu eby'enjawulo ebya buli lunaku kati bijja kusoloozebwako omusolo.

eng_prompt: As families prepare for the new school year, they are facing rising costs for supplies and clothing. Budgeting for back-to-school expenses has become a significant challenge for many parents.
lug_prompt: Nga amaka geetegekera omwaka gw'essomero omupya, boolekedde ebbeeyi y'ebintu n'engoye okulinnya. Okukola embalirira y'ensimbi ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kudda ku ssomero kifuuse okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri abazadde bangi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gangi tye ka yubbe pi mwaka me kwan manyen, gitye ka neno wel jami ki bongi matye ka medde. Yubu byek me lim pi lutino kwan odoko peko madit tutwal bot lunyodo mapol.

eng_prompt: As the government proposed new tax regulations, many businesses began to voice their concerns. Among them, stationery dealers expressed strong opposition to the financial burden the tax would impose on their operations.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bwe yateesa ku mateeka amapya agakwata ku misolo, abasuubuzi bangi baatandika okwogera ebibaluma. Mu bo, abasuubuzi b'ebiwandiiko baalaga obutali bumativu olw'omugugu gw'ensimbi omusolo gwe gwali gugenda okuteeka ku mirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gamente okatti ki tam me kelo cik manyen me mucoro, lutim biacara mapol gucako miyo tam gi. I kingi, joo ma cato bukke ki karatac gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom wel lim ma mucoro man biketo I kom tic gi.

lgg_prompt: Gamete ni e'yo 'bazu azita musara ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria, tujari karakara eyi e'do e'yo eyi ma dria e'da. Eyi ma eselea, 'ba afa osisia ni 'diyi ozipi 'diyi ece a'di 'diza okporu e'yo robia ni musoro 'da ni ngazu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Many industries rely on the extraction and processing of minerals, but the methods used can pose significant risks. Workers in quarries and mines often face hazardous conditions that can lead to serious health issues.
lug_prompt: Amakolero mangi geesigama ku kusima n'okulongoosa eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka, naye enkola ezikozesebwa ziyinza okuleeta akabi ak'amaanyi. Abakozi mu birombe n'ebirombe batera okusanga embeera ez'obulabe eziyinza okuvaako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu.

eng_prompt: The ancient texts often spoke of the king's divine qualities and unmatched virtues. Among his many titles, one stood out for its profound significance.

lgg_prompt: E'yo andra drio 'diyi nze e'yo 'ba opi ru 'diyi ma adriza onyiru azini adriza onyiru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo dria erini 'yele 'diyi ma eselea, alu 'du pari e'yo orodriruri ma e'yosi.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, musical instruments hold significant meaning and often represent the heartbeat of a community. For the Kingdom, the drum embodies unity and strength, resonating with the spirit of its people.

lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya kwe okutegeera ebyafaayo by'obwakabaka, yayingira mu biwandiiko eby'edda ne mu tterekero ly'obwakabaka. Essira yalitadde ku mannya ag'enjawulo bakabaka ge baakozesanga mu biseera eby'edda.

eng_prompt: After a wild night that spiraled out of control, he found himself in a situation he never expected. Now, his friends are desperately trying to figure out how to help him.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiro ekizibu ennyo, yeesanga mu mbeera gye yali tasuubira. Kati, mikwano gye bagezezaako nnyo okuzuula engeri y'okumuyambamu.
ach_prompt: Inge dyewor marac tutwal ma pe obedo ki twero, en onongo ni en tye I peko ma onongo pe byek tye I kome. Kombedi lureme tye ka tute matek me nongo yoo me konye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akware naetiono noi, abu ngesi kodum akekuan toma ojautene lomam ngesi aomit. Kwana, eutasi ipaperoke aitam noi ajenun epone loka aingarakin ngesi.
lgg_prompt: O'du azi onziruri ma vutia, eri isu i e'yo erini egari ma alia. Sawa 'disi, eri ma agyipi yi o'bi avasi geri ecozu eri ma aza kozu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ekiro ky'obwinazi ekyabaire kitarikwetegyerezibwa, akeeshangira omu mbeera ei yaabaire atateekateekire. Hati, banywani be nibagyezaho munonga kumanya oku bashemereire kumuyamba.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling to make ends meet, the journalist found himself facing mounting financial pressures. Despite his best efforts to secure a loan, he ultimately fell short when it came time to settle his obligations in court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'alwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, munnamawulire oyo yeesanga mu buzibu bw'ensimbi obweyongera buli lukya. Wadde nga yakola kyonna ekisoboka okwewola ssente, ekiseera kyatuuka n'alemererwa okusasula ebisaanyizo bye mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo, lacoo lok angea ne onongo tye ki peko me lim matye kamede. Kadi bed ni en otute matek me nongo den, en pe ocobo miti ne I agiki ne I kare ma kare oromo me cobo ticce I kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitelekaar aijar, abu arotan iyemuto kodum ebe ejai ationis naka ikapun. Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu naepol noi kanu adumun eloni, abu ngesi ibiror kotoma apak naka aitac ikapunuke adieket.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini dri ciria afa dria esuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi isu yi dri e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi ma alia. Erini tro okpo 'bazu mari esuzu ra ti, asizu e'de sawa ecazu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ofezu dwania 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana kwebaisaho, omunyamahurire akeeshangira aine oburemeezi bw'esente obweyongyeire. N'obu yaakozire kyona ekirikubaasika kutunga rooni, akahendera aremirwe obu obwire bwahika bw'okushashura obujunanizibwa bwe omu kooti.

eng_prompt: The town still remembers the day when the news broke. Many gathered to pay their respects to a man who had dedicated his life to service.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kikyajjukira olunaku amawulire lwe gaafuluma. Bangi baakuŋŋaanye okussa ekitiibwa kyabwe mu musajja eyawaayo obulamu bwe okuweereza.

lgg_prompt: Tawuni 'da ma alea 'ba eyi nga po'di ega o'du e'yo 'da ni efuzu ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi tra eyi inzita fezu agu idri erini 'diyi owipi azi ngazu ri dri.

eng_prompt: The medical team conducted a thorough examination, but the results yielded no clear answers. Despite extensive testing and investigation, the circumstances surrounding the individual's passing remained a mystery.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abasawo yakola okwekebejjebwa okujjuvu naye ebyava mu kukebera tebyafulumye bya kuddamu bitegeerekeka. Newankubadde waliwo okukebera n'okunoonyereza okungi, embeera eyeetoolodde okufa kw'omuntu yasigala nga ya kyama.
ach_prompt: Dul pa daktari gutimo pim matut tutwal, ento adwogi ne pe okelo lagam matye atir. Kadi bed ni kitimo pim ki kwed madit tutwal, jami ma otimme ikare ma dano enoni otoo pud pe ngene.
teo_prompt: Apotu imurok inwakautu aingic ejok, konye mam akiro ngun apotu odumutu abongonokineta nuajokak. Karaida aponi inwakai keda aingic noi, mam aponi kojenunai epone loatwania itunganan ngol.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi andri eyi ma rua kililiru te e'yo efupi 'diyi awini e'yo eyi ma aza ko kililiru ku. O'bita azini vuti ondaza angiri 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo 'ba 'da ni drazu 'diyi awi e'yo 'bani nile ku.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abashaho ekakora okukyebera kurungi kwonka ebirugiremu tibirikushoboorora gye. Oihireho okukyebera n'okucondooza munonga, embeera y'okufa kw'omuntu ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the latest health reports, the president called an emergency meeting with his medical team. He had expected better outcomes and clearer communication regarding the nation's health crisis.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya alipoota z'ebyobulamu ezisembyeyo, pulezidenti yayita olukungaana olw'amangu n'abasawo be. Yali asuubira ebivaamu ebirungi n'empuliziganya ennambulukufu ku bikwata ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwogi tic pa lutic yoto kom, ladit lobo olwongo kacoke ma opoto atura ki lutic yoto kom mege. En onongo tye ki gen ni adwogi ne bibedo ber dok lok angeya malubbe ki peko me yot kom I lobo man bibedo yot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iripotan luka angaleu luitetiak, abu lokapolon akwap konyarau airiamunet keda eswamakake luka angaleu. Aomit ngesi ebe ebuni ngesi adumun akiro nuajokak nuikamunitos ationis naka angaleu naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, prisdent omve mitingi e'yo mbeleru ni i vile amuti arojo ni 'diyi pie. Eri ega ndra e'yo efupi onyiru azini e'yo nzeza kililiru e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ripoota z'eby'amagara, purezidenti akeeta orukiiko rw'amaani n'abashaho be. Akaba ategyereize ebirikurugamu birungi hamwe n'empurizagana nungi aha bikwatiraine n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: After weeks of providing care and treatment, the medical staff have grown increasingly frustrated with the lack of compensation. They have decided to take a stand and insist on receiving their overdue payments.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bawa obujjanjabi n'obujjanjabi, abasawo beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'obutaba na kuliyirirwa. Basazeewo okuyimirira n'okunywerera ku kufuna ssente zaabwe ezisaliddwa.
ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me miyo kony ki kony me yot kom, lutic yoto kom cwinygi ocwer tutwal pi cul ma pe gi nongo. Gumoko tam gi me cung matek i kom nongo culgi ma dong okato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aijanakin amukian keda amukian, mam eswamak luka angaleu eyalamasi kanu amamus atacakinio. Aseutu kesi aibwo kosodete ainguun ebe ibusakinit kesi aitac ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma tambaza azini aro fezu 'bo, eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'bani eyi ofezu kurisi. Eyi 'du e'yo pa tuzu eyini ani asi 'bazu eyi ma musara eyini sa'wa ezu 'diyi esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okureeberera n'okuragurira abashaho, abakozi b'eby'amagara beeyongyeire kugwera ekiniga ahabw'obutashashurwa. Bakasharamu kutaho enteekateeka y'okutunga emishaara yaabo erikukyerererwa.

eng_prompt: After much deliberation and weighing their options, they concluded that taking a break was necessary for their well-being. The stress and pressure had become overwhelming, prompting them to prioritize their mental health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo n'okulowooza ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu, baatuuka ku kusalawo nti okuwummulamu kyali kyetaagisa ku lw'obulungi bwabwe. Obunkenke n'okunyigirizibwa byali bibasukkiridde, ne bibaleetera okukulembeza obulamu bwabwe obw'obwongo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut ki tamo I kom gin ma gitwero timone, gumoko ni yweyo obedo gin ma pire tek pi ber bedo gi. Par ki lyeto ma onongo gitye kwede omako wigi tutwal, ma oweko guketo cwinygi I kom yotkom me adamgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom noi keda aomoom nuepedorete kesi aswam, apotu kesi kongicutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aiyengun kanuka aijar kec najokan. Apol noi aiyalongongo keda aiyalongongo, ido abu koyangau kesi aisingarenit angaleukec naka adam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo yini eco 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du egata kini ava liza eri orodriru eyi ma edri ni. E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi eca ndra okporu tu eyini ani fe eyini asi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma omi ni 'diyi ma dria okori ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga n'okushwijuma eby'okukora, bakasharamu ngu okuhuumura kikaba kiri eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bwabo. Okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira bikaba nibingi munonga, ekyabareeteire kwebembeza amagara gaabo g'omutwe.

eng_prompt: As the demand for housing continues to rise, many developers are seeking new opportunities. With urban areas becoming increasingly crowded, investors are looking for land.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'amayumba bweyongera okulinnya, abazimba bangi banoonya emikisa emipya. Olw'abantu okweyongera obungi mu bibuga, bamusigansimbi banoonya ettaka.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel odi tye kamede kwede, ludiro mapol tye ka yenyo gum me tic mapat-pat. Kit ma dano tye mapol I boma madongo, luket lim I biyacara tye ka yenyo ngom.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo itogoi, eutasi itunga luipu aimo arerengesio nuitetiak. Keda aiboisio nuipu itunga noi koibuga, eutasi agwelanarak aimo alupok.
lgg_prompt: Jo ma cu ni mu drile turia, 'ba angu ezo'ba karakara 'diyi drileba o'diru 'diyi nda. Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tutu risi, 'ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi nyaku nda.
nyn_prompt: Okwetenga kw'amaju kukweise nikweyongyera, abahingi baingi nibaronda emirimo misya. Ahabw'okugira ngu emyanya y'omu ndembo eyeyongyeire kuba erimu abantu baingi, abashubuzi nibaronda eitaka.

eng_prompt: In today's volatile market, many are looking for stable opportunities to secure their investments. However, relying on government actions can often lead to uncertainty and disappointment.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akakyukakyuka, bangi banoonya mikisa egy'obutebenkevu okukuuma eby'obusuubuzi byabwe. Newankubadde, okwesigama ku bikolwa bya gavumenti emirundi egisinga kuviirako obutali bukakafu n'okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye mapol tutwal, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me gwoko limgi. Kadi bed kumeno, jenge I kom tim pa gamente ipol kare kelo peko ki turcwiny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka esokoni, eutasi itunga luipu aimo arerengesio nu eyuara kanu aingada ikapun kec. Konye, amunokina aswamisio nuka apugan eyangauni amamus aijen ka amamut aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Cuu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi geri ndundu eyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma lonyi lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ma tambazu. Kani si, asi'baza e'yo gamete ni 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri eco sawa driasi fe e'yo aa'zu e'yo kokoru azini asi nyoza ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'erizooba akarimu okuhindahinduka, baingi nibasherura emigisha y'okurinda eby'obushubuzi byabo. Kwonka okwesiga ebikorwa bya Gavumenti, nikibaasa kureetaho obutetegyerezibwa n'okumarwa amaani.

eng_prompt: The company recently acquired a new location to expand its operations. This strategic move allows for increased production capacity and future growth.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko kampuni yafuna ekifo ekipya okugaziya emirimu gyayo. Enkola eno ey'obukodyo esobozesa okwongera ku busobozi bw'okufulumya ebintu n'okukulaakulana mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Cokcok-ki dul ne onongo kabedo manyen me medo ticgi. Yub man weko rwom me yubo jami mede ki dongo lobo I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Abu ekampuni kodum aiboisit naitetet kanu aitanyanyar aswamukec. Epedori aswamisioit ngin aiyatakin apedor naka aitolomun iboro ka apol koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Amuti nderi isu pari o'diruni eturisi azi erini 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu. E'yo 'di ni fe e'yo afa edeza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu zota ewu drialeri ma alea ri be.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni etungire omwanya musya gw'okushanjuura emirimo yaayo. Enkora egi neeyongyera amaani omu kukora ebintu n'entunguuka omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: The hospital had recently implemented a new hiring policy aimed at increasing diversity within its staff. However, some employees were not pleased with the decision, expressing concerns about qualifications and experience.
lug_prompt: Eddwaliro gyebuvuddeko lyateekawo enkola empya ey'okupangisa abantu ng'egenderera okwongera ku bungi bw'abakozi baayo. Newankubadde, abakozi abamu tebaali basanyufu n'okusalawo, nga balaga okweraliikirira ku bisaanyizo n'obumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: Cocoki ot yat okatti ki cik manyen me coyo lutic mapatpat. Kadi bed kumeno, lutic mukene cwinygi pe obedo yom ki tam ma kimoko, kun giwaco ni gi tye ki lworo I kom rwom me kwan gi ki ngec gi.
teo_prompt: Abu pac adekis itolomu ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aipagisa eswamak kanu aiyatakin eswamak luegelegela. Konye, mam eswamak ice eyalamasi keda aseunet ngin, itodunitos aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos apedorosio keda amisiarit.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da e'do curu'do azita o'diru azi'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma esele cozu. Kani si, azi'ba azi 'diyi aa'ni ndra ayikosi e'yo 'duza 'da si ku, eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini nita eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro rikaba ritandikireho engyenderwaho nsya y'okupangisa abakozi erikugyenderera okwongyera obwingi bw'abakozi baayo. Kwonka abakozi abamwe tibashemerereirwe encwamu egyo, barikworeka okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'ebirikwetengwa hamwe n'obumanyirizi.

eng_prompt: As the healthcare system faces increasing challenges, there is a growing need for skilled professionals to fill the gaps in patient care. To address this shortage, many hospitals are looking to recruit foreign doctors who bring diverse expertise and experience.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyobulamu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okweyongera, waliwo obwetaavu obweyongera obw'abakugu abalina obukugu okuziba ebituli mu kulabirira abalwadde. Okumalawo ebbula lino, amalwaliro mangi gatunuulira okuwandiika abasawo abagwiira abajja n'obukugu n'obumanyirivu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yub me yot kom tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal, miti tye pi ludiro matye ki ngec me tic i kom lutwo. Me tyeko peko man, odi yadi mapol tye ka mito coyo ludaktari ma aa ki lobo mawoko ma gitye ki ngec ma pat pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejaas erionget loka angaleu keda atiokisio nuiyatakinos, ejai eipuda lo ipirioitin luepedorete ailelebikin aiboisio nuka aidar adekak. Kanu aitemokin ekadakada lo, eutasi adekisia nuipu aimo imurok luka akwapin ace luejaasi keda ipirioitin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ni esu tualurisi, le 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma nga azi 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, arojo karakara eyi le dakitari enga'ba kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi si geri ndundu eyini azi ngazu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'amagara birikurabamu oburemeezi obweyongyeire, hariho ekyetengo ky'abakugu kuhwera abarwaire. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu, amarwariro maingi gariyo nigasherura abashaho kuruga aheeru abaine obukugu n'obumanyirizi butarikushushana.

eng_prompt: After months of anticipation and hope, the community gathered for the vaccination drive. However, as the first doses were administered, doubts began to surface about the legitimacy of the supplies.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okusuubira n'okusuubira, abantu baakuŋŋaana mu kaweefube w'okugema. Newankubadde, nga ddoozi ezisooka ziweebwa, okubuusabuusa kwatandika okulabika ku bwenkanya bw'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kuro ki bedo ki gen, lwak gugure pi yub me gwero dano. Kadi bed kumeno, ikare ma ki miyo yat agwera me acel, akala-kala ocake I kom twero pa jami ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aomisio keda amuno, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aikis ekato. Konye, neipikakinere idoses lusodit, apotu abuonokin toma abeit naka iboro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia asi'baza azini asi'baza be, ongulumu eyi tra eyi otita aro soza niri 'yezu. Kani si, 'bani aro osoza oko 'diyi fezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'do e'yo ega kini afa 'bani awale 'diyi ma e'yo ada ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okutegyereza n'okugira amatsiko, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kukora enteekateeka y'okusirika. Kwonka, nk'oku emibazi y'okubanza yaabaire neegambwa, okubanganisa kukatandika kubaho ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'ebintu ebyo.

eng_prompt: In the shadows of a bustling city, tensions between rival factions were escalating. The agency knew they needed someone discreet to infiltrate the enemy's ranks.
lug_prompt: Mu kisiikirize ky'ekibuga ekijjudde abantu, obunkenke wakati w'ebiwayi ebivuganya bweyongedde. Ekitongole kyali kimanyi nti kyetaaga omuntu ow'ekyama okuyingira mu lunyiriri lw'abalabe.
ach_prompt: I dye boma madit ma dano dwong iye, telle I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat matye ka pyem I kingi obedo ka mede. Dul enoni onongo ngeyo ni gimito ngat mo ma ryek me donyo I kin lumone.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aipanya nuka eibuga loepol noi, apol noi ingungeta kiding ipatei lueboloboloete. Ajeni erionget ebe ekotosi kesi itunganan yenepedori alomar toma orotin luka lukasurup.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma dria, ori gbaza amuti a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma eselea ri ri ri tu uru. Amuti 'da nii ra kini eyi le 'ba azi e'yo kokoru ni eyi ma ti suzu 'ba aribo eyini 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicuucu by'orurembo orwabaire rurimu abantu baingi, obunkenke ahagati y'ebibiina ebyabaire nibihakanisa bukaba nibweyongyera. Ekitongore kikaba nikimanya ngu nikyetenga omuntu w'obwegyendesereza okwejumba omu mahe g'abazigu.

eng_prompt: After years of research and development, the team finally achieved a breakthrough in their efforts to combat the virus. With the support of government funding and collaboration with leading scientists, the company made the vaccine.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza n'okukulaakulanya okumala emyaka, ttiimu yatuuka ku buwanguzi mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa akawuka. Olw'obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti n'okukolagana ne bannassaayansi abakugu, kampuni yakola eddagala erigema.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me kwed ki dongo lobo, dul enoni otyeko nongo yoo me lweny i kom kwidi ne. Ki kony me lim pa gamente kacel ki winye ki lucayan madongo, dul ne oyubu yat agwera ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aingic keda aitolomun iboro, apotu etimu opedosi aitodolikin aswamukec naka aitiji ekorona. Keda agangat naka ikapun kama ejai apugan keda aiswamanara keda itunga luka sayanis luapolok, abu ekampuni kiswama ekato.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara 'bani e'yo vuti ondazu azini e'yo ezozu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu e'yo azi okporu eyini 'ye ecozu a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be ra. Atita robia ni gameteni fe risi tualu ti ecita be 'ba sayansini okporu 'diyi pie, amuti 'da ede aro azo atrizu ri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okucondooza n'okutunguura, tiimu ekabaasa kurwanisa akakooko ka korona. Ekitongore kikakora omubazi gw'okusirika n'obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga omu Gavumenti hamwe n'ab'ebya sayansi abakuru.

eng_prompt: We are eagerly awaiting updates on the situation. The press conference is about to begin, and the reporter will give us more information.
lug_prompt: Tulindirira n'obwagazi amawulire agakwata ku mbeera. Olukungaana lwa bannamawulire lunaatera okutandika era omusasi ajja kutubuulira ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Watye kakuru lok manyen I kom ngo matye katimme. Kacokke pa luco lok angeya dong cok cakke, ki lacoo lok angea obi miniwa ngec mukene.
teo_prompt: Idarit sio akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ejautene. Eyapie einer keda lu iyemuto ageun, ido ebuni arotan iyemuto aijaikin oni akiro nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ama asi driasi e'yo o'duko e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi te. E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri nga e'do mbeleru, dika 'ba osisiani 'diyi nga ama dri o'dukoti drile ri fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Twine ekihika ky'okutegyereza ebirikukwata aha nshonga. Orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru ruri haihi kutandika, kandi omushaki w'amahurire naija kutuha ebirikukiraho.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions among the team have raised concerns about the effectiveness of our current protocols. As a result, we have decided to reassess our guidelines regarding response times.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa mu ttiimu kuleeseewo okweraliikirira ku bukugu bw'enkola zaffe eziriwo. N'ekivuddemu, tusazeewo okuddamu okwekenneenya ebiragiro byaffe ebikwata ku budde bw'okwanukula.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki ikin lutic okelo lworo I kom yoo me tic ma watye kwede kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, wamoko tamwa me ngiyo yoo me tic ma watye kwede ma lubbe ki kare me gamo lapeny.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lupac kiding etimu eyangautu aiyalongong kanuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ainapeta wok. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio acamutu airereor aicoreta wok nuikamunitos apak naka abongokin.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru amuti nde ma eselea 'diyi eji asi otiza e'yo ama vile azita sawa 'disi 'diyi ma 'yeta ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, ama 'du e'yo ama vile azita sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu dika.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okwabaireho ahagati y'akakiiko, kireesireho okwerarikirira aha bukoryo obu turikukoresa obwahati. N'ekyarugiremu, tushaziremu kugaruka kushwijuma ebiragiro byaitu ebirikukwata aha bwire bw'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious election, the community finally welcomed their newly elected leader. Many residents were hopeful for positive changes and eager to see what initiatives would be introduced.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okuwanvu era okwalimu enkaayana, abantu baasembyeyo okwaniriza omukulembeze waabwe eyaakalondebwa. Abatuuze bangi baali basuubira enkyukakyuka ennungi era nga beesunga okulaba enteekateeka ki ezigenda okutandikibwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer ma obedo pi kare malac dok ma opong ki apoka-poka, lwak i agiki ne gujolo latela gi manyen ma kiyero. Lutedero mapol gubedo ki gen pi aloka-loka maber dok gubedo ki miti me neno yub ango ma kibinyuto.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aseo, apotu itunga ijaikisi engarenon lo aseun. Ejaasi itunga luipu keda amuno naka aijulakin iboro luibusakinit aitolomun.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ezuru azini ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ai asizu eyi ma drice'ba o'diru 'diyi ra. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi'baza be ojata muke 'diyi ma dria dika eyi le saaru e'yo 'bani nga 'ye 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaruuru akarikumara obwire buraingwa kandi akarimu entongane, abantu bakahendera baakiira omwebembezi waabo omusya. Abatuuragye baingi bakaba baine amatsiko g'empinduka nungi kandi baine ekihika ky'okureeba enteekateeka ezirikuza kutandikwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing budget deficit, the government is considering various measures to boost revenue. As part of this plan, some taxes will be increased.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi eryeyongera mu mbalirira, gavumenti erowooza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okwongera ku musolo. Ng'ekimu ku nteekateeka eno, emisolo egimu gijja kwongezebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me byek me lim matye kamede, gamente tye ka tamo I kom yoo mapat-pat me medo lim. Macalo but yub man, gibimedo mucoro mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ekadakada loka ebajet, euta apugan aomoom iwaitin luegelegela lu itopoloere ikapun. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aiyatakin isolosinei ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ayuza ma ongmbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete ni e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye robia esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga musoro azi 'diyi otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'esente eyeyongyeire omu mbariirira,gavumenti eriyo nereeba oburyo bw'okwongyera aha mishoro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, emishoro emwe neija kwongyezibwa.

eng_prompt: As the government proposed new funding initiatives, a wave of discontent began to spread among the populace. Many residents expressed their frustration during town hall meetings, voicing concerns about their financial burdens.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bwe yaleetawo enteekateeka empya ez'okuvujjirira, obutali bumativu bwatandika okusaasaana mu bantu. Abatuuze bangi baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe mu nkiiko za town hall, nga balaga obweraliikirivu olw'emigugu gyabwe egy'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gamente okatti ki tam manyen me miyo cente, cwer cwiny ocako nya ikin lwak. Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwiny gi ikare me kacoke me town hall, kun gi nyutu lworo gi i kom peko me lim ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar apugan aitemokin ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aigang ikapun, abu amamut aiyalama kogeu aisiarakin kanejaas itunga. Apotu itunga luipu kitodu aiyalongongokec kotoma airiamununeta nuka etaun hall, itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanu ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni e'yo otuta robia fezu o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri si, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku ri e'do i ere o'bi eyi ma eselea. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku ri mitingi tawuni hall ni 'diyi ma alea eyini asi otiza e'dazu e'yo eyini robia esu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku yaagizire ekiteiso ky'okutandikaho enkora ensya y'okushashurira abantu, okwetomboita kukatandika kujanjaara omu bantu. Abatuuragye baingi bakooreka obusaasi bwabo omu nkiiko za tawuni hall, barikworeka okwerarikirira ahabw'emihendo yaabo y'esente.

eng_prompt: After months of observing his growing discontent, the team began to wonder about his future with the company. Rumors circulated that he was considering other opportunities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga balaba obutali bumativu bwe obweyongera, ttiimu yatandika okwebuuza ku biseera bye eby'omu maaso ne kampuni. Olugambo lwatambula nti yali alowooza ku mikisa emirala.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me neno cwer cwiny mege, lutic ne gucako tamo I kom anyim mege ki dul ne. Lok angea okato ni en tye ka tamo I kom gum mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aanyun amamut aiyalama ke, apotu etimu kogeutu aomoom nuikamunitos ngarenike keda ekampuni. Apotu akiro kotakanutu ebe euta ngesi aomoom nuikamunitos arerengesio ace.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani eri ma awata ni zozu ri ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti nde e'do e'yo ega eri ma ewu drialeri ma dria amuti nde be. E'yo onzi eyi aci kini eri e'yo ega drileba azi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okureeba obutashemererwa bwe obweyongyeire, tiimu ekatandika kwebuuza ebiro bye by'omumaisho na kampuni. Orugambo rukajanjaara ngu akaba nateekateeka aha migisha endiijo.

eng_prompt: After the press conference ended, the journalist approached the spokesperson for a more in-depth discussion. She was eager to clarify some of the statements made during the event.
lug_prompt: Olukungaana lwa bannamawulire bwe lwawedde, bannamawulire baatuukirira omwogezi w'olukiiko okuteesa mu bujjuvu. Yali ayagala nnyo okunnyonnyola ebimu ku bigambo ebyayogerwa ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko lok ki lucoo lok angea, lacoo lok angea ne ocito bot lalok pi lok matut. En obedo ki miti matek me tito lok mogo ma en owaco I kare me yub ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin einer keda arotak iyemuto, abu arotan iyemuto kolot mama ejai eraban kanu aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun. Akoto ngesi aitetem akiro ace nuelimunitai kotoma opucit kangol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri ni i dezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi emu 'ba anzenzea ei ni ri vu e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea. Eri ndra avaru e'yo 'bani nze omu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma azi eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru ku rwahwaire, abanyamakuru bakahika ahari mukuru w'eishengyero kugira ngu bagambe ebirikukiraho. Akaba aine ekihika ky'okushoborora bimwe aha bigambirwe aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread protests from the local community, officials announced their plans to seize the property for development. Many residents were shocked when they learned that the government had bypassed legal protocols in the process.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okwekalakaasa kungi okuva mu bantu b'omu kitundu, abakungu baalangirira enteekateeka zaabwe ez'okutwala ekibanja ekyo okukikozesa mu by'enkulaakulana. Abatuuze bangi baakwatibwa ensonyi bwe baamanya nti gavumenti yali ebuuse amateeka mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak obedo ka jemo, lutic guwaco ni gitye ki yub me mayo jami ne pi dongo lobo. Lutedero mapol gubedo ki ngeng I kare ma guniang ni gamente okwero lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu itunga luka atutubet ongurianata, apotu eswamak kolimosi aitemonokineta kec nuka aikamar iboro kanu apol. Apotu itunga luipu koumokisi noi najenunia kesi ebe mam apugan etupitos ainapeta nuka ikisila kotoma ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ni ngiringiri 'yezu 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi otita yini lezu angu 'da 'duzu angu ezoma ni. O'bi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi ovu osuta si eyini e'yo onizu kini gamete aga azita eyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obwesharingo bwingi kuruga omu bantu b'omubyaro, abakuru bakarangirira enteekateeka yaabo y'okutwara eitaka ry'entunguuka. Abatuuragye baingi bakatangaara ku baaherize kumanya ngu gavumenti ekaba etakuratiire ebiragiro omu nkora egyo.

eng_prompt: After years of deforestation and habitat destruction, local conservation efforts finally succeeded in protecting the land. As a result, the area is now a forest reserve.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga batema emiti n'okusaanyaawo ebifo we babeera, abantu b'omu kitundu baasobola okukuuma ettaka. N'ekyavaamu, ekitundu kati kifuuse kya kibira.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tongo yadi ki balo kabedo ma dano bedo iye, tute pa lwak me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa I agiki ne gucobo miti gi me gwoko ngom eni. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo ne dong odoko bunga.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitub ikito keda amunar aiboisio, apotu itunga luka atutubet kopedosi ayuwar alupok ngun. Kanuka ngun, erai kwana aiboisit ngin aiboisit naidarere amagoron.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani pati ogazu azini angu aa'zu 'diyi ezazu 'bori ma vutia, okpo 'ba angu 'da ma ta mbapi 'diyi esu asizu angu 'da ma tambazu ra. E'yo 'disi, angu 'da curu'do jere ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutema emiti hamwe n'okushiisha eby'obuhangwa, amaani g'okurinda eby'obuhangwa omu byaro gakahwera omu kurinda eitaka. N'ekyarugiremu,omwanya hati n'ekibira.

eng_prompt: Despite the doubts swirling in their minds, the evidence they presented was compelling. As the discussion unfolded, it became clear that their honesty was unwavering.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalina okubuusabuusa mu birowoozo byabwe, obujulizi bwe baayanjudde bwali bukakasa. Ng'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kugenda mu maaso, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obwesimbu bwabwe tebwali bukyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki akala-kala I wigi, caden ma gunyuto obedo ber tutwal. I kare ma nywako lok tye ka wot anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni lokgi tye ada.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajaasi kesi keda abuonokin kotoma aomisiokec, ajaasi kesi keda ajenanut naepol noi. Neautar aitetem akiro ngun, apotu kojenutu ebe mam abeit kec epedori aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro aa'zu e'yo eyi ma omi ma alea ra ti, afa ecetaru eyini e'da 'diyi ndra okporu. E'yo onzeza ni muzu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini yi ma e'yo a'da ri ma omgbo esi ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe haabaire hariho okubanganisa omu biteekateeko byabo, obujurizi obu baahayo bukaba nibugumya. Okugaaniira kukaguma nikugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu amazima gaabo gakaba gatarikuhinduka.

eng_prompt: After struggling to keep up with her classmates, she realized the importance of focusing on her studies. Motivated by her desire to improve, she began seeking help and resources to enhance her learning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuba okukwatagana ne bayizi banne, yakizuula nti kikulu nnyo okussaayo omwoyo ku misomo gye. Olw'okwagala okulongooka, yatandika okunoonya obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa okwongera ku buyigirize bwe.
ach_prompt: Inge tute matek me lubu kor lutino kwan luwote, en oniang ber pa keto cwinye I kwan. En ocako yenyo kony ki jami me medo rwom me kwane pien obedo ki miti me medo rwom me kwane.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ainingosit ajaut keda ipaupake luka atukot, abu ngesi kojen ajokis naka aiting asiomanike. Aponi kisinyikokinai ngesi aimo agangat keda iboro lu itojokaret asiomanike.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru isuzu eri ma agyipika kilasi'a 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, eri esu orodri asi 'bazu onita ma dria ri ra. E'yo erini lezu i otuzuri ma e'yosi, eri e'do azakoma azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi nda eri ma onita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurwana n'abeegi bagyenzi be, akeetegyereza omugasho gw'okuta amaani aha mishomo ye. Ahabw'ekyetengo kye ky'okutunguuka, akatandika kuronda obuhwezi n'ebintu by'okutunguura eby'obwegyese bwe.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, the number of applicants continues to rise. As a result, employers are inundated with resumes from highly skilled candidates.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, omuwendo gw'abasaba emirimu gweyongera okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, abakozesa bajjula biwandiiko okuva mu bantu abalina obukugu obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I kom tic, wel dano ma tye ka penyo pi tic tye ka medde. Macalo adwogi ne, wegi tic gi pong ki karatac tic pa lutino kwan ma ludiro tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka aswamisinei, iyata enaba lo itunga lu ekotosi aswam. Kanuka ngun, epuakata ikulepek aswam keda aiwadikaeta nuka aswam kama ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda acoa naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ewu andruri ma alia, kalafe 'ba waraga sipi azi tia 'diyi ni ri ni mu drile tu. E'yo 'disi, ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi esu engazu ꞌba onita be angiri ꞌdiyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empaka z'emirimo, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikushaba emirimo niguguma nigweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozesa baingi nibatunga ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo kuruga omu bantu abaine emyoga y'amaani.

eng_prompt: As we assess the effectiveness of local governance, it's important to evaluate the performance of key officials. One group that plays a crucial role in this is the Resident District Commissioners.
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya obulungi bw'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu, kikulu okwekenneenya enkola y'abakungu abakulu. Ekibiina ekimu ekikola omulimu omukulu mu kino be ba Resident District Commissioners.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno kit ma tela me tedero tye maber kwede, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma lutic mapigi tego tye katimo kwede ticgi. Dul acel ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal I lok man obedo dul pa luwang gamente I district.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio aanyanar eswamae loajokan loka epugae lo okwap, ejokuna aanyanar eswamae lo eswamak luapolok. Egurupu ediope loejaasi keda aswam naepol noi kotoma akiro nu eraasi lukapolok luko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Amani geri local governance ni azi ngazu kililiru ri ma ale andriria, eri orodriru azi'ba okporu 'diyi ma 'yeta ma ale andrizu indi. Ongulumu alu azi okporu ngapi e'yo 'di ma alia 'diyi 'ba Resident District Commissioners ru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma oburungi bw'obwebembezi bw'ebyanga, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma enkora y'abakuru. Guruupu emwe erikukora omurimo gw'amaani omuri eki n'abajwekyerwa ba gavumenti aha disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events, the community has been closely observing the actions of local authorities. Many residents have expressed concerns about the effectiveness of their leadership.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abantu babadde beetegereza nnyo ebikolwa by'abakulembeze b'ebyalo. Abatuuze bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku bukugu bw'obukulembeze bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lwak gubedo ka neno tic pa lutela me tedero. Lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo I kom tela gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, eutasi itunga airereonor aswamisio nuka apedorosio nuka atutubet. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongikec kanuikamunitos epone loingarenikitotor kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ongulumu eyi ebi e'yo drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini 'ye 'diyi ma pamvu one. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyi ma driceza kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho juba, abantu batwire nibareebuuza ebikorwa by'abebembezi b'ebyaro. Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obwebembezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the increasing number of foreign professionals entering the healthcare workforce. Many local physicians feel that this trend undermines their job security and the quality of care provided to patients.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abakugu abagwiira abayingira mu byobulamu. Abasawo b'omu kitundu bangi bawulira nti kino kikosa emirimu gyabwe n'omutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Lworo tye pi wel ludiro ma aa ki lobo mawoko matye kadonyo I tic me yot kom. Daktari me tedero mapol gitye ki tam ni tim man balo ticgi ki rwom me kony ma kimiyo ki lutwo.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu enaaba loepol loka ipirioitin luka akwapin ace lueutasi alomar toma aswam naka angaleu. Eomitos imurok luka atutubet ebe itolitoli ngin aswamukec keda amukian na ijaikitai adekak.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'bi ovu e'yo kalafe angiri 'ba azi ngapi e'yo rua alanisi engapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyini fizu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Dakitari karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ega kini e'yo 'di ni eyi ma azi eyi eza dika eyi ma azakoma fele 'ba azoru 'diyi dri ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira ahabw'omuhendo gw'abakugu kuruga aheeru y'eihanga ogweyongyeire omu by'amagara. Abashaho b'omubyaro baingi nibateekateeka ngu omuringo ogu niguremesa emirimo yaabo n'omutindo gw'okureeberera abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent staffing shortages, it's important to evaluate all potential candidates. Many qualified individuals within the community are eager to contribute their skills.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bbula ly'abakozi gyebuvuddeko, kikulu okwekenneenya abo bonna abeesimbyewo. Abantu bangi abalina ebisaanyizo mu kitundu beetegefu okuwaayo obukugu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me nok pa lutic ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me neno joo weng matye ki miti me cung. Dano mapol ma gukwano i kabedo wa gitye ki miti me miyo ngec gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ekadakada loka eswamak, ejokuna airereor eswamak kere lu ekotosi abwaak. Itunga luipu luejaasi keda apedor kotoma atutubet ekotosi aimedaun keda acoasineikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi'ba eyini aa'zu weresi ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru 'ba dria ecopi pa tupi ra 'diyi ma ale andrizu. Ba karakara onita be ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi avasi ondua eyini 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'abakozi eriho obwahati, n'eky'omugasho okushwijuma abantu boona abarikwenda kwesimbaho. Abantu baingi abaine emishomo omu byaro, baine ekihika ky'okuhayo emyoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the financial documents, several discrepancies were identified that could jeopardize the upcoming project. The team convened to discuss the necessary steps to address these concerns promptly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ennyo ebiwandiiko by'ensimbi, wabaddewo obutakkaanya obw'enjawulo obuyinza okukosa pulojekiti ejja. Ttiimu yatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ebizibu bino mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom karatac me lim, kinongo jami mapol ma pe tye kakare ma twero balo yub matye kabino ni. Dul ne gubedo kacoke me nywako tam i kom ngo ma omyero gutim pi tyeko peko eni oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor apapula nuka ikapun, aponi kodumunai iboro luipu lumam epedorete aimusung epurojekt lo ebunit. Abu etimu iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu katipet.
lgg_prompt: Bani kokobi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu e'yo onzi karakara ecopi otita emupi ri ezapi ra 'diyi. Amuti 'da eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye e'yo eyi ma aza kozu mbeleru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'empiiha, bakareeba ebitarikuhikaana ebirikubaasa kuremesa purogyekiti erikwija. Tiimu ekashutama kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikwetengwa kukora aha nshonga ezi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Amidst growing tensions between the ruling factions, the council convened to discuss the future of governance. Concerns were raised about the implications of merging the two distinct tenure systems in place.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke obweyongera wakati w'ebiwayi ebiri mu buyinza, akakiiko kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'obukulembeze eby'omu maaso. Okweraliikirira kwaleetebwa ku biyinza okuva mu kugatta enkola z'ettaka ebbiri ez'enjawulo eziriwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle tye kamedde I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye matye I loc, dul ne gubedo ka lok I kom anyim pa tela. Lworo obedo tye I kom adwoki me ribo yub aryo mapat-pat me ngom matye ni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyatakin na ingungeta kiding ipatei lu ipugai, apotu lukapolok ineritata kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos apugan naka oingaren. Aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos nuepedorete atakanun kanu aimorikikin ainapeta ngun aarei nuegelegela nuka alupok.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ma eselea amuti opi dria 'diyi ma eselea ri ma talasi, kanisulu 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo driceza ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo ecopi 'yepi e'yo angu 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma ti ecizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke obweyongyeire ahagati y'ebibiina ebiri omu butegyeki, orukiiko rukashutama kuhanuura aha nyensya y'obwebembezi. Okwerarikirira kukareetwaho aha bikwatiraine n'okugarukanisa engyenderwaho ibiri ez'eby'eitaka eziriho.

eng_prompt: In any group or organization, there often arises a natural desire for leadership and control. This ambition can lead to competition among individuals vying for authority.
lug_prompt: Mu kibiina kyonna oba ekitongole, wabaawo obwagazi obw'obutonde obw'obukulembeze n'obuyinza. Okwegomba kuno kuyinza okuviirako okuvuganya mu bantu ssekinnoomu abavuganya ku buyinza.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken onyo dul mo keken, miti me tela ki loc bedo tye. Miti man twero kelo pyem ikin dano matye kapyem pi twero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ogurupu kere arai erionget, ejai duc eipud loka aingarenikin keda aipuga. Epedori ngin ayangaun abolobol kanejaas itunga lueboloboloete kanu aipuga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kani amuti ciri ma alea, lezu driceza ni azini opi nyaza ni ri ma ovu ci. Asi 'baza 'diri eco fe baka seza 'ba yi ma eselea a'bala 'yepi opi nyaza ma dria 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu guruupu nainga ekitongore kyona, nihabaho ekyetengo ky'obwebembezi n'obutegyeki. Ekigyendererwa eki nikibaasa kureetaho okuhayahayana ahagati y'abantu abarikurwanira obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the city as both taxi operators and minibus drivers competed for passengers. Frustrations boiled over when a disagreement about pick-up zones escalated into a heated confrontation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu kibuga ng'abavuzi ba takisi n'abavuzi ba mini bbaasi bombi bavuganya ku basaabaze. Okwennyamira kwabalukawo obutakkaanya ku bifo eby'okutambuliramu bwe bwafuuka okulwanagana okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I boma ne I kare ma ludwo taxi ki ludwo bac matino gubedo ka pyem I kom luwot. Cwer cwiny ocake ikare ma telle I kom kabedo ma omyero dano guwot iye odoko lweny matek adada.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio koibuga naarai apotu iderepan luka atakisi keda luka ibasin kopegata kanu itunga. Apotu ingungeta kibiroros naarai abu amamut acamanar kanu aiboisio nuepedorete itunga alomar toma opeget loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ri e'bi tu aku ambu cityniri ma alia ekile 'ba takisi onzupi 'diyi tualu 'ba minibus onzupi 'diyi pie a'bala 'yeria 'ba aci'ba 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo erita ako ni angu 'bani 'ba eyi trazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ecazu a'di 'diza okporu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba buriyo nibweyongyera omu rurembo ahabw'abavugi ba taxi hamwe n'abavugi ba mini baasi kurwanira abagyenzi. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire obu obutaikirizana aha myanya y'okwihiramu abantu kukahinduka okurwanagana kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising fuel costs and inflation, many taxi drivers gathered to discuss their options. After a heated debate, they ultimately decided against increasing their fares.

ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel moo matye kamede ki wel cente madit tutwal, ludwo taxi mapol gugure me nywako tamgi. Ingee laro lok matek tutwal, gumoko tamgi pe me medo wel mutokagi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka akinyet keda etiai loka ikapun, apotu iderepan luka atakisin kotukokinos kanu aitemitem nuiswamaete kesi. Akaulo naka epeget loepol noi, apotu kesi koseutu mam aiyatakin itiaisinei kec.

eng_prompt: As the troops advanced deeper into enemy territory, their resources began to dwindle rapidly. Reports from the front lines indicated that the current stockpile was insufficient to sustain the ongoing operations.
lug_prompt: Amagye bwe geeyongera okuyingira mu ttaka ly'omulabe, eby'obugagga byago byatandika okukendeera amangu. Lipoota okuva ku nkomerero zaalaze nti ebyamaguzi ebiriwo kati tebimala kuyimirizaawo mirimu egigenda mu maaso.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by the community, local leaders sought support from various sectors. They reached out to influential entities that could provide resources and expertise.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, tensions have been rising on campus as students voice their concerns over rising costs. Many feel that the proposed tuition increase is unjust and unsustainable for their education.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, obunkenke bubadde bweyongera ku ssettendekero ng'abayizi balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'ebisale ebigenda byeyongera. Bangi bawulira nti ekiteeso ky'okwongeza ebisale by'essomero si kya bwenkanya era tekisobola kuyimirizaawo kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato cokcok-ki, telle obedo ka mede I gang kwan pa lutino kwan pien lutino kwan gunyutu lworo gi pi wel cul matye kamede. Dano mapol gitye ki tam ni medo cente me culu kwan pe ber dok pe twero weko kwan gi mede anyim.

lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'emirimu okulinnya n'okukendeera kw'ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti, abakulembeze bawaliriziddwa okuddamu okwekenneenya enkola y'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu bisale by'okusoma zaalangirirwa.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, access to healthcare facilities is limited, forcing individuals to seek help far from their homes. Many communities lack nearby clinics, making it necessary for patients to travel extensively for medical care.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, okufuna obujjanjabi butono, ekiwaliriza abantu okunoonya obujjanjabi ewala okuva mu maka gaabwe. Ebitundu bingi tebirina malwaliro agaliraanyeewo, ekireetera abalwadde okutambula ennyo okufuna obujjanjabi.

ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutic gugure me nywako lok I kom ngo ma gunongo. I kacokke pa luco lok angeya ma obedo tin con, lalok madit owaco ni mony omoko ngo ma otimme.
