ach_prompt: Lworo tye pi woo ki peko me gudu ma bino macalo adwogi me gedo gang kwan manyen. Lutedero mapol tye ki lworo ni wel lutino kwan kacel ki gangi ma obudonyo obi balo kabedo gi ma opye mot.
teo_prompt: Aponi itoroniarai nuikamunitos acelanar keda aitolitol amotokan kanu adukio na esomero loitetet. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe epote esisiak keda ikalia luipu aitolitol aiboisit kec naililingi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo o'duko azini e'yo nzila ni 'diyi ma e'yo sizu sukulu o'diru 'da si ri ma dria. Ba angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi 'ye urisi kini sukulu anzi eyi ma omgbo ni tualu familia eyi pie ri ni nga angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi 'ye onzi.
nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira ahabw'eiraka n'oburemeezi bw'ebiiruka ahabw'okwombeka eishomero risya. Abatuuragye baingi nibatiina ngu okweyongyera kw'abeegi n'amaka, nikwija kurabanisamu ebyaro byabo.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and exposure to harsh weather, the once-sturdy structures now show signs of deterioration. Inspectors noted that the foundation had weakened significantly over time.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'embeera y'obudde embi, ebizimbe ebyali bigumu kati biraga obubonero bw'okusaanawo. Abakebera ebintu baakizuula nti omusingi gwali gusajjuse nnyo ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki bedo I kare me piny marac tutwal, gedo macon ma obedo matek kombedi tye kanyuto lanyut me bale pa jami. Langii kor tic gunongo ni guti ne odoko goro tutwal I kare ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit keda ejautene loaronon loka ikwamin, adukena nueswamauna sek itodunitos ijenuneta luka aibiror. Apotu engicete kowanyutu ebe abu atukot ngin itolitol noi kotoma apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu azini e'yo angu mile onzi 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, jo andra okporu 'diyi e'da curu'do eceta e'dazu kini yi eza i ra. Ba e'yo andri'ba 'diyi ndre kini e'yo 'da eza i sa'wa driasi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura hamwe n'obwire bubi, ebyombeko ebyabaire bigumire hati nibyoreka obubonero bw'okusiisikara. Abarambuzi bakareeba ngu omusingye gukaba gugumire kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a rise in chronic illnesses and a lack of access to medical facilities. Community members have expressed growing concerns about the overall well-being of residents.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga okweyongera kw'endwadde ez'olukonvuba n'obutafuna bujjanjabi. Abantu b'omu kitundu balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku mbeera y'abatuuze okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni wel dano matye ki two ma pe cang ki peko me nongo kony me yot kom tye ka medde tutwal. Lwak gunyutu lworo I kom kwo pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata adekasinei nu ekorona keda amamus na adumunun amukian. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanu aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi ewu agapi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ece kini azo eyi ma omgbo tu tu tualu geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma esuta ma ako be. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini tualu e'yo aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'endwara ezitarikukira hamwe n'obutabaasa kuhikwaho obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Abantu b'omukyanga boorekire okwerarikirira aha magara g'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Viewers can expect an in-depth report on the recent developments in the local community. This segment aims to highlight the key events that have captured public interest.
lug_prompt: Abatunuulizi basobola okusuubira alipoota enzijuvu ku bigenda mu maaso mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko. Ekitundu kino kigendererwamu okulaga ebikulu ebibaddewo ebisikiriza abantu.
ach_prompt: Jo ma neno telebijon gitwero bedo ki gen me nongo lok matut I kom jami matye katime I kabedo gi. But lok man tye ki miti me nyutu jami mapigi tego ma otimme ma oyomo cwiny lwak.
teo_prompt: Epedorete asesenak aomit ebe eponio aiwadik eripoota loikamunit akiro nuiswamasi pac kotoma atutubet. Alosikinet naka atutubet kana erai aitodun akiro nuepolok nuepedorete itunga aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ba angu ndre'ba 'diyi eco ega o'duko e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. Esele 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo okporu o'bi yi ma asi 'bapi ra 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Abareebi b'omupiira gw'ebigyere nibabaasa kuteekateeka ngu nibaija kutunga ripoota erikukwata aha bintu ebibaireho omu byaro. Ekicweka eki kigyendereire kworeka ebintu ebikuru ebirikureetera abantu kukunda.

eng_prompt: The highly anticipated documentary has finally been completed. Viewers have been eagerly waiting for its release.
lug_prompt: Ekiwandiiko ekibadde kisuubirwa ennyo kyaddaaki kiwedde. Abatunuulizi babadde balindirira n'obwagazi okufulumizibwa kwayo.
ach_prompt: Cal me lok angeya ma kibedo ka kurone tutwal-li dong otum. Lunen tuku gubedo kakuru ki miti madit tutwal kare ma kikatti kwede.
teo_prompt: Aponi kawasia ongetakinai akiro nuka aiwadikaeta nuewomitai ebe ejaas. Idaritos asesenak keda eipud noi alacakinio ke.
lgg_prompt: Ba de asizu e'da senema e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'bani ebi te 'diyi 'bo. Ba angu ndre'ba 'diyi ebi e'da nderi te asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omuzaano gw'ebihandiiko ogurikuteekateekwaho munonga guherize kuhwa. Abareebi batwire nibategyereza n'omuhimbo okurekurwa kwayo.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed numerous unethical practices among several major corporations. As a result, the legislators are not happy with the conduct of the companies.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kwalaga ebikolwa ebitali bya mpisa mu bitongole ebinene ebiwerako. N'ekivuddemu, ababaka si basanyufu n'enneeyisa ya kampuni.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco mapol I kin dul madongo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, luwang lwak I ot moko cik cwinygi pe yom I kom tim pa dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio lumam iswamaete ejok kotoma ikampunin luapolok luipu. Kanuka ngun, mam imeeban iyalamasi keda iponesio luka ikampunin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da 'yeta onzi karakara amuti okporu 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba legiko ni 'diyi aa'ni ayikosi adriza amuti nde 'diyinirisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebikorwa bingi ebitahikire omu bitongore ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu,abany'eishengyero tibashemerereirwe emicwe ya kampuni.

eng_prompt: It is essential for any workplace to prioritize the safety and well-being of its employees. Implementing effective security measures is crucial in creating a safe environment.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo ku mulimu gwonna okukulembeza obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abakozi baayo. Okuteeka mu nkola enkola ennungi ey'ebyokwerinda kya mugaso nnyo mu kutondawo embeera ey'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal I gang tic mo keken me keto ber bedo pa luticgi obed gin ma pire tek. Keto cik me gwoko kuc itic pire tek tutwal me kelo ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aiboisit adio na aswam aisingarenit ayuwar keda aijar naka eswamakake. Aitwasam iwaitin lu ayuara ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun aiboisit na eyuara.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru pari azi ngazu ciri ni asi 'bazu ageitema azini aa'ta muke 'ba erini azi ngazu 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo ageitema ni kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea ri eri orodriru angu ageitema ni 'diyi ma edeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho buri mwanya gw'okukoreramu kwebembeza eby'okwerinda n'amagara marungi g'abakozi baayo. Okuta eby'okwerinda omu nkora n'eky'omugasho omu kureetaho obusingye.

eng_prompt: Recent developments in case law have raised questions about the effectiveness of current regulations. As a result, stakeholders are calling for a thorough review of the legal framework.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaliwo gye buvuddeko mu mateeka ereeseewo ebibuuzo ku bukugu bw'amateeka agaliwo. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako basaba okuddamu okwekenneenya amateeka.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme cokcok-ki I lok me cik okelo lapeny I kom kit ma cik matye ni tiyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma timo tic mapat-pat tye ka lego ni myero ki nen cik mapat-pat matye.
teo_prompt: Apolou na pac kotoma okisila ayangau aingiseta nuikamunitos ajokis naka ikisila lu ejaas. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi itunga airereonor ekisil ngol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi eji e'yo azi ngaza kililiru azita sawa 'disi 'diyiniri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi ai 'bani e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugiremu omu biragiro ebyahwireho, bireesireho okubanganisa aha bukoryo bw'ebiragiro ebiriho hati. N'ekyarugiremu, abu kirikukwataho nibashaba okushwijuma ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial developments, the board has decided to take a more active role in overseeing the allocation of resources. They believe that direct involvement will enhance transparency and accountability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebibaddewo mu by'ensimbi gye buvuddeko awo, akakiiko kasazeewo okwenyigira ennyo mu kulondoola engaba y'obuyambi. Balowooza nti okwenyigiramu obutereevu kujja kwongera ku bwerufu n'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok me lim matye katimme cokcok-ki, dul madoro tic omoko tamgi me timo tic matek me neno kit ma ki poko kwede lim. Gitye ki niyee ni bedo tye atir obi medo ada ki kor tic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nueswamauna pac kotoma apiyai, aseun erionget aswam kagogong noi kowai lo aimaniman eipone lo ekorere ikapun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aimorikikin kes epote aitopolor aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma robia niri ma dria o'diru 'diyisi, board 'du e'yo azi okporu 'yezu e'yo lonyi awaza niri ma pamvu onezu. Yi a'i ra kini fizu e'yo nde ma alia kililiru ri ni nga e'yo ada ma omgbo otu azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka y'eby'empiiha,akakiiko kashaziremu kukora omurimo gw'okureeberera oku eby'obugaiga birikugabwa. Nibateekateeka ngu okwejumbamu butunu nikwija kwongyera amazima n'embaririra.

eng_prompt: A thick fog rolled in over the small town, shrouding the streets in an eerie silence. As the sun began to rise, a group of early morning joggers stumbled upon a gruesome scene in the park.
lug_prompt: Ekire ekinene kyabuutikira akabuga akatono, ne kibikka enguudo mu kasirise ak'ekyewuunyo. Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo, ekibinja ky'abavuzi b'ebidduka ku makya ennyo beesittala ku kintu eky'entiisa mu ppaaka.
ach_prompt: Lweny madit omako boma matidi ne, oloro iteng gudi ma piny oling mot tutwal. Ikare ma ceng ocako aa malo, gurup pa lungwec ma onongo gitye ka ngwec odiko tutwal gunongo gin mo marac tutwal I park.
teo_prompt: Abu ekipiei loelangir noi kibiroros otaun lodidi, kosodi aidony irotin kotoma aililing naepol noi. Neageuna akolong aibwo, abu egurupu loka akerak luka tupuruc kotoma atupuruc kodum ibore yenitukuriani kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang.
lgg_prompt: Ori nzizaruri e'de tawuni werea 'da ma dria, nzila eyi ma ti opi ci. Etuka ni e'doria efuria, ongulumu 'ba ongu nzu'ba o'bitisi 'diyi isu e'yo onzi angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omwirima gw'amaani gukagwa aharubaju rw'akabuga kakye, gwabiika enguuto omu kasirise k'omutaano. Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurugaho, guruupu y'abairuki omu kasheeshe bakareeba ekintu ky'akabi munonga omu paaka.

eng_prompt: Authorities discovered the body in the back room of the establishment. Investigators believe the incident may be linked to a dispute that occurred earlier that evening.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baazuula omulambo mu kisenge eky'emabega mu wooteeri. Bambega balowooza nti ebyaliwo biyinza okuba nga byekuusa ku butakkaanya obwaliwo akawungeezi ako.
ach_prompt: Lutela gunongo lyel ne I ot butu ma I ngee ot cam. Lutim kwed tye ki niyee ni peko man kubbe ki tele ma obedo tye I otyeno enuni.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio odumutu ates agola na kau naka eoteri. Iyuunitos angicak ebe epedori ationis ngin arucokina keda engunget loabu kotakanu atibong ngin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi esu avu 'da jo ale aliza jo ale aliza 'da ma vutia ri ma alea. Ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi ega kini e'yo 'da eco adri e'yo erita ako ni i 'yepi ondresi 'da ma e'yosi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakashanga omurambwe omu kishengye ky'enyima omu hoteeri. Bambega nibateekateeka ngu ekyabaireho nikibaasa kuba kiine akakwate n'obutaikirizana obwabaireho omu mwebazyo ogwo.

eng_prompt: As the new academic year approaches, uncertainty looms over the educational institutions. Administrators are anxious to finalize their plans, but crucial information remains pending.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'ebyensoma omupya gusembera, obutali bukakafu bweyongedde mu matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza. Abakulembeze beesunga okumaliriza enteekateeka zaabwe, naye amawulire amakulu gakyalindiridde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mwaka me kwan manyen tye ka bino, peko tye I gangi kwan. Lutela tye ki miti matek me tyeko yubgi, ento ngec mapigi tego pud tye.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekaru lo asioman loitetet, ejai amamus acamunit aiboisio nu asioman. Ekapakina engarenok aitodolikin ainapeta kec, konye eringa akiro nuepolok idario.
lgg_prompt: Eli onita ni o'diruri ni ecazu 'boria, e'yo onzi ni e'do pari onita ni 'diyi ma dria. Drice'ba eyi avasi otita eyini 'diyi dezu, te e'yo okporu 'diyi nga po'di eyi esu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese omutsya ku gurikuhika haihi, okwerarikirira nikweyongyera omu matendekyero g'eby'obwegyese. Abeebembezi beine ekihika ky'okuhendera enteekateeka zaabo, kwonka amakuru maingi gakiriho.

eng_prompt: The team has been working tirelessly for months, and several members are feeling burnt out. In light of this, they decided to formally ask for some time off.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde ekola butaweera okumala emyezi, era bammemba bangi bawulira nga bakooye. Okusinziira ku kino, baasalawo okusaba mu butongole akaseera k'okuwummula.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo katic labongo yweyo pi dwe mapol, dok lumemba mapol tye ka winyo ni tic otum woko. Ma lubbe ki lok man, gumoko tamgi me penyo pi yweyo mo.
teo_prompt: Iswamat etimu ngol keda agogongu kanu ilapio, ido itunga luipu epupete ebe etwakiasi kesi. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi koseutu ailip aiyengun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi azi nga okpo kokoru mba karakara eyi ma alea, dika 'ba karakara eyi ama asi 'bo. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, eyi ai sa'wa azi liza ni.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etwire neekora n'amaani kumara ameezi, kandi ba memba baingi beehuriire baruhire. Ahabw'enshonga egi, bakasharamu kushaba omu butongore obwire bw'okuhuumura.

eng_prompt: The anticipation in the community is palpable as the religious leader arrives for a much-anticipated visit. Many have gathered to welcome him and seek his guidance during his short stay.
lug_prompt: Obweraliikirivu mu kitundu bweyolekera ddala ng'omukulembeze w'eddiini atuuse okukyala okwabadde kusuubirwa ennyo. Bangi bakungaanidde okwaniriza n'okunoonya obulagirizi bwe mu kaseera ke akatono.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma latela dini obino I lim ma obedo ki byek madit tutwal. Dano mapol gugure me jolo en ki yenyo tirane I kare ma en tye I lobo kany.
teo_prompt: Amuno na itunga ewanyunitai neadolunia engarenon lo ediini kanu aipejokin na eomitai ebe ebunit. Apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos kanu aijaun ngesi ka aingitun aicoretake kotoma apakike naedit.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri e'da sa'wa drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ni emuzu omuru eyini ega saaru ri ma alea. Ba karakara eyi tra eyi eri ai'zu azini eyi ma imbata ndazu sa'wa erini aa'zu were ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu nibateekateeka munonga, omwebembezi w'ediini ku yaizire kutaayaayira abantu. Abantu baingi baketeeranira hamwe kumwakiira n'okumushaba obuhabuzi omu bwire bukye obu yaabaire ariho.

eng_prompt: Participants from all over the community gathered at the park early in the morning. Excitement filled the air as they prepared for the annual charity event.
lug_prompt: Abeetabamu okuva mu bitundu byonna baakuŋŋaanidde mu ppaaka ku makya ennyo. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga nga bwe beetegekera omukolo gw'okugaba obuyambi ogutegekebwa buli mwaka.
ach_prompt: Dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat gugure I park odiko con. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal ikare ma gubedo ka yubbe pi yub me miyo kony me lim ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka aiboisio kere kotukokinos aiboisit naidarere itiang tupuruc. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma aiboisit naetemonokinere kanuka epucit loka aingarakinio kangol ekaru.
lgg_prompt: Ba enga'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea ndulu 'diyi tra eyi angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma alea o'bitisi. Ayiko fu oli ma alia yini yi oturia otuta 'yezu omu 'ba azakoma fepi eli vusi 'diyiniri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abantu kuruga omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe baketeeranira omu paaka omukasheeshe kare. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okweteekateekyera omukoro gw'okugaba obuhwezi ogurikubaho buri mwaka.

eng_prompt: Everyone is excited about the upcoming conference, and many notable figures are expected to attend. Among them, she will also be at the event.
lug_prompt: Buli omu musanyufu olw'olukungaana olujja, era abantu bangi ab'amaanyi basuubirwa okubeerawo. Mu bo, naye ajja kubeera ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: Dano weng tye ki yom cwiny pi kacoke matye kabino ni, ki dano mapol ma oywek tye ki gen me bedo tye. I kingi, en bene obubedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina itunga kere kanu atukonokin na ebunit, ido eomitai ebe epote itunga luipu luejenara ajaikin. Kotoma kesi, ebuni ngesi da ajaut opucit.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria ovu ayikosi otita imbatani emupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, dika 'ba karakara 'bani ega 'diyi nga emu ra. Eyi ma eselea eri vini mu adri omu 'da ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe ashemerereirwe oruteerane orurikwija, kandi abantu b'amaani baingi nibateekateekwaho kubaho. Omuri bo, naija kuba ari aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: Instilling financial responsibility in individuals often begins in childhood, where lessons about budgeting and prioritizing needs over wants are introduced. As people grow and experience various financial situations, their attitudes towards saving can evolve significantly.
lug_prompt: Okuyigiriza abantu obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi kutandikira mu buto, ng'ebyokuyiga ku mbalirira n'okukulembeza ebyetaago okusinga ebyetaago bitandikibwawo. Abantu bwe bakula era ne bafuna embeera z'ensimbi ez'enjawulo, endowooza zaabwe ku kutereka zisobola okukyuka ennyo.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo dano ki kit me tic ki lim I kare mapol cakke I kare me tino, kama kipwonyo gi ki kit me timo byek me lim ki keto miti gi obed mukwongo me loyo miti gi. Ka dano woto ki dongo dok nongo peko me lim mapat-pat, tamgi I kom gwoko lim bene loko tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ikapun egeunete kotoma apesur nudidika, ne itolomunere aisisiaeta nuikamunitos ebajet keda aisingarenit ipudesia adepar ipudesia. Kwape epoloete itunga kosodete ajaut keda ejautene loegelegela loka ikapun, epedorete aomisio kec nuikamunitos aimono ikapun aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza e'yo robia ni ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri ni e'do sa'wa driasi anzi nyiri eyi ma alea, 'bani e'yo onizu otita aje robia ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi 'duzu okori ma dria. Ba eyini zoria azini e'yo robia ni ndundu eyi esu ria, eyi ma egata robia trazu ri ma dria ri eco i oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa abantu obujunanizibwa omu by'empiiha nikutandikira omu buto, ahu amashomo agarikukwata aha mbariirira hamwe n'okwebembeza ebyetengo kukira ebyetengo. Abantu ku barikukura kandi bakabona embeera z'esente ezitarikushushana, emiteekateekyere yaabo aha kubiika neebaasa kuhinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: Many individuals plan for their retirement, believing they have saved enough to enjoy their golden years. However, unforeseen circumstances can lead to financial struggles later in life.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bateekerateekera okuwummula kwabwe, nga balowooza nti batereka ekimala okunyumirwa emyaka gyabwe egya zzaabu. Newankubadde, embeera ezitasuubirwa zisobola okuleetawo entalo z'ensimbi mu bulamu obw'oluvannyuma.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyube pi kare gi me weko tic kun gitamo ni gu gwoko cente ma oromo me nongo mit pa mwaka gi. Kadi bed kumeno, jami ma pe byek tye I komgi twero kelo peko me lim I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu itemonokinete nuikamunitos aiyengun kec, eomitos kesi ebe imonoete kesi ikapun luedolitos kanu alelakin ikarukec. Konye, iboro lumam itemokitai epedorete ayangaun atiokisio nuka ikapun koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi otita eyi 'ye eyi ma ava liza azi vurisi eyini egazu kini eyi ma robia ca eyini ani ayiko esuzu eli eyivile 'diyi ma alea ra. Kani si, e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi eco fe e'yo ewaru robia ma dria 'diyi ma e'yo 'ye idri ma vutia ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateekyera okuhuumura aha mirimo yaabo, barikwikiriza ngu bakatereka ekirikumara okushemererwa omu myaka yaabo mirungi. Kwonka, ebintu ebitarikuteekateekwaho nibibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi bw'esente bwanyima omu magara.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing concerns about national debt and economic stability, many leaders prioritize short-term gains over long-term financial planning. This trend raises questions about their commitment to fiscal responsibility.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bbanja ly'eggwanga n'obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna, abakulembeze bangi bakulembeza amagoba ag'ekiseera ekitono okusinga enteekateeka y'ebyensimbi ey'ekiseera ekiwanvu. Enkola eno ereetawo ebibuuzo ku kwewaayo kwabwe eri obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lworo tye mapol I kom banya pa lobo kacel ki bedo ki kuc I tenge me lim, lutela mapol gi keto cente pi kare manok me loyo yub me lim pi kare malac. Man kelo lapeny I kom miti gi me timo tic gi I tenge me lim.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyatakina aiyalongong kanuka apesenin nuka akwap keda ainapakina naka ikapun, engarenok luipu isingarenitos ameda naka apak naedit adepar aitemonokin nuka apak naepol. Eyangauni ngin aomisio nuikamunitos ainakina kec naka aitodolikin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi kari ma mari ma dria azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, drice'ba karakara eyi orodri sa'wa weresi 'diyi 'du okporu aga otita robia ni sa'wa ezu 'diyi. E'yo 'di ni e'yo eji asi 'baza yini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwerarikirira okweyongyeire aha bikwatiraine n'amabanja g'eihanga hamwe n'obutebekana omu by'entaasya, abeebembezi baingi nibakuza omu maisho amagoba g'obwire bukye kukira enteekateeka y'esente ey'obwire bureingwa. Omuringo ogu nigureetaho okubanganisa ahabw'obweziriki bwabo omu by'esente.

eng_prompt: After reflecting on the consequences of their choices, they realized the impact it had on their relationships. The weight of their decisions began to sink in, leaving them with a sense of remorse.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufumiitiriza ku biyinza okuva mu kusalawo kwabwe, baategeera engeri gye kyakosaamu enkolagana yaabwe. Obuzito bw'okusalawo kwabwe bwatandika okubbira mu mitima gyabwe, ne babaleka nga bejjusa.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam I kom adwogi me tam ma gumoko, guniang adwogi ne I kom wat meggi. Pek pa tam ma gumoko ocako donyo I wigi, oweko gubedo ki koko I cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aomoom nuikamunitos nuelomunete kotoma aseununeta kec, apotu kesi kojenutu epone loepedoriata kesi aimorikikin keda luce. Apotu ationis naka aseununeta kec kogeutu aibiror, kojalakisi kesi aiitun aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Eyi ma egata e'yo eyini pe 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu e'yo eyini 'ye eyi ma eselea ri ra. E'yo ewaru yini 'dule 'diyi e'do e'de yi ma alia, yini yi ku asi otiza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka aha birikubaasa kuruga omu kucwamu kwabo, bakeetegyereza oku kyabaire nikikwata aha mikago yaabo. Oburemeezi bw'okusharamu kwabo bukatandika kubagwamu, kyabareka n'okwefuuza.

eng_prompt: After several discussions about financial stability, the group realized the importance of planning for unexpected expenses. They began to explore various strategies to build a safety net for their future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'enjawulo ku kutebenkera mu byenfuna, ekibinja kyazuula obukulu bw'okwetegekera ensaasaanya etasuubirwa. Baatandika okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuzimbira ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso eby'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom gwoko lim, gurup oniang ber pa yubbe pi jami ma pe byek tye I komgi. Gu cako yenyo yoo mapat-pat me yubu kabedo maber pi anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ineresinei luipu nuikamunitos ainapakina naka ikapun, apotu egurupu kojenutu ajokis naka aitemonokin ikapun lu mam eomitai. Apotu kesi kogeutu aingic iwaitin luegelegela lu aidar kes koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo robia esuzu kililiru ri ma dria, amuti 'da esu orodri 'bani otita eyi 'yezu e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi e'do geri ndundu eyi onda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ewu drialeri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura emirundi mingi ahaby'esente, guruupu eketegyereza omugasho gw'okuteekateekyera enshohoza etarikuteekateekwaho. Bakatandika kuronda oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe bw'okwombeka eby'okwerinda ahabw'ebiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for accessible education in the community, a new initiative was launched. The organizers recognized that many children were missing out on learning opportunities due to various barriers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusoma okwangu mu kitundu, enteekateeka empya yatongozebwa. Abategesi baakizuula nti abaana bangi baali bafiirwa emikisa gy'okusoma olw'ebiziyiza eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kwan ma yot ikabedo, yub manyen kicako. Luyub ne guniang ni lutino mapol pe tye ka nongo gum me kwan pi peko mapat-pat matye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman naepol noi kotoma atutubet, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuitetiak. Apotu lu itemonokinak kojenutu ebe mam idwe luipu eutasi adumun arerengesio nu asioman kanuka atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu onita 'bani eco esu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, 'ba e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi esu ra kini anzi nyiri karakara eyi apini drileba onita ni 'diyi ma alea ku e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'eby'obwegyese omu bantu, enteekateeka nsya ekatandikwaho. Abatebekanisa bakareeba ngu abaana baingi bakafeerwa emigisha y'okwega ahabw'oburemeezi butari bumwe na bumwe.

eng_prompt: As he spoke, his words seemed to contradict each other, leaving everyone in the room puzzled. The vague gestures he made only added to the confusion surrounding his message.
lug_prompt: Bwe yali ayogera, ebigambo bye byalabika ng'ebikontana, ekyaleka buli omu mu kisenge nga yeewuunya. Ebikolwa ebitali bitegeerekeka bulungi bye yakola byayongera ku butabanguko obwali mu bubaka bwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka lok, lokke nen calo obedo ka lokke, ma oweko dano weng ma obedo I ot ne obedo ki ngeng tutwal. Lanyut mapat-pat ma en otimo omedo anywena-nywena I lokke.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi einer, apotu akekiro kojaunos, ido ajalakisi nginitunganan kotoma agola abuonokin. Apotu ijenuneta lumam ejena lueswamat ngesi kiyatakisi aitolitol akiroke.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo nzeria, e'yo erini nze 'diyi e'da kile yi ati yi ma eselea, erini fezu 'ba dria jo ale aliza ma alia 'diyi dri osuzaru. E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi fe lu e'yo erini nze 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire nagamba, ebigambo bye bikaba nibireebeka nk'ebirikuhakanisa, ekyarekire buri omwe omu kishengye atarikumanya eky'okukora. Eby'okureeberaho ebitarikwetegyerezibwa gye ebi yakozire, bikongyera okubuzabuza oburikwetorwaire obutumwa bwe.

eng_prompt: Frequent legal battles with neighboring nations have strained the national budget. As a result, the government is struggling to allocate funds for essential services.
lug_prompt: Entalo z'amateeka ezibeerawo n'amawanga agaliraanyeewo zikosa embalirira y'eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti erwana okuteekawo ensimbi ez'obuweereza obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Lweny mapol ikot ki lobo ma orumuwa okelo peko I byek lim pa lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ka nongo peko me poko cente pi kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta luipu luka ikisila keda akwapin nu idunyare eyangaunitos ationis toma obajet loka akwap. Kanuka ngun, euta apugan ationis aitolomun ikapun kanu aijaanakinio na itunga.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'diza e'yo liza ma alia kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie 'diyi okpo fe bajeti kariniri dri. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni dri ci robia 'bazu azi orodriru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Entaro z'amateeka n'amahanga agatuherereire zitwire niziteganisa embaririra y'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti eriyo neteganisibwa kutaho esente z'obuheereza oburikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the region for months, with protests erupting over controversial policies. Many feared that the outspoken religious leader's influence would provoke further unrest.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala emyezi, nga okwekalakaasa kwabalukawo olw'enkola ezikontana. Bangi baali batya nti obukulembeze bw'omukulembeze w'eddiini ono agenda kwongera okuleetawo obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo ne pi dwe mapol, ki jemo ma ocake pi cik mapat-pat ma kelo apoka-poka. Dano mapol gubedo ki lworo ni tela pa latela dini enoni obumedo lweny.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun ilapio luipu, keda aidiya naepol noi kanuka ainapeta nuegelegela. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe ebuni engarenon lo ediini loenerar noi ayangaun amumu naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu angu 'da ma alea imba karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'dozu e'yo azita esele coza ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi kini drice'ba e'yo nzepi okporu 'da ma okpo ni nga e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga kumara ameezi, hamwe n'okwesharinga okwabaireho ahabw'ebiragiro ebitarikuhikaana. Baingi bakaba nibatiina ngu obwebembezi bw'ediini obw'amaani nibuza kureetaho obutabanguko obundi.

eng_prompt: After hearing conflicting reports about the event, the journalist felt compelled to dig deeper. She knew that uncovering the truth required more than just surface-level information.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira alipoota ezikontana ku mukolo, munnamawulire yawulira ng'alina okunoonyereza ennyo. Yali akimanyi nti okuzuula amazima kyetaagisa ekisingawo ku kumanya obumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok mapat-pat I kom yub eni, lacoo lok angea ne owinyo ni omyero okwed matut. En onongo ngeyo ni niang lok ada mito jami mapol makato ngec ma aa ki iwi yamo keken.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup akiro nuegelegela nuikamunitos akiro ngun, abu arotan iyemuto kopup ebe ibusakinit kesi aingic akiro ngun. Ajeni ngesi ebe kanu ajenun abeit ekotoi akiro nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi ega kini yi ma asi 'ba e'yo onizu drile. Ni ra kini e'yo ada ma e'yo ofuzu le aga o'duko e'yo dria 'diyi ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira ripoota ezirikuhakanisa ebirikukwata aha mukoro, abanyamakuru bakeehurira nibagyemeserezibwa kusherura ebirikukiraho. Akaba naamanya ngu okujumbura amazima nikyetenga ekirikukira aha makuru g'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous research and analysis, the team finalized their report. They were eager to present their conclusions to the highest office in the country.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga banoonyereza n'okwekenneenya, ttiimu yamaliriza alipoota yaayo. Baali beetegefu okwanjulira ofiisi esingayo okuba ey'oku ntikko mu ggwanga ebyo bye baali bazudde.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me kwed ki ngiyo kor tic gi, dul ne otyeko coyo adwogi tic gi. Gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me miyo tam gi bot lutic ma rwom gi malo i lobo man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic ka aingic, apotu etimu ongetakisi eripoota kec. Akapakina kesi aitodiar akiro kec mama ejai eyapiesi loapolon kakere kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vuti ondaza okporu 'diyi ma vutia, amuti 'da de eyi ma o'duko asizu. Eyi ndra avaru e'yo eyini esu 'diyi e'dazu ofisi uru ndeni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza n'okushwijuma, tiimu ekahendera ripoota yaabo. Bakaba baine ekihika ky'okureeta ebirugire omu bigyezo byabo omu ofiisi y'ahaiguru omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: The nation has a rich history of spiritual leadership and devotion. In honoring its past, the people reflect on the profound impact of their revered figure.
lug_prompt: Eggwanga lirina ebyafaayo bingi eby'obukulembeze obw'eby'omwoyo n'okwewaayo. Mu kussa ekitiibwa mu byafaayo byayo, abantu bafumiitiriza ku bukulu bw'omuntu waabwe ow'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Lobo man tye ki tekwaro me tela me cwiny ki woro. I woro jami ma otime I kare mukato angec, dano tamo I kom adwogi maber ma ngat ma kiworo enoni okelo.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi akwap keda akiro nukolo nuka eingarenone loajokan keda ainakina. Kowai lo ayongite akiro nukolo, eomitos itunga nuikamunitos ajokis naka itunganan yen ayongitai.
lgg_prompt: Kari 'di ma adi lonyi be driceza e'yo Munguniri ma dria azini ava feza ma dria. E'yo erini agapi 'bo 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, o'bi yi e'yo ega e'yo orodriru 'ba 'bani inzi 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga riine ebyafaayo by'obwebembezi bw'eby'omwoyo n'okwehayo. Omu kuheereza ekitinisa ebyafaayo byayo, abantu nibateekateeka aha mugasho gw'omuntu waabo orikuheebwa ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: As the weather warms up and summer plans begin to take shape, many people start thinking about the upcoming holidays. One significant occasion that marks the unofficial start of summer is just around the corner.
lug_prompt: Obudde bwebutandika okubuguma n'enteekateeka z'omusana okutandika okukola, abantu bangi batandika okulowooza ku luwummula olujja. Omukolo ogumu ogw'omugaso ogutegeeza entandikwa y'omusana mu butongole guli kumpi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma piny tye ka ryeny dok yub me oro tye ka cako time, dano mapol cako tamo I kom yweyo matye kabino ni. Yub acel ma pire tek ma nyutu acaki pa oro tye cok.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekapakina ekuse ka etepe, egeunete itunga luipu aomoom nuikamunitos aiyengun naebunit. Apucit adiope naepol noi naepedori aitodun ageunet naka akwap ejai toma okoona.
lgg_prompt: Angu mile ni ecazu drizarurisi azini otuta e'doria e'doria, 'ba karakara eyi e'do ega e'yo lifu emupi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi e'dopi
nyn_prompt: Obwire ku burikuguma nibutagata, abantu baingi batandika kuteekateeka aha kihuumuro ekirikwija. Omukoro gumwe ogw'omugasho ogurikworeka entandikwa y'obwire bw'obutiti omu butongore, guri haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and setbacks, he persevered with unwavering determination. His journey from adversity to success serves as a testament to the power of resilience.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ayolekaganye n'ebizibu bingi, yagumira n'obumalirivu obutakyukakyuka. Olugendo lwe okuva mu buzibu okutuuka ku buwanguzi luweereza ng'obukakafu ku maanyi g'okugumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orwatte ki peko mapol, en omede ki tic matek. Wot mege me aa ki I peko me oo I cobo miti ne obedo lanyut me teko pa diyo cwiny.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda atiokisio nuipu, abu ngesi kinyikok keda agogongu naepol noi. Erot ke anyoun kotoma atiokisio kitoni akerianut erai ajenanut na agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro dri fuzu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi be ra ti, eri mu drile asi 'baza kokoru. Aci erini e'dozu e'yo ewaru ma alea cazu drile suza ma alea ri ni e'da okpo 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi n'oburemeezi bwingi, akagumizamu n'amaani. Orugyendo rwe kuruga omu buremeezi kuza omu businguzi, niruhamya amaani g'okugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered to honor his legacy, they decided to commemorate his contributions in a meaningful way. In recognition of his impact, the local government declared a day of remembrance for all to observe.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaana okussa ekitiibwa mu by'obugagga bye, baasalawo okujjukira bye yakola mu ngeri ey'amakulu. Mu kusiima enkola ye, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaalangirira olunaku lw'okujjukira buli omu okukuza.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gugure me woro nying mege, gumoko tamgi me kwero tic mege I yoo maber. Pi ngeyo adwogi maber ma en okelo, gamente me tedero okatti ki yub me kwero nino enoni pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu ayongite ekirorike, apotu kesi koseutu aiitun aswamisioke koipone kaloejok. Kanu aijen aswamisioitike, abu apugan naka atutubet kolimo apaaran naka aiitun ngesi kanu itunga kere ainumunum.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini trazu tualu inzita fezu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria, eyi ai e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu geri kililiru si. E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, gamete angu 'da ma alea ri 'ba o'du 'ba dria eyini eyi ma e'yo egazu ri inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe okuheereza ekitinisa omurimo gwe, bakasharamu kwijuka obuhwezi bwe omu muringo murungi. Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gwe, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekataho eizooba ry'okwijuka abantu boona.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into their misconduct, the department has decided to take action. As a result of their actions, the officers will be punished.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku mpisa zaabwe embi, ekitongole kisazeewo okubaako kye kikola. Olw'ebikolwa byabwe, abasirikale bajja kubonerezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom timgi maraco, dul ne omoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi me timgi, kibi miyo pwod ki abili.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos iponesio kec luarokok, abu edipatiment koseu aswam nu ebeit. Kanuka aswamisiokec, eponio alecor eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia 'yeta yini onzi 'diyi ma dria, enyati 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. E'yo yini 'yeleri ma e'yosi, 'ba nga azi'ba nde 'diyi dri panga fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha mitwarize yaabo mibi, ekitongore ky'eby'obutegyeki kishaziremu kukoraho. Ahabw'ebikorwa byabo, ba ofiisa nibaija kubonerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent investigation into corruption within the department, several individuals have come under scrutiny. As a result of the ongoing probe, some officers have already been arrested.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa ku buli bw'enguzi mu kitongole, abantu bangi batunuuliddwa. Olw'okunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso, abasirikale abamu baakwatibwa dda.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma okato cokcok-ki I kom tim camcana I tenge enoni, dano mapol kiketo cwinygi I komgi. Macalo adwogi me kwed matye kawot anyim, kimako abili mukene.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aingic naka amidicio naka apiyai kotoma orionget kangol, aponi owanyunai itunga luipu. Kanuka aingic na elosi akonye, aponi orocunai ipolisin ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza o'diru e'yo anyamgbolo niri ma dria ri ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi emu e'yo eti ondaza ma alea. E'yo vuti ondaza mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, 'ba obi polisi azi 'diyi 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okucondooza obwahati aha bushomankuzi omu kitongore, abantu baingi batandikire kushwijumwa. Ahabw'okucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho, ba ofiisa abamwe bakwasirwe.

eng_prompt: After much debate and discussion, the local government finally decided to implement the new policy. Reactions to the announcement have varied widely, reflecting the diverse opinions within the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi, gavumenti y'ebitundu yasalawo okussa mu nkola enkola empya. Abantu beeyisizza mu ngeri za njawulo ku kulangirira kuno, ekiraga endowooza ez'enjawulo mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok mapol, gamente me tedero omoko tamgi me keto cik manyen eni itic. Kit ma lwak odok I kom lok angeya ne obedo pat-pat tutwal, ma nyutu tam mapat-pat matye I kin lwak.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda aomisio nuipu, abu atukot naka esomero koseu aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak. Kanuka ngun, auriak kes ejaas kau naka aswamisioit ngin.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuteekateeka munonga,akakiiko k'eishomero kakacwamu kuta ebiragiro bisya omu nkora. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire nibo bari enyima y'ekikorwa ekyo.

eng_prompt: Despite being in her early forties, she has embraced her role with joy and enthusiasm. Her children started families early, leading her to this unexpected yet fulfilling chapter of her life.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kati ali mu myaka amakumi ana egy'obukulu, omulimu gwe agukkirizza n'essanyu era n'obunyiikivu. Abaana be baatandika amaka nga bukyali, ekyamutuusa ku ssuula eno etasuubirwa naye nga emala mu bulamu bwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en pud tye ki mwaka pyer angwen keken, en ojolo ticce ki yomcwiny. Lutino ne gucako gangi con, ma oweko en odonyo I dul man ma pe byek tye iye ento ma opong ki yomcwiny I kwo ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida erai ngesi lo ikaru akaisaongon, acamunit ngesi aswamuke keda aiyalama. Apotu ikedwe kogeutu ikalia sek, ido abu koyangau ngesi toma atutubet na mam ngesi aomit konye koinakini ngesi aijar naejok.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu eli be kali su driorisi ra ti, eri a'i azi eriniri ayikosi azini ava be. Eri vile anzi 'diyi e'do aku drioru, erini fezu eri dri e'yo erini ega kokoru te eri ma idri ma alia ayiko fepiri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe ari omu myaka makumi ana y'obukuru, yaakiira omurimo gwe n'okushemererwa n'omuhimbo. Abaana be bakatandika amaka bukiri kare, ekyamurugiremu omu kicweka eki ekyabaire kitarikuteekateekwaho kandi ekyamureeteire okumarwa omu magara gye.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent economic downturn, the central bank has decided to implement measures to stimulate growth. As a result, the lending rate has been reduced.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusereba kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, bbanka enkulu esazeewo okussaawo enkola ez'okutumbula enkulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, amagoba ku kwewola gakendedde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa tenge me lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, bang madit me lobo Uganda omoko tamme me keto yoo me dongo lobo itic. Macalo adwogi ne, wel magoba ma kimiyo ki dano me deno lim odok piny.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun, aseun aingadis naka ikapun aitegear iwaitin lu isinyikokit apol. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto ameda naka ilonin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma e'yosi ri ma e'yosi, ero robia ta mbazu kari 'di ma alea ri 'du e'yo azi ecozu zota ejizu ra. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba esi ongmbo ongmbo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria mari fezu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entatsya y'eby'entaasya eyabaire eriho, banka enkuru eshaziremu kutaho oburyo bw'okureetaho entunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, amagoba g'okuguza amabanja gakyendiirwe.

eng_prompt: To mitigate potential disruptions and ensure smooth operations, we have implemented a comprehensive risk management strategy. This is aimed at enabling business continuity.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukendeeza ku kutaataaganyizibwa n'okukakasa nti emirimu gitambula bulungi, tukozesezza enkola enzijuvu ey'okuddukanya obuzibu. Kino kigendererwamu kusobozesa bizinensi okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Me dwoko piny peko ma twero bedo tye ki neno ni tic owoto maber, watye ki yoo mapat-pat me doro peko ma twero bedo tye. Man obedo me weko biacara mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun ka awanyun ebe iswamai ejok, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuepedorete aitikitik atiokisio. Alosikinet na erai kanu aingarakin agwelanar ainyikokin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecopi e'yo eyi ezapi ra 'diyi ma omgbo esizu tualu azi ngaza kililiru ri be, ama 'ba geri e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi dria. Diri lezu fezu tujari ni muzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Okutuubya aha butabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho n'okureeba ngu emirimo neekora kurungi, tutaire omu nkora enkora nungi y'okureeberera akabi. Ekigyendererwa n'okureeba ngu eby'obushubuzi bigumizemu.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant disparity in academic outcomes between different types of educational institutions. This trend raises questions about the factors contributing to the success of non-government schools.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo enjawulo mu nsoma y'abayizi mu matendekero ag'enjawulo. Enkola eno ereetawo ebibuuzo ku nsonga eziviirako obuwanguzi bw'amasomero ag'obwannannyini.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I kin gangi kwan mapat-pat. Man kelo lapeny I kom ngo ma weko gangi kwan ma pe jenge I kom gamente woto maber.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak atiaketait naepol noi naka eswamae loka esisiak kotoma osomeroi luegelegela. Eyangauni ngin aomisio nuikamunitos akiro nu eyangaunitos eswamae loajokan loka isomeroi luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da esele coza okporu agata onitani 'diyi ma alia pari onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'di ni zita eji e'yo fepi sukulu gamete ma pala ku 'diyi ma drile suzaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'amaani omu by'obwegyese omu matendekyero agatari gamwe na gamwe. Enkora egi nereetaho ebibuuzo aha nshonga ezirikureetaho obusinguzi omu mashomero g'abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: Many parents are increasingly concerned about the quality of education their children receive. Recent studies have highlighted significant shortcomings in the academic outcomes of conventional educational institutions.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi beeyongera okufaayo ku mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza abaana baabwe bye bafuna. Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga obunafu obw'amaanyi mu nsoma y'amatendekero aga bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol tye ka paro pi rwom me kwan ma lutino gi nongo. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto goro madit tutwal I kom lutino kwan me gangi kwan macon.
teo_prompt: Ipu auriak lu epodokitos adoketait na asioman na edumunenete idwekec. Aingic napac itodunit aibucanaro naepol noi kotoma asioman naka isomeroi luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Tipika karakara eyi curu'do asi otiza be onita onyiru anzi eyivile 'diyini esu ri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onzi 'diyi agata onita ni pari onita ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi beeyongyeire kufayo aha mutindo gw'obwegyese obu abaana baabo barikutunga. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'obwegyese omu matendekyero aga buriijo.

eng_prompt: Many families believe that urban education offers better resources and opportunities for their children. As a result, they often prioritize city schools when making decisions about their children's education.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi gakkiriza nti okusoma mu bibuga kuwa abaana baabwe ebyetaago n'emikisa emirungi. N'ekivuddemu, batera okukulembeza amasomero g'omu bibuga nga bakola okusalawo ku kusoma kw'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gitye ki niyee ni kwan i boma miyo gum ki jami ma mite pi lutino gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi tero gangi kwan me boma madit me bedo gin ma pire tek ikare me moko tam i kom kwan pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos ikalia luipu ebe asioman na otaun einakini idwe kec iboro ka arerengesio nuajokak. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aisingarenit isomeroi luka osite kapak kana aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi ai ra kini onita aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni afa ayuzaru muke ndeni 'diyi fe anzi eyivile 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni sukulu aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyi 'du okporu eyini peta eyi 'duria sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigeikiriza ngu obwegyese bw'omundembo, nibuheereza abaana baabo eby'okukoresa n'emigisha mirungi. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwebembeza amashomero g'omundembo baaba nibakora encwamu ahaby'obwegyese bw'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: Recent initiatives aimed at enhancing educational resources and support for female students have been implemented. As a result, there has been a noticeable shift in academic engagement and achievement among the girls in that school.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka ezaakaggwa ezigendereddwamu okutumbula eby'enjigiriza n'obuyambi eri abayizi abawala ziteekeddwa mu nkola. N'ekivuddemu, wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu kusoma n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu bawala mu ssomero eryo.
ach_prompt: Gityeko kati ki yub me medo rwom me kwan ki konyo lutino anyira. Macalo adwogi ne, aloka-loka madit otime I kwan pa lutino anyira me gang kwan enuni.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuitegelikina nuitemokinitai kanu aitojokar eswamae lo asioman keda agangat nejaas esisiak lu apesur. Kanuka ngun, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma asioman keda aitodolikinio naka apesur kosomero kangol.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do e'yo o'diru 'bani lezu afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu sukulu anzi ezoanzi ru 'diyi dri 'bo. E'yo 'disi, ojata e'dapi ra sukulu anzi ezoanzi ru sukulu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ebi ovu ci.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'obwegyese n'obuhwezi bw'abeegi abaishiki, etandikirweho. N'ekyarugiremu, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu kwega kw'abaishiki omu eishomero eryo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing disparities in educational access and quality, the government launched a new initiative. This initiative aimed to provide equal opportunities for all students, regardless of their background.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obutali bwenkanya obweyongera mu kufuna n'omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza, gavumenti yatongoza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abayizi bonna emikisa egyenkanankana, awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me kelo apoka-poka matye kamedde I yoo me nongo kwan ki rwom me kwan, gamente ocako yub manyen. Yub man obedo ki miti me miyo gum marom ki lutino kwan weng labongo paro pi kama gi aa ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu eyatakinos kotoma adumunun asioman keda adoketait na asioman, abu apugan kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai ainakin esisiak kere arerengesio nueriakasi araida elomunitos kesi koipone kaloegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza tupi onita ma esutaa azini wura ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'di ni. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu drileba trotro 'diyi fezu sukulu anzi dria eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra ti.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu by'obwegyese n'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kuheereza abeegi boona emigisha erikwingana, oihiremu oburugo bwabo.

eng_prompt: Despite our team's best efforts and strategic planning, we are still falling short of our goals. As we review our progress, it becomes clear that the target has not yet been met.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga ttiimu yaffe efubye nnyo n'okuteekateeka obulungi, tukyalemererwa okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byaffe. Bwe twekenneenya enkulaakulana yaffe, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebiruubirirwa tebinnaba kutuukirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul tuku megwa oketo tek me yube maber tutwal, pud pe watye ka cobo miti wa. Ka watye ka ngiyo kit ma watye ka wot kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni miti ne pwod pe oo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamatos itimun wok kagogongu ka aitemonokin ejok, mam oni ipedori aitodolikin alosikinetekosi. Kwape sio airereor elosiokosi, ecai cut ebe mam itodolikinitai alosikinetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ni tro okpo 'bazu kililiru tualu otuta kililiru 'diyi be ti, ama e'de nga po'di e'yo amani lele 'diyi ma alia ku. Amani e'yo ama ni muzu drile ri ma ale andriria, eri e'da kililiru kini 'ba esuni nga e'yo amani lele 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu tiimu yaitu eretsire amaani n'entebekanisa nungi, tukiriyo nituremwa kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu. Ku turikushwijuma entunguuka yaitu, nikyoreka butunu ngu ekigyendererwa kitakahikire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote inclusivity and provide opportunities for all learners, educational institutions are increasingly adopting flexible admission policies. This shift reflects a growing understanding that academic performance is not the sole indicator of a student's potential.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula abantu bonna n'okuwa abayizi bonna emikisa, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza geeyongera okussaawo enkola z'okuyingiza abayizi ezikyukakyuka. Enkyukakyuka eno eraga nti okusoma si kye kyokka ekiraga obusobozi bw'omuyizi.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwan pa lutino ki miyo gum ki lutino kwan weng, gangi kwan tye ka loko cik me gamo lutino. Alokaloka man nyutu niang ma tye kamede ni rwom me kwan pe obedo lanyut acel keken me kero pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloritor itunga kere kosodete aijaikin arerengusio nejaas esisiak kere, eutasi isomeroi aitolomun ainapeta nuegelegela nuka aijaunun esisiak. Itodunit aijulanakineta ngun amisiikin ebe mam eswamae loka esisiak kotoma asioman ngesi bon itodunit apedor naka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba dria ma eselea azini drileba fezu sukulu anzi dria eyini, pari onita ni 'diyi curu'do azita 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu sukulu'a 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi 'du. Ojata 'di ece vata ni tupi kini agata sukulu lazuri ovuni lu e'dapi sukulu mva ma okpo ni ri i ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho obumwe n'okureetera abeegi boona emigisha, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese nigyeyongyera kukoresa engyenderwaho nungi y'okwikiriza abeegi. Empindahinduka egi neeyoreka okwetegyereza okurikweyongyera ngu okukora kurungi omu mashomero tikyo kyonka ekirikworeka obushoboorozi bw'omwegi.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a fair and thorough admissions process, the committee has designed a comprehensive evaluation exercise. This initiative will help identify the most qualified candidates for the program.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa enkola y'okuyingiza abantu mu bwenkanya era mu bujjuvu, akakiiko kakoze enteekateeka y'okukebera abayizi bonna. Enteekateeka eno ejja kuyamba okuzuula abeesimbyewo abasinga okuba n'ebisaanyizo mu pulogulaamu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub me coyo lutino tye maber dok maber, dul enoni oyubu yoo me kwedo lutino weng. Yub man bikonyo me niang lutino kwan ma gupore me donyo I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapeta nuajokak nuka aijaunun esisiak, etemokinit ekomiti ainapeta nuka airereonor esisiak. Ebuni aswamisioit ngin aingarakin ajenun itunga luepedorete alomar ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu geri kililiru azini kililiru 'diyisi, komiti 'da otu geri 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu 'diyi ma ale andrizu dria. Otita 'di ni nga azakoma fe 'ba agapi muke ndeni otita 'di ma alea 'diyi ma esuta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza, akakiiko kateireho enkora y'okushwijuma. Enteekateeka egi neija kuhwera omu kumanya abeegi abarikukirayo oburungi omu puroguraamu.

eng_prompt: The players have been preparing for weeks, focusing on their strategies and teamwork. As part of their schedule, the football team will be visiting its competitors.
lug_prompt: Abazannyi babadde beetegekera okumala wiiki eziwera nga bassa essira ku bukodyo bwabwe n'okukolera awamu. Nga ekimu ku nteekateeka zaabwe, ttiimu y'omupiira ejja kukyalira abavuganya nayo.
ach_prompt: Lutuku gubedo ka yubbe pi cabit mapol, kun giketo cwinygi I kom diro gi ki tic kacel. Macalo but yub meggi, dul tuku odilo ne gubi limo jo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Auta aboliak aitemonokin kanu isabitin luipu, apodokinit acoasineikec keda aswam nepepe. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta kec, ebeit etimu loka emopira aipejokin lueboloboloete keda kesi.
lgg_prompt: Anzi mupira avipi 'diyi ebi eyi otu sabiti eyi ma alea, asi 'bazu geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria tualu azi ngazu amuti ru 'diyi pie. Otita yini ma azi ru, amuti mupira tuzaniri nga mu omuru 'ba ageti otipi yi be 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Abazaani batwire nibetebekanisa kumara esande nyingi, barikuta omutima aha bukoryo bwabo n'okukorera hamwe. Nk'emwe aha ntebeekanisa yaabo, tiimu y'omupiira neija kutaayaayira abarikugihakanisa.

eng_prompt: Officials held a press conference to address the ongoing investigation. During the event, they unveiled new findings that shocked the public.
lug_prompt: Abakungu baatudde olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okwogera ku kunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso. Ku mukolo, baatongozza ebipya ebyazuuliddwa ebyawuniikiriza abantu.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ki kacoke pa luco lok angeya me lok I kom kwed matye kawot anyim. Ikare me yub eni, gunyutu jami manyen ma oyomo cwiny lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak kojaikinos keda lu iyemuto kanu einer nuikamunitos aingic na elosi akonye. Kotoma opucit kangol, apotu kesi kitodiasi akiro nuitetiak nuapotu koumokisi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi 'ye e'yo nze 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo nzezu e'yo eti ondaza mupi drile 'diyi ma dria. Sawa omu 'da nirisi, eyi e'da e'yo 'bani esu o'diru 'diyi o'bi eyini osuta fepi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kugamba aha kucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho. Omu mukoro, bakashohoza ebijumbwirwe ebitsya ebirikutangaaza abantu.

eng_prompt: Sexual health education is often inadequate in many communities. As a result, misconceptions about safe practices can lead to risky behaviors.
lug_prompt: Okusomesa ku byobulamu bw'okwegatta tekumala mu bitundu bingi. N'ekivuddemu, endowooza enkyamu ku nkola ez'obukuumi zisobola okuviirako enneeyisa ey'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Pwonye i kom yotkom me butu imit ipol kare pe tye maber ikabedo mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, tam ma pe atir I kom jami ma ber twero kelo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakino na nuka angaleu na aelo mam edolit kaiboisio nuipu. Kanuka ngun, aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos ayuwara epedorete ayangaun iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Imbata e'yo ali o'baza niri ma dria ri cani aku karakara eyi ma alea ku. E'yo 'disi, egata onzi 'diyi eco fe 'ba eyini adriza onzi 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa ebikwatireine n'okuteerana tikurikumara omu byanga bingi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiteekateeko ebitahikire ebikwatiraine n'emitwarize mirungi nibibaasa kurugwamu emicwe y'akabi.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered to commemorate the annual festival, excitement filled the air. Organizers revealed a series of special events planned for the occasion.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaana okujjukira omukolo ogutegekebwa buli mwaka, waaliwo essanyu lingi. Abategesi baategeezezza ebintu eby'enjawulo ebyategekebwa ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure me kwero kwer ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, yomcwiny opong I kabedo weng. Luyub onyuto yub mapat-pat mapat-pat ma kiyubu pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin aiitun ainumunum naka epucit kangol ekaru, apol noi aiyalama. Apotu lu itemonokinak olimosi nuikamunitos iboro luitegelikina luitemokinitai kanuka epucit kangol.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini trazu omu eli vusi 'da ma e'yo egazu risi, ayiko ga angu eyi ma alea tre. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi ece e'yo ndundu 'bani otule omu 'da ni 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe kwijuka omukoro ogurikubaho buri mwaka, haabaho okushemererwa kwingi. Abatebekanisa bakashoborora emikoro y'omutaano eyabaire etebekanisiibwe aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: The company is looking to fill a crucial role in its management team. As a result, several candidates have stepped forward to showcase their qualifications.
lug_prompt: Kampuni enoonya okujjuza ekifo ekikulu mu ttiimu yaayo ey'obukulembeze. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi ab'akamalirizo abawerako bavuddeyo okulaga ebisaanyizo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Dul ne tye ki miti me cobo tic mapire tek tutwal I dul ma doro ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol gukato anyim me nyutu rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Ekoto ekampuni ailelebikin aswam naepol noi kotoma otimu loka eyaitene. Kanuka ngun, apotu esisiak luipu kolomutu aitodiar apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da le azi okporu ni 'ba amuti eri ma driceza ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi efu drile eyi ma kokobi onita ni 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni eriyo nereeba ngu ebaase kuhikiiriza omurimo gw'omugasho omu tiimu yaayo y'obwebembezi. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi batandikire kworeka ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered in anticipation, the tension in the air was palpable. Two fierce rivals had trained for months, each determined to claim victory in the upcoming showdown.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu bakungaanidde mu ssanyu, obunkenke mu bbanga bwalabika. Abavuganya babiri ab'amaanyi baali beetendese okumala emyezi, nga buli omu mumalirivu okuwangula olutalo olwali lugenda okujja.
