eng_prompt: The community center is hosting an important event this weekend. Attendees are encouraged to come and learn valuable information that can empower them.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'ekyalo kitegese omukolo omukulu wiikendi eno. Abeetabye bakubirizibwa okujja ne bayiga obubaka obw'omugaso obuyinza okubawa amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Gang tic pa lwak tye ki yub ma pire tek tutwal I tum cabit eni. Kicuku cwiny dano me bino ka pwonyo jami mapigi tego ma twero jingo cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Ebeit aiboisit naka itunga ajaut keda epucit loepol noi kosabiti kalo. Isinyikokinitai itunga aipejonokin kosodete aisisiaun akiro nuepedorete aitogogong kes.
lgg_prompt: Pari ongulumu eyini aa'zu ri ni omu okporu ni 'ye wikiendi 'disi. Ba eka 'ba emu'ba 'diyi emuzu e'yo orodriru ecopi yi dri okpo fepi ra 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'abantu niguza kutaayaayisa omukoro gw'omugasho wiikendi egi. Abeejumbiremu nibahigwa kwija kwega amakuru g'omugasho agarikubaasa kubagaruramu amaani.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted a troubling increase in aggressive behavior among young people. Researchers are investigating various factors that may contribute to this alarming trend.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga okweyongera kw'empisa ez'obukambwe mu bavubuka. Abanoonyereza banoonyereza ku nsonga ez'enjawulo eziyinza okuviirako embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni tim gero tye ka medde tutwal ikin bulu. Lutim kwed tye ka kwedo jami mapol ma twero kelo tim man ma kelo lworo.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe eyatakinos iponesio lu amumu kanejaas atumunak. Eutasi angicak aingic iboro luegelegela luepedorete ayangaun aswamisioit na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba ode eyi ma adriza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi e'yo ndundu ecopi fepi e'yo 'di ni i 'yezu 'diyi ma eti onda.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'emitwarize y'obwinazi omu minyeeto. Abacondoozi bariyo nibacondooza enshonga nyingi ezirikubaasa kureetaho enkora egi.

eng_prompt: In a recent discussion about the controversial topic, various opinions began to emerge. As the conversation unfolded, it became clear that many individuals had strong feelings about the issue.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku nsonga eyo, endowooza ez'enjawulo zaatandika okulabika. Ng'emboozi egenda mu maaso, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abantu bangi balina enneewulira ez'amaanyi ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki, tam mapat-pat ocako bino. I kare ma lok ne tye ka wot anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni dano mapol tye ki tam matek tutwal I kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos akirot ngin, apotu aomisio nuegelegela kogeutu alomun. Neautar einer ngol alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe ipu itunga luejaasi keda aomisio nuegogong nuikamunitos akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru e'yo 'di ma dria ri ma alea, egata ndundu eyi e'do efu amve. E'yo onzeza ni mu drile, eca e'da kini 'ba karakara eyi ma egata e'yo nde ma dria okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, ebiteekateeko bitari bimwe, bikatandika kubaho. Okugaaniira kuyabaire nikugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu abantu baingi bakaba baine ebiteekateeko by'amaani aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In light of the growing economic disparities, community leaders have come together to address the urgent need for reform. They believe that a fairer approach to taxation could significantly improve the lives of many citizens.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutafaanagana mu by'enfuna obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebitundu bakwataganye okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ennongoosereza. Balowooza nti enkola ey'obwenkanya mu kusasula emisolo eyinza okulongoosa ennyo obulamu bwa bannansi bangi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim matye kamede, lutela me tedero guribe kacel me cobo miti me aloka-loka matye oyot-oyot tutwal. Gitye ki niyee ni yoo me ngolo mucoro maber twero yubu kwo pa anywali mapol.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiakatiaka naka ikapun, apotu engarenok luka atutubet imorikikinos kanu aitemokin eipud loka aijulanakineta. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ewai loajokan lo isolosinei epedori aitojokar aijar naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi emu tualu e'yo ojata lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi ai ra kini geri kililiru 'bani musoro trazu ri eco kari anzi karakara eyi ma edri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omutaano oguriyo nigweyongyera omu by'entaasya, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakwatanisize kukora aha kyetengo ky'ahonaaho ky'empinduka. Nibiikiriza ngu enkora y'oburingaaniza omu by'emishoro neebaasa kutunguura amagara g'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent budget shortfall, officials have been exploring innovative strategies to enhance revenue. As a result, various experts and stakeholders have come together to propose solutions.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bbula ly'embalirira gye buvuddeko, abakungu babadde banoonya engeri z'okwongera ku musolo. N'ekivuddemu, abakugu n'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo bakwataganye okuteesa ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me byek me lim matye cokcok-ki, lutic gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo lim. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro ma padi padi kacel ki joo ma lok tye I komgi guribe kacel me kelo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos ekadakada loka ebajet, eutasi eswamak aingic iwaitin luitetiak luka aiyatakin edumune loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, imorikikinos ipirioitin keda itunga luegelegela kanu aitemokin ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bajeti ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda robia esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi tualu 'ba ambo ndundu eyi pie emu tualu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'embaririra, abakungu batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okwongyera aha ntaatsya. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu n'abaine akakwate omu by'obutegyeki bakwatanisize kutaho oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent unrest and growing tensions in the city, authorities have decided to take decisive action. After gathering evidence of his illegal activities, the government has issued a warrant for his arrest.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butabanguko obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera mu kibuga, ab'obuyinza basazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi ku bikolwa bye ebimenya amateeka, gavumenti efulumizza ekiragiro okumukwata.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim gero ma otime cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamede I boma ne, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Inge nongo caden ma moko ni en otimo jami ma turu cik, gamente omiyo waraga me make.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka amumu na ajai pac keda aiyalongong na iyata noi koibuga, aseutu apedorosio aswam kagogong. Akaulo naka aituk ajenanut nuikamunitos aswamisioke numam ekisil ecamakinit, abu apugan kitolomu apapula naka aikamanario ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru tupi aku ambu city niri ma alea 'diyi pie, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo azi okporu ni 'yezu. E'yo e'dapi kini eri 'ye e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, gamete fe waraga 'bani eri bizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwahwaireho n'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu rurembo, ab'obushoborozi bashaziremu kukora eky'amaani. Ahanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi oburikworeka ngu akakora ebitahikire, gavumenti ehaireyo ekihandiiko ekirikumwikiriza kumukwata.

eng_prompt: Despite his significant contributions to the community, many people remain unaware of his efforts. As a result, he is not recognized by the government.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yakola ebintu bingi mu kitundu, abantu bangi tebamanyi bimukwatako. N'ekyavaamu, gavumenti temukkiriza.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en otimo jami mapol pi lwak, dano mapol pe gingeyo pi tute ma en otimo. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente pe ngeye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda aswamisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi itunga, mam itunga luipu ejenete nuiswamat ngesi. Kanuka ngun, mam apugan ejeni ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro azi onyiru 'yezu ongulumu eyini ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi nini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ku. E'yo 'disi, gamete a'ini eri ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhwezi bwe bw'amaani omu bantu, abantu baingi tibarikumanya amaani agu yaakozire. N'ekyarugiremu, tarikwikirizibwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Despite its significant contributions to the economy and culture, the local community has often been overlooked. Many residents feel that their hard work and dedication have gone unrecognized by the authorities.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bakoze kinene mu by'enfuna n'ebyobuwangwa, abantu b'omu kitundu batera okubuusibwa amaaso. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nti okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo kwabwe tekusiimiddwa aboobuyinza.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul enoni okonyo tutwal I tenge me lim ki tekwaro, pol kare ki cayo lwak me tedero. Lutedero mapol gitye ki tam ni lutela pe gingeyo tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda iboro luipu luepedorete aingarakin kotoma ikapun keda inonosio, epalunitai itunga luka atutubet. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam apedorosio ejenete aswamukec keda agogongukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye orodriru e'yo robia ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyi ma alia ra ti, 'ba ebi 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi adi te. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ega kini azi okporu eyini nga azini asi feza eyini ri ma e'yo 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi esuni ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhwezi bw'amaani omu by'entaasya n'eby'obuhangwa, abantu b'omubyaro batwire nibarekyererwa. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu okukora munonga kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo tibirikusiimwa ab'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the suspicious behavior, the friend decided to report the incident. Concerned for everyone's safety, they contacted the authorities immediately.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba enneeyisa eyeekengera, mukwano gwe yasalawo okuloopa ebyali bibaddewo. Olw'okweraliikirira ku lw'obukuumi bwa buli omu, baatuukirira ab'obuyinza mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Inge neno tim ma pe ber, lareme omoko tamme me doto gin ma otimme. Pi lworo pi ber bedo pa dano weng, guloko ki lutela cut-cut.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun iponesio lumam eomitai, abu apaperoke koseu alimor ngun. Kanu aiyalongong kanuka ayuwara naka itunga kere, apotu kesi odolokisi apedorosio katipet.
lgg_prompt: Erini adriza 'bani ega kokoru 'da ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, eri ma agyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'da oluzu. Asi otiza e'yo 'ba dria ma ta mbaza ma dria, eyi olu e'yo 'ba okpo e'ipiru 'diyi pie indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okureeba emicwe etarikwetegyerezibwa,munywani we akasharamu kuhabura ekyabaireho. Ahabw'okwerarikirira eby'okwerinda kwa buri omwe, bakeeta ab'obushoborozi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple reports of escalating tensions between the couple, authorities decided to investigate the situation further. Concerned neighbors alerted the police about loud arguments and signs of distress coming from the residence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota eziwera ez'obunkenke obweyongera wakati w'abafumbo, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza ku mbeera. Baliraanwa abeeraliikirivu baategeeza poliisi ku kukaayana okw'amaanyi n'obubenje obwali buva mu maka.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo adwogi tic mapol I kom telle matye I kin lunyom egoni, lutela gumoko tamgi me mede ki kwedo ngo matye katimme. Jirani ma onongo gitye ki lworo gu cwalo lok bot abili pi koko ma obedo dwong tutwal ki lanyut me peko ma obedo kabino ki I gang ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun iripootan luipu nuikamunitos aiyatakin naka ingungeta kiding ekiliokit keda aberu kangun, apotu apedorosio koseutu aingic akirot ngin. Apotu idunyeta lu apodokinit ngun olimokisi ipolisin nuikamunitos epeget loepol noi keda ijenuneta luka atiokisio nuelomunitos korekec.
lgg_prompt: Erini o'duko karakara eyi esuzu e'yo erita ako ni tupi 'ba iri 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'da ma eti ondazu drile. Jo ejele asi otiza be 'diyi lu polisi eyini e'yo 'bani agata gazu okporu azini eceta e'yo ewaru ni efuzu engazu aku 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga ripoota nyingi ezirikworeka obunkenke ahagati y'abashwereine, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kwongyera kucondooza aha nshonga egyo. Abaturanyi abarikwerarikiriire bakarabura poriisi ahabw'okuhajaana kw'amaani n'obubonero bw'oburemeezi kuruga omu maka.

eng_prompt: After a long search for the missing man, authorities received a tip about his whereabouts. Concerned friends and family had reported him missing days earlier.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala ebbanga ddene nga banoonya omusajja eyabula, ab'obuyinza baafuna amagezi ku gy'ali. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda ze abaali beeraliikirivu baaloopa nti yali abuze ennaku ntono emabega.
ach_prompt: Ingee yenyo laco ma orweny pi kare malac, lutela gunongo ngec i kom kama en tye iye. Lurem ki lugang ma onongo gitye ki par mapol onongo dong guwaco ni en orweny nino mapol mukato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aimo etunganan loabu kowolio, apotu apedorosio kodumutu akiro nuikamunitos aiboisit ke. Apotu ipaperokec keda lukokalekec kolimosi ebe abu ngesi kowolio apaarasia nukokau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani agu avipiri ndazu sa'wa ezu ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu e'yo erini aa'zu ngua ri ma dria. Agyipi azini familia asi otiza be 'diyi ece ndra eri ma aviza o'du agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusherura omushaija owabuzire kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakatunga amakuru agarikukwata ahari we. Banywani be n'ab'omuka ye bakaba bamugambireho ebiro bikye enyimaho.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have surfaced detailing the harmful effects of the practice on vulnerable communities. As a result, many advocacy groups have called for immediate action against it.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumye gyebuvuddeko awo ziraga mu bujjuvu akabi akali mu kikolwa kino ku bantu abateesobola. N'ekyavaamu, ebibiina bingi ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu bisabye wabeewo ekikolebwako mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma okati cokcok-ki nyutu adwoki marac ma tim man kelo I kom lwak ma peko tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapol ma lwenyo pi twero pa dano gulego ni myero kitim gin mo oyot-oyot i komgi.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitetiak lu itodunitos atiokisio nuka aswamisioit ngin mama ejaasi itunga lu ican. Kanuka ngun, esinyikokitos igurupun luipu aitikitik ngun katipet.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi eturisi 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi 'yeta 'di ni 'ye ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma dria 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma karakara eyi ai 'bani e'yo 'yezu e'yo nde ma dria mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kurugaho nizigamba aha kabi k'ekikorwa eki aha bantu abatarikwebaasa. N'ekyarugiremu, guruupu nyingi z'okurwanirira obugabe zishabire ngu habeho ekikorwa ahari kyo.

eng_prompt: Following the public outcry over the recent incident, officials held a press conference to address the concerns raised by community members. In response to the allegations, the police has defended their conduct.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'abantu okwekubira enduulu olw'ebyaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakungu baatuuza olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okwogera ku kweraliikirira kw'abantu b'ekitundu. Mu kwanukula ebigambibwa, poliisi yeewozezzaako ku nneeyisa yaayo.
ach_prompt: Inge koko pa lwak I kom ngo ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutic ne gubedo ki kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom peko ma lwak tye kwede. Ma lubbe ki adot ne, abili ocwako timgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aimony naka itunga kanuka akangas kangin, apotu eswamak itolototo einer keda lu iyemuto kanu aitemitem akiro nuka itunga luka atutubet. Kanu abongokin aitoroneta ngun, apotu ipolisin igangata iponesiokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'bi eyini owuzu e'yo 'da ma dria 'bo ri ma vutia, azi'ba eyi 'ye e'yo nze 'ba osisiani 'diyi pie e'yo 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. Omvita e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma dria, polisi eyi ati eyi ma adriza ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'abantu okwetomboitwa ahabw'ekyabaireho juba, abakungu bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru, kugira ngu bagarukemu okwerarikirira kw'abantu b'omukyanga. Omu kugarukamu ebyabaire nibigambwa, poriisi ekeesharinga aha bikwatireine n'emitwarize yaayo.

eng_prompt: The community had always looked up to him for guidance and wisdom. His actions, however, took a surprising turn that left many questioning their faith.
lug_prompt: Abantu bulijjo baali bamutunuulira okufuna obulagirizi n'amagezi. Kyokka, ebikolwa bye byakyuka mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa ekyaleka bangi okubuusabuusa enzikiriza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lwak I kare weng gubedo ki gen I kome pi kony ki ryeko. Ento tim mege okelo ngeng tutwal ma oweko dano mapol obedo ki akala-kala I kom niyee gi.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc itunga asesen ngesi kanu aicoreta keda acoa. Konye, apotu aswamisioke kijulakisi itunga luipu abuonokin nuikamunitos aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi ndra sa'wa driasi angu ndre engazu eri vu imbata azini ondua esuzu. Kani si, e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi 'du ojata osuta ru fepi 'ba karakara yi dri e'yo egazu yi ma a'ita ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakaba bamurebireho kutunga obuhabuzi n'obwengye. Kwonka ebikorwa bye bikakora ekirikutangaaza ekyarekire baingi nibabangaanisa okwikiriza kwabo.

eng_prompt: Amid growing concerns about his declining approval ratings, party leaders convened to discuss the future of their candidate. In a private meeting, they expressed their doubts about his chances for re-election.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kweraliikirira okukendeera kw'obuyambi bwe, abakulembeze b'ekibiina baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'omubaka waabwe eby'omu maaso. Mu lukungaana olw'ekyama, baalaga okubuusabuusa kwabwe ku mikisa gye egy'okuddamu okulondebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne gubedo ka lok i kom anyim pa lacungu gi. I kacoke ma obedo I mung, gunyutu akala-kala gi I kom gum ma en tye kwede me nongo yer odoco.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyalongongo naepol noi kanu aikidiokor na adoketaitike, apotu engarenok luka epate iriamunos kanu aitemitem ingaren naka abwoanikec. Kotoma airiamunet naka aiyeyea, apotu kesi kitodutu abuonokinikec kanu aseo bobo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi 'diyi ma talasi, drice'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu ewu drialeri ni 'ba pa tupi eyivile 'diyiniri ma dria. Mitingi azi ngulupisi ni ma alea, eyi ece e'yo eyi ma agata eyini ecozu pa sozu dika ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'okwerarikirira okweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ebibiina bakateerana kuhanuura aha biro bya nyensya by'omuntu waabo oyesimbireho. Omu rukiiko rw'ekihama, bakooreka okubanganisa kwabo aha migisha ye y'okugaruka akarugaho.

eng_prompt: After much anticipation and excitement from the participants, the organizers have officially announced the return of the event. Competitors are eager to showcase their skills once again.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusuubira ennyo n'okusanyuka okuva mu beetabamu, abategesi balangiridde mu butongole okudda kw'omukolo. Abavuganya beesunga okulaga obukugu bwabwe omulundi omulala.
ach_prompt: Ingee bedo ki gen ki yomcwiny madit tutwal ki bot joo ma obedo tye, luyub guwaco ni yub eni dong odwogo. Lupyem tye ki miti matek me nyutu diro gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aiyalongongo keda aiyalama kama ejaasi itunga, apotu luitemonokinak kolimosi abongunet naka epucit ngol. Ekapakina abolobol aitodun acoasineikec bobo.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza azini ayiko engazu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba otu'ba 'diyi azi e'yo 'di ma omvizu 'bo. Ba baka sepi 'diyi avasi eyi ma ondua e'dazu dika.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga n'okushemererwa kuruga omu bajwekyerwa, abatebekanisa balangirire omu butongore okugaruka kw'omukoro. Abarikuhakana baine ekihika ky'okugaruka kworeka emyoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: The tournament schedule has been finalized, and teams are eager to compete. Fans can expect an exciting lineup of matches throughout the weekend.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka y'empaka emaliriziddwa, era ttiimu zeesunga okuvuganya. Abawagizi basobola okusuubira emipiira egy'enjawulo mu wiikendi yonna.
ach_prompt: Yub me pyem tuku dong otum dok team tye ki miti me pyem. Lucwak tuku omyero gubed ki gen ni tuku mapatpat bibedo tye I tum cabit weng.
teo_prompt: Aponi ongetakinai ainapeta nuka abolobol, ido ekotosi itimun abolobol. Epedorete egangitok aomit ebe epote aboliak aiyalama noi kosabiti kere.
lgg_prompt: Otita abala ni 'diyi 'bo, amuti avita ni 'diyi avasi abala 'yezu. Ba atita fepi 'diyi eco ega e'yo avita ni ndrizaru 'diyi ma dria sabiti ni i deria ra.
nyn_prompt: Entebekanisa y'empaka z'emizaano eherize kukorwa, kandi tiimu ziine ekihika ky'okuzaana. Abahagizi nibabaasa kuteekateeka emizaano erikushemeza omu wiikendi yoona.

eng_prompt: Many individuals strive to achieve their goals and aspirations. This ambition often fuels their determination and hard work.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuba okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byabwe n'ebirooto byabwe. Okwegomba kuno kutera okukubiriza obumalirivu bwabwe n'okukola ennyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tute matek me cobo miti gi. Miti man ipol kare weko gimoko tamgi me tic matek.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu iswamaete kagogongu kanu aitodolikin apeleikinata kec keda apeleikinata kec. Apodokinit ngin einakini kesi agogongu na aswam keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi okpo 'ba e'yo eyini lele 'diyi esuzu. Asi 'baza 'diri tuni ava fe yini asi 'bazu azini azi ngazu avasi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateeraho kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo n'ebigyendererwa byabo. Ekigyendererwa eki nikibareetera kugumizamu n'okukora n'amaani.

eng_prompt: The landscape of entrepreneurship is fraught with challenges and uncertainties. Despite the excitement of launching a new venture, many founders face significant obstacles that can lead to failure.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obusuubuzi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu. Ng'oggyeko essanyu ly'okutongoza emirimu emipya, abatandisi bangi basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi obuyinza okuviirako okulemererwa.
ach_prompt: Tenge me timo biacara tye ki peko mapol tutwal. Kadi bed ni cwinye yom me cako biacara manyen, lucako mapol nongo peko mapol ma kelo poto pa biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi akiro nuka agwelanar keda atiokisio nuipu. Karaida iyalamasi kesi noi kanu ageun iboro luitetiak, itunga luipu etereikina keda atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Angu tujari 'yezuri ma alia e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi tre. Aa'zu ayiko be tujara o'diru e'dozu ra ti, 'ba karakara e'dopi 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru okporu ecopi fepi yi dri e'dezu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obushubuzi birimu oburemeezi bwingi. Oihireho okushemererwa kw'okutandikaho emirimo misya, abatandikireho emirimo baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikubaasa kurugwamu okuremwa.

eng_prompt: Building a thriving enterprise requires constant effort and adaptability. Many entrepreneurs underestimate the challenges that come with sustaining growth and profitability.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba bizinensi ekulaakulana kyetaagisa okufuba buli kiseera n'okukyusakyusa. Abasuubuzi bangi banyooma okusoomoozebwa okujja n'okutumbula enkulaakulana n'amagoba.
ach_prompt: Gedo biacara ma dongo mito tute matek tutwal ki bedo ki kero me timo jami mapat-pat. Lutim biacara mapol pe giparo tutwal I kom peko ma bino macalo adwogi me dongo ki nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Adukio naka ebiasara lo iswamai ejok ekot aswam kagogong keda apedor. Itunga luipu luitolosete ibiasaran mam ejenete atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma apol keda ameda.
lgg_prompt: Tujura drile suzaru ri ma sita le okpo sa'wa driasi azini e'yo ojazu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria. Ba tujari 'yepi karakara 'diyi e'yo ewaru zota azini orodri ejipi 'diyi ma omgbo esi ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka bizinesi erikutunguuka nikyetengyesa okukoresa amaani n'obwegyendesereza. Abashuubuzi abaingi tibarikufayo aha buremeezi oburikuruga omu kutunguuka n'okukora amagoba.

eng_prompt: In a world where achievements often feel fleeting, many individuals and organizations grapple with the challenge of maintaining their momentum. Understanding the factors that contribute to lasting success is essential for long-term growth and fulfillment.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga ebituukiddwaako bitera okuwulirwa nga bya kaseera buseera, abantu bangi n'ebitongole birwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'okukuuma entambula yabyo. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako obuwanguzi obw'olubeerera kyetaagisa mu kukulaakulana okw'ekiseera ekiwanvu n'okutuukiriza.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma jami ma kitimo ipol kare nen calo tye pi tutunu, dano ki dule mapol gitye ka lweny ki peko me medde anyim. Niang jami ma kelo loc pi kare malac obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo ki bedo ki yomcwiny pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naewomitai ebe epatana aitodolikinio, itunga keda iriongeta luipu etereikina keda ainingosit naka aidar adoketaitikec. Amisiikin iboro lueyangaunete akerianut naka apak naepol erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka apak naepol ka aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo ni aa'zu ewule, 'ba karakara eyi tualu amuti karakara eyi pie e'yo ewaru eyini aa'zu ewule 'diyi ma alea ri be. E'yo ecopi fepi drile suza ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru zota ewu drile ri ma alea azini ayiko esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu ebirikubaasa kukorwa nibireebeka nk'eby'akanya kakye, abantu n'ebitongore bingi nibirwana n'oburemeezi bw'okugumizamu n'omurimo gwabo. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho obusinguzi obw'obwire buraingwa n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka n'okumarwa.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and speculation about his future, the player finally made a decision. Fans were left wondering where he would end up next.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteesa n'okuteebereza ku biseera bye eby'omu maaso, omuzannyi yasembye okusalawo. Abawagizi baalekebwa nga beebuuza wa gy'addako.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye pi dwe mapol ki byek I kom anyim mege, latuku ne dong omoko tamme. Lucwak tuku gubedo ki ngeng I kom ngo ma obutimo I agiki ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda aomisio nuikamunitos ngarenike, abu abolian kiswamau aseunet. Aponi kojalakinai egangitok aomoom ne ebuni ngesi angetakin.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini e'yo egazu ewu drusiri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba avitani 'da asizu e'yo 'du ra. Ba atita fepi 'diyi ku yi osuzu pari erini ngazu asizu vileri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa n'okuteebereza aha biro bye eby'omumaisho, omuzaani akahendera yaakora encwamu. Abahagizi bakasigara nibeebuuza ahu yaakurateho.

eng_prompt: Despite the team's efforts to implement a new strategy, the underlying issues remain unaddressed. As a result, many stakeholders are left feeling frustrated and uncertain about the future.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga ttiimu efubye okussa mu nkola enkola empya, ensonga eziriwo tezinnagonjoolwa. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako bangi balekeddwa nga bennyamivu era nga tebalina bukakafu ku biseera bya mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul enoni otute matek me keto yub manyen itic, pe kicobo peko matye. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol giwinyo marac dok pe gi ngeyo anyim gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamit etimu aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak, mam itemokinitai akiro nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga luipu keda aiyalongong ido mam ejenete nuikamunitos ingaren.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ni tro okpo 'ba otita o'diru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea ra ti, e'yo okporu 'diyi nga po'di 'duni nga po'di ku. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi asi nyoza azini asi'baza be ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani ga tiimu okuta omu nkora enkora ensya, enshonga ezirikugyenda omumaisho tizikakozirweho. N'ekyarugiremu, abaine akakwate omu by'obutegyeki baingi nibasigaza amaganya n'okwerarikirira aha by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Many community members expressed their frustration over the recent initiative. Despite its good intentions, the act is seen as a waste of time and resources.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu kitundu baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'enteekateeka eyakolebwa gye buvuddeko. Wadde nga kirina ebigendererwa ebirungi, ekikolwa kino kitunuulirwa ng'okwonoona obudde n'eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Lwak mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi yub ma otime cokcok-ki. Kadi bed ni miti ne obedo ber, tim ne kineno calo balo cawa ki lim.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu amamut aiyalama kanu aswamisioit na pac. Karaida ejaasi keda apeleikinata nuajokak, esesenitai aswamisioit ngin kwape aibiror apak keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo 'di ma dria. Egata erini tro ovuzu onyiru 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba e'yo nde ndre ekile sawa ezaza azini lonyi ezazaru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu byaro boorekire okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabw'enteekateeka eyabaireho juba. Oihireho ebigyendererwa birungi, ekikorwa nikireebeka nk'okushiisha obwire n'ebintu.

eng_prompt: The excitement is building as teams finalize their rosters. Fans are eagerly anticipating the kickoff of the season.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyeyongera nga ttiimu zimaliriza olukalala lwazo. Abawagizi beesunga nnyo entandikwa ya sizoni.
ach_prompt: Yomcwiny tye ka mede ikare ma dul tuku mapat-pat tye ka tyeko coyo nyinggi. Lucwak tuku gitye ka kuro acaki pa kare me tuku.

eng_prompt: The excitement is building as the tournament approaches. Fans are eager to see which teams will compete in the upcoming matches.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyeyongera ng'empaka zisemberera. Abawagizi beesunga okulaba ttiimu ki ezigenda okuvuganya mu mipiira egijja.
ach_prompt: Yomcwiny tye ka mede ikare ma pyem tye cok. Lucwak tuku tye ki miti matek me neno team mene matye ka pyem I tuku matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga aiyalama naarai eyapie abolobol. Ekapakina egangitok aanyun itimun lu ebeit abolobol kotoma aboliasio nu ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko zo 'ba eyi ma eselea abala eyini ecazu ogogo risi. Ba atita fepi 'diyi avasi amuti ngo eyi ngapi abala emupi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa nikweyongyera ahabwokuba empaka ziri haihi. Abahagizi beine ekihika ky'okureeba tiimu ezirikwija kuhajaana omu mizaano erikwija.

eng_prompt: In a world where individualism often takes precedence, it's essential to consider the ways we can foster a sense of community. What practices or values do we embrace to ensure that we support one another?
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga buli omu ku ffe y'alina okukulembeza, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri gye tuyinza okukulaakulanyaamu enneewulira y'omukago.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma dano acel-acel maro bedo tye, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom yoo ma watwero medo rwom me ribbe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naingarenikinitor itunga, ejokuna noi aomoom iwaitin lu ipedoria oni aitopolor aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi tutuni okporu, eri orodriru e'yo egazu geri amani ecozu e'yo ongulumu ni 'diyi ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu okwetegyeka kw'omuntu, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku turikubaasa kureetaho obumwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events, many have called for clearer regulations. However, the legislative process has yet to produce any concrete measures.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, bangi basabye wabeewo amateeka amategeerekeka obulungi. Newankubadde, enkola y'okuteekawo amateeka tennaba kuleetawo nkola ntuufu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, dano mapol gulego ni omyero ki ket cik ma niange maber. Kadi bed kumeno, yub me moko cik pwod pe okatti ki yoo mo keken matir.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, ekotosi itunga luipu aitolomun ikisila lu ecaete. Konye, mam ber ainapeta nuka ikisila itolomunitos iboro luibusakinit aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi ai 'bani azita eyi 'bazu kililiru. Kani si, e'yo 'bani 'ba azita sizu 'diyi nga po'di e'da e'yo azi 'bani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati, baingi bashabire ngu habeho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa gye. N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, enkora y'eby'obutegyeki n'obwahati terikubaasa kurugwamu ekintu kyona ekirikubaasika.

eng_prompt: In the complex landscape of crime prevention and public safety, law enforcement agents often face challenging decisions. They must navigate ethical dilemmas while balancing community expectations and legal standards.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera enzibu ey'okutangira obuzzi bw'emisango n'obukuumi bw'abantu, abakuumaddembe batera okusanga okusalawo okusoomooza. Balina okutambula mu bizibu by'empisa nga bakwataganya ebisuubirwa mu kitundu n'emitindo gy'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kabedo matek tutwal me gengo timo bal ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, lutic ma gwoko cik ipol kare ginongo peko me moko tam. Omyero gityek peko me cik kun nongo gitye ka poro miti pa lwak ki rwom me cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka aitikitik abilibilio naka ikisila keda ayuwara naka itunga, itunga luitolosete ikisila itereikina duc keda aomisio nuetioko. Ibusakinit kesi aitemokin atiokisio nuikamunitos iponesio luegelegela kosodete aimorikikin nu ekoto itunga keda nu ekoto ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo onzi eyi atrizu azini o'bi eyi ma tambazu ri ma alea, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi tutuni e'yo 'du ewaru. Le eyi ma nga azi e'yo onzi eyi ma dria eyini ta tro aa'zu e'yo o'bi eyini ega eyi ma dria 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera egumire y'okuzibira ebihagaro hamwe n'okwerinda abantu, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okucwamu. Bashemereire kurwanisa oburemeezi oburikukwata aha mitwarize n'emitindo y'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: The recent incidents involving law enforcement have sparked widespread discussions among residents. Many are questioning the impact of police practices on the overall well-being and trust within the community.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko ebizingiramu abakuumaddembe bireeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu batuuze. Bangi babuusabuusa engeri enkola za poliisi gye zikosaamu obulamu obulungi n'obwesige mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ngo ma otimme cokcok-ki I kom abili okelo laro lok I kin lwak. Dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom adwoki pa tim pa abili I kom ber bedo ki gen I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuiswamasi pac nuikamunitos ipolisin eyangautu ipegeta luipu kanejaas itunga. Mam itunga luipu ejenete epone loepedoriata ipolisin aitodolikin aijar keda amuno naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie o'diru 'diyi eji e'yo nzeza angiri 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi zita eji e'yo polisi eyini 'ye o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria tualu asi'baza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ebyabaireho obwahati ebirikukwata aha kukuratira ebiragiro, bireesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu batuuragye. Baingi nibabangaanisa oku enkora ya poriisi erikukwata aha mutindo gw'abantu hamwe n'obwesigye omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After gathering new evidence that linked the suspects to a series of recent crimes, the security agents convened to discuss their next steps. They believed that a second attempt to apprehend the individuals was necessary to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi obupya obukwataganya abateeberezebwa n'ebikolobero ebiwerako ebyakabaawo, ab'eby'okwerinda baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiddako. Baalowooza nti okugezaako okuddamu okukwata abantu kyali kyetaagisa okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Inge coko caden manyen ma kubu joo mabyek me timo bal tye I komgi I kom bal mapol ma otime cokcok-ki, lugwok kuc gubedo kacoke me nywako tam I kom ngo ma omyero gutim. Gitye ki niyee ni temo me mako dano ne tyen me aryo obedo gin ma mite pi gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret naitetet naerucokinit lu ekamunitai keda imusagon luipu, apotu itunga luka ayuwara iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit kesi aswam. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ibusakinit aitam bobo aikamar itunga ngun kanu ayuara na itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecepi kini 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ecipi e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba ageyitema ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini 'ye drile 'diyi ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini le 'ba ma obi 'ba 'da eyi pale iri eyini ani ageyitema o'bi eyini ri ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi obutsya oburikworeka ngu abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro, ab'eby'okwerinda bakahurira hamwe kuhanuura aha kirikukurataho. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okuteeraho omurundi gwa kabiri kukwata abantu, kikaba nikyetengwa okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence presented against him, he remained steadfast in his denial. The truth is being twisted by those who seek to tarnish his reputation.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo obujulizi bungi obumuvunaanibwa, yasigala munywevu mu kwegaana. Amazima gakyusibwa abo abanoonya okwonoona erinnya lye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden madwong tutwal kikelo i kome, en omedde ki kwero lokke. Jo ma mito balo nyinge tye ka nyweno lok ada.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aitogogongoret naepol noi mama ejai ngesi, abu ngesi kinyikok ainger ngun. Eutasi ngul lu ekotosi amunar ekirorike aijulakin abeit.
lgg_prompt: Afa ecetaru 'bani e'da eri ma rua 'diyi ma talasi, eri awi okporu e'yo erini a'i 'diyi ma alea. Ba lepi eri ma ru ezazu 'diyi e'yo ada oja.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho obujurizi bwingi obwaretsirwe kumuhakanisa, akaguma agumire omu kwehakana kwe. Amazima gahindwirwe abo abarikwenda kushiisha eiziina rye.

eng_prompt: In response to recent challenges and feedback from the community, the council convened a special meeting to discuss potential reforms. After extensive deliberation, the members reached a consensus on the need for a more effective governance model.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko n'ebiteeso okuva mu bantu, akakiiko kaayita olukiiko olw'enjawulo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnongoosereza eziyinza okukolebwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, bammemba baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku bwetaavu bw'enkola y'obukulembeze ennungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye ka time ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak, kancil olwongo kacoke ma pire tek me nywako tam i kom aloka loka matwero time. Ingee tam matut, lumemba guwinye I kom miti me tela maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka pac keda abongokineta nuka itunga, abu ekansulo konyarau airiamun na itegelikina kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta nuibusakinit aswam. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu imeban opuputu acamanara kanu eipuda lo epugae lo iswamai ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini o'duko engazu ongulumu eyivu risi, kanisulu omve mitingi azi ndu ni agbatara gbazu e'yo ojata eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo o'yoza angiri ma vutia, memba 'da eyi esu ti ecita e'yo lezu geri driceza ni muke ndeni ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho obwahati hamwe n'ebiteiso kuruga omu bantu,akakiiko kaketa orukiiko rw'omutaano kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, abanyakibiina bakaikirizana aha kyetengo ky'enkora nungi y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In response to community feedback, the local government has initiated a new initiative aimed at enhancing accessibility. This approach aims to ensure that residents can easily access essential services.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okuddibwamu kw'abantu, gavumenti z'ebitundu zitandiseewo enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula okutuuka. Enkola eno egendereddwamu okukakasa nti abatuuze basobola okufuna amangu obuweereza obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwoki me lok pa lwak, gamente me tedero ocako yub manyen me medo yoo me nongo kony. Yub man tye me neno ni lutedero nongo kony ma mite pi kwo gi oyot.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin akiro nuka itunga, etolomu apugan na okwap ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotosi aitojokar adolokinio. Alosikinet na erai awanyun ebe epatanikit itunga adumunun aijanakino.

nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro, ahabw'okugarukwamu abantu, etandikireho enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okwongyera aha kuhikwaho. Enkora egi negyenderera okureeba ngu abatuuragye nibahikwaho obuheereza bw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: After extensive planning and discussions, the team finalized the details of the new initiative. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, the program has not yet been implemented.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, ttiimu yamaliriza kalonda yenna akwata ku nteekateeka empya. Kyokka, olw'embeera etasuubirwa, enteekateeka eno tennateekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub ki nywako lok mapol, dul pa lutic gumoko tam gi I kom yub manyen ne. Kadi bed kumeno, pi jami ma otimme atura, pwod pe ki keto yub eni itic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemonokin ka aineranara, apotu etimu ongetakisi akiro nuka ainapeta nuitetiak. Konye, kanu ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, mam ber itemokinitai ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Otuta angiri 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da de e'yo dria otita o'di 'da ma dria 'bo. Kani si, e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyisi, 'ba e'doni nga otita 'da 'ye ku.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about resource allocation, it became clear that certain communities were being overlooked. As a result, the team decided to shift their attention to the needs and challenges faced by different demographics.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku kugabanya eby'obugagga, kyalabika bulungi nti ebitundu ebimu byali bibuusibwa amaaso. N'ekyavaamu, ttiimu yasalawo okussa essira ku byetaago n'okusoomoozebwa abantu ab'enjawulo kwe basanga.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom yub me poko lonyo, onen atyer kamaleng ni kabedo mukene kitye ka cayo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ne omoko tamgi me loko tamgi I kom miti ki peko ma dano ma padi padi tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aikor iboro, apotu kojenutu ebe mam itunga ice epalunit. Kanuka ngun, abu etimu koseu aijulakin apodokinit kec mama ejaasi ipudesia keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru e'yo lonyi awazu ri ma dria ri ma alea, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba e'de ongulumu azi 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, amuti 'da pe asi e'yo eyini 'diyi ojazu e'yo 'ba eyini lele 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo ewaru 'ba eyini esu 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho obwahati aha kuheereza abantu ebintu, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebyanga ebimwe bikaba nibirekyererwa. N'ekyarugiremu, tiimu ekasharamu kuta omutima ahabyetaago hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikushangwa abantu batarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Proper handling and storage of agricultural products are crucial for maintaining their quality. Unfortunately, many farmers lack the resources and knowledge to store cassava effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukwata n'okutereka obulungi ebirime bya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma omutindo gwabyo. Eky'ennaku abalimi bangi tebalina bikozesebwa n'amagezi ku ngeri y'okuterekamu obulungi muwogo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ki gwoko jami apura maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko rwom gi. Ki gum marac, lupur mapol peke ki ngec ki jami ma mite me gwoko gwana maber.
teo_prompt: Aiting keda aidar iboro lu akoru ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar adoketait kec. Nukaiturur, emamiatatar akoriok keda iboro keda acoa na aidar emwogo ejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini eyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru eyi ma wura ma tambazu. Drile onziru, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma alia 'diyi vu afa ayuzaru azini ondua gbanda ma tambazu kililiru 'diyi yo.

eng_prompt: Our village is known for its lush landscapes and abundant crops. Many farmers attribute their success to the rich nutrients found in the ground.
lug_prompt: Ekyalo kyaffe kimanyiddwa olw'obutonde bwakyo obulungi n'ebirime ebingi. Abalimi bangi obuwanguzi bwabwe babutadde ku biriisa ebiri mu ttaka.

teo_prompt: Ejenara ecalokosi kanu aiboisio ke nuibusiak ka iraan luipu. Akoriok luipu itodunitos akerianut kec kanuka inyamat luajokak luejaasi toma alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni calo amavileri angu erivile 'diyi ma e'yosi azini ori nyakuni 'diyi be tre. Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ma pari yi drile suza yiniri 'ba afa nyakuni nyaku ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ekyaro kyaitu nikimanywa ahabw'obuhangwa bwakyo n'ebihingirwe bingi. Abahingi n'abariisa abaingi obusinguzi bwabo nibabutwarira aha biriisa ebiri omu itaka.

eng_prompt: After a season of favorable weather conditions and improved farming techniques, the crops flourished across the fields. As a result, the farmers have got high yields this season.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'embeera y'obudde ennungi n'obukodyo bw'okulima obulungi, ebirime byakula mu nnimiro. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bafunye amakungula mangi sizoni eno.
ach_prompt: Inge kare ma piny obedo ber ki diro me pur ma oyube maber, cam omede I poto mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur gunongo kac madit tutwal I kare me kac eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ejautene loajokan loka ikwamin keda iponesio luajokak luka akoru, apotu ikorion opoloutu kotoma amisirin kere. Kanuka ngun, adumutu akoriok isakan luipu noi apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo angu mile ni muke 'diyi ma vutia azini geri ori ezozaniri ma omgbo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, ori eyi zo amvu eyi ma alea dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi esu afa ofuza angiri ayi ti 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'embeera y'obwire nungi hamwe n'emitwarize mirungi y'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ebihingirwe bikakurakurana omu misiri. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi batungire amasharuura maingi omu siizoni egi.

eng_prompt: During the recent meeting, several concerns were raised about the lack of transparency and accountability in various organizations. As a result, the leader is not happy with the way some companies operate.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo, okweraliikirira kungi kwaleetebwa olw'obutaba na bwerufu n'obutaba na mbalirira mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, omukulembeze si musanyufu n'engeri kampuni ezimu gye ziddukanyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo mapol okatti I kom bedo peke pa ada ki kor tic I dul mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, latela ne cwinye pe yom ki kit ma kamponi mukene tye ka tic kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, aponi kitodunai aiyalongongo naepol kanu amamus aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, mam engarenon iyalama keda epone loiswamata ikampunin ice.
