nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, okwerarikirira kwingi kukareetwa ahabw'eibura ry'oburingaaniza n'embaririra omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, omwebembezi tashemerereirwe enkora ya kampuni ezimwe.

eng_prompt: After weeks of gathering evidence and interviewing witnesses, the team finally compiled their findings. The officer reviewed the detailed analysis with great interest, eager to uncover the truth.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bakung'aanya obujulizi n'okubuuza abajulizi, ttiimu yasembyeyo okukung'aanya ebizuuliddwa. Omukungu yeetegereza okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu n'obwagazi bungi ng'ayagala nnyo okuzuula amazima.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me coko caden ki penyo lucaden, lacen dul ne guyubu ngo ma gunongo. Abili ne gukwano lok matut tutwal ki miti madit tutwal, ki miti me niang lok ada.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aituk ajenanut ka aingitingit ajenak, apotu etimu kitolomutu akirokec. Abu epolisit kosiom akiro ngun keda eipud loepol noi kanu ajenun abeit.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu azini 'ba sadini ru 'diyi ozizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra asizu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi. Azi'ba 'da la e'yo eti ondaza 'da ma ale asi driasi, ava be e'yo ada esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okurundaana obujurizi n'okubuuza abajurizi, tiimu ekahendera yaakora ebirugiremu. Ofiisa akashwijuma ebihandiiko n'omuhimbo gw'amaani, aine ekihika ky'okumanya amazima.

eng_prompt: After thorough research and analysis, we have compiled all relevant information. The team worked diligently to ensure no detail was overlooked.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwekenneenya, tukuŋŋaanyizza amawulire gonna agakwatagana. Ttiimu yakola n'obunyiikivu okulaba nga tewali kintu kyonna kibuusibwa maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok matut tutwal, wa coko ngec weng ma mite. Dul ne gutiyo matek tutwal me neno ni pe kiweko gin mo keken.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ka aingic ejok, idumunit sio akiro kere nuikamunitos akiro ngun. Apotu etimu iswamata kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe emamei idiobore yen epalunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru azini e'yo eti ondaza ma vutia, ama tra o'dukoti dria orodriru 'diyi 'bo. Amuti 'da nga azi okporu nezu ra kini 'ba awini e'yo azi ece ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza n'okucondooza kurungi,tukatebekanisa amakuru goona agarikwetengwa. Tiimu ekakora n'amaani okureeba ngu tihaine ekintu kyona ekyabaire kitahurirwe.

eng_prompt: In the chaos of the laboratory accident, a beaker tipped over, spilling its dangerous contents onto the floor. As she rushed to contain the spill, she lost her footing and fell directly into the corrosive liquid.
lug_prompt: Mu kavuyo akaaliwo akabenje ka laabu, ekikopo kyagwa wansi, ne kiyiwa ebirimu eby'obulabe wansi. Bwe yabadde afubutuka okuziyiza okukulukuta kw'amazzi, yabulwa ekigere n'agwa butereevu mu mazzi.
ach_prompt: I kuku kuku ma obedo tye ikare me peko me gudu me ot pim, kikopo mo opoto woko, ma oketo jami matye I iye I ngom. I kare ma en tye ka ngwec me gengo cwer pa pii, en orwenyo tyene ci opoto I pii ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amumu naka akangas naka aiboisit nainwakere, abu eikopo kibiror, kosodi ailik iboro luededeng kwap. Neautar ngesi aisunyikokin aitikitik akorio na akipi, abu ngesi kotwania akeje kosodi aibiror toma akipi.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'yo drileonzi pari azo o'bizuri ma alia ri ma alia, kopo azini e'de va, afa erini 'bale onzi 'diyi ti nyaku dria. Erini arizu e'yo yi tizu 'boria, eri avi i ma pa azini e'de trotro yi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu butabanguko bw'akabenje ka labaratore, ekikopo kikagwa, ekyasheesha ebintu byakyo eby'akabi ahansi. Obuyabiire naarahuka kurwanisa okushuka kw'amaizi, akagwa omu maizi.

eng_prompt: In cases where the evidence is not overwhelmingly against the accused, the legal system must consider the possibility of granting bail. This decision is often influenced by various factors, including the nature of the crime and the defendant's flight risk.
lug_prompt: Mu misango nga obujulizi tebusukkiridde ku oyo avunaanibwa, enkola y'amateeka erina okulowooza ku ky'okuteebwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. Okusalawo kuno kwesigamizibwa ku bintu eby'enjawulo, omuli enkola y'omusango n'obulabe bw'omuwawaabirwa okudduka.
ach_prompt: I lok ma caden pe tye matek tutwal I kom ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye, cik omyero otam I kom miyo twero me bedo mabuc mawoko. Moko tam man ipol kare jenge I kom jami mapol, ma I kingi obedo kit bal ne ki peko me ngwec pa ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye.
teo_prompt: Karai mam aitogogongoret erai naepol noi mama ejai lo iwosatai, ekot ikisila aomoom nuikamunitos alacakinio naka itunganan. Etapit duc aitemokin ngun kotupitete iboro luegelegela, aimoriarit epone loka emusago keda ationis naka akerit naka lo iwosatai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini 'ba 'bani to 'da eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba ma ega e'yo 'bani 'ba 'da ofuzu azita pala 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo ndundu eyi tutuni e'yo 'du e'yo 'di ma dria, ekile e'yo onzi 'da ma wura azini 'ba 'bani to 'da ma e'yo 'bani ecozu apazu ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu mishango etarimu bujurizi bw'amaani oburikuhakanisa orikujunaanwa, enkora y'ebiragiro eshemereire kuteekateeka aha ky'okwemerererwa. Encwamu egi neetwarirwa enshonga nyingi, otwariiremu omuringo gw'ekihagaro hamwe n'akabi k'orikujunaanwa okutoroka.

eng_prompt: The continent of Africa has experienced a series of prolonged conflicts that seem to have no resolution in sight. Understanding the underlying factors contributing to these persistent wars is crucial for fostering peace and stability in the region.
lug_prompt: Ssemazinga wa Afirika ayolekaganye n'obukuubagano obw'enjawulo obumaze ebbanga nga tebulabika. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako entalo zino ezitakoma kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lobo Afrika okato ki I lweny mapol ma nen calo pe gitye ki yoo me tyeko ne. Niang tyen lok ma oweko lweny tye mapol obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo kuc ki ber bedo I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi akwapin nuko Africa keda ingungeta luipu noi ido esubit bala emamei aitemokinet. Ajenun iboro lu eyangaunitos ijisinei lu mam enyikokinitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aipuc ka ainapakina kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Kari Africa niri esu e'yo a'di 'diza eyini aa'zu sa'wa ezu dika e'da kile e'yo eyi ma aza kozu angu ndundu eyi ma alea yo. Eꞌyo ꞌbani fe aꞌdi ꞌdipi sawa ezu ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma vata eri orodriru asianzu azini asianzu ejizu angu ꞌdi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Kontinenti ya Afirika etungire entaro nyingi ezirikumara obwire buraingwa kandi ezitarikureebeka ngu niziija kuhwaho. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho entaro ezi, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obusingye n'obutebekana omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In recent months, tensions have escalated among several member states regarding political disagreements and economic policies. As a result, some African countries decided to take a stand by withdrawing from the African Union.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke bweyongedde mu mawanga agali mu mukago olw'obutakkaanya mu byobufuzi n'enkola z'ebyenfuna. N'ekyavaamu, amawanga ga Afirika agamu gaasalawo okuva mu mukago ogutaba amawanga ga Afirika.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, telle omede I kin lobo mapat-pat matye I dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat I kom lok me cungu iwi-bye ki cik me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe mukene me Afrika gumoko tamgi me aa woko ki I dul me African Union.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding akwapin nuipu nuikamunitos amamut acamanar kotoma akiro nuka politikis keda nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu akwapin ace luko Africa koseutu ajalakin Atukot Naka Africa.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ori eyi tu kari karakara memba ru 'diyi ma eselea e'yo erita ako politiki ni azini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, kari Africa ni 'diyi ma azi eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu eyini efuzu amuti African Union niri ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke bweyongyeire omu mahanga maingi agarikukwatanisa ahabw'obutakwatanisa omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'ebikwatireine n'eby'entaasya. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga ga Afirika agamwe gakasharamu kuruga omu kibiina ky'amahanga ga Afirika.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing global refugee crisis, various international organizations are stepping up their efforts to provide support. One such organization is dedicated to ensuring that displaced individuals receive the necessary resources to rebuild their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'abanoonyiboobubudamu ekyeyongera mu nsi yonna, ebitongole by'ensi yonna eby'enjawulo byeyongedde amaanyi mu kuwa obuyambi. Ekimu ku bibiina ng'ebyo kikakasa nti abantu ababundabunda bafuna ebintu ebyetaagisa okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Pi peko pa luring ayela matye kamede I wilobo, dul mapat-pat me wilobo tye ka medo kero gi me miyo kony. Dul acel ma kit meno tye ki miti me neno ni dano ma orwenyo gangi gi gunongo jami ma mite me yubu kwo gi odoco.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na ikerai kotoma akwap kere, eutasi iriongeta luka akwapin ace aiyatakin agangat kec. Ediopet kotoma oriongeta kangun erai kanu aanyun ebe itunga lu ekerete kotoma aiboisio kec edumununete iboro lu itwasamao kanu aisiteteun aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo emunyale eyini tupi wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti karakara kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi okpo fe atita fezu. Amuti alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi afa lele 'diyi esu eyi ma edri sizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empungi obweyongyeire omu nsi yoona, ebitongore by'amahanga goona biriyo nibyongyera amaani omu kuhayo obuhwezi. Kimwe aha bitongore nk'ebyo n'eky'okureeba ngu abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo batunga eby'okukoresa by'okugaruka kwombeka amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have surfaced detailing suspicious financial transactions within the refugee department. As a result, the government is taking action to address these serious claims.
lug_prompt: Amawulire agafulumye gyebuvuddeko galaga ebintu ebiteeberezebwa okukolebwa mu kitongole ky'abanoonyiboobubudamu. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti ekola ku nsonga zino ez'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma okati cokcok-ki nyutu jami mapat-pat ma obedo katime I tenge me lim I dul ma loyo lok kom luring ayela. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ka timo gin mo me cobo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitodunitos iboro lu eomitai ebe itwasamao ikapun kotoma orionget loka ikerai. Kanuka ngun, euta apugan aswam kagogong kanu aitemokin ationis na.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo robia ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma dria arakala emunyale eyini ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni e'yo 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kurugaho, nizigamba aha nkoragana y'esente etarikwetegyerezibwa omu kitongore ky'empungi. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti eriyo neekora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, lawmakers have implemented stricter regulations to combat gun violence. As a result, the penalties for illegal firearms possession have become significantly harsher.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ababaka ba palamenti bataddewo amateeka amakakali okulwanyisa obutabanguko obuva ku mmundu. N'ekivuddemu, ebibonerezo by'okusangibwa n'emmundu mu bumenyi bw'amateeka byeyongedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, luwang lwak I ot moko cik guketo cik matek tutwal me lweny i kom tim gero ki muduku. Macalo adwogi ne, pwod pi bedo ki muduku iwi alii dong odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etolomutu imeeban ikisila lu itigogongoritai kanu aitiji amumu na imudun. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi aitisilario naka ajaut keda imudun lumam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi 'ba azita okporu a'di 'dizu ngiringiri osu si ri be. E'yo 'disi panga 'bani fele 'ba osu eyi be azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eca okporu saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ab'eishengyero bateireho ebiragiro by'amaani by'okurwanisa obwimukiriro bw'embundu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebibonerezo by'okugira ebikwato by'okurwanisa ebitahikire, bigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: Authorities conducted a late-night security operation in response to rising tensions in the area. As the situation escalated, gunfire erupted, leading to tragic consequences.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baakola ekikwekweto ky'eby'okwerinda ekikeesezza olwaleero olw'obunkenke obweyongedde mu kitundu. Embeera bwe yagenda yeeyongera, amasasi ne gabalukawo, ekyaviirako ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lutela gutimo tic mapat-pat me gwoko kuc I dyewor pi telle matye kamedde I kabedo eni. Ikare ma peko ne omedde, muduku ocake ma okelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kiswamata aswamisio nuka ayuwara kware kanu aiyatakin aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit. Neapolor ejautene, apotu imudun kogeutu ainomio, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi 'diyi 'ye 'yeta azi ageitema ni inisi ni e'yo asi otiza angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi. E'yo ni tuzu drile, osu eyi e'do eyi ogbi, e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakakora ekikwekweto ky'eby'okwerinda omu bwire bw'ekiro ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu kyanga. Embeera kuyabiire neyeyongyera, hakabarukaho amasasi, ekyarugiremu oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address the growing demand for healthcare professionals, the government has announced new positions within its health sector. As a result, the newspaper has published job vacancies in the Ministry of Health.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukola ku bwetaavu bw'abakugu mu byobulamu obweyongera, gavumenti erangiridde ebifo ebipya mu kitongole kyayo eky'ebyobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, olupapula lw'amawulire lufulumizza emirimu mu minisitule y'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me cobo miti pa lutic yoto kom matye kamede, gamente otyeko miyo ngec manyen I tenge me yoto kom. Macalo adwogi ne, gajeti me lok angeya okatti ki karatac ma nyutu ni tic tye I jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka eswamak luka angaleu, elimorit apugan aiboisio nuitetiak kotoma orionget loka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, etolomu apapula naka iyemuto aswamisinei nuejaasi toma orionget loka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma kalafe tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete azi pari o'diru 'diyi esele arojo niri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, karatasi e'yo laza be 'diyi si pari azi ni 'diyi okalamvu alataniri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire emirimo misya omu kitongore kyayo ky'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu,orupapura rw'amakuru rwashohoza emirimo omu minisiture y'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Upon reviewing the latest quarterly figures, it became evident that the data presented was inconsistent. Several discrepancies raised concerns about the accuracy of the information provided.
lug_prompt: Bwe twekenneenya omuwendo ogusembyeyo ogwa buli luvannyuma lwa myezi esatu, kyazuuka nti omuwendo ogwanjuddwa tegukwatagana. Obutakwatagana obw'enjawulo bwaleetawo okweraliikirira ku butuufu bw'amawulire agaweereddwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me ngiyo kor wel me dwe adek ma okato angec, onen atyer kamaleng ni ngec ma kimiyo pe rwatte. Apoka-poka mapol okelo lworo I kom ada pa ngec ma kimiyo.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana airereor inaabai luka ikaru iuni lu atuboros, aponi kojenunai ebe mam akiro nu itodunitai iswamaete ejok. Apotu iboro luegelegela koyangautu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos abeit naka akiro nu ijaikitai.
lgg_prompt: Bani kalafe o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo 'bani e'dale 'diyi ma esele co yi. Erita ako karakara eyi eji asi otiza e'yo 'bani fele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma omuhendo gwa kashatu, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebihandiiko ebirikuheebwayo tibirikuhikaana. Obutaikirizana bwingi bukareetaho okwerarikirira aha mazima g'amakuru agaheirwe.

eng_prompt: After weeks of gathering information and insights, she finally feels ready to share her thoughts. You won't want to miss what she has to say.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'akungaanya obubaka n'amagezi, kati mwetegefu okwogera ky'alowooza. Tojja kwagala kusubwa by'alina okwogera.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me coko ngec ki niang matut, en dong tye atera me nywako tam ma mege. Pe imito keng winyo ngo ma en owaco.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aituk akiro keda acoa, apotu ngesi kopuputu ekapakina aimor aomisioke. Mam jo ikoto atwaniar nu ebeit ngesi alimun.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo eyi trazu, eri asizu i ma egata eyi awazu. Mi leni afa erini le 'yo 'diyi ece ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okurundaana amakuru n'obwengye, ahamuheru yahurira ayeteekateekire kugamba ebiteekateeko bye. Torikwenda kufeerwa ebi aine kugamba.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration and extensive discussions with experts, we have developed a comprehensive strategy that addresses our nation's most pressing challenges. This approach not only aims to foster economic growth but also prioritizes sustainability and social equity.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'abakugu, tukoze enteekateeka ey'awamu ekwata ku kusoomoozebwa kw'eggwanga lyaffe okusinga okw'amangu. Enkola eno tekoma ku kutumbula nkulaakulana mu byenfuna naye era ekulembeza obuwangaazi n'obwenkanya mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut ki nywako lok ki ludiro, wayubu yoo me cobo peko mapigi tego ma lobo wa tye kwede. Yub man pe tye ki miti me kelo dongo lobo keken ento bene tye ki miti me neno ni jami weng tye maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok ka aineranara keda ipirioitin, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuepedorete aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka akwapuwok. Mam alosikinet na erai aitopolor apol naka ikapun bon konye erai aisingarenit nuka aijar keda aijar naejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu kililiru azini e'yo onzezu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, ama e'do otita azi dria e'yo ewaru kari amavileri ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Geri 'di ni lu lezu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otuzu ku, te eri vini asi 'ba e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria tualu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'okuhanuura n'abakugu,tukakora enteekateeka erikukwata aha buremeezi bw'eihanga ryaitu. Enkora egi terikugyenderera kutunguura eby'entaasya byonka, kureka neekora n'okureetaho oburinganiza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As discussions about the new government initiative intensified, tensions began to rise among the kingdom's leadership. Many officials expressed their concerns regarding the potential impact of the plan on their authority and the citizens they serve.
lug_prompt: Okuteesa ku nteekateeka ya gavumenti empya bwe kweyongera, obunkenke bwatandika mu bukulembeze bw'obwakabaka. Abakungu bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku ngeri enteekateeka eno gy'eyinza okukosaamu ekitongole kyabwe ne bannansi be baweereza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok I kom yub manyen pa gamente omedde, telle ocako medde I kin lutela me ker ne. Lutela mapol gunyutu lworo gi I kom adwoki pa yub eni I kom tela gi ki anywali ma gitiyo botgi.
teo_prompt: Nepe apolor ineresinei nuikamunitos apugan naitetet, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin kanejaas engarenok luka ajakanut. Apotu eswamak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos epone loepedoriata ainapeta ngun aitolitol apedorosiokec keda itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza e'yo gameteni o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, asi otiza e'do tu driceza kari niri ma eselea. Azi'ba karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo otita 'da ni eco 'ye angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria tualu kari anzi eyini azi ngazu 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha nteekateeka ya gavumenti ensya ku kweyongyeire, obunkenke bukatandika kweyongyera omu bwebembezi bw'obugabe. Abakuru abaingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine n'enkora y'enteekateeka egi aha kitongore kyabo hamwe n'abantu abu barikuheereza.

eng_prompt: The store has become a popular destination for beauty enthusiasts in the area. Customers often rave about the wide selection of high-quality items available.
lug_prompt: Edduuka lifuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abaagazi b'okwewunda mu kitundu. Bakasitoma batera okwemulugunya ku bintu eby'omutindo ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Kacat ne dong odoko kabedo ma oywek tutwal ki joo ma maro lengo I kabedo eni. Luwil ipol kare gi loko I kom jami ma rwom gi malo mapat-pat matye.
teo_prompt: Araun eiduka ngol aiboisit naejenara noi naka itunga lueminasi aibuses kotoma aiboisit. Etapit duc agwelak aisiyalamikin kanu iboro luegelegela lu adoketait naepol noi lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Dukani 'da eca angu 'ba e'yo ndrizani lepi angu 'di ma alea 'diyini le tu ni ru. Aje'ba eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo nze e'yo afa wura muke 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eduuka ehindukire omwanya ogurikumanywa munonga abarikukunda eby'oburungi omu kyanga. Bakasitoma nibakira kushemererwa ahabw'ebintu bingi eby'omutindo gw'ahaiguru ebiriho.

eng_prompt: As part of its expansion strategy, the company has been actively opening new locations across the nation. This growth has allowed them to better serve their customers and increase their market presence.
lug_prompt: Ng'emu ku nteekateeka zaayo ez'okugaziya, kampuni ebadde yeenyigira nnyo mu kuggulawo ebifo ebipya okwetooloola eggwanga. Enkulaakulana eno ebasobozesezza okuweereza obulungi bakasitoma baabwe n'okwongera okubeerawo kwabwe mu katale.
ach_prompt: Macalo yoo me dongo lobo ne, dul ne obedo ka yabo kabedo manyen I but lobo man mapat-pat. Dongo man okonyogi me tic maber ki luwilgi ki medo rwom me catgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ke nuka aitanyanyar, euta ekampuni ngol apukor aiboisio nuitetiak kotoma akwap. Apol na engaraki kesi aijanakin agwelak kec ejok ka aiyatakin esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Otita erini tujari 'yezu ri ma azi ru, amuti 'da e'bi angu o'diru 'diyi ma ti zi kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Zota 'diri fe yi dri azi ngazu aje'ba yini 'diyi dri kililiru azini yi ma cu ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nkora yaayo y'okushanjuura, kampuni etandikire kwiguraho emyanya misya okwetoroora eihanga ryona. Entunguuka egi ebaasize kuheereza kurungi abaguzi baabo n'okwongyera aha katare.

eng_prompt: In our village, there is a strong emphasis on personal appearance and self-care. Many of the local women take pride in their beauty routines.
lug_prompt: Mu kyalo kyaffe, essira liteekebwa nnyo ku ndabika y'omuntu n'okwerabirira. Abakyala b'omu kitundu bangi benyumiriza mu by'okwewunda byabwe.
ach_prompt: I caro wa, dano keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom kit ma ginen kwede ki gwokke kekengi. Pol pa mon me tedero gi awaka I kom yub gi me lengo.
teo_prompt: Kocaalo kosi, epodokitai noi nuikamunitos epone loesubitotor itunga keda aidar awate kec. Angor nuipu kotoma atutubet isiyalamikitos noi kotoma ainapeta kec nuka aibuses.
lgg_prompt: Calo amavileri ma alea, 'ba asi 'ba e'daza 'ba ma ngulupi niri ma dria tualu asi 'bazu 'ba ma ngulupi ma ta mbaza ma dria. Oku angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi afusi e'yo eyini 'ye angu ndriza ma dria 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyaro kyaitu, abantu nibafayo munonga aha mireebekyere yaabo n'okwerinda. Abakazi baingi b'omubyaro, nibesiimisa emiringo yaabo y'okweboneza.

eng_prompt: After much consideration and research, we decided to support his passion for the trades. He has always been fascinated by how things are built and the intricacies of construction work.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo n'okunoonyereza, twasalawo okuwagira okwagala kwe eri eby'obusuubuzi. Abadde yeegomba nnyo engeri ebintu gye bizimbibwamu n'obuzibu obuli mu kuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam ki kwed mapol, wamoko tamwa me cwako miti ne I kom biacara ne. En obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom kit ma kiyubu kwede jami ki kit ma tic me gedo obedo tek kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom noi keda aingic, apotu sio aseutu aigang amina ke naka agwelanar. Aminakinit ngesi noi epone loedukio iboro keda iponesio luitegelikina luka aiduk.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egaza ma vutia azini vuti ondaza ma vutia, ama asi e'yo 'du atita fezu leta erini tujari 'yezu ri dri. Eri ebi sawa driasi ava esu geri 'bani afa sizu 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo 'bani afa sizu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga n'okucondooza, tukasharamu kumushagika ahabw'okukunda eby'obushubuzi. Atwire naashemezibwa oku ebintu byombekwa hamwe n'emirimo y'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: The oil industry in Uganda has seen significant growth in recent years, attracting numerous investors. As a result, various companies are vying for a share of the lucrative market.
lug_prompt: Ekkolero ly'amafuta mu Uganda libaddemu okukulaakulana okw'amaanyi mu myaka egiyise, ekisikiriza bamusigansimbi bangi. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni ez'enjawulo zivuganya ku katale.
ach_prompt: Biacara me moo I lobo Uganda odongo tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni, ma oweko lutim biacara mapol gubino I lobo Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat tye ka pyem me nongo but cuk ma kelo lim madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi erionget loka akinyet ko Uganda kokaru lu atuboros, ido ingalaunit agwelanarak luipu. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikampunin luipu abolobol kanu adumun esokoni loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu odu ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri esu zota okporu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, erini ani 'ba lonyi vuti alezani karakara eyi ejizu. E'yo 'disi, amuti ndundu eyi a'bala 'ye cuu 'bani robia esuzu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'amajuta omu Uganda kitungire entunguuka y'amaani omu myaka egi, ekirikureetaho abashubuzi baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi ziriyo nizihayahayana aha butare oburikureeta esente nyingi.

eng_prompt: After extensive debates and discussions, the members of the parliamentary committee reached a consensus on the need for further review. As a result, the parliamentary committee has delayed passing the bill.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakiise ku kakiiko ka palamenti baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku bwetaavu bw'okuddamu okwetegereza. N'ekivuddemu, akakiiko ka paalamenti kalwawo okuyisa ebbago.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok ki nywako lok mapol, lumemba me dul me ot moko cik guwinye I kom miti me ngiyo kor tic. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa luwang lwak I ot moko cik ogale ki moko cik ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta keda ipegeta luipu, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti loka airabet opotu kopedosi airereor akiro ngun. Kanuka ngun, iyapi ekomiti loka airabet aitodolikin ekisil ngol.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara azini e'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, memba committee koloseni ni 'diyi esu ti ecita e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nde ma ale andrizu dika ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, committee koloseni ni 'da eza sa'wa e'yo azita 'da ma agazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura munonga, akakiiko k'eishengyero kakaikirizana aha nshonga y'okugaruka kushwijuma. N'ekyarugiremu,akakiiko k'eishengyero kakyerereirwe kurabira omu iteeka.

eng_prompt: As I settled in to watch the evening news, I couldn't help but notice the anticipation in the air. The network had promised a special report on current events, and I was eager to see how the anchor would present the stories.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnatuula okulaba amawulire g'akawungeezi, nnalaba ebbugumu mu bbanga. Omukutu gw'empuliziganya gwali gusuubizza alipoota ey'enjawulo ku bigenda mu maaso mu kiseera kino, era nnali nneesunga okulaba engeri omukozi w'empuliziganya gy'anaayanjuliramu emboozi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma abedo piny me neno lok angea me otyeno, aneno miti madit tutwal I yamo. Dul me telebijon man onongo ocikke me miyo ripot i kom jami matye katimme kombedi, dok onongo atye ki miti me neno kit ma latit lok angea ne binyuto kwede lokke.
teo_prompt: Neabwouna eong asesen iyemuto lukabong, abu eong apedori aanyun ebe ejai aiyalama noi kokwam. Esumunit esitesen lo iyemuto alimor eripoota lo itegelikina loikamunit akiro nuiswamasi kopana, ido akoto eong noi aanyun epone lo itodianarete itunga akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mani riria e'yo efu'ba ondresi 'diyi ndrezu, ma econi ndra e'yo asi 'baza ni oli alia 'diyi ndre ku. Okalamvu e'yo oyuzani 'da owi i o'duko ndusi e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria, dika ma ndra avasi ndrezu geri 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'da ni nga e'yo nde 'diyi 'yezu ri ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Ku naashutamiire kureeba amahurire g'omwebazyo, nkareeba amatsiko omu mwanya. Kampuni y'empurizagana ekaraganisa kukora ripoota ey'omutaano aha biriho hati, kandi nkaba nyine ekihika ky'okureeba oku omushomi w'amahurire yaabaire naija kworeka ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The local government has implemented various educational reforms in the area. As part of these efforts, several institutions have been established to enhance learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu etaddewo ennongoosereza ez'enjawulo mu byenjigiriza mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amatendekero ag'enjawulo gatandikiddwawo okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero okelo aloka-loka mapol I lok kom kwan I kabedo eni. Macalo but yub eni, ki yabo gangi kwan mapol me medo gum me kwan.
teo_prompt: Etolomu apugan naka atutubet aijulanakineta nuipu nuka asioman katutubet. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, aponi odukoi isomeroi luipu kanu aitopolor asioman.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ba ojata onita ma alea 'diyi angu 'da ma alea karakara. Okpo 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba e'do pari onita ni karakara 'diyi drileba onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyanga eteire omu nkora empindahinduka nyingi omu by'obwegyese omu kyanga. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, amatendekyero maingi gatandikirweho okwongyera aha migisha y'okwega.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about safety and modernization, the city council has allocated funds for improvements. As a result, the old buildings in all city authority schools are under renovation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda n'okuzza ebintu ku mulembe, akakiiko k'ekibuga kateereddewo ensimbi z'okutereeza. N'ekivuddemu, ebizimbe ebikadde mu masomero g'ekitongole ky'ekibuga byonna biri mu kuddaabirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc ki rwom me tic, kancil me boma madit omiyo cente me yubu jami. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka roco odi ma otii I gangi kwan pa dul me city authority weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit ayuwara keda aiteteun eswamae loakwana, ejaiki ekansulo loka eibuga ikapun kanu aitemonokino. Kanuka ngun, eutasi aitemonokino adukena nuemojongito kosomeroi luka apedorosio nuka esite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi e'yo ageitema ni azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria, kanisulu aku ambu city niri 'ba robia e'yo otuza ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba jo oku sukulu dria aku ambo city authority ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ede o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda hamwe n'okutunguura eby'omurembe, akakiiko k'orurembo kateireho esente z'okutunguura. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyombeko ebikuru omu mashomero g'ekitongore ky'orurembo biriyo nibigarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote fitness and community engagement, local organizations have organized a marathon event. As part of this initiative, several schools will participate in the upcoming marathon.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula embeera y'omubiri n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bitegese empaka z'okudduka emisinde. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amasomero agawerako gajja kwetaba mu misinde egijja.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me yot kom ki ribbe pa lwak, dul mapat-pat me tedero guyubu pyem ngwec. Macalo but yub man, gangi kwan mapol gubi bedo tye I pyem ngwec matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor angaleu keda aiswamanara naka itunga, etemokisi iriongeta luka atutubet abolobol naka akerit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote isomeroi luipu ajaikin toma abolobol naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu rua ala otuzu azini o'bi yi ma eselea, amuti angu ma alia 'diyi otu avita ongu nzuzaniri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, sukulu karakara eyi mu ongu nzuza emupi 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushongyera omutindo gw'omubiri hamwe n'okureeta abantu omu byanga, ebitongore by'omubyaro byatebekaniise empaka z'okwiruka. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, amashomero maingi nigeija kwejumba omu mpaka z'okwiruka ezirikwija.

eng_prompt: Recent economic challenges have disproportionately affected younger generations, leading to significant job losses. As a result, many young people are struggling to find stable employment opportunities.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko kukosezza nnyo abavubuka, ekiviiriddeko okufiirwa emirimu. N'ekivuddemu, abavubuka bangi balwana okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Peko me can lim ma otimme cokcok-ki okelo peko madit tutwal I kom joo matino ma oweko gurwenyo tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, bulu mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic matye kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuka ikapun lu atuboros emunasi atumunak noi, eyangauni aibiror naka aswamisinei. Kanuka ngun, eutasi atumunak luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu o'diru 'diyi 'ye e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma dria onzi, erini fezu azi avizu angiri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ode karakara eyi dri ci drileba azi eyini aa'zu sa'wa driasi 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwakyerereireho, buteganisize munonga abantu bato, ekyarugiremu okufeerwa emirimo. N'ekyarugiremu, eminyeeto mingi eriyo neerwana kuronda emirimo y'obutuura.

eng_prompt: Many industries rely heavily on labor from abroad, often seeking cheaper alternatives to local workers. This has led to growing concerns about the treatment and rights of these foreign employees.
lug_prompt: Amakolero mangi geesigama nnyo ku bakozi okuva mu nsi z'ebweru, nga banoonya engeri endala ez'ebbeeyi eya wansi mu bakozi ba wano. Kino kireetedde okweraliikirira okweyongera ku ngeri abakozi bano abagwiira gye bayisibwamu n'eddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Gangi tic mapol gijenge tutwalle I kom lutic ma aa ki I lobo ma woko, pol kare giyenyo yoo me tic ma wele yot loyo lutic me tedero. Man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma lutic ma aa ki lobo ma woko kitero gi kwede ki twero gi.
teo_prompt: Ipu icuman lu itwasamaete eswamak luko kinga, etapit duc aimo iponesio luepataka adepar eswamak luko kinga. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong naepol noi naikamunit amukian keda apedorosio nuka eswamak lu okinga.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu karakara eyi asi'baza 'ba azi ngapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani geri azi ngazu aje kokoru 'diyi ndazu aga azi ngapi kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza tu e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ngapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi 'yezu azini drilemgbo yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amakorero maingi nigakoresa abakozi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga, buriijo nigaronda emiringo etari y'obuguzi bukye kukora abakozi b'omwihanga. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha kutwarizibwa n'obugabe bw'abakozi aba abarikuruga aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in human rights awareness, many individuals in vulnerable communities continue to fall victim to exploitation. Various factors, including poverty and lack of education, contribute to the persistence of this issue.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enkulaakulana mu kumanyisa abantu ku ddembe ly'obuntu, abantu bangi mu bitundu ebyesudde bakyatulugunyizibwa. Ensonga ez'enjawulo omuli obwavu n'obutasoma bireetera ensonga eno okusigalawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me rweyo lwak i kom twero pa dano tye malo tutwal, dano mapol i kabedo ma can tye iye pud gitye ka nongo peko me nywaro tic ki dano. Tye jami mapol ma oweko peko man pud tye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naejok noi kotoma aisisianakino naka apedorosio nuka itunga, itunga luipu kotoma atutubena nuetioko eringa itwasamao. Akiro nuegelegela, aimoriarit ibakor keda amamus na asioman kes eyangaunitos ationis na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileba o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tro tu ra ti, 'ba karakara ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi nga po'di e'de e'yo 'bani eyi ayuzuri ma alea. E'yo karakara eyi, alio tualu onita ako be, eyi fe e'yo 'di ni aa'zu drile.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu kumanyisa abantu obugabe bw'abantu, abantu baingi omu byaro ebitarikwebaasa nibagumizamu kutuntuzibwa. Enshonga nyingi, otwariiremu obworo n'eibura ry'obwegyese, nibyo birikureetera enshonga egi kugumaho.

eng_prompt: The team has been working hard over the past few months, and everyone is looking forward to some well-deserved time off. As we wrap up our projects, I wanted to remind you all about our upcoming break.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde ekola nnyo mu myezi egiyise, era buli omu yeesunga okufuna akaseera ak'okuwummula. Nga tufundikira pulojekiti zaffe, njagala okubajjukiza byonna ebikwata ku luwummula lwaffe olujja.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku eni obedo katic matek tutwal I dwe ma okato angec, dok dano weng tye ki miti me nongo yweyo ma opore pigi. I kare ma watye ka tyeko ticwa, amito poyo wiwu weng I kom yweyowa matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Iswamat etimu kagogong noi kanu ilapio idis lu atuboros, ido ekotosi itunga kere aiyengun. Kapak kana angetakin ipurojektin wok, akoto eong aiitun yes nuikamunitos aiyeng wok naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi azi nga avasi mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, dika 'ba dria eyi asi 'baza be sa'wa eyini le 'diyi ma alea. Amani otita amavile 'diyi ma ti opizurisi, ale mi dri ega e'yo ama vile ava liza emupi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etwire neekora n'amaani kumara ameezi makye agahwaire, kandi buri omwe aine ekihika ky'okuhuumura. Ku turikuhendera purogyekiti zaitu, nkaba niinyenda kubaijutsya ebirikukwata aha kihuumuro kyaitu ekirikwija.

eng_prompt: In a world often marked by division and strife, the role of faith in guiding moral behavior becomes increasingly important. As followers of Christ, believers are encouraged to embody the teachings of love and compassion in their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enjawukana n'obukuubagano, omulimu gw'enzikiriza mu kulambika empisa gweyongera okuba omukulu. Nga abagoberezi ba Kristo, abakkiriza bakubirizibwa okussa mu bulamu bwabwe enjigiriza y'okwagala n'okusaasira.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma pol kare opong ki apoka-poka ki lweny, tic pa niye me doro kit me kwo tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Macalo lulub kor Kricito, kicuku cwiny luyee me keto pwony me mar ki kica ikwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda atiakatiaka keda ingungeta, ajokis na aiyuun kotoma aingarenikin iponesio lukajokak erai naepol noi. Kwape atupitok luka Kristo, isinyikokitai eyuunak aitodolikin aisisianakino nuka amin keda asianut kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo esele coza ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea, azi aita ni adriza muke ri ma dri cezu ri eca orodriru tu. Ekile 'ba Kristaa ma vuti o'dupi 'diyi ru, 'ba ai 'ba a'ita be 'diyi imbata leta azini asi ndriza ma dria 'diyi 'bazu eyi ma edri eyi ma alea o'du driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu okwebaganisamu n'obutabanguko, omurimo gw'okwikiriza omu kwebembera emicwe n'emitwarize, nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Nk'abakuratsi ba Kristo, abaikiriza nibahigwa okukoresa engyesa y'okukunda n'okusaasira omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: The rising number of health issues related to tobacco use has sparked concern among local residents. Many have noticed a troubling trend of increased cigarette consumption among their friends and family.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ebikwatagana n'okukozesa taaba kireeseewo okweraliikirira mu batuuze. Bangi balabye omuze ogweraliikiriza ogw'okunywa sigala okweyongera mu mikwano gyabwe n'ab'omu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Mede pa peko me yot kom ma kubbe ki mato taa okelo lworo ikin lutedero. Dano mapol guneno kit ma luremgi ki luganggi tye ka mato taa.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakin na adekasinei nu ikamanara keda aimat esigala eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas itunga luka atutubet. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu epone loetiono noi loka aimat esigala kanejaas ikapaper keda lukokalekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma kalafe tupi e'yo taba ma ayuza ni 'diyi fe asi otiza 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi esu e'yo asi otiza fepi taba seza ma omgbo tupi eyi ma agyipi eyi ma eselea familia eyi pie ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'oburemeezi bw'ebyamagara oburikukwata aha kukoresa etaabe, kireesire okwerarikirira omu batuura gye. Abantu baingi bareebire omuringo ogurikuteganisa ogw'okunywa sigara omu banywani baabo hamwe n'ab'omumaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing health concerns and public pressure, lawmakers convened to discuss measures aimed at reducing tobacco use. After extensive debates and consultations with health experts, a decisive action was taken.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera n'okunyigirizibwa kw'abantu, ababaka ba palamenti baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ezigendereddwamu okukendeeza ku kukozesa taaba. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okwebuuza ku bakugu mu byobulamu, ekintu eky'amaanyi kyakolebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede ki lyeto ma lwak tye kwede, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me gengo mato taa. Ingee nywako lok ki ludiro me yot kom, kimoko tam gi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda aiyalongong naka itunga, apotu imeeban luka airabet iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itwasamaere etaba. Akaulo naka epeget keda ipirioitin luka angaleu, aponi kitolomunai nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ma e'yo ni tuzu tualu okpo o'bi eyini ri be, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri 'bani lezu taba ayuza ma omgbo esizu 'diyi ma dria. Agbatara angiri 'yezu azini e'yo ozizu 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo azi okporu ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'abantu, abanyishengyero bakashutama kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okukyendeeza okukoresa etaabe. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okwebuuza aha bakugu omu by'amagara, hakakorwa eky'amaani.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted the alarming rise in smoking-related illnesses among the population. In light of these findings, health workers have warned people against the dangers of cigarette smoking.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti endwadde ezireetebwa okunywa sigala zeeyongedde nnyo mu bantu. Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza kuno, abasawo balabudde abantu ku kabi akali mu kunywa sigala.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ka nongo two ma aa ki I mato taa tye ka medde tutwal. Ma lubbe ki adwoki me kwed magi, lutic yoto kom gu ciko dano i kom rac pa mato taa.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe iyata noi adekasinei nu ikamanara keda aimat esigala kanejaas itunga. Katupitos nu ewanyunitai, apotu eswamak luka angaleu ikwenyasi itunga atiokisio nuka aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini azo taba seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'ba eyi ma eselea saaru. E'yo 'bani esu 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba eyini e'yo onzi taba seza niri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire oburikureetwa okureesa omu bantu. Kurugirira aha bijumbwirwe, abashaho barabwire abantu aha kabi akari omu kureesa esigara.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, conflicts have often escalated into devastating wars that reshape nations and communities. The consequences of such violence are felt deeply by those caught in the crossfire.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, entalo zitera okufuuka entalo ezisaanyaawo ensi n'ebitundu. Ebiva mu butabanguko ng'obwo biwulirwa nnyo abo abakwatibwa mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro pa dano, lweny pol kare dong odoko lweny marac tutwal ma kelo alokaloka I lobo mapat-pat kacel ki kabedo mapat-pat. Adwogi me tim gero ma kit meno dano mapol giwinyo ki i cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apolor duc ingungeta toma ojisinei luepedorete aitolitol akwapin keda atutubena. Akiro nuelomunete kotoma amumu kangin epupete ngul luejaasi toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ngiringiri eyi ma omgbo tu a'di onzi kari eyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo ngiringiri 'dile 'diyi ma vutia 'diyi 'ba e'yo nde 'ye'baa 'diyi ma dria saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, entaro zitwire nizihinduka entaro ezirikushiisha amahanga n'abantu. Ebyarugyire omu butabanguko nk'obwo, nibireetwa abo abarikukwatwa omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation into the company's practices, it was determined that several employees had been unfairly treated. As a result, the management decided to take action to rectify the situation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bikolwa bya kampuni, kyazuulibwa nti abakozi bangi baali bayisiddwa bubi. N'ekyavaamu, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo okutereeza embeera.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo tic pa dul ne pi kare malac, kinongo ni lutic mapol kitero gi i yo marac. Macalo adwogi ne, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo me yubu ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos aswamisio nuka ekampuni, aponi kodumunai ebe mam eswamak luipu eyaitai ejok. Kanuka ngun, abu eyaitene koseu aitemokin ationis ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu kini 'ba 'ye azi'ba karakara eyi dri geri kililiru si ku. E'yo 'disi, driceza 'da pe e'yo 'yezu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebikorwa bya kampuni, kikareebeka ngu abakozi baingi bakaba batatwariziibwe kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukurira ekitongore bakasharamu kukora kyona ekirikubaasika okutereeza embeera.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the data from last month, I realized that additional context was necessary. To provide a clearer picture, I have added more information to this month's report.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko okuva omwezi oguwedde, nnakizuula nti ensonga endala zaali zeetaagisa. Okusobola okuwa ekifaananyi ekitegeerekeka obulungi, nnongedde obubaka mu alipoota y'omwezi guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok ma aa ki I dwe ma okato, aniang ni lok mukene mapigi tego mite. Me niang maber, amedo ngec mukene I kom adwoki me kwed me dwe man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuka elap je, abu eong ajenun ebe ejokuna akiro ace. Kanu aijaikin aanyunet na ecai, eyataki eong akiro nuipu toma oripoota lo olap lo.
lgg_prompt: O'duko engazu mba ajerisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma azi ci. E'da fezu kililiru, ma o'ba e'yo azi dika o'duko siza mba 'disi ri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko kuruga okwezi okuhweire, nketegyereza ngu enshonga ezindi zikaba nizetengwa. Okuhereza ekishushani ekirikwetegyerezibwa gye, nyongyeire ebirikukwata ahari ripoota y'omwezi ogu.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the evidence and legal arguments presented, we have decided to escalate the matter. Consequently, our case has been forwarded to the High Court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza obujulizi n'ensonga z'amateeka ezaayanjuddwa, tusazeewo okwongera amaanyi mu nsonga. N'olw'ekyo, omusango gwaffe gutwaliddwa mu kkooti enkulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom caden kacel ki lok makwako cik ma kikelo, wamoko tamwa me medo rwom me lokke. Macalo adwogi ne, kicwalo pido wa I court mamalo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos aitogogongoret keda akiro nuka ikisila, apotu sio aseutu aiyatakin akirot ngin. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijukarai emusago wok okooti lokapolon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecetaru azini e'yo azita palaa 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama asi e'yo nde ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba edri ama vile kesi dwani ururi ma drilia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza obujurizi hamwe n'enshonga z'ebiragiro, tushaziremu kwongyera aha nshonga. N'ekyarugiremu, omushango gwaitu gutwirwe omu kooti enkuru.

eng_prompt: After weeks of investigation and interviews, the reporter finally pieced together the complex narrative. With sources confirming key information, the journalist has full details of the story.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwerako ng'anoonyereza era ng'abuuzibwa ebibuuzo, omusasi yasobola okukomekkereza ng'awadde endowooza ye. Olw'okuba ensonda zikakasa amawulire amakulu, munnamawulire alina kalonda yenna akwata ku nsonga eyo.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kwed ki lok ki dano, lacoo lok angea ne otyeko yubu lok matego tutwal. Ki kama kikwanyo ki iye lok ma moko lok mapigi tego, lacoo lok angea ne tye ki ngec matut I kom lokke.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic keda aingitingit, abu arotan iyemuto kitemok akiro ngun. Keda akiro nu itigogongorete akiro ngun, ejaasi arotan iyemuto keda akiro nukaidules nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara e'yo vuti ondaza ni azini ozita eyi ma vutia, 'ba osisiani 'da tra asizu e'yo ewaru 'da 'bo. Ba e'yo nze'ba 'diyi ni e'yo okporu 'diyi ma eti ecezu risi, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi ma e'yo dria e'yo nde ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okucondooza n'okubuuza, omushaki w'amahurire akahendera yaata hamwe enshonga egumire. Ahabw'oburugo oburikworeka amakuru g'omugasho, omunyamahurire aine byona ebirikukwata aha kitebyo.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the influx of displaced individuals can strain local resources and healthcare systems. As a result, these communities often face significant public health challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, okuyingira kw'abantu abasenguddwa kusobola okussa akazito ku bikozesebwa mu kitundu n'enkola y'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bino bisanga okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, bedo tye pa dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi twero balo lim ki yub me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo magi ipol kare nongo peko me yot kom madongo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka atiokisio, epedorete itunga luipu lueyangaunete aiboisio kec aitolitol iboro luka atutubet keda nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, ejaas itunga lu keda atiokisio nu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, 'ba 'bani ofu angu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni eco fe e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea azini geri arojo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu 'diyi tutuni dri fu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo, nikubaasa kuremesa eby'obugaiga n'eby'amagara g'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyanga ebi nibitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: The ongoing conflict in their home countries has forced countless individuals to flee in search of safety and stability. As a result, many refugees find themselves in precarious situations, struggling to rebuild their lives in unfamiliar environments.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso mu nsi zaabwe buwalirizza abantu bangi okudduka okunoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. N'ekivuddemu, abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi beesanga mu mbeera embi, nga balwana okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe mu mbeera ze batamanyi.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye kawot anyim I lobegi oweko dano mapol guringo me yenyo kuc ki ber bedo. Macalo adwogi ne, luring ayela mapol nongo gitye I kwo matek tutwal, gitye ka tute matek me roco kwo gi I kabedo ma pe gingeyo.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta lu elosi akonye kotoma akwapin kec abu koinak itunga luipu akerit aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, edumununete ikerai luipu awate kec toma ojautene loetiono noi, ationis na aiduk bobo aijar kec kotoma aiboisio nu mam kesi ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri mupi drile kari yini aku 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe 'ba kalafe angiri 'diyi apa angu tambaza azini asianzu ndaria. E'yo 'disi, emunyale karakara eyi eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea, eyi dri ci eyi ma edri sizu o'diru angu eyini nile ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho omu mahanga gaabo, zihamize abantu baingi kuhunga kuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana. N'ekyarugiremu, empungi nyingi nizeshanga omu mbeera mbi, nizirwana kwombeka amagara gaabo omu myanya etarikubamanyirwa.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the tragic accident, the community gathered to mourn the loss of a beloved figure. The impact of his passing was felt deeply, as he was a devoted husband and father.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje ak'entiisa, abantu baakuŋŋaana okukungubaga olw'okufiirwa omwagalwa waabwe. Obuzibu bw'okufa kwe bwawulirwa nnyo, kubanga yali bba era taata omumalirivu.

eng_prompt: After hours of searching for information, he finally found someone willing to share what they had seen. The atmosphere was tense as he approached the witness, eager to uncover the truth.

eng_prompt: After days of intense negotiations and discussions, the leaders gathered for a final summit. Tensions were high, but the desire for peace and cooperation drove them to find common ground.

eng_prompt: In an effort to strengthen diplomatic relations, the government announced a series of international engagements. As part of this initiative, the head of state has gone for a foreign visit.

lug_prompt: Ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero wabaddewo akajagalalo mu kibuga era nnali nneebuuza ekyali kigenda mu maaso. Bwe nnabikkula ttivvi, amawulire agakwata ku nsonga ez'amangu gankwata.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and preparation, the athletes were eager to showcase their skills on the global stage. The excitement surrounding the event was palpable, as fans anticipated a strong showing from their representatives.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okwetegekera, bannabyamizannyo baali beesunga okulaga obukugu bwabwe ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna. Essanyu eryetoolodde omukolo lyategeerekeka, nga abawagizi basuubira omuzannyo ogw'amaanyi okuva mu bakiise baabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki yub matek tutwal, lungwec ne gubedo ki miti me nyuto diro gi I rwom me wilobo. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare me yub eni, pien lucwak gubedo ki gen ni luwanggi gibinyuto jami mabeco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitutuonoro ka aitemonokin, ekotosi akerak aitodiar acoasineikec kotoma akwap kere. Apol noi aiyalama kotoma opucit kangol, naarai aomitos egangitok ebe ebuni abwoikinitokokec aitodiaret naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini otuta ni 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi ma ava ndra eyi ma ondua e'dazu angu wudrikuru si 'diyi ma alea. Ayiko omu 'da ma alea ri ndra e'dazaru, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ega kini 'ba pa tupi eyivile 'diyi nga avita 'ye okporu.

Okushemererwa okwabaireho aha mukoro kukaba nikureebeka, ahabw'okuba abahagizi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu abajwekyerwa baabo nibaza kworeka amaani maingi.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure effective governance and public service delivery, it is essential that individuals in government positions possess the necessary expertise. This requirement underscores the importance of education and training for those who serve the public.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa enfuga ennungi n'obuweereza bwa gavumenti, kikulu nnyo abantu abali mu bifo bya gavumenti okuba n'obukugu obwetaagisa. Obwetaavu buno bukkaatiriza obukulu bw'okusoma n'okutendekebwa eri abo abaweereza abantu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tela ki miyo kony maber bot lwak, pire tek tutwal ni dano matye I gangi tic pa gamente gubed ki ngec ma mite. Miti man nyutu ber pa kwan ki pwonye pi lutic pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai epugae loajokan keda ejanakine loajokan, ejokuna itunga luejaasi toma aiboisio nuka apugan ajaut keda acoa na ekotoi. Itodunit ngin ajokis naka asioman keda aituutoonor ngul lu ijanakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru azini azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri nezu, eri orodriru 'ba aa'pi pari gameteni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ondua ci. E'yo 'di ece orodri onita ni azini imbata fezu 'ba azi ngapi o'bi eyidri 'diyini ri ra.

eng_prompt: Implementing new training programs and modernizing processes will enhance efficiency and accountability. As a result, this will improve the quality of work in government ministries.
lug_prompt: Okussa mu nkola pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa empya n'okukyusa enkola kijja kwongera ku buwanguzi n'embalirira. N'ekinaavaamu, kino kijja kutumbula omutindo gw'emirimu mu bitongole bya gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Keto yub me pwonye manyen I tic ki yubu yoo me tic I kare-ni obi medo rwom me tic ki kor tic. Macalo adwogi ne, man bimedo rwom me tic I jang miri mapat-pat pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aitutuonoro ka aijulakin iponesio luka aswam ejok ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ebuni ngin aitojokar adoketait na aswam kotoma oriongeta luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani o'diru 'diyi ma 'yeta azini geri 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma wura o'diru ri ni nga azi ngazu kililiru azini geri 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'disi, 'di nga azi ngaza okalamvu gameteni 'diyi ma alia ri otu.
nyn_prompt: Okuta omu nkora enteekateeka nsya z'okutendeka abantu n'okutereeza omuringo gw'okukora, nikiija kwongyera aha bukoryo n'embaririra. Ekyarugiremu, eki nikiija kutunguura omutindo gw'emirimo omu bitongore bya gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the popularity of football in Uganda has surged, attracting various businesses to invest in the sport. As a result, numerous partnerships have formed between corporate sponsors and local football clubs.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuganzi bw'omupiira mu Uganda bweyongedde, ekisikiriza bizinensi ez'enjawulo okusiga ensimbi mu muzannyo guno. N'ekivuddemu, enkolagana nnyingi zitandikiddwawo wakati w'ebitongole ebivujjirira ne ttiimu z'omupiira ez'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yweka pa tuku odilo I lobo Uganda omede tutwal, ma oweko biacara mapol tye ka keto lim I tuku eni. Macalo adwogi ne, winye mapol otime ikin dul mapat-pat makimiyo lim ki dul tuku odilo me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenara noi abolia naka emopira ko Uganda, ido ingalaunit ibiasaran luipu aipikakin ikapun toma abolia ngin. Kanuka ngun, eswamaunos aiswamanara kiding ikampunin luigangitos keda ikilabun luka emopira.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani mupira tuzari ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea ri tu ra, e'yo 'di fe tujari karakara eyini asi 'bazu avita 'di ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ti ecita karakara eyi e'do amuti mupira avipi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, omuhendo gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere omu Uganda gweyongyeire, ekirikureetera bizinesi nyingi kuta sente omu muzaano. N'ekyarugiremu, enkwatanisa nyingi ekozirwe ahagati y'ebitongore ebirikushagika n'ebibiina by'omupiira eby'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: After a remarkable season filled with impressive victories and standout performances, the team has garnered significant attention and respect. Fans and analysts alike are praising their skill and teamwork, solidifying their reputation.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lwa sizoni ey'ekitalo ejjudde obuwanguzi obw'ekitalo n'omutindo ogw'enjawulo, ttiimu efunye okufaayo n'ekitiibwa. Abawagizi n'abakugu bonna batendereza obukugu bwabwe n'okukolera awamu, okunyweza erinnya lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge kare me tuku maber tutwal ma opong ki loc ki tuko maber tutwal, dul tuku eni gunongo woro ki miti madit tutwal. Lucwak tuku kacel ki lutim kwed gitye ka pwoyo diro gi kacel ki tic gi macalo gurup, ma oweko nying gi odoko tek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naejok noi naka aitelekaar keda aitelekaar keda aswam naejok noi, adumu etimu aijen keda ayongit. Eutasi egangitok keda angicak aitur acoasineikec keda aswam kec nepepe, aitogogong ekirorikec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa avita ni onyiru 'bani agazu onyiru tu azini avita onyiru tu 'diyi ma vutia, amuti avita ni 'di isu inzita azini inzita angiri. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi pie, yi ongo 'be yi ma ondua azini azi ngaza tualu, yini yi ma ru otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima ya sizooni y'omutaano erimu obusinguzi n'okukora kurungi, tiimu etungire ekitiinisa n'okureebererwa. Abahagizi hamwe n'abacencuzi nibasiima emyoga yaabo hamwe n'okukorera hamwe, ekyongyeire eiziina ryabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to strengthen economic ties and promote collaboration, a major trade conference was organized to address key issues facing the continent. Leaders from various nations recognized the importance of unity and participation in this pivotal event.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza enkolagana mu by'enfuna n'okutumbula enkolagana, olukungaana lw'ebyobusuubuzi olukulu lwategekebwa okukola ku nsonga enkulu ssemazinga z'ayolekaganye nazo. Abakulembeze okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo baategedde obukulu bw'obumu n'okwetaba mu mukolo guno omukulu.
ach_prompt: I tute me jingo wat ikit me biacara ki dongo winye, kacoke madit me biacara kiyubu me cobo peko mapigi tego ma lobo Afrika tye kwede. Lutela me lobo mapat-pat guniang ber pa ribe ki bedo tye I yub man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eidicane lo ikapun ka aitopolor aiswamanara, aponi itemokinai airiamun na agwelanar kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuepolok nu ejaas akwapin nuka Africa. Apotu engarenok luka akwapin nuegelegela kojenutu ajokis naka aimorikikina keda ajaikina toma opucit lo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otuzu azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba otu otita amboru e'yo tujari ni 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo okporu angu ndundu Africa ni 'diyi ma dria. Drice'ba engapi kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu orodri ti ecita ni azini fizu e'yo okporu 'di ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera amaani omu by'entatsya hamwe n'okureetaho okukwatanisa, oruteerane rw'eby'obushubuzi rukatebekanisibwa kukora aha nshonga nkuru eziri omu kicweka ekyo. Abebembezi kuruga omu mahanga gatari gamwe, bakareeba omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okwejumba omu mukoro gw'omugasho ogu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges, a proposal was put forth to stimulate growth and innovation. Many experts gathered to discuss potential strategies, leading to a consensus among some of the senior economists in the country.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwakaggwa, ekiteeso kyateekebwawo okutumbula enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya. Abakugu bangi baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ez'enjawulo, ekyaviirako okukkaanya mu bannassaayansi abakugu mu by'enfuna mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, kimiyo tam me kelo dongo lobo ki diro manyen. Ludiro mapol gugure me nywako lok I kom yoo mapat-pat matwero tic kwede, man okelo winye ikin ludiro me lim madongo me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, aponi kitolomunai aomisio nuka aitopolor apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Apotu ipirioitin luipu kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorete kesi aswam, ido abu koyangau acamanara kanejaas ipiriotin luka ikapun luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba egata zota azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ndundu eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria, e'yo 'di fe 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria okporu kari 'di ma alea 'diyini ti ecizu eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwahwireho, ekiteiso kikateebwaho okureetaho entunguuka n'okujumbura. Abakugu baingi baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura, ekyarugiremu okukirizana ahagati y'abakugu omu by'entatsya omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere was electric as industry leaders gathered to discuss the latest innovations. With cameras rolling, the reporter prepared to share the highlights of the event.
lug_prompt: Embeera yabadde ya ssanyu ng'abakulembeze b'amakolero bakungaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku buyiiya obusembyeyo. Nga kkamera zitambula, omusasi yeetegese okugabana ebikulu ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma lutela me biacara gucokke me nywako lok I kom jami manyen ma kiyubu. I kare ma camera tye ka tic, lacoo lok angea ne oyube me nywako lok mapigi tego I yub ne.
teo_prompt: Apol noi ejautene ne atukonokinor engarenok luka ikampunin kanu aitemitem akiro nuitetiak. Keda ainom akameran, abu arotan iyemuto okapakina aimor akiro nuapolok nuka epucit.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of nurturing creativity, the media company has invested in various artists and their projects. This commitment to fostering musical talent has become a cornerstone of their mission.

eng_prompt: The concert organizers have been working tirelessly to assemble a talented lineup. They aim to showcase a diverse range of musical styles and expertise.

ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me kwer ne tye cok, dul tuku ne tye ka tic matek tutwal me tyeko jami weng. Ki ngec madwong ma en tye kwede I yub me yub, en otelo wii yub weng.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations, the two parties finally reached a consensus on the terms of the deal. Excitement filled the room as they prepared to share the details with the public.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka ipegeta, apotu ipatei ngun iarei opotu kopedosi acamanar kanu acamanar. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma agola naarai akapakina kesi aimor akiro ngun keda itunga.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of its compliance with industry regulations, the regulatory board reached a favorable decision. As a result, the company has been permitted to operate freely.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ennyo okugoberera amateeka g'amakolero, akakiiko akakwasisa amateeka kaatuuka ku kusalawo okulungi. N'ekyavaamu, kampuni ekkiriziddwa okukola mu ddembe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma dul enoni tye ka lubu kwede cik ma doro tic enoni, dul enoni omoko tam maber tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gimiyo twero ki dul ne me tic labongo lageng mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejok nuikamunitos atupakinitotor kesi ikisila luka ekampuni, abu erionget loka ikisila kodolok toma aomisioit najokan. Kanuka ngun, acamakin ekampuni aswam kopone kaloajokan.

eng_prompt: Despite their claims and long-standing presence, historical records clearly indicate that the land was taken unjustly. Legal documents and treaties reveal that the true custodians have been marginalized for generations.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni giwaco ni gubedo tye pi kare malac, coc me tekwaro nyutu ni kimako ngom ne I yoo ma pe atir. Waraga me cik kacel ki winye mapat-pat nyutu ni lugwok jami ma ki keto iwi alii pi kare malac.

eng_prompt: After hearing conflicting reports from various sources, we realized it was essential to investigate further. Determined to uncover the facts, we assembled a dedicated team for the task.

lgg_prompt: O'duko erizu engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, ama esu ra kini eri orodriru e'yo eti ondazu drile. Asi 'baza be e'yo ada eyi esuzu, ama tra amuti azi ngapi e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira ripoota ezitarikuhikaana kuruga omu myanya etari emwe na emwe, tukareeba ngu ni kikuru okwongyera kucondooza. Ahabw'okwenda kumanya amazima, tukakora tiimu y'okukora omurimo ogwo.

eng_prompt: Local officials recently unveiled a comprehensive development strategy aimed at improving infrastructure and services in the area. Many community members gathered to discuss the potential benefits and opportunities that the plan could bring.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko abakungu b'ebyalo baatongoza enteekateeka y'enkulaakulana egendereddwamu okutumbula ebizimbe n'obuweereza mu kitundu. Abantu b'omu kitundu bangi baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku miganyulo n'emikisa enteekateeka eno by'eyinza okuleeta.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero cokcok-ki gucako yub me dongo lobo ma ki keto pi ilo malo rwom me tic ki jami ma mite ikabedo eni. Lwak mapol gugure me lok i kom ber pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitodiasi ainapeta nuka apol kanu aitojokar aiboisio keda aijanakino kotoma aiboisit. Apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos kanu aitemitem ajokisio keda arerengesio nuepedori ainapeta ngun ayangaun.

nyn_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyaro batongoize enteekateeka y'entunguuka erikugyenderera okutunguura ebyombeko n'obuheereza omu kyanga. Abantu baingi omu byaro, baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha migasho n'emigisha ebi enteekateeka egi erikubaasa kureeta.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the bustling streets of Kampala, anticipation filled the air. Citizens gathered at polling stations, eager to make their voices heard in the democratic process.

ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I teng gudu me Kampala, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Anywali gugure I kabedo me bolo kwir, ki miti matek me winyo dwon gi I yub me tela pa lwak.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the findings, it became evident that the information was poorly organized. The lack of structure made it difficult to understand the key points he was trying to convey.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro, aponi kojenunai ebe mam akiro ngun aponi itemokinai ejok. Amamus na ainapeta abu ijaik eong etiono amisiikin akiro nuapolok nuetamitor ngesi aitodolikin.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugiremu, kikarebeka butunu ngu amakuru gakaba gatatebekanisiibwe kurungi. Obutabaho bw'entebekanisa, kikagumira abantu kwetegyereza enshonga nkuru ezi yabaire naagyezaho kugamba.

eng_prompt: The government has been working to improve the facilities for individuals awaiting trial. One of the key locations for this initiative is a detention center in the eastern region of the country.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ebadde ekola okutumbula embeera z'abantu abalindiridde okuwozesebwa. Ekimu ku bifo ebikulu eby'enteekateeka eno kifo kya basibe mu kitundu ky'obuvanjuba bw'eggwanga.

teo_prompt: Iswamai apugan aitojokar aiboisio nuka itunga lu idarete aitepesenio. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok kanu aswam ngun ngesi aiboisit naidarere isibei kokide naka akwap.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation and rumors, we finally gathered enough courage to confront the authorities. During the meeting, the officer in charge told us the truth about the detention center.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tuteebereza n'olugambo, twasobola okufuna obuvumu okwogera n'aboobuyinza. Mu lukungaana, omukungu avunaanyizibwa yatugambye amazima agakwata ku kifo we bakuumirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me byeko ki lok angeya, dong wa nongo tekcwiny me lok ki lutela. Ikare me kacoke, ladit wii abili owaco itwa lok ada I kom ot buc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio keda einer, apotu sio adumutu atitingikinit aitepeg apedorosio. Kotoma airiamunet, abu epolisit kolimok sio abeit naikamunit aiboisit naidarere isibei.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu asizu asi mba drice'ba eyi ma ti tazu ra. Mitingi 'da ma alea, azi'ba e'yo 'da ma drilea ri lu amani e'yo adaru pari 'bani 'ba eyi ombezu 'da ma dria.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed alarming patterns of misconduct within the legal system. As a result, concerns about the integrity of the judiciary have intensified among the public and legal experts alike.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo emize emibi mu kitongole ky'amateeka. N'ekivuddemu, okweraliikirira ku bwesimbu bw'ekitongole ekiramuzi kweyongedde mu bantu n'abakugu mu by'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal I tenge me cik. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo i kom ber bedo pa dul ma ngolo kop omede ikin lwak ki ludiro me cik.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio luarokok luka ikisila. Kanuka ngun, eyatakin aiyalongongo kama ejaasi itunga keda ipirioitin luka ikisila.

eng_prompt: After years of experience in the legal system, the court announced the appointment of a new chief judge. With a reputation for fairness and diligence, the judge was ready to tackle the challenges ahead.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi mu by'amateeka, kkooti yalangirira okulondebwa kw'omulamuzi omukulu omuggya. Olw'erinnya lye ery'obwenkanya n'obunyiikivu, omulamuzi yali mwetegefu okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic I tenge me cik, kot owaco ni kicimo langolkop madit manyen. Langol kop ne onongo tye atera me lweny i kom peko matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka amisiarit kotoma okisila, abu ekooti kolimo aseunet naka atubon loapolon loitetet. Keda ekiror lo abeit ka acobeu, akapakina atubon aitemokin atiokisio nuejaas ngaren.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani aa'zu e'yo liza ma alia 'bori ma vutia, dwani azi e'yo 'bani 'ba drile dwanini o'diru ni opezuri ra. E'yo 'bani 'ba e'yo liza kililiru azini asi driasi risi, 'ba e'yo lipiri de ngonde e'yo ewaru drilia 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: In a courtroom, various legal professionals work together to ensure justice is served. Among them, one figure stands out for their authority and responsibility in overseeing legal proceedings.
lug_prompt: Mu kkooti, bannamateeka ab'enjawulo bakolera wamu okulaba nga obwenkanya buweebwa. Mu bo, omuntu omu yeeyolekera olw'obuyinza n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe balina mu kulondoola emitendera gy'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I ot kot, lupirida mapol gitiyo kacelo me neno ni ngol matir otime. I kingi, ngat acel nen tutwal pi twero ki ticgi me doro lok makwako cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okooti, iswamaete ipirioitin luegelegela nepepe kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinitai etube loajokan. Kotoma kakesi, ejai idiopetunganan loitegelikina kanu apedorosiokec keda aswamukec naka aimaniman akiro nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Kotia, 'ba onita be e'yo liza ma dria tre 'diyi azi nga tualu nezu ra kini 'ba isu e'yo liza kililiru ri ra. Yi ma eselea, 'ba alu ni pa so okpo yini azini azi yini e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kooti, abakugu omu by'amateeka ab'emiringo mingi nibakorera hamwe, okureeba ngu oburingaaniza bubaho. Omuri bo, hariho omuntu omwe orikwetegyerezibwa ahabw'obushoborozi n'obujunaanizibwa bwe omu kureebuuza emishango.

eng_prompt: A strong financial system is essential for fostering economic growth and stability. Among the various components of this system, the banking sector plays a pivotal role in facilitating investment and providing essential services.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyensimbi ennywevu ya mugaso mu kutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'obutebenkevu. Mu bintu eby'enjawulo mu nkola eno, ekitongole kya bbanka kikola omulimu omukulu mu kusobozesa okusiga ensimbi n'okuwa obuweereza obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Yub me tic ki lim ma tek obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ber bedo. I kin jami mapat-pat matye I yub man, tenge me beng timo tic mapire tek tutwal me konyo keto lim I biyacara ki miyo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo egogong lo ikapun nes ejok kanu aitopolor apol keda ainapakina. Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka ainapeta nu, iswamai aingadisia nuka ikapun aswam naepol noi kanu aitapatan agwelanar keda aijanakin icie iboro.
lgg_prompt: Geri robia esuzu okporu ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini asianzu ejizu. Afa ndundu otita 'di ma alia 'diyi ma eselea, esele ero robia ta mbazani 'diyi azi okporu nga lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ma aza kozu azini azakoma orodriru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'empiiha ey'amaani n'ey'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'entaasya n'obutebekana. Omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe omu nkora egi,ebitongore bya banka nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omukureeberera eby'obushubuzi n'okuheereza obuheereza.

eng_prompt: To assess the risk of lending money, financial institutions must evaluate the potential borrower's reliability. One crucial factor in this evaluation is the individual's credit history.
lug_prompt: Okukebera akabi akali mu kwewola ssente, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi birina okwekenneenya obwesige bw'oyo ayinza okwewola. Ensonga emu enkulu mu kwekenneenya kuno ye byafaayo by'ebbanja ly'omuntu.
ach_prompt: Me niang peko ma twero bedo tye ikare me deno cente, gangi tic me lim omyero gunen kace ngat ma mito deno cente tye ki gen. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I kare me ngiyo kit ma ngat moni otiyo kwede ki den.
teo_prompt: Kanu airereor atiokisio nuka aijaun ikapun, ekot iriongeta luka ikapun airereor abeit naka itunganan yenepedori aijaun ikapun. Adiopebore naepol noi kotoma aingic akiro ngun ngesi akiro nuikamunitos apesenin nuka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Bani ecozu e'yo ewaru mari fezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu, le amuti robia ta mbapi 'diyi ma one 'ba mari 'dupi 'diyi ma asi'baza ra. E'yo azi okporu 'bani e'yo 'di ma ale andrizu ri eri e'yo 'bani 'ba 'da ma mari ma dria 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the economic landscape has shifted dramatically, prompting widespread concern among experts. As a result, many are turning their attention to the financial sector's response to these evolving challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, embeera y'ebyenfuna ekyuse nnyo, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakugu. N'ekivuddemu, bangi batadde ebirowoozo byabwe ku ngeri ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi gye kiddamu okusoomoozebwa kuno okukyuka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me lim olokke tutwal, ma okelo lworo madit ikin ludiro. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka loko tamgi I kom kit ma dul me lim twero cobo kwede peko magi matye ka time.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ejulakinos noi ejautene loka ikapun, ido eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas ipiriotin. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin apodokinit kec mama ejaasi erionget loka ikapun kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, angu e'yo robiani 'diyi oja i okporu, e'yo 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi ma asi otiza ejipi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'ba e'yo okalamvu robia niri ni 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: As people age, their bodies undergo various changes that can lead to discomfort and mobility issues. One of the most prevalent health concerns in this demographic is persistent pain in the back.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwebakula, emibiri gyabwe gifuna enkyukakyuka ez'enjawulo eziyinza okuleeta obutali bumativu n'obuzibu bw'okutambula. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okweraliikiriza abantu mu kiseera kino kwe kulumizibwa omugongo.
ach_prompt: Ka dano woto ki tii, komgi loko jami mapol ma twero kelo peko me wot. Tye peko me yot kom acel ma dano mapol tye kwede en aye arem me cogo ma pe rweny.
teo_prompt: Neipolorata itunga, etereikina akwan kec keda aijulanakineta nuepedorete ayangaun amamut aiyalama keda ationis naka alosit. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuka angaleu nuejaasi itunga lu erai apipil naka epur.

eng_prompt: The healthcare system is facing significant challenges in providing specialized care. One of the most pressing issues is the shortage of medical professionals in certain fields.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyobulamu eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kuwa obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bizibu eby'amangu kwe kubulwa kw'abasawo abakugu mu mirimu egimu.
ach_prompt: Tenge me yot kom tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal I miyo kony me yot kom. Lok acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye peko me nok pa lutic yoto kom I tenge mukene.

lgg_prompt: Arakala alata niri ni e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu geri alata wura ndu 'diyi fezu ri ma alea. E'yo azi okporu tu 'diyi ma azi eri 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma ako pari azi 'diyi ma alia.
