eng_prompt: In light of recent investigations into unethical behavior, there has been growing public outcry for accountability among those in power. Many citizens believe that holding officials responsible is essential for restoring trust in government.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku mpisa ezitali za mpisa, wabaddewo okwemulugunya okw'amaanyi mu abo abali mu buyinza. Bannansi bangi balowooza nti okuvunaana abakungu kyetaagisa okuzzaawo obwesige mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I kom tim maraco, lwak tye ka koko matek tutwal I kom joo matye I loc ni myero gunyut kor tic gi. Lutedero mapol gitye ki niyee ni keto adot i kom lutic pire tek tutwal me dwoko gen i kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aingic napac kanu iponesio luarokok, ejai aimony naepol noi kama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma apugan. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ibusakinit aitoron eswamak kanu ainyakun amunokina apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza o'diru e'yo adriza onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, o'bi eyi ma o'duko e'yo 'yezu 'ba opi dria 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Kari anzi karakara eyi ai ra kini azi'ba eyi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma dria ri eri orodriru asi'baza gamete ma dria ri ogozu.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the two figures stealthily approached the campsite, unaware of the watchful eyes nearby. Their hushed whispers and furtive movements hinted at something suspicious brewing in the shadows.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abantu ababiri baasemberera enkambi nga tebamanyi nti waaliwo amaaso agali awo okumpi. Okuwuubaala kwabwe mu kasirise n'okutambula kwabwe mu nkukutu byalaga nti waliwo ekintu ekiteeberezebwa ekyali kigenda mu maaso mu kisiikirize.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, dano aryo egoni gucako donyo I kem, labongo ngec mo I kom wang mabedo cok. Yeto lokgi ki kit ma gubedo ka wot kwede nyutu ni gin mo marac tye ka timme I col piny.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga ngun iarei koloto aiboisit naebeitor kesi aibwo, komam ejenete nuikamunitos akonyokonin nuejaas. Apotu kesi kikwenyasi kosodete aanyun ebe ejai ibore yen eomitai ebe ebuni aswam kotoma aipanya.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba iri 'diyi mu angu kembe ni 'diyi ma agei ci, eyini ani e'yo 'ba mile be angu 'da ma agei 'diyi ma dria ku. Yi ma o'duko o'dupiri azini yi ma acita onyiru 'diyi ece kini e'yo azi 'bani ega kokoru ni yi 'ye angu 'da ma alia.

eng_prompt: The administrative center of Buganda is known for its historical significance and cultural heritage. One of the key institutions in this region is responsible for managing land matters.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ekiddukanya Buganda kimanyiddwa olw'ebyafaayo n'ebyobuwangwa. Ekimu ku bitongole ebikulu mu kitundu kino kivunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z'ettaka.
ach_prompt: Kabedo madit me tela me Buganda ngene pi ber pa tekwaro ki tekwaro ne. Dul acel ma pire tek I but lobo man aye tye ki twero me doro lok me ngom.

lgg_prompt: Ba ni angu opi nyazani Buganda vileri orodri e'yo ewu driori ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyi ma e'yosi. Amuti okporu angu 'di ma alia 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'obwebembezi bwa Buganda nigumanywa ahabw'obukuru bwagwo omu byafaayo n'eby'obuhangwa. Kimwe aha bitongore ebikuru omu kyanga eki, nikyo kiine obujunanizibwa bw'okureeberera enshonga z'eitaka.

eng_prompt: In recent political debates, tensions have escalated as various factions voice their concerns. Many believe that the current administration's initiatives are failing to address the needs of the populace.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kw'ebyobufuzi okwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, obunkenke bweyongedde ng'ebiwayi eby'enjawulo biraga ebiruma byabwe. Bangi balowooza nti enteekateeka z'obukulembeze obuliwo ziremereddwa okukola ku byetaago by'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare me laro lok me cungu iwi bye ma okato cokcok-ki, telle omede tutwal I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat I kare ma gitye ka lok I kom peko gi. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni yub pa gamente matye kombedi pe tye ka cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ipegeta luka politikis lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta naarai itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epikosi ainapeta nuka eyaitene loakwana aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara politiki ni o'diru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra amuti ndundu eyini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyisi. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini e'yo driceza curu'dori ni 'diyi o'bi e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza ko ti.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura kw'eby'obutegyeki okuhweireho, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahabw'ebibiina ebitarikushushana kugamba ebirikubyerarikiriza. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu enteekateeka y'obwebembezi oburiho obwahati eremirwe kukora ahabyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic downturn, many citizens are struggling to make ends meet. As a result, the governor has taken a stand to protect consumers from predatory lending practices.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusereba kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, bannansi bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, gavana ayimiriddewo okukuuma abaguzi okuva ku kwewola okw'ekibogwe.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, anywali mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente ocung matek me gwoko luwil ki i kom tim me miyo lim den ma pe tye atir.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma e'yosi, kari anzi karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, gavana 'du pa so 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo mari feza onzi 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'eby'entaasya eyeyongyeire, abatuuragye baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho. N'ekyarugiremu, gavana ayesimbireho okurinda abaguzi okwetantara emize y'okuguza amabanja etari y'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: I was caught up in a meeting that ran longer than expected. As a result, I completely lost track of time.
lug_prompt: Nnakwatibwa mu lukiiko olwamala ebbanga ddene okusinga bwe nnali nsuubira. N'ekyavaamu, saamanya budde.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the federation implemented a series of comprehensive training programs and initiatives aimed at nurturing young talent. As a result, athletes have shown remarkable progress and competitiveness on both national and international stages.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekibiina kyassaawo pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa okw'enjawulo n'enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okukuza ebitone by'abavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, bannabyamizannyo balaze enkulaakulana ey'ekitalo n'okuvuganya ku mitendera gy'eggwanga n'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dul enoni oketo yub me pwonye mapol I tic ma obedo ki miti me pwonyo lutino matino. Macalo adwogi ne, lungwec gunyuto dongo matek tutwal ki pyem I rwom me lobo kacel ki lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, abu atukot ngin kitolomu ainapeta nuipu nuka aitutuonoro kanu aitopolorite atumunak luejaasi keda atalanta. Kanuka ngun, apotu akerak itodutu apol keda abolobol naepol noi kotoma akwapuwok keda akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti nde 'ba otita imbatani azini e'yo ndundu eyini lezu feta Munguni fe 'ba ode eyini 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi e'da zota onyiru azini baka seza kari ma alia azini kari amve 'diyi ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, ekibiina kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka eminyeeto erikugyenderera okutunguura emyoga yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu,abairuki boorekire entunguuka n'okuhayahayana aha rurengo rw'eihanga hamwe n'orw'amahanga goona.

eng_prompt: Despite their dedication and hard work, the national team has faced challenges in recent competitions. As they prepare for the upcoming championship, it's clear that additional training is necessary.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okwewaayo kwabwe n'okukola ennyo, ttiimu y'eggwanga efunye okusoomoozebwa mu mpaka eziyise. Nga bwe beetegekera empaka za bannantammegwa ezijja, kyeyoleka bulungi nti okutendekebwa okulala kwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul tuku me lobo man guketo cwinygi dok gutiyo matek, pud gunongo peko mapol I pyem ma okato cokcok-ki. I kare ma gitye ka yubbe pi pyem tuku odilo matye kabino ni, nen atyer kamaleng ni pwonye mukene mite.

lgg_prompt: Yi ma ava azini azi ngaza avasiri ma talasi, amuti kari ni 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru yi a'bala o'diru 'diyi ma alia ra. Yi ni otuta 'yeria abala emupi 'diyi ni, eri e'da kililiru kini embata azi dika 'diyi orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani, tiimu y'eihanga etungire oburemeezi omu mpaka ezihweire. Ku barikwetebeekanisiza empaka z'omupiira ezirikwija, nikyoreka butunu ngu okutendekwa okundi nikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in interest for cycling events, the federation has been analyzing participation trends. They believe that the upcoming promotional campaigns will attract more enthusiasts to the sport.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obwagazi mu mpaka z'obugaali gye buvuddeko, federo ebadde yeekenneenya enkola y'okwetabamu. Balowooza nti kampeyini z'okutumbula omuzannyo ezigenda okujja zijja kusikiriza abawagizi bangi mu muzannyo guno.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo pa miti I kom pyem ngwec ki lela I kare ma okato cokcok-ki, dul ma doro lok kom ngwec ki lela obedo ka ngiyo kit ma dano mapol tye katuko kwede. Gitye ki niyee ni yub me cato wil matye kabino ni obi weko dano mapol maro tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos eipud loka itunga luejaasi toma abolobol naka ipikipikin, euta atukot ngin airereor epone loka ajaut toma. Iyuunitos kesi ebe epote ikampeins lu ebunit aisinyikokin itunga luipu alomar toma abolia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu tuzu e'yo avita pikipiki ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma e'yosi, amuti 'da e'bi e'yo 'ba eyini fizu 'diyi ma ale andri. Yi a'ira kini e'yo otuza emupi 'diyi nga 'ba avaru 'diyi ma ava eji avita 'da ma alea drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abazaani b'empaka z'obugaari, ekitongore kitwire nikicondooza aha muringo gw'okwejumbamu. Nibateekateeka ngu ehururu ezirikwija niziija kureetaho abantu baingi abarikukunda emizaano.

eng_prompt: The excitement is building as the annual championship draws near. Riders from around the globe are preparing to showcase their skills on this prestigious stage.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyeyongera ng'empaka za bannantammegwa ezitegekebwa buli mwaka zisemberera. Abavuzi b'ebidduka okuva mu nsi yonna beetegekera okulaga obukugu bwabwe ku siteegi eno ey'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano tye ka yom ikare ma pyem tuku odoko cok. Lungwec ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat tye ka yubbe me nyuto diro gi I wi abam man ma oywek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Eutai aiyalama noi naarai eyapie abolobol naka ekaru. Eutasi ibodabodan luka akwap kere aitemonokin aitodiar acoasineikec kotoma adoketait na.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko zo 'ba eyi ma eselea a'bala eli vusi 'diyi ni ecazu ogogo. Ba onzu'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi yi oturia yi ma ondua e'dazu angu 'di ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa kweyongyeire obu empaka z'omwaka zaahika haihi. Abavugi kuruga omunsi yoona, nibeteekateekyera kworeka emyoga yaabo aha siteegi egi ey'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: The state of healthcare infrastructure has become a pressing issue in recent years. Many facilities are struggling to meet the demands of a growing population and outdated standards.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyobulamu efuuse ensonga ey'amangu mu myaka egiyise. Ebifo bingi birwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'omutindo ogukaddiye.
ach_prompt: Rwom me tic me ot yat odoko peko madit tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Gangi tic mapol tye ka yele me cobo miti pa wel dano matye kamede ki rwom me tic macon.
teo_prompt: Adoketait na amukian erai ationis naepol noi kokaru lu atuboros. Eutasi aiboisio nuipu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga luiyatasi keda adoketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma wura eca e'yo azi okporu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea ni ru. Afa ayuzaru karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie ri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'ebyobujanjabi ehindukire enshonga y'amaani omu myaka egi. Ebyombeko bingi nibirwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu abarikweyongyera n'omutindo oguhwaireho.

eng_prompt: After years of advocating for better educational facilities, the community finally secured funding from the government. This financial support was crucial for addressing the urgent need for a new school in our town council.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga balwanirira eby'enjigiriza ebirungi, ekitundu kyasembyeyo okufuna obuyambi okuva mu gavumenti. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bwali bukulu nnyo mu kukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'essomero eppya mu town council yaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny pi yub me kwan maber, lwak me kabedo eni dong gunongo kony me lim ki bot gamente. Kony me lim man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko me gedo gang kwan manyen i town council wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aipuga kanu aiboisio nuajokak nuka asioman, apotu itunga odumutu ikapun kanejai apugan. Ajokuna noi agangat na naka ikapun kanu aitodolikin eipud loka esomero loitetet kotaunikosi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia a'di 'dizu afa onita ni muke ndeni 'diyi ma dria, ongulumu 'da esu asizu robia engazu gamete vu ra. Atita robia ni 'diri ndra orodriru e'yo lepi sukulu o'diru ni ama vile town council ma alia ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi barikurwanirira eby'obwegyese birungi, abantu bakahendera batunga esente kuruga omu Gavumenti. Obuhwezi obu obw'esente bukaba buri obw'omugasho munonga omu kukora aha byetaago by'amaani by'eishomero risya omu tawuni kanso yaitu.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated and conflict erupted, the nation found itself engulfed in a devastating struggle. The once-thriving northern region soon became a battleground, suffering the brunt of the violence.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera n'obukuubagano ne bubalukawo, eggwanga lyeesanga mu lutalo olw'amaanyi. Ekitundu ky'obukiikakkono ekyali kikulaakulana mangu kyafuuka ekifo eky'olutalo, nga kibonaabona olw'obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle ki lweny omedde, lobo ne onongo tye I lweny madit tutwal. Kabedo ma tung kumalo ma onongo yam tye ka dongo oyot-oyot odoko kama lweny obedo iye, ma oweko dano mapol gunongo peko me tim gero.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor atiokisio keda ingungeta, abu akwap kodum akekuan toma ojie loepol noi. Atutubet naka nyakoi naejok noi abu koraun aiboisit na ejie, ido abu itereikina keda amumu naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu uru azini ngiringiri ni e'doria, kari esu i a'di 'diza onzi ma alia. Angu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea oku drile ri eca mbeleru angu a'di 'dizu ni ru, erini candi isuzu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire n'obutabanguko bwabarukaho, eihanga rikashangwa omu ntaro y'amaani. Ekicweka ky'amatemba ekyabaire nikyeyongyera kutunguuka omu bwire butari bwa hare, kikahinduka omwanya gw'orutaro, kyabonabona ahabw'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing unemployment rates, community programs have been established to empower young people. These initiatives focus on equipping them with essential skills and resources for entrepreneurship.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'emirimu eryeyongera, pulogulaamu z'ekitundu zitandikiddwawo okutumbula abavubuka. Enteekateeka zino zitunuulira okubawa obukugu n'ebikozesebwa ebikulu mu kutandikawo bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me bedo peke pa tic matye kamede, yub mapat-pat ma ikabedo mapat-pat ki keto pi tyelo kor bulu. Yub eni tye ki miti me miyo botgi diro ki jami ma mite pi cako biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amamus na aswamisinei, etolomun ainapeta nuka aitigogong atumunak. Alosikinet na erai ainakin kesi acoa ka iboro lu itwasamao kanu agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Azi ako ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, 'ba e'do otita ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba ode eyini okpo fezu. Otita 'diyi asi 'ba yi dri ondua azini afa orodriru tujari 'yezu 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo erikweyongyera, enteekateeka z'ekyanga zitandikirweho kutunguura eminyeeto. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okubahereza emyoga n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa kutandika bizinesi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, we launched a comprehensive skills development program aimed at empowering youth. As a result of our efforts, the training has improved the lives of many young people in our community.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, twatongoza enteekateeka y'okukulaakulanya obukugu egendereddwamu okutumbula abavubuka. Olw'okufuba kwaffe, okutendekebwa kulongoosezza obulamu bw'abavubuka bangi mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, wacako yub me dongo diro ma ki keto pi tyelo kor bulu. Macalo adwogi me tutewa, pwonye ne okelo alokaloka I kwo pa bulu mapol I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apotu sio etegeasi ainapeta nuka aitopoloun acoa kanu aitigogong atumunak. Kanuka aswam wok, etojokaar aituutoonor ngin aijar naka atumunak luipu kotoma atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ama e'do otita azi ondua eyini 'diyi ezozu 'ba ode eyini okpo fezu. Okpo amani 'diyisi, imbata 'da otu 'ba ode karakara amavile ongulumu 'diyi ma edri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, tukataho enteekateeka y'okutunguura emyoga y'eminyeeto. Ahabw'amaani gaitu,okutendeka kutungwire amagara g'eminyeeto omu kyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: The construction industry is experiencing fluctuations in material costs. As a result, builders and contractors are closely monitoring market trends.
lug_prompt: Ekkolero ly'okuzimba lifuna enkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi y'ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abazimbi ne ba kontulakita beetegereza nnyo eby'akatale.
ach_prompt: Tenge me gedo tye ka nongo aloka-loka I wel jami tic. Macalo adwogi ne, lugedo ki lutic mapat-pat tye ka ngiyo kit ma biacara tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi erionget loka aduko keda aijulanakineta kotoma itiaisinei luka iboro. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adukok keda adukok airereonor nuka esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu afa sizu ri ni ojata isu aje afa sizu 'diyiniri ma alia. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa si'ba 'diyi azini 'ba azi nga'ba 'diyi e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'okwombeka kiriyo nikireeba empindahinduka omu mihendo y'ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, abombeki hamwe na ba konturakiti bariyo nibareebuuza kurungi eby'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: I'm planning to start a small construction project in my backyard. Before I head to the store, I need to check the prices for some materials.
lug_prompt: Nteekateeka kutandika pulojekiti y'okuzimba entono mu luggya lwange. Nga sinnagenda mu dduuka, nneetaaga okukebera emiwendo gy'ebintu ebimu.
ach_prompt: Atye ki yub me cako tic me gedo I gang mega. Mapwod pe acito I dukan, omyero kong anen wel jami mogo.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aitemonokin ageun epurojekt loka aduko koingaren ka. Erongo eong alosit oiduka, akoto eong awanyun itiaisinei luka iboro ice.
lgg_prompt: Ma otuta 'ye otita afa sizu werea ni e'dozu ma vile aku dria. De nga po'di amuni pari afa ozizuri ma alia ku, le ma ma andri afa azi 'diyi ma aje ra.
nyn_prompt: Ninteekateeka kutandika purogyekiti y'okwombeka omu mbuga yangye. Ntakaza omu duuka, ninyetenga kureeba emihendo y'ebintu ebimwe.

eng_prompt: Expectant mothers play a crucial role in shaping the health of their future children. Ensuring a balanced diet is essential for supporting optimal fetal growth and development.
lug_prompt: Bamaama abali embuto bakola omulimu munene mu kubumba obulamu bw'abaana baabwe ab'omu maaso. Okufuna emmere erimu ebirungo byonna kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuza n'okukula kw'omwana ali mu lubuto.
ach_prompt: Mon ma oyac timo tic mapire tek tutwal me yubu yotkom pa lutino gi. Bedo ki cam maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa latin ma i ic.
teo_prompt: Angor nu epotiete iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aitolomun angaleu naka idwekec lu oingaren. Aanyun ebe enyamete inyamat luedolete ejok kanu aitogogong apolo keda apol naka ikoku.
lgg_prompt: Ayia okporovu ru 'diyi azi okporu nga anzi yini ewu drusiri ma alea 'diyi ma rua ala si. Nyaka nyaza kililiru ri eri orodriru atita fezu ezoanzi okporovu ru 'diyi dri zozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi abaine enda nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura amagara g'abaana baabo. Okureeba ngu eby'okurya birimu ebiriisa byona, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukukura n'okutunguuka kw'omwana atakazairwe.

eng_prompt: Regular medical check-ups during pregnancy can significantly impact the health of both the mother and the baby. Ensuring proper monitoring and support throughout this critical period is essential for a healthy outcome.
lug_prompt: Okukeberebwa buli kaseera ng'oli lubuto kikosa nnyo obulamu bwa maama n'omwana. Okukakasa okulondoola okulungi n'obuyambi mu kaseera kano ak'obunkenke kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Pimme kare ki kare ikare me yacu twero balo yotkom pa mego ki latin. Neno ni ki lubu kor tic ki kony ma mite ikare eni weng pire tek tutwal pi adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar adekis duc kapak na epotiete epedori aitolitol angaleu naka toto keda ikoku. Aanyun ebe ejai aanyanar ka agangat kotoma apakio kanu nuarokok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma andri eyi arojoa sa'wa driasi sa'wa okporovu nirisi ri eco rua ala ayia eyini tualu odekua eyi pie ri oja ra. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma pamvu onezu kililiru azini atita fezu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukyeberwa buri kaire omu bwire bw'enda nikibaasa kukora kihango aha magara g'omukazi n'omwana. Okureeba ngu hariho okurondoora n'obuhwezi omu bwire obu obw'amaani, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'ebirikurugamu.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted alarming trends in healthcare, particularly concerning the well-being of mothers during childbirth. Experts are raising concerns about the factors contributing to this troubling rise.
lug_prompt: Alipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga enkulaakulana eyeeraliikiriza mu byobulamu naddala ku bikwata ku bulamu bwa bamaama mu kiseera ky'okuzaala. Abakugu balaga obweraliikirivu ku nsonga eziviiriddeko okweyongerayongera kuno okweraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto jami mapol ma tye katimme I tenge me yot-kom, tutwalle i kom kwo pa mege ikare me nywal. Ludiro tye ka nyutu lworo I kom jami ma okelo mede pa wel dano matye ka kelo lworo.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan itodutu iponesio luajokak noi luka angaleu kacut nuikamunitos aijar naka angor kapak naka aidoun. Eutasi ipirioitin aitodun aiyalongongikec kanuikamunitos iboro lu eyangaunitos aiyatakinio na.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onzi 'yepi e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria tuni e'yo ayia eyini aa'zu muke sa'wa eyini mva osizu ri ma dria. Ba e'yo nipi e'yo eyi ma dria angiri 'diyi asi otiza e'da e'yo fepi e'yo eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kubaho, nizooreka entunguuka omu by'amagara, okukira munonga ebirikukwata aha magara g'abakazi baaba nibazaara. Abakugu nibereka okwerarikirira aha nshonga ezirikureetaho okweyongyera oku.

eng_prompt: After a heated argument that escalated beyond control, her parents reached their breaking point. With emotions running high, they made a decision that would change everything.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyomba okw'amaanyi okwagenda mu maaso, bazadde be baatuuka ku ssa ery'okumenya. Olw'obunkenke obw'amaanyi, baasalawo ekyandikyusizza buli kimu.
ach_prompt: I ngee laro lok matek tutwal ma oweko lunyodone gudoko tek tutwal. Ki lworo madit tutwal, gumoko tam ma obiloko jami weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget loepol noi loapotu kopedosi aitikitik, apotu auriakake kodolokisi aiyengun. Keda aiyalongongo naepol noi, apotu kesi kiswamata aseunet naepedori aijulakin iboro kere.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako okporuni ma vutia, tipika eri vile 'diyi eca asi nyoza ma alia. Asi otiza be uru, eyi 'du peta ecopi e'yo dria ojapi ra ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhajaana munonga, abazaire be bakahika aha nshonga yaabo. Ahabw'obusaasi bwingi, bakacwamu ekyabaire nikiija kuhindura buri kimwe.

eng_prompt: In the small town of Maplewood, rumors circulated about a mysterious piece of land that had been abandoned for years. Many were curious about its history, but few knew that a doctor had laid claim to it.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono aka Maplewood, engambo zaasaasaana ku ttaka eritali lya bulijjo eribadde lisuuliddwa okumala emyaka. Bangi baali baagala okumanya ebyafaayo byayo, naye batono abaali bamanyi nti omusawo yali agirina.
ach_prompt: I boma matidi me Maplewood, lok angea okato I kom ngom mo ma pe niange ma dong kiweko woko pi mwaki mapol. Dano mapol gubedo ki miti me ngeyo gin mukato angec, ento jo manok keken aye onongo gingeyo ni daktar mo owaco ni en aye okelo ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma otaun lodidi loka Maplewood, apotu akiro kotakanutu nuikamunitos alupok nuemamei ajenara kanu ikar luipu. Akotosi itunga luipu akiro nuikamunitos akiroke nukolo, konye ikidioko lu ejenete ebe ajai emuron loabu kotema ebe erai ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni were Maplewood niri ma alea, o'duko eyi aci angu azi 'bani nile ku 'bani adi eli karakara 'bo 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ndra ava be e'yo ewu driori ma dria, te 'ba were eyi nii kini dakitari azi 'du e'yo 'da ma dria ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu tawuni nkye eya Maplewood, engambo zikagyenda omu maisho ahaitaka ry'ekihama eryabaire rimazire emyaka mingi ritarikukoresibwa. Baingi bakaba nibenda kumanya ebyafaayo byayo, kwonka bakye nibo baabaire nibamanya ngu hariho omushaho owagihaire.

eng_prompt: During his sermon, the priest reflected on the growing divisions in society and the importance of unity. He emphasized that each individual has a role to play in fostering a spirit of cooperation and understanding.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuulira kwe, kabona yafumiitiriza ku kweyongera kw'enjawukana mu bantu n'obukulu bw'obumu. Yakikkaatirizza nti buli muntu alina omulimu gw'okukola mu kutumbula omwoyo gw'okukwatagana n'okutegeeragana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pwony mege, padi ne oloko I kom apoka-poka matye kamede I kin lwak ki ber pa ribe. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ni dano acel-acel tye ki tic me atima I dongo cwiny me ribe ki winye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisianakineke abu esaseredoti kitetem nuikamunitos atiakatiaka naka itunga keda ajokis naka aimorikikina. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe kanginitunganan ejaas keda aswam na aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini e'yo oluzurisi, padere 'da ega e'yo esele coza ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria tualu orodri ti ecita niri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi kini 'ba alu alu ma azi ti ecita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kubuzya kwe,omwebembezi w'ediini akagamba aha kwebaganisamu kweyongyeire omu bantu hamwe n'omugasho gw'okukwatanisa. Akashoboorora ngu buri omwe aine omurimo gw'okukora omukureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: The government has decided to implement new policies aimed at improving public health. This was announced by the minister.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti esazeewo okussa mu nkola enkola empya ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu. Kino kyalangirirwa minisita.
ach_prompt: Gamente omoko tamme me keto cik manyen ma ki keto pi ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak itic. Minicta aye owaco lok man.
teo_prompt: Aseu apugan aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotore aitojokar angaleu naka itunga. Abu eminisita kolimo nu.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'du e'yo azita o'diru 'bani lezu alata o'bi eyini ri otuzu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Minisita azi e'yo 'di ni.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eshaziremu kutaho engyenderwaho nsya ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu. Eki kikarangirirwa minisita.

eng_prompt: After weeks of investigation, the team finally uncovered the mastermind orchestrating the operation. All the clues pointed to a single individual who had been pulling the strings from the shadows.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga banoonyereza, ttiimu yasembyeyo okuzuula eyabade ategeka ekikwekweto. Obujulizi bwonna bwasonga ku muntu omu eyabadde asikambula emiguwa mu bisiikirize.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi cabit mapol, dul pa ludito guwaco ni dong gunongo ngat ma oyubu tim ne. Lanyut weng onyuto ngat acel ma obedo kakwanyo tol ne ki I col piny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic, abu etimu kodum itunganan yeneuta aitemonokin aswamisioit ngin. Apotu akiro kere itodutu ebe ejai idiopetunganan yeneuta aikony ikokoro.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vuti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu 'ba e'yo 'da otupi 'diyi ra. E'yo dria e'dapi kini 'ba alu ni e'bi e'yo yi 'du engazu angu 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okucondooza, tiimu ekahendera yashanga owabaire atebekanisa ekikwekweto. Oburugo bwona bukashoboorora ahari omuntu omwe owabaire naasika emiguha kuruga omu bicuucu.

eng_prompt: Despite living in an English-speaking country for several years, he struggles to communicate effectively. His limited vocabulary and difficulty with grammar often hinder his conversations.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'amaze emyaka mingi ng'abeera mu nsi eyogera Olungereza, akaluubirizibwa okwogera obulungi. Amakulu ge amatono n'obuzibu bwe mu grammar bitera okumulemesa emboozi ze.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo I lobo ma kiloko iye leb munu pi mwaki mapol, en nongo tek tutwal me lok maber. Lok ma en tiyo nok tutwal ki peko ma en tye kwede me niang kit ma lok moni tye ka lok kwede pol kare gengo lok mege.
teo_prompt: Karaida iboyete ngesi kotoma akwapin nuinerasi amusugun adaun ikar luipu, etiono ngesi einer ejok. Akiroke nu ikidioko ka atiokisio nuka angajep mam etapit duc aitikitik ineresinei ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro aa'zu kari mundu ti nzepi 'diyi ma alea eli karakara ra ti, eri dri ci e'yo nzezu kililiru. Eri ma e'yo nzeza ma ongmbo were azini e'yo ewaru geri 'bani e'yo nzezu 'diyi pie 'diyi eri ma e'yo nzeza atri sawa driasi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaatuura omu eihanga erikugamba orungyereza kumara emyaka mingi, nabona oburemeezi bw'okugamba kurungi. Ekigambo kye kikye hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okumanya engyenderwaho y'ebigambo, nibimuremesa kugamba gye.

lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, pulezidenti yatuukirira abakulembeze b'enzikiriza ab'enjawulo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku misingi gy'eggwanga. Omu ku bantu abakulu be yatuukirira ye mwepiskoopi w'essaza ly'omu kitundu.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the group as differing opinions clash. In an effort to maintain unity, the leaders have gathered to discuss their conflicting views.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibiina ng'endowooza ez'enjawulo zikontana. Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obumu, abakulembeze bakungaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ndowooza zaabwe ezikontana.

lug_prompt: Mu bbugumu ly'olutalo, omujaasi yalaba munne ng'agalamidde wansi ng'afunye ebisago. Awatali kulonzalonza, yayanguwa mu layini y'amasasi okumuggya mu kifo ekitali kya bulabe.

eng_prompt: In a press conference held shortly after the incident, military officials provided an update on the recent attack. They emphasized the importance of accurate information amidst the chaos surrounding the event.
lug_prompt: Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire olwatudde amangu ddala oluvannyuma lw'ekyabaddewo, abakungu b'amagye baategeezezza ku bulumbaganyi obwaliwo gyebuvuddeko. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okuwa amawulire amatuufu wakati mu butabanguko obwaliwo ku mukolo.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eizooba ryingi aha murimo, nkahendera nashutama aha kitanda. N'eky'omugasho nyowe kuguma nimanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Our community has a rich history of producing talented athletes. It's no surprise that many of the national team players hail from our home village.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyaffe kirina ebyafaayo bingi mu kufulumya bannabyamizannyo abalina ebitone. Tekyewuunyisa nti abazannyi ba ttiimu y'eggwanga bangi bava mu kyalo kyaffe.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of recent competitions and talent showcases, the sports council has been actively scouting for promising athletes. Their efforts have paid off, as they have identified more young stars to join the national team.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya empaka ezaakaggwa n'okwolesebwa kw'ebitone, akakiiko k'ebyemizannyo kabadde kanoonya bannabyamizannyo abalungi. Okufuba kwabwe kuvuddemu ebibala, kubanga bazudde abazannyi abato abalala okwegatta ku ttiimu y'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom pyem ma okato cokcok-ki ki nyuto talanta, dul ma doro lok kom tuku gubedo ka yenyo lungwec matye ki gen. Tute gi okelo adwogi maber pien gunongo lutino ma gitye ki miti me donyo I tim me lobo.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling match that showcased his incredible skills, the footballer was eager to share his thoughts with the media. The anticipation surrounding his performance had drawn the attention of a well-respected sports journalist.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuzannyo ogw'essanyu ogwalaga obukugu bwe obw'ekitalo, omuzannyi w'omupiira yali ayagala nnyo okugabana ebirowoozo bye ne bannamawulire. Okusuubira okwaliwo ku bikwata ku mutindo gwe kwali kwewuunyisizza munnamawulire w'eby'emizannyo omututumufu.

lgg_prompt: Abala azi ndrizaru erini e'dapi ondua erini 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba mupira avipi 'da le saaru e'yo erini ega 'diyi awazu 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi pie. E'yo 'bani ega e'yo erini 'ye ri ma dria ri fe 'ba osisia osipi e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria inzizuri ma asi ra.

eng_prompt: The sport of golf has long been associated with luxury and exclusivity. As a result, access to golf courses and clubs often comes with a hefty price tag.
lug_prompt: Omuzannyo gwa goofu gubadde gukwataganyizibwa n'eby'okwejalabya. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna ebisaawe bya goofu ne kiraabu zitera okujja n'ebbeeyi ya waggulu.

teo_prompt: Adaun apak naepol noi eidicane loka abolia naka golf keda iboro luibusiak noi. Kanuka ngun, adolokin isawen luka golf keda ikilabun epol etiai loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Avita golfniri ebi ovu ecizaru sawa ezu e'yo ajekokoru azini e'yo onyiru 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, muzu pari avita golf ni 'diyi ma alia azini amuti avita golf ni 'diyi ma alia ri ma aje ni tu.
nyn_prompt: Omuzaano gwa gorufu gutwire nigugambwaho nk'ogw'omutaano. N'ekyarugiremu, okuhika aha mizaano ya gorufu hamwe na kiraabu, nikikira kwija n'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling competition that showcased incredible talent and determination, the judges tallied the scores and announced the finalists. Excitement filled the air as everyone eagerly awaited the results.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'empaka ezinyuma ezaayolesa ebitone n'obumalirivu, abalamuzi baakuba obubonero ne balangirira abawanguzi ab'akamalirizo. Obwagazi bwajjula empewo nga buli omu alindirira n'obwagazi ebyava mu bigezo.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem ma oyomo cwiny tutwal ma onyuto talanta ki miti matek tutwal, lungol kop gu kwano makci ka gu nyutu jo ma oloyo pyem me agiki. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dano weng obedo kakuru adwogi peny.

lgg_prompt: A'bala ndrizaru 'bani feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi e'dazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi tra kalafe eyi azini azi 'ba agapi asizuri ra. Ayiko fu oli ma alia 'ba dria ni e'yo agata ni 'diyi tezu avasi.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the bustling streets, the sounds of honking horns and chattering vendors filled the air. The narrow roads were packed with vehicles and pedestrians alike, making it difficult to navigate through the town.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka ku nguudo ezaali zijjudde abantu, amaloboozi g'amakondeere agaali gakuba enduulu n'ag'abatembeeyi abaali bawuubaala gaali mu bbanga. Enguudo enfunda zaali zijjudde emmotoka n'abatembeeyi, ekyakaluubiriza okutambulira mu kabuga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka aa malo I dye gudu ma dano dwong iye tutwal, dwon tung-gi ki dwon pa lucat opong I yamo. Gudu matidi ne opong ki mutoka ki luwot ma woto ki tyengi, ma oweko obedo tek tutwal me wot I boma ne.
teo_prompt: Nealosior akolong korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu noi, apotu iporotoi luka amopiran keda agwelanarak kilelebunos kokwam kere. Apotu irotin ludidik kilelebunos keda amotokan keda alotok, ido abu koinak etiono alosit otaun.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria nzila 'ba eyini aa'zu tre 'diyi ma dria, o'duko 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma o'duko azini o'duko 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma o'duko si ri ga angu ma alea dria. Nzila aliru 'diyi ga tre mutukari eyi pie tualu 'ba acipi pasi 'diyi pie, erini fezu acita angu tawuni niri ma alea ri ecazu ewaru.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose higher in the sky, the vibrant energy of the city began to awaken. Locals and tourists alike flocked to the heart of the metropolis, drawn by the enticing aromas and colorful displays.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yasituka waggulu mu bbanga, amaanyi g'ekibuga gaatandika okuzuukuka. Abantu b'omu kitundu n'abalambuzi beeyiwa mu kibuga, nga basikirizibwa obuwoowo obulungi n'okwolesebwa kwa langi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka aa malo I dan polo, teko pa boma madit ocako ryeny. Lutedero kacel ki lulim piny gubino I dye boma madit enoni, ma oywayo cwinygi pi ngwec mamwonya tutwal ki nyuto cal mapat-pat matye I iye.

eng_prompt: I've been researching various industries to invest in, and the oil and gas sector seems promising. However, I'm unsure about the steps involved in launching a business in this field within our country.
lug_prompt: Mbadde nnoonyereza ku makolero ag'enjawulo ge nnyinza okuteekamu ssente, era ekitongole ky'amafuta ne gaasi kirabika nga kisuubiza. Kyokka, sikakasa mitendera egiteekebwa mu kutongoza bizinensi mu nsonga eno mu ggwanga lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Abedo katimo kwed I kom tenge mapat-pat ma omyero aket lim I iye, dok tenge me moo ki yamo malyel nen calo tye ki gen. Kadi bed kumeno, pe angeyo yoo me cako biacara man I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aingic ikampunin luegelegela luibusakinitor eong aipikakin ikapun toma, ido esubit bala iswamaete akinyet keda ekwam ejok. Konye, mam eong ajeni epone loka aitegear ebiasara kotoma akwap wok.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi e'yo vuti onda okalamvu ndundu lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ma dria, azini okalamvu odu ni azini oli ni 'diyi e'da kililiru. Kani si, ma nini e'yo 'bani tujari 'di e'dozu kari amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: As global demand for energy continues to rise, various players in the market are vying for a larger share. This has led to an increasingly aggressive landscape in the oil industry.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze mu nsi yonna bweyongera okulinnya, abazannyi ab'enjawulo mu katale bavuganya ku migabo eminene. Kino kiviiriddeko embeera eyeeyongera okuba embi mu makolero g'amafuta.

eng_prompt: The mining industry in Northern Uganda has seen significant growth in recent years. As a result, several companies have emerged to capitalize on the region's rich mineral resources.

nyn_prompt: Eby'okutimba eby'obugaiga bw'omu itaka omu matemba ga Uganda bitungire entunguuka y'amaani omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi zitandikire kukoresa eby'obugaiga bw'omu itaka omu kicweka ekyo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing interest in sustainable farming practices among rural communities. As a result, many farmers are turning to traditional methods and local livestock breeds that are better adapted to the region's climate.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo obwagazi obweyongera mu nnima ez'obuwangaazi mu bitundu by'ebyalo. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bangi baddukira mu nkola z'ekinnansi n'ebika by'ebisolo eby'omu kitundu ebikwatagana obulungi n'embeera y'obudde mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me pur tye ka mede I kin lwak me caro. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur mapol tye ka cako tic ki yoo macon me gwoko lee ki kwai lee ma kiyubu pi gwoko lee ma kiyubu pi kwo me kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol noi eipud loka itunga luka ocaloi kanu akoru. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akoriok luipu aijulakin aitwasam iponesio luka einono keda iponesio luka itiang luka atutubet luepedorete ajaut keda ekuse loka ikwamin.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, leta e'yo ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu angu caloru 'diyi ma eselea tutu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara ori ezo'ba 'diyi yi oja geri a'di ni 'diyi ma alia azini anyapa asea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu b'omubyaro beeyongyeire kukunda emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi baingi nibahindukira omu mihanda y'obuhangwa hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'amatungo oburikuhikaana n'embeera y'obwire omu kyanga kyabo.

eng_prompt: We were curious about your background and asked him for details. After a long conversation, he finally opened up.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the streets, I couldn't help but notice the chaos around me. From the scattered trash to the mismatched signs, it was clear that there was little order to be found.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali ntambula mu nguudo, nnalaba akavuyo akaali keetoolodde. Okuva ku kasasiro eyabunye okutuuka ku bubonero obutakwatagana, kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti waaliwo obutebenkevu butono obwandisangiddwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I teng gudu, aneno kuku kuku ma obedo tye I kabedo ma orumuwa. Nicake I kom yugi ma opoke-poke me oo I kom lanyut ma pe orwatte, nen atyer kamaleng ni yub onongo pe tye maber tutwal.

nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto, nkareeba akavuyo kangye. Kuruga aha kasasiro eyabaire eteganiisibwe kuhisya aha bubonero obutarikukwatanisa, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hatariho butebekana.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the neighborhood has seen a dramatic increase in break-ins and violent incidents. Many families have taken to installing security systems and forming neighborhood watch groups to protect themselves.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ekitundu kirabye okweyongera mu bubbi bw'amayumba n'ebikolwa eby'effujjo. Amaka mangi gataddewo eby'okwerinda n'okukola ebibiina by'obukuumi okusobola okwekuuma.

eng_prompt: As urbanization continues to rise across the continent, many cities are experiencing significant growth. Among these, Kampala stands out for its rapidly increasing population and vibrant culture.

teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aiyatakin kotoma akwapin nukokinga, ejaasi itaunin luipu keda apol naepol noi. Kotoma akiro nu, itegelikina Kampala kanu enaaba loka itunga keda inonosio luegelegela.

nyn_prompt: Nk'oku abantu barikugumizamu nibatuura omu ndembo, endembo nyingi nizitunguuka munonga. Omuri ebi byona, Kampala neshangwa ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu oguriyo nigweyongyera juba hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: The economic downturn has led to a significant increase in unemployment rates. As a result, many individuals and families are struggling to find stable housing.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ri fe azi ako ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi tualu familia karakara eyi pie eyi dri ci jo eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'eby'entaasya kureesireho okweyongyera kw'eibura ry'emirimo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu n'amaka maingi nibarwana kuronda oburaaro burungi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to impact daily life, many local establishments are struggling to adapt. In response to health guidelines, several businesses have made the difficult decision to shut their doors temporarily.

ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde ki balo kwo pa dano, gangi kwan mapol tye ka tute matek me ngiyo ki kwo gi. Macalo adwogi me lubu cik me yot kom, biyacara mapol gumoko tam matek me loro dogola gi pi tutunu.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan, eutasi isomeroi luipu ainingosit ajenun. Kanu aitodolikin aicoreta nuka angeleu, eswamata ibiasaran luipu aseunet na etiono noi naka agolokin ikekia kec kanu apak naedit.

eng_prompt: Throughout her life, she dedicated herself to public service and championed numerous causes that uplifted her community. Her unwavering commitment and passion left an indelible mark on the nation.

eng_prompt: After a long battle with illness, his family gathered to say their final goodbyes. Despite the efforts of doctors and loved ones, his condition continued to deteriorate.

ach_prompt: Ingee lweny ki two pi kare malac, lugang ne gugure me weko en. Kadi bed ni ludaktari ki lugang pa latwo gutiyo matek tutwal, two mege omedde ameda.

lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu azo be sawa ezu ma vutia, familia eri vile 'diyi tra yi yi asizu. Dakitari eyi tualu 'ba eyini leletu 'diyi pie okpo 'ba ra ti, eri ma rua ri mu drile e'yo onzi 'yezu.

nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigugwa aheeru,obucureera omu nju bukateerwaho orwari rw'amaani. Bwanyima y'akaire kakye, ebitaara bikacwekyerera, byabata omwirima.

eng_prompt: Many people enjoy watching thunderstorms from a safe distance, marveling at the power of nature. However, the dangers associated with lightning are often underestimated.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banyumirwa okulaba okubwatuka kw'eggulu nga bali wala, nga beewuunya amaanyi g'obutonde. Newankubadde, obulabe obuva mu kubwatuka kw'omulabe butera okubuusibwa amaaso.

lgg_prompt: Angu mile ma o'duko ece kini ozoo ni nga ovu sa'wa ezu. E'yo 'disi, nyaku 'da ma alea afa 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra dika angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do pari dria.

eng_prompt: I can't believe I missed the earlier broadcast, and I need to catch up on the latest updates. With everything happening lately, it's crucial for me to stay informed.

teo_prompt: Mam eong acamunit ebe abu eong atwania aitodiareta nukokau, ido akoto eong adumunun akiro nuitetiak. Keda iboro kere lu iswamasi apakio nu, ejokuna eong aijen.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, tensions were high as members expressed their frustration over the chairman's behavior. Recognizing the impact of his actions, he took a moment to address the committee.

eng_prompt: In a functioning democracy, collaboration and mutual respect among leaders are essential for effective governance. Building strong relationships can lead to more productive discussions and better outcomes for the public.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya akola obulungi, enkolagana n'okussa ekitiibwa mu bakulembeze bikulu nnyo mu bukulembeze obulungi. Okuzimba enkolagana ey'amaanyi kisobola okuleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okulungi n'ebirungi eri abantu.
ach_prompt: I loc alwak matye katic maber, winye ki woro ikin lutela pire tek pi tela maber. Gedo wat matek twero weko nywako lok bedo ber dok kelo adwogi maber pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naejok, aiswamanara keda ayongite engarenok kes ejok kanu apugan naejok. Adukio na eidicane loegogong epedori ayangaun aineranara na ejok ka akiro nuajokak nejaas itunga.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, the leadership of the nation becomes crucial for maintaining order and security. As the highest authority in the government, the leader holds significant responsibilities regarding military operations.

lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi, driceza kari niri eca orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma tambazu. Azi'ba gameteni okporu ndeni ri ru, drice'ba 'da ma azi okporu e'yo marani ni 'diyi ma dria ci.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict and uncertainty, the role of the military becomes crucial for maintaining peace and security. Their presence serves as a safeguard against threats that could endanger civilians.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu, omulimu gw'amagye gufuuka omukulu mu kukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu. Okubeerawo kwabwe kukola ng'obukuumi okuva ku kutiisatiisa okuyinza okuteeka abantu ba bulijjo mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, tic pa mony pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Bedo tye gi konyo me gwoko dano i kom jami ma twero balo kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta keda amamus acamanar, erai aswam naka ajore naepol noi kanu aidar ainapakin keda ayuwara. Ajaut kec ijaikini kwape ayuwara kama ejaasi lukasurup luepedorete aimusung itunga lukokwap.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, the demand for charcoal as a primary source of fuel has led to increased deforestation. As a result, local communities often resort to cutting down trees to meet their energy needs.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, obwetaavu bw'amanda ng'ensibuko y'amafuta enkulu buviiriddeko okweyongera kw'okutema ebibira. N'ekivuddemu, abantu baddukira mu kutema emiti okusobola okufuna amasannyalaze ge beetaaga.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, miti me mako maka macalo yoo acel me nongo moo okelo tyen lok me tongo yadi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ipol kare gi cako tongo yadi me cobo miti gi me mac.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, eipud loka atotol kanu akinyet eyangaunit atubutubio na ikito. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga aitub ikito kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec luka akim.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, lezu makale esuzu ekile geri odu esuzu okori fe pati ogaza ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do pati eyi oga eyini ani ecozu eyi ma aci esuzu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, disputes over property ownership have escalated, leading to tensions among local communities. Many residents are frustrated by the lack of clear documentation regarding land ownership.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkaayana ku bwannannyini ku bintu zeeyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okusika omuguwa mu bantu b'omu kitundu. Abatuuze bangi bennyamivu olw'obutaba na biwandiiko bitegeerekeka bulungi ebikwata ku bwannannyini ku ttaka.

eng_prompt: The findings of the study were highly anticipated by industry experts. After months of research and analysis, the team finally completed their work.

lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera okukula n'obusuubuzi bweyongera okutandikibwawo mu kitundu, ebizimbe ebiriwo kati bikaluubirizibwa okugoberera omutindo. lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini ri ni mu drile tualu tujari karakara eyini eyi e'dozu angu 'da ma alea, afa ndundu eyini aa'zu sa'wa 'disi 'diyi dri ciria. Ojata okporu 'diyi kokoru, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo ewaru eyini acizu o'du driasi azini geri eyini ecozu afa eyini le 'diyi esuzu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, nations have often found themselves in conflicts that require military intervention. As a result, military forces are frequently sent to various regions around the world to maintain peace and stability.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, amawanga gatera okwesanga mu ntalo ezeetaagisa amagye okuyingira mu nsonga. N'ekivuddemu, amagye gatera okusindikibwa mu bitundu eby'enjawulo okwetooloola ensi okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, lobe mapol gubedo I lweny ma mite ni lumony gubed tye. Macalo adwogi ne, lumony ipol kare kicwalo gi I but lobo mapat-pat me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu akwapin odumutu akiro nuka ingungeta nu ekotosi ajore alomar toma. Kanuka ngun, ijukario ajore aiboisio nuegelegela kotoma akwap kere kanu aidar ainapakin keda ainapakina.

nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, amahanga gatwire nigashangwa omu ntaro ezirikwetenga amahe. N'ekyarugiremu, amahe nigasindikibwa omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe okwetoroora ensi yoona, okurinda obusingye n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the global landscape has seen a troubling rise in violence and extremism. As a result, security concerns have intensified, particularly in regions grappling with political instability.

ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, tim gero ki gero omede tutwal I wilobo. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo me gwoko kuc omede tutwalle I but lobo mapat-pat matye ki peko me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi amumu keda amumu kotoma akwap kere. Kanuka ngun, apolor aiyalongongo naka ayuwara kacut kotoma aiboisio nuejaasi keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma politikis.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, wudrikuru ma wura ndre e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, asi otiza e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu tuni angu politiki ni e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: I have gathered all the necessary data and completed my analysis. Now, I just need to compile everything into a cohesive document.
lug_prompt: Nkuŋŋaanyizza obubaka bwonna obwetaagisa ne mmaliriza okwekenneenya kwange. Kati, nneetaaga kukungaanya buli kimu mu kiwandiiko ekikwatagana.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the region for weeks, culminating in a violent confrontation. As chaos erupted, the crowd surged around the podium where the religious leader was speaking.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala wiiki eziwera, ne butuuka ku ntikko mu kulwanagana okw'amaanyi. Obwegugungo bwe bwabalukawo, abantu baakuŋŋaanira ku podium omukulembeze w'eddiini gye yali ayogera.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo eni pi cabit mapol ma oweko lweny obedo tye. I kare ma kuku kuku ocake, dano mapol gubino I wi podium kama latela dini onongo tye ka lok iye.
teo_prompt: Apolor akiro nuka ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun isabitin luipu, ido abu kitodolik nuka amumu. Neabwangunor amumu, apotu itunga kolukutu aiboisit naeuta engarenon loka edini einer.

eng_prompt: In the wake of recent events, many in the community are grappling with a sense of confusion and concern. Reports of the incident have left believers questioning the motives behind the violence directed at their spiritual leader.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, abantu bangi mu kitundu bali mu kusoberwa n'okweraliikirira. Amawulire agakwata ku byaliwo gaaleka abakkiriza nga babuusabuusa ebigendererwa ebiri emabega w'obutabanguko obukoleddwa ku mukulembeze waabwe ow'eby'omwoyo.
ach_prompt: I ngee jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, dano mapol I kabedo gi tye ka lweny ki anywena-nywena ki lworo. Lok I kom ngo ma otimme oweko luyee obedo ki akala-kala I kom tyen lok ma oweko tim gero obedo tye I kom latela dini gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, itunga luipu ejaas keda aiyalongong keda aiyalongong. Akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun ajalakisi eyuunak abuonokin nuikamunitos alosikineta nuka amumu nejaas engarenon kec loka edini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo eyi ma aza kozu tualu asi otiza be. O'duko e'yo 'da ma dria 'diyi fe 'ba aitaa'ba 'diyi ma asi otiza e'yo asisile ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria drice'ba eyivile 'diyi vu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and a series of eyewitness accounts, the police finally identified the suspect. With the evidence mounting against him, they set up a sting operation to catch him in the act.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'ebiwandiiko by'abaabaddewo, poliisi yasembyeyo okuzuula ateeberezebwa. Olw'obujulizi obweyongedde ku ye, baakola ekikwekweto eky'okumukwata ng'akola.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki lok pa lucaden mapol, abili dong gunongo ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome. Kit ma caden tye ka mede I kome, gucako yub me make I tim ne.

lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini e'yo 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ni 'yozu 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi esu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'da ra. Afa e'dapi kini eri eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu tualurisi, eyi e'do e'yo 'bani ecozu eri bizu 'yeta 'da ma alea.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere was charged with anticipation as the event unfolded, drawing a crowd of onlookers. Cameras clicked and microphones were poised, ready to capture every moment.
lug_prompt: Embeera yabaddemu okweraliikirira ng'omukolo gugenda mu maaso, nga gukunga abantu bangi. Kkamera zaali zitegese era ne mayirofooni zaali zitegese okukwata buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Dano gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma yub ne tye ka time, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo tye. Camera gubedo ka goyo cal ki mairofon ma oyubbe me mako jami weng matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga keda eipud loepol noi naarai apotu itunga luipu kojaikinos toma opucit kangol. Apotu akameran kisinyikokisi kosodete aipikakin isimun, ekapakina aikamun akiro kere.

nyn_prompt: Embeera ekaba erimu amatsiko ahabwokuba omukoro gukaba nigugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi bakareeba. Za kamera zikaba ziriho kandi n'ebyoma bikaba byeteekateekire kukwata buri kaire.

eng_prompt: Located in the heart of the city, the bustling marketplace attracts vendors and shoppers from all over the region. Its vibrant atmosphere and diverse offerings make it a popular destination for both locals and tourists alike.
