lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, entambula ennungi ya mugaso eri abakugu. Bangi baddukira mu ntambula endala okusobola okuyita mu kalippagano k'ebidduka n'okutuuka amangu gye bagenda.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal-li, wot maber pire tek tutwal ki ludiro. Dano mapol tye ka tic ki yoo me wot mukene me kato ki I motoka mapol tutwal ki oo I kabedogi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naeutai aswam katipet, epolok noi elose loajokan kanuka ipirioitin. Eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin iponesio ice luka alosit kanu alosit kotoma orot loepol noi kosodete adolere aiboisio kec katipet.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia acipa kililiru ri eri orodriru 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi dri. Ba karakara eyi geri acizu 'diyi oja eyini ani acizu nzila dria eyini ani cazu angu eyini muzu 'diyi ma alea mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu eby'engyenda nyingi, eby'engyenda birungi n'eby'omugasho aha bakugu. Abantu baingi nibahindukira omu miringo endiijo y'engyenda, kugira ngu bahikye ahu barikuza juba.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising within the council as members debated the allocation of resources for the upcoming festival. During the heated discussion, the treasurer couldn't hold back his frustration any longer.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu lukiiko nga bammemba bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugabanyizaamu ebyetaago by'ekivvulu ekijja. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, omuwanika teyasobola kwefuga.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lutela I kare ma gubedo ka laro lok I kom kit me poko lim pi yub me kwee matye kabino ni. Ikare me laro lok matek tutwal, lagwok lim onongo dong pe twero gengo cwer cwinye.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma ekansulo naarai apotu imeban kitetemoto nuka aikor ikapun luka epucit lo ebunit. Kotoma opeget loepol noi, mam eyapiesi abu kopedo aidar anyunyura ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni ri e'bi tu kanisulu ma alia memba yini agbatara gbazu afa ayuzaru omu emupi ri ni 'diyi ma esele cozu ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza okporu 'da ma alea, 'ba lonyi ta mbapiri econi i ma candi ma ta mba dika ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bugumire nibweyongyera omu kakiiko nk'abakiiki barikuhanuura aha nshonga y'okugaba eby'obugaiga by'omukoro oguri kwija. Omu kuhanuura kw'amaani, omubiiki w'esente tarabaasize kwezibira.

eng_prompt: The courtroom was filled with anxious faces, all waiting for the proceedings to begin. As the clock ticked past the scheduled start time, murmurs of confusion spread among the attendees.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge kya kkooti kyajjula abantu abaali beeraliikirivu nga balindirira okutandika kw'omusango. Ng'essaawa egenda esukka obudde obwali butegekeddwa okutandika, okwemulugunya kw'okutabulwa kwabuna mu abo abaaliwo.
ach_prompt: Ot kot opong ki dano ma gitye ki lworo madit tutwal, ma gitye kakuru cako pido. Ikare ma cawa okato cawa ma kiyubu me cake, woo me anywena-nywena omede ikin joo ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Ileleba adieket keda iponesio luka itunga lu ekuriaka noi, kere aidarit apupio na emusago ageun. Neautar esawa aitub isawan lu ebeit ageun, apotu itunga luka atukot kogeutu aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Jo dwaniniri ga dria 'ba asi otiza be 'diyi si, dria te e'yo erizu ri e'dozu. Sawa ni mu drile sawa 'bani lezu e'dozu ri ma vutia, e'yo 'ba emupi 'diyi ma eselea ri ere i.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye kya kooti kikaba kiijwire abantu abarikutegyereza okuhurira orubanja. Eshaaha kuyabaire neekyerererwa obwire obu yaabaire etebekanisiibwe kutandika, okwetomboitwa kweyongyeire omu bantu abaabaire bariho.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence presented, the judge emphasized the importance of hearing from those who could provide additional insights. He then instructed us to come with our witnesses in the next court session.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi obwanjuddwa, omulamuzi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuwulira abo abasobola okuwa amagezi amalala. Oluvannyuma yatulagira okujja n'abajulizi baffe mu lutuula lwa kkooti oluddako.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ma kikelo, langol kop oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa winyo lok pa jo ma twero miyo ngec mukene. En olego wa me bino ki lucaden wa I kare me winyo lok I kot mabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ajenanut na ijaikitai, abu ekatubon kitogogong ajokis naka aipup itunga luepedorete aijaikin ajenanut acie. Abu ngesi kolimok sio abunere keda ajenak kosi kotoma apupio na etupakini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri 'yo kini eri orodriru e'yo erizu engazu 'ba ecopi e'yo ecepi 'diyi vu. Eri fe amani azita emuzu 'ba sadiniru 'diyi pie e'yo eriza koti'a ri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi,omuramuzi akahamya omugasho gw'okuhurira abo abarikubaasa kwongyera kumanya. Akaturagiira kwija n'abajurizi baitu omu kooti.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive political landscape, securing adequate resources is crucial for any party's success. Without sufficient financial backing, even the most promising initiatives can falter.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'ennaku zino ey'okuvuganya, okufuna ebyetaago ebimala kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'ekibiina kyonna. Awatali buyambi bw'ensimbi obumala, n'enteekateeka ezisinga okusuubiza zisobola okugwa.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me cungu iwi bye ma ite kare ni, nongo lim ma oromo pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa dul me cungu iwi bye mo keken. Labongo kony me lim ma oromo, yub ma beco loyo weng twero poto.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka akiro nuka politikis, aitolomun iboro lu edolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka epate. Arai emamei agangat na ikapun na edolit, epedorete aswamisio nu iswamaete ejok aibiror.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala politiki ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu angiri ri eri orodriru amuti azi ni drile suza ni. Robia atita capira ri kokoru, ata e'yo onyiru ndeni 'diyi eco e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki by'erizooba eby'okuhayahayana, okutunga eby'okukozesa ebirikumara n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi bw'ekibiina ky'obutegyeki kyona. Hatariho obuhwezi bw'esente oburikumara, n'enteekateeka nungi neebaasa kugwa.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the landscape of sports journalism in Uganda has been evolving, yet certain trends remain evident. One notable observation is the gender disparity within the field.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, embeera y'amawulire g'ebyemizannyo mu Uganda ebadde ekyuka, naye waliwo ebintu ebimu ebikyaliwo. Ekimu ku byo kye tulaba kwe kwawukana mu kikula ky'abantu mu mulimu guno.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo me coyo lok angeya me tuku I lobo Uganda obedo ka loke, ento jami mukene pud tye katimme. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye apoka-poka matye ikin mon ki coo I tenge eni.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma airot iyemuto luka aboliasio koUganda, konye ejaas iponesio ice luitodunitos. Adiopet aanyunet erai atiakatiaka naka ikiliok keda angor kotoma aswam kangin.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani e'yo nzezu e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria Ugandaa ri ebi i oja ra, te e'yo azi 'diyi nga kiri e'da ra. E'yo azi 'bani ndre 'diyi ma azi esele coza oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'amahurire g'eby'emizaano omu Uganda bitwire nibihinduka, kwonka hariho ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Ekintu kimwe eky'omutaano eky'okureeba n'obutakwatanisa omu kikura ky'abantu omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation and anticipation, the press conference finally took place. During the event, the journalist has given us all the information concerning our national team.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateebereza n'okusuubira, olukungaana lwa bannamawulire kyaddaaki lwaliwo. Mu mukolo, munnamawulire atuwadde amawulire gonna agakwata ku ttiimu yaffe ey'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me byek ki byek, kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya dong otum. I kare me yub eni, lacoo lok angea omiyo itwa ngec weng ma kwako tim me lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio keda aomisio, abu airiamunet naka iyemuto kojaikin. Kotoma opucit kangol, abu arotan iyemuto ijaik sio akiro kere nuikamunitos etimukosi loka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri 'ye i asizu ra. Sawa omu 'da nirisi, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi fe ama dri e'yo dria amuti kari ni amavile ri ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteebereza n'okuteekateeka, orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru rukaheza kubaho. Aha mukoro, abanyamakuru batuhaire amakuru agarikukwata aha tiimu yaitu y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, his remarkable achievements in various sports have garnered national attention. Many experts agree that his talent and determination set him apart from his peers.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, ebyewuunyisa by'atuuseeko mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo bituuse ku bantu bangi mu ggwanga. Abakugu bangi bakkiriziganya nti ekitone kye n'obumalirivu byamufuula ow'enjawulo ku banne.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, jami mabeco ma en otimo I tuku mapat-pat okelo miti pa lobo ni. Ludiro mapol giye ni talanta mege ki tek cwiny mege okete pat ki luwote.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, aitodolikineta ke kotoma aboliasio nuegelegela ejaikisi akwap kere ajenara. Ecamunitos ipirioitin luipu ebe atalanta ke keda amunokina ke abu kitirian ngesi kama ejaasi ipaupakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, e'yo erini 'ye avita ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu kari 'di ma mile ra. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi ai ra kini talanta erini azini asi 'baza erini 'diyi fe erini aa'zu ndu 'ba eri ma agyipi 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'obweziriki, obusinguzi bwe omu mizaano etari emwe, butungire amaani omu ihanga ryona. Abakugu abaingi nibaikiriza ngu etaraanta ye hamwe n'okwehayo kwe bikamutandukana na bagyenzi be.

eng_prompt: With its fast-paced action and passionate fans, many people eagerly gather to watch their favorite teams compete. The thrill of each play and the unpredictability of the game keep spectators on the edge of their seats.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebikolwa byayo eby'amangu n'abawagizi abanyiikivu, abantu bangi bakungaana n'obwagazi okulaba ttiimu zaabwe ze baagala nga zivuganya. Okusanyuka kwa buli muzannyo n'obutategeerekeka bw'omuzannyo bikuuma abalabi ku mabbali g'ebifo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki jami ma time oyot-oyot tutwal ki lucwak ma cwinygi yom, dano mapol gure ki miti me neno tim ma gimaro me pyem. Yomo cwiny I kom tuku acel-acel kacel ki kit ma tuku pe nen kwede weko lunen bedo I nget komgi.
teo_prompt: Keda aswamisio nuka atipet keda egangitok, itunga luipu etukonokinos kanu asesen itimunukec lueminasi kesi abolobol. Aiyalama naka abolia kangin idiobore keda epone lomam itunga ejenete eipone lo ebeitor kesi ajaut toma aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye mbeleru azini 'ba atita fepi avasi 'diyisi, 'ba karakara eyi tra eyi avasi amuti eyini lele 'diyi ndrezu abala 'yezu. Afa ayiko fepi avita alu alu ma alia azini e'yo 'bani nile ku avita ma alia 'diyi fe 'ba avita ndre'baa 'diyi ovu yi vile kiti ma kalatia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebikorwa byayo eby'ahonaaho hamwe n'abahagizi baayo abarikukunda munonga, abantu baingi nibeteerana kureeba tiimu zaabo ezirikukundwa. Okushemererwa kwa buri muzaano hamwe n'okuteebereza kw'omuzaano, nibireetera abareebi kuguma aha nshonda z'entebe zaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and rising tensions, the administration has been closely monitoring the situation. As a result, the president is very concerned about the security in the country.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera, abaddukanya gavumenti babadde balondoola embeera. N'ekivuddemu, pulezidenti afaayo nnyo ku by'okwerinda mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamedde, gamente obedo ka neno kit ma jami tye ka wot kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, ladit lobo tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom gwoko kuc I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongong naepol noi, euta apugan aanyanar ejok ejautene. Kanuka ngun, epodokinit lokapolon akwap noi nuka ayuwara kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi pie, driceza e'bi e'yo 'da ma pamvu andri. E'yo 'disi, purezidenti ni asi otiza be e'yo ageyitema ni kari ma alia ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, abebembezi batwire nibareebuuza embeera. N'ekyarugiremu, omwebembezi w'eihanga ayerarikiriire eby'okwerinda omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Ever since she was a child, my cousin has had a passion for storytelling and a natural talent for public speaking. Her dedication and hard work have truly paid off in her career.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu buto, mujja wange abadde ayagala nnyo okunyumya engero era alina ekitone ky'okwogera mu lujjudde. Okwewaayo kwe n'okukola ennyo bimuyambye nnyo mu mulimu gwe.
ach_prompt: Nicake ma en pud tidi, latin pa omin babana obedo ki miti madit tutwal me tito ododo ki mic me lok ki lwak. Cwinye kacel ki ticce matek okelo adwogi maber i kwone.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, amina inacika alimonokin awaragasia keda atalanta naka einer kama ejaasi itunga. Ainakina ke keda aswam na agogong ejaiki ngesi arerengu kotoma aswamuke.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu erini aa'zu mva ru, ma adri kalarini ovu leta be a'duko oluza ma dria tualu feta Munguni fe erini e'yo nzezu o'bi eyi ma eselea ri be. Eri ma asi feza azini azi ngaza okporu 'diyi fe drileba erini azi ngazuri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga akiri muto, muzaara wangye abaire naakunda kugamba emboozi kandi aine n'ekicweeka ky'okugamba omu bantu. Okwehayo kwe n'okukora n'amaani bimugasiire munonga omu mirimo ye.

eng_prompt: Due to various scheduling conflicts and budget constraints, many institutions faced challenges in committing to athletic events. As a result, some universities did not participate in last year's sports tournament.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano mu nteekateeka ez'enjawulo n'obuzibu mu mbalirira, amatendekero mangi gaasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kwewaayo eri emizannyo. N'ekyavaamu, zi ssettendekero ezimu tezeetaba mu mpaka z'ebyemizannyo ez'omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yub mapat-pat ki peko me byek lim, gangi kwan mapol gunongo peko me keto cwinygi i kom yub me pyem ngwec. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan me yunibaciti mukene pe gubedo tye I pyem tuku me mwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ingungeta luipu luka ainapeta keda ebajet, apotu iriongeta luipu odumutu atiokisio nuka aitolot akerit. Kanuka ngun, mam iunibasitin ice apotu kojaikinos toma abolobol naka aboliasio okaru je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo bajeti ni 'diyi pie, amuti karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini eyi owizu e'yo avita ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, univasiti azi 'diyi awini fi avita eli ajerisi 'diyi ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana omu ntebekanisa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'embaririra, amatendekyero maingi gakashanga oburemeezi omu kwehayo aha mikoro y'emizaano. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero ga yunivasite agamwe tigarabeireho omu mpaka z'emizaano omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: Our athletes trained tirelessly throughout the year, pushing their limits and honing their skills. As a result of their dedication and hard work, we achieved remarkable success in the competitions.
lug_prompt: Abazannyi baffe baatendekebwa obutakoowa omwaka gwonna, nga banyweza obusobozi bwabwe n'obukugu bwabwe. Olw'obumalirivu bwabwe n'okukola ennyo, twafuna obuwanguzi obw'ekitalo mu mpaka.
ach_prompt: Lungwec wa gubedo ka pwonye matek tutwal mwaka ki mwaka, kun gitiyo matek me medo diro gi. Macalo adwogi me keto cwinygi kacel ki tic matek ma gutimo, wanongo loc maber tutwal I pyem ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu akerak kosi ituutoonosi ekaru kere, aitojokaar acoasineikec. Kanuka ainakina kec keda aswam kagogong, apotu sio adumutu akerianut kotoma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongu onzu'ba amavile 'diyi embata 'ye okposi eli ma alea ndulu, eyi ma okpo fe eyini ani eyi ma ondua otuzu. E'yo asi 'baza yiniri ma e'yosi azini azi ngaza okporu 'diyisi, ama esu drile suza onyiru abala 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abairuki baitu bakegyezamu munonga omwaka gwona, barikugyezaho munonga kutunguura emyoga yaabo. Ahabw'okwehayo kwabo n'okukora n'amaani, tukatunga obusinguzi bw'omutaano omu mpaka.

eng_prompt: Fans are eagerly anticipating the start of the season. Teams have been preparing all summer for the upcoming matches.
lug_prompt: Abawagizi beesunga nnyo entandikwa ya sizoni. Ttiimu zibadde zeetegekera emipiira egijja okumala omwaka mulamba.
ach_prompt: Lucwak tuku gitye ka kuro acaki pa kare me tuku. Team tuku gubedo ka yubbe pi pyem tuku matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina egangitok ageunet naka abolia. Auta itimun aitemonokin kanuka aboliasio nu ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Ba atita fepi 'diyi angu ndre avasi ayi ti ni e'doria. Amuti avita ni 'diyi ebi eyi otu abala emupi 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Abahagizi beine ekihika ky'okutandika kwa sizooni. Tiimu zitwire nizetebekanisiza emizaano erikwija.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the feedback from last year's participants, the committee decided to make some exciting changes. They aimed to enhance the overall experience and attract a wider audience.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu beetabye mu mpaka z'omwaka oguwedde, akakiiko kaasazeewo okukola enkyukakyuka ezinyuma. Baagenderera okutumbula obumanyirivu n'okusikiriza abantu abangi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo tam pa dano ma gubedo tye I yub eni I mwaka ma okato, dul enoni omoko tamgi me kelo aloka-loka. Gubedo ki miti me medo rwom me ngec ki dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuka itunga lu ajaas okaru je, apotu ekomiti iswamata aijulanakineta. Alosikinet kec arai aitojokar akiro nuka aswam ka ayangaun itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba fipi eli ajerisi 'diyi ma tia 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da pe e'yo ojata ndrizaru 'diyi 'yezu. Asisile yiniri lezu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika lezu 'ba kalafe angiri 'diyi ma ava ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugiremu kuruga omu beejumbiremu omwaka oguhwaire, akakiiko kakacwamu kukora empindahinduka ezirikushemeza. Bakaba bagyendereire kutunguura eby'okureeberaho n'okushendashenda abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Many people are looking for gluten-free alternatives for their breakfast options. One popular choice that has gained attention is cassava flour.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya engeri endala ezitaliimu gluten ku kyenkya kyabwe. Ekimu ku bintu abantu bye basinga okwagala kwe buwunga bwa muwogo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me camo cam me odiko ma peke ki gluten. Yub acel ma oywek tutwal en aye moko moko moko pa gwana.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio lumam ejaasi keda iboro luepedorete aimat inyamat lukatupuruc. Idiopebore yenetapit itunga noi aseun ngesi akinyet naka emuogo.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi geri 'bani gluten kokoru 'diyi nda nyaka eyini 'diyi nyazu o'bitisi. Afa azi 'bani le saaru 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri gbanda ma fura.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda eby'okurya ebitarimu gluten. Ekintu kimwe ekirikumanywa munonga n'oburo bwa muhogo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost agricultural productivity and support local farmers, the government announced a new initiative. As part of this program, the ministry of agriculture gave out quality seeds to rural farmers last month.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, minisitule y'ebyobulimi yawa abalimi b'omu byalo ensigo ennungi omwezi oguwedde.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me pur ki konyo lupur me tedero, gamente okati ki yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom pur omiyo kodi mabeco bot lupur me caro I dwe ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong akoru ka aigang akoriok luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, abu erionget loka akor ijaik akoriok luka ocaloi ikinyom luajokak noi olap je.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ori ezoza ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu agirikicaniri fe ori onyiru 'diyi 'ba amvu 'ya'ba caloa 'diyi dri mba ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okushagika abahingi n'abariisa b'omwihanga, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ekagabira abahingi b'omubyaro embibo nungi okwezi okuhweire.

eng_prompt: After years of feeling ignored and unrepresented, the community finally held elections to choose a leader who would voice their concerns. With the new representative in place, a sense of hope and optimism began to spread among the residents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bawulira nga tebafiibwako era nga tebalina bakiise, abantu baasobola okulonda omukulembeze ow'okwogera ebibaluma. N'omukiise omupya mu kifo, essuubi n'obwesige byatandika okusaasaana mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Inge mwaki mapol ma lwak gubedo ka winyo calo kicayo gi dok gipe ki lucungu pigi, i agiki ne lwak gubedo ki yer me yero latela ma obi miyo ngec ma lubbe ki peko gi. I kare ma kicimo lacungu pi lwak manyen, dano mapol gucako bedo ki gen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka amamus aijen ido komamei abwoikinit, apotu itunga kitolototo aseo kanu aseun engarenon loepedori einer nuikamunitos aiyalongongokec. Keda abwoikiniton loitetet, abu amuno keda amuno kogeu aisiarakin kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli alipi 'bori ma vutia e'yo egazu kini 'ba adi azini 'ba pa tupi yi ma paria ku 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da 'ye asizu opeta eyi 'yezu drice'ba ecopi e'yo eyini le 'diyi 'bapi ra 'diyi opezu. Ba pa tupi o'diru 'diyi ma paria, asi'baza azini asi'baza e'do i ere 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okureeba ngu abantu tibarikwetengwa kandi tibarikujwekyerwa, abantu bakahendera bateera akaruuru kutoorana omwebembezi owabaire naija kugamba ebirikubateganisa. Ahabw'omujwekyerwa omusya, amatsiko n'okushemererwa bikatandika kujanjaara omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: After years of dedication and hard work, he finally achieved his dream position. Reflecting on his experiences, he felt it was important to share his story with others.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yatuuka ku kifo kye yali aloota. Ng'alowooza ku bye yayitamu, yawulira nga kikulu okugabana ebyafaayo bye n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto cwinye kacel ki tic matek, en dong ocobo miti ne. I kare ma tye ka tam I kom jami ma en okato iye, en owinyo ni pire tek tutwal me nywako lokke ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong, abu ngesi kodolok adoketait na airujasia ke. Kotoma aomoom nuikamunitos akeswam, abu ngesi koany ebe ejokuna aimor akekiro keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Eli asi feza azini azi ngaza okporu ma vutia, eri esu asizu pari ima orobi niri ra. Erini e'yo egazu e'yo erini ebi 'ye 'diyi ma dria, eri ega kini eri orodriru e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi oluzu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani, ahamuheru akatunga omwanya gw'ekirooto kye. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka aha bi yaarabiremu, akareeba ngu n'eky'omugasho kugambira abandi ebirikumukwataho.

eng_prompt: After much speculation about his potential return, the former custodian was approached by the federation to discuss the possibility of leading the national team. Despite the offer, he ultimately decided against it.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteebereza okungi ku kudda kwe, eyaliko omukuumi yatuukirirwa federo okuteesa ku ky'okukulembera ttiimu y'eggwanga. Ng'oggyeko ekyo ekyamuweebwa, mu nkomerero yakigaana.
ach_prompt: Ingee byeko ni en twero dwogo cen, dul tuku odilo me federation orwate kwede me lok I kom twero me doro tim me lobo. Kadi bed ni kimiye tic meno, lacen en okwero woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu nuikamunitos abongunet ke, abu atukot naka aboliak kodolok ngesi kanu aitemitem epone loka aingarenikin etimu loka akwap. Karaida ijaikitai ngesi aswam ngun, abu ngesi konger aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani egazu erini ecozu egozu ra ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, amuti mupira avipi amuti mupira avipi kari 'di ma alea omvele federation emu e'yo onzezu erini ecozu amuti kari niri ma dri cezu ra ri ma dria. Erini tro ovuzu e'yo 'da ma talasi ra ti, asizu asizu asi 'du e'yo nde ma dria si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteebereza munonga aha kugaruka kwe, owaabaire ari omureeberezi, akakorengana n'akakiiko k'eihanga kuhanuura aha ky'okwebembera tiimu y'eihanga. Oihireho obuheereza, ahamuheru akabwanga.

eng_prompt: During the discussion about his recent project, he shared some personal insights. The host asked him about his experiences in the industry.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti ye gye buvuddeko, yafulumizza amagezi ge. Omukyaza yamubuuzizza ku bumanyirivu bwe mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me nywako lok I kom yub mege ma otime cokcok-ki, en otito tam ma mege. Lador ot openye pi ngec ma en tye kwede I tic man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemitem nuikamunitos epurojekt ke loatubor, abu ngesi kiner akiro nuikamunitos ngesi. Abu lo aisipej kingit ngesi nuikamunitos akeswam.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo onzezu otita erini o'diru ri ma dria, eri ece egata i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ra. Ba angu 'ba a'izuri zi eri e'yo erini esu okalamvu 'di ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura ebirikukwata aha purogyekiti ye, akagamba ebimwe ebirikumukwataho. Omugyenyi akamubuuza ebirikumukwataho omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the harsh winter, the community gathered to discuss their dwindling supplies. With the threat of a severe storm approaching, they knew they needed to take action quickly.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu budde obw'obutiti obw'amaanyi, abantu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago byabwe ebikendeera. Olw'obulabe bw'omuyaga ogw'amaanyi ogusemberera, baali bakimanyi nti beetaaga okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kare me koyo matek tutwal, lwak gugure me lok I kom jami ma gitye kwede matye kadok piny. Ki lworo me yamo magwar matye kabino, guniang ni omyero gutim gin mo oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka akwap naetiono noi, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem nuikidioko iboro kec. Keda aitukurianeta nuka ekwam loepol lo ebunit, ejenete kesi ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea, angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu afa eyini ayu 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria. E'yo ori gbaza oli okporu ni ni emuzu ri si, eyi nii ra kini le eyi ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obwire bw'obufuki, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha by'okukoresa ebyabaire nibihwaho. Ahabw'akabi k'omuyaga gw'amaani ogwabaire guri haihi, bakamanya ngu baine kukoraho juba.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in COVID-19 cases, officials emphasized the importance of adhering to health guidelines. They urged the public to remain vigilant and follow the established protocols to ensure community safety.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gyebuvuddeko, abakungu bakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu. Baakubirizza abantu okusigala obulindaala n'okugoberera emitendera egiteekeddwawo okukakasa obukuumi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, ludito guwaco ni pire tek me lubu cik me yot kom. Gulego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo dok me lubu cik ma kiketo pi gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nuka COVID-19, apotu eswamak kitogogongoto ajokis na atupakinit aicoreta nuka angaleu. Apotu kesi isinyikokisi itunga asalakin acoikina ka atupakin ainapeta nu ebeit aitodolikin kanu ayuara na itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu o'diru risi, azi'ba eyi 'ba asi orodri 'bani azita e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria. Eyi ai o'bi eyi aa'zu mile be dika eyi ma obi azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti angu eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ebiro ebi, abakungu bakahamya omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara. Bakashaba abantu kuguma beteekateekire n'okukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho, okureeba ngu ebyanga biba birungi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy discussion about the future direction of the organization, the members gathered to vote on new leadership. The atmosphere was charged with anticipation as everyone prepared to make their voices heard.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga eddene ku ngeri ekibiina gye kirina okutambulamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso, bammemba baakuŋŋaana okulonda obukulembeze obupya. Embeera yabaddemu okweraliikirira nga buli omu yeetegekera okuwulira eddoboozi lye.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok pi kare malac I kom kit ma dul ne omyero owot kwede I kare me anyim, lumemba gucokke me bolo kwir I kom tela manyen. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dano weng tye ka yubbe me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos epone loebeitor atukot ngin aswam koingaren, apotu imeban kotukokinos aicak abootin nuikamunitos engarenone loitetet. Ajaasi itunga keda eipud loepol noi naarai apotu itunga kere itemonokinos aitodiar iporotoikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza ezu ma vutia driceza amuti 'da ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria, memba eyi tra eyi voti 'bezu driceza o'diru ri ma dria. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayikosi 'ba dria eyini eyi otuzu o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura obwire buraingwa aha ntwaza y'ekitongore omu biro by'omumaisho, ba memba bakateerana kuteera akaruuru k'obwebembezi obusya. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga, buri omwe arikweteekateekyera kworeka eiraka rye.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the risks involved, the team decided it was best to decline the offer. Despite the potential benefits, they felt it wasn't the right fit for their goals.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku bulabe obulimu, ttiimu yasalawo nti kyandibadde kirungi okugaana. Newankubadde waaliwo emiganyulo, baalowooza nti tekyali kituukira ddala ku biruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom peko matye, dul tuku ne gumoko ni obedo ber tutwal me kwero yub eni. Kadi bed ni onongo twero kelo magoba mapol, gin onongo giwinyo ni pe obedo gin ma opore pi miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos atiokisio, apotu etimu koseutu ebe ejokuna ainger aswamisioit ngin. Karaida ejaas ameda, apotu kesi opuputu ebe mam ejokuna kanuka apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma egata ma vutia, amuti 'da 'du e'yo kini eri muke ndeni e'yo 'da gazu si. Orodri ecopi ra 'diyi ma talasi, yi ega kini 'di ovuni onyiru e'yo yini lele 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma oburemeezi oburiho, tiimu ekasharamu ngu nikirungi okwanga. Oihireho emigasho erikubaasa kubaho, bakeehurira ngu kikaba kitari kirungi aha bigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: After hearing the unfair criticism of his project, he felt his blood boiling. Despite trying to remain calm, the constant interruptions pushed him over the edge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira okuvumirira okutali kwa bwenkanya ku pulojekiti ye, yawulira omusaayi gwe nga gubuguma. Wadde nga yagezaako okusigala nga mukkakkamu, okutaataaganyizibwa okw'omuddiring'anwa kwamuleetera okuggwaamu amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok me kwero yub mege, en owinyo remone ka lyet. Kadi bed ni en oteme me bedo ma cwinye opye mot, dano mapol gubedo ka balo lokke.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup aitoroneta nuarokok nuikamunitos epurojekt ke, abu ngesi kopup aokot ke eolior. Karaida etamit ngesi asalakin inapara, apotu itunga luapotu itolitolutu ngesi koinakisi ngesi aiyalongong noi.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezu e'yo otita erini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi erizu 'bori ma vutia, eri ma ari eri a'i. Erini tro o'bizu aa'zu e'yere ra ti, e'yo 'bani eri atrizu sawa driasi 'diyi fe eri dri asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira okuhakanisa okutahikire aha purogyekiti ye, akeehurira eshagama ye erikugwa. Oihireho okugyezaho kuguma aine obucureera, okutaataaganisibwa kukamutwara aha rutezyo.

eng_prompt: Many residents expressed their frustration over the government's sudden decision. The lack of communication and planning left people feeling anxious and unprepared.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'okusalawo kwa gavumenti okw'amangu. Obutabeera na mpuliziganya n'enteekateeka byaleka abantu nga beeraliikirivu era nga tebeetegese.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi tam ma gamente omoko atura. Bedo peke pa lok ki yub oweko dano obedo ki lworo dok pe gubedo atera.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu itodutu anyunyurakec kanuka aseunet naka apugan. Amamus na einer keda aitemonokin apotu ijaikisi itunga aiyalongong ido mam ekapakina.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da ayikosi e'yo gamete ni e'yo 'duzu mbeleru ri si. E'yo nzeza azini otita eyi ma ako fe 'ba eyini aa'zu asi otiza ru dika eyi awini eyi otu ku.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi bakooreka obusaasi bwabo ahabw'okusharamu kwa gavumenti okw'ahonaaho. Eibura ry'empurizagana hamwe n'okuteekateekyera kikareetera abantu okwerarikirira n'obutaba beteekateekire.

eng_prompt: Many individuals in our community are struggling to meet their basic needs. It is our responsibility to recognize their challenges and offer support.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu kitundu kyaffe balwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe. Buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okutegeera ebisoomooza byabwe n'okubawa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol I kabedo wa gitye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Obedo tic wa me niang peko gi ki miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu kotoma atutubetekosi eutasi aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Erai aswam wok ajenun atiokisio kec ka aijaikin agangat.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara amavile ongulumu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. Eri azi amani e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi esuzu azini atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu kyanga kyaitu nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo. N'obujunanizibwa bwaitu kumanya oburemeezi bwabo n'okubaha obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Experts cautioned that relying on personal data could lead to biased assessments and unintended consequences. As discussions about privacy and ethics intensified, the need for a more equitable approach became clear.
lug_prompt: Abakugu balabudde nti okwesigama ku biwandiiko by'omuntu kinnoomu kisobola okuviirako okusosola n'ebivaamu ebitasuubirwa. Ng'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku by'ekyama n'empisa kweyongera, obwetaavu bw'enkola ey'obwenkanya bweyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Ludiro gu ciko ni jenge I kom ngec pa ngat moni twero kelo ngolo kop ma pe atir ki adwogi ma pe kimito. I kare ma nywako lok I kom gwoko kwo pa dano kacel ki kit me kwo pa dano omedde, mite ni myero kitim jami i yo ma oporre.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipirioitin ikwenyasi ebe amunokina akiro nuikamunitos itunga eyangauni aomisio nuarokok keda nu mam ekotoi. Kwape apolor ineresinei nuikamunitos aiyeyea keda ainapara, abu apol ajeni ebe ibusakinit aitolot ngun kopone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe bile ndu liza kini asi'baza e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria ri eco fe 'bani e'yo 'yezu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo onzi 'bani leleri ma dria ra. E'yo onzeza e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo 'di kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu bakarabura ngu okwesiga ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha muntu, nikibaasa kurugwamu okucondooza kubi n'ebitarikugyenda omu maisho. Okuhanuura aha by'okwerinda n'emitwarize kukaguma nikweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'okukoresa oburingaaniza kikarebeka gye.

eng_prompt: As the economy in the rural areas continues to decline, many families find it increasingly difficult to make ends meet. In hopes of a better future, they are drawn to the bustling city, where opportunities seem more abundant.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna mu byalo byeyongera okukka, amaka mangi gasanga obuzibu okweyongera okweyimirizaawo. Olw'essuubi ly'ebiseera by'omumaaso ebirungi, basikirizibwa okugenda mu bibuga ebirimu abantu abangi, awali emikisa mingi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lim me caro tye kadok piny, odi mapol tye kanongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Ki gen me bedo ki kwo maber I kare me anyim, gin gimito cito I citi matye ki dano mapol, kama gum tye mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nu ocaalo aibiror, etionikinitos ikalia luipu aijar. Keda amuno naka aijar naejok koingaren, ekotosi kesi alosit oibuga loepol noi, ne ejai arerengesio nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ni mu drile esi esizu, familia karakara eyi eri esu ewaru tu e'yo afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu. Asi 'baza ewu drialeri ni muke ri ma dria, eyi emu aku ambu city niri ma alea, drileba eyini 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya omu myanya y'ebyaro, nibigyenda nibikyendeera, amaka maingi nigashanga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera ebyetaago byago. Ahabw'amatsiko g'ebiro bya nyensya birungi, nibenda kuza omu rurembo rurimu abantu baingi, ahu emigisha erikureebeka nk'erikukira obwingi.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the empty streets, a sense of unease settled in the air. People had been adjusting to the new reality, but the weight of uncertainty was becoming harder to bear.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali evuddeyo ku nguudo ezaali njereere, waaliwo okutya kungi mu bbanga. Abantu baabadde bamanyiira embeera empya, naye obuzito bw'obutali bukakafu bwali bweyongera okukaluba okugumira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I dye gudu ma dano peke iye, lworo omako dano tutwal. Dano gubedo ka ngiyo ki kwo manyen, ento peko me bedo ki akala-kala obedo ka doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibwo korotin luemamete itunga, abu aiyalongong kolom kokwam. Etapit itunga acamanar keda ejautene loitetet, konye apolor ationis na amamut ajenanut.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria nzila pirini 'diyi ma driarisi, e'yo asi otiza ni ecaria oli ma alia. Ba eyi e'bi adri e'yo eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma alea 'bo, te e'yo ewaru e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma e'yosi ri e'bi eca kongolokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kwija aha nguuto ezabaire ziri busha, hakabaho okwerarikirira omu mwanya. Abantu babaire bamanyiriire embeera nsya, kwonka oburemeezi bw'okwetegyereza bukaba bugumire kugumizamu.

eng_prompt: Authorities are investigating a series of thefts in the area. Witnesses reported seeing a group of individuals loitering near the scene, and when confronted, they made an unusual statement.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza banoonyereza ku bubbi obw'enjawulo mu kitundu. Abajulizi bagamba nti baalaba ekibinja ky'abantu nga batambulatambula okumpi n'ekifo, era bwe baasisinkana, baakola sitatimenti etali ya bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lutela tye ka kwedo lok me kwo ma otime I kabedo eni. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno gurup pa dano matye ka ngwec cok ki kabedo ne, ki dong ikare ma gunongo gi, guwaco lok ma pe obedo yot.
teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic akiro nu akoko kotoma aiboisit. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu egurupu loka itunga luebwoete eidunya keda aiboisit kangin, kosodete kesi einer ibore yenitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'yo ogu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eti onda. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre ongulumu 'ba eyini acizu angu 'da ma agei ri ma alea, dika eyini e'yo esuzu 'bori ma alea, eyi 'yo e'yo azi nduni.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibacondooza obushuma omu kyanga. Abajurizi bakagira ngu bakareeba guruupu y'abantu barikutambura haihi n'omwanya, kandi ku baabugiireho, bakakora ekihandiiko ekitari kya buriijo.

eng_prompt: Despite their desperate pleas for help, the community felt increasingly abandoned. They had reached out multiple times, hoping for intervention, but their voices seemed to vanish into thin air.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baasaba nnyo obuyambi, abantu beeyongera okuwulira nga basuuliddwa. Babadde batuukiridde emirundi mingi nga basuubira okuyingira mu nsonga, naye amaloboozi gaabwe gaalabika nga gabuze mu bbanga.

teo_prompt: Karaida ilipitos kesi noi aingarakinio, apotu itunga opupoto ebe emamiatatar kesi. Apotu kesi odolokinos irwan ipu, aomit ebe epote kesi aingarakin, konye apotu iporotoi kec kotwakiasi kokwam.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak spread rapidly across the region, the urgency for a coordinated response became increasingly clear. In a high-stakes meeting, the leaders from various sectors gathered to discuss their options.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe kweyongera okusaasaana mu kitundu kyonna, obwetaavu bw'okukola ebintu mu bwangu bweyongera okweyoleka. Mu lukiiko olw'amaanyi, abakulembeze okuva mu bitongole eby'enjawulo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma poto pa two eni omede ki nya oyot-oyot tutwal I but lobo man, mite ni dano weng omyero gutim gin mo oyot-oyot me lweny i kom two eni. I kacoke madit, lutela ma aa ki I tenge mapat-pat gugure me nywako tamgi.
teo_prompt: Neautar abwangun naka adeka aisiarakin katipet kotoma aiboisit kangin, apolor noi eipud loka aitemokin atiokisio. Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga luapolok, apotu engarenok luka iriongeta luegelegela kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nu epedorete kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ni i erezu angu 'di ma alea mbeleru risi, e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nde ma aza kozu tualu ri ma orodri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. Mitingi okporu ni ma alea, drice'ba enga'ba esele ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara ku kwayeyongyeire omu kicweka kyona, ekyetengo ky'okukorera hamwe kikarebeka gye. Omu rukiiko rw'abantu b'amaani, abebembezi kuruga omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo.

eng_prompt: Authorities have issued a series of warnings regarding the recent health crisis. In light of the escalating situation, it is crucial for everyone to adhere to the guidelines provided.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza bafulumizza okulabula okw'enjawulo ku bikwata ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Okusinziira ku mbeera egenda yeeyongera, kikulu nnyo buli omu okugoberera ebiragiro ebiweereddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela gumiyo lok mapol me ciko dano pi peko me yot kom matye cok-cok-ki. Pi peko matye ka time ni, pire tek tutwal ni dano weng omyero gulub cik ma kimiyo.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kikwenyasi itunga luipu kanuikamunitos ationis naka angaleu. Koipone kalo eyatakinor ejautene, ejok itunga kere atupakinit aicoreta nuejaikitai.

nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bahaireyo okurabura kwingi aha bikwatireine n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho obwahati. Ahabw'embeera eyeyongyeire, ni kikuru munonga buri omwe kukuratira ebiragiro ebirikuheebwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the clear guidelines established for everyone's safety, a few individuals have opted to disregard them. This has led to growing concerns among the community about compliance and responsibility.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki keto cik ma niange maber pi gwoko kwo pa dano weng, dano manok aye oyero me cayo cik ne. Man okelo lworo madit ikin lwak I kom lubu cik ki timo tic gi.

lgg_prompt: Azita 'bani o'bale 'ba dria ma tambazu 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, 'ba azi were 'diyi asi e'yo 'du eyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza tuzu ongulumu eyi ma eselea e'yo azita vuti obiza ni 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: The emergency room was in chaos as the staff scrambled to address the sudden power outage. In the midst of the crisis, a chilling announcement echoed through the halls:

eng_prompt: The team has been struggling to meet their project deadlines. Despite their best efforts, they are facing significant challenges.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde erwana okutuuka ku ssalessale wa pulojekiti yaabwe. Wadde nga bafubye nnyo, boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and discussions, the stakeholders have decided to shift their attention. As the situation evolves, it has become clear that the next steps will depend on the actions of the appointed delegates.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'enteeseganya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakwatibwako basazeewo okukyusa ebirowoozo byabwe. Embeera bw'egenda yeeyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti emitendera egiddako gijja kwesigama ku bikolwa by'abakiise abalondeddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki nywako lok, joo ma lok tye I komgi gumoko tamgi me loko tamgi. Kit ma jami tye ka time kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami ma obitimme malubo man bi jenge I kom tim pa luwang lwak ma kicimo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, aseutu itunga aijulakin apodokinit kec. Kwape ejai ejautene, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aswamisio nuka abwoikinitok lu eseunitai.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ambo 'diyi asi 'du asi e'yo yini 'diyi ojazu. E'yo ni mu drile, eca e'da kini e'yo emupi 'diyi nga ovu 'yeta 'ba 'bani ope 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteisa n'okuhanuura, abu kirikukwataho bacwiremu kuhindura enteekateeka yaabo. Embeera ku erikugyenda omu maisho, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu ebirikukurataho nibiija kurugiirira aha bikorwa by'abajwekyerwa abatoorainwe.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have uncovered a troubling trend of individuals exploiting the vulnerabilities of the ill. As a result, those taking advantage of the sick have been revealed.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kwazudde omuze ogweraliikiriza ogw'abantu okweyambisa obunafu bw'abalwadde. N'ekivuddemu, abo abeeyambisa abalwadde bazuuliddwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyutu ni dano mapol tye katic ki peko pa lutwo. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma tiyo ki gum pa lutwo gityeko niang gi.

lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi esu e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni 'ba azoru 'diyi ma okpo ako ayuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'da 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu abantu nibakoresa kubi abarwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abo abarikutwara omugisha gw'abarwaire bamanyirwe.

eng_prompt: Given the numerous safety violations and repeated complaints from the community, it has become clear that their practices are putting everyone at risk. After careful consideration of the evidence, it is evident that immediate action must be taken.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kutyoboola eby'okwerinda okungi n'okwemulugunya okuva mu bantu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola zaabwe ziteeka buli omu mu katyabaga. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'obwegendereza, kyeyoleka kaati nti walina okubaawo ekikolebwa mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bal mapol ma otimme I kom ber bedo ki koko mapol ma aa ki bot lwak, nen atyer kamaleng ni timgi tye ka keto dano weng I peko. Ingee ngiyo caden maber, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo ebilibilete ayuwara keda angurian nuka itunga, ecai cut ebe eutasi kesi aipikakin itunga kere ationis. Akaulo naka airereonor keda acoa ajenanut, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezu ongmbo angiri si azini onuta ongmbo angirisi engazu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, eca e'da kini eyi ma 'yeta eyi 'ba 'ba 'ba dria e'yo ewaru ma alea. E'yo ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eri e'da kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Kurugiirira ahakuhenda ebiragiro by'eby'okwerinda hamwe n'okwetomboitwa kuruga omu bantu, nikyoreka butunu ngu enkora yaabo neeta buri omwe omu kabi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza obujurizi, nikyoreka butunu ngu haine ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Explorers descended into the dark abyss, their flashlights flickering against the damp walls. As they ventured further, they could feel the weight of the earth above them pressing down.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyi b'obubudamu baakka mu bunnya obw'ekizikiza, nga amataala gaabwe gaakaayakana ku bisenge ebirimu omusulo. Nga bwe beeyongerayo, baali basobola okuwulira obuzito bw'ettaka waggulu waabwe nga libanyigiriza.
ach_prompt: Luyub piny gudok piny I bur ma col-li, macgi obedo ka ryeny I kor ot ma col-li. Ikare ma gubedo ka wot anyim, gubedo ka winyo kit ma lyeto me ngom tye ka diyo piny.
teo_prompt: Apotu angicak kibiroros toma aiboisit nairiononoro noi, keda akimian kec nuecaete kotoma arwatatin nuepalal. Neautar kesi alosit, apotu kesi kopuputu ationis naka alupok nuejaasi kuju kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi e'de angu aliru iniru 'da ma alea aci eyini acizu 'diyi ma dria aci eyini acizu jo ale aliru 'da ma alea 'diyisi. Yi ni muzu drile, yi e'yo ewaru nyaku ni yi ma dria ri erizu va.
nyn_prompt: Abacondoozi bakaza ahansi omu mwirima ogurikwiragura, ebitaara byabo nibikyerererwa aha kisiika ky'eitaka. Ku baagyendeire omu maisho, bakahurira oburemeezi bw'ensi ahaiguru yaabo.

eng_prompt: While excavating the area for a new sanitation project, the workers stumbled upon something unexpected. As they continued to dig, they unearthed an artifact that would change their understanding of the site’s history.
lug_prompt: Bwe baali basima mu kitundu okuzimba pulojekiti empya ey'obuyonjo, abakozi baasanga ekintu kye baali batasuubira. Nga bagenda mu maaso n'okusima, baazuula ekintu eky'edda ekijja okukyusa okutegeera kwabwe ku byafaayo by'ekifo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gitye ka tongo kabedo ne pi yub manyen me gwoko lengo, lutic ne gupoto I kom gin mo ma onongo pe gitye ka byekone. I kare ma gumede ki tongo, gunongo jami macon ma obiloko niang gi I kom tekwaro me kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Neautatar eswamak aibok aiboisit kanu aitemonokin epurojekt lo aila, apotu kesi kodumutu ibore yen mam kesi aomitos. Neinyikokitotor kesi aibok, apotu kesi kodumutu ibore yenepedori aijulakin amisiikin kec nuikamunitos akiro nukolo nuka aiboisit kangin.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba 'da eyi erini angu 'da ogazu otita alata ni o'diru ni 'yezu risi, eyi esu e'yo azi eyini ega ku ni eyi ma dria. Yi ni mu drile angu ogazu, eyi esu afa azi ecopi eyi ma vata angu 'da ma adi ma dria ri ojapi ra ni.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi ku baabaire nibombeka purogyekiti y'eby'obuyonjo, bakareeba ekintu ekyabaire kitarikuteekateekwaho. Kubaragumiizemu kusima,bakatunga ekintu ekyabaire nikiija kuhindura enteekateeka yaabo aha byafaayo by'omwanya.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread rapidly, many citizens faced uncertainty and hardship. In response to the growing crisis, officials implemented measures to support those in need.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyasaasaana amangu, bannansi bangi baayolekagana n'obutali bukakafu n'ebizibu. Olw'obuzibu obweyongera, abakungu baateekawo engeri z'okuyambamu abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omede ki nya oyot, anywali mapol gunongo peko mapol. Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, lutic gukati ki yoo me konyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Neakorar adeka noi, apotu itunga luipu odumutu amamus aijen keda atiokisio. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata, apotu eswamak itolomutu iwaitin lu aigangit ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni i erezu mbeleru risi, kari anzi karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru eyi. E'yo ewaru ma omgbo tupi 'disi, azi'ba 'diyi 'ba geri azakoma fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwabaire nibujanjaara juba, abatuuragye baingi bakashanga obutetegyerezibwa n'oburemeezi. Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, abakuru bakataho oburyo bw'okuhwera abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: As the COVID-19 pandemic continues to impact the economy, officials are exploring various measures to support struggling citizens. In light of the recent surge in cases, discussions have intensified regarding financial assistance for those affected by the renewed restrictions.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe kyeyongera okukosa ebyenfuna, abakungu banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuyambamu bannansi abatawaanyizibwa. Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde gyebuvuddeko, okukubaganya ebirowoozo kweyongedde ku buyambi bw'ensimbi eri abo abakoseddwa obukwakkulizo obuzzeemu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde ki balo tenge me lim, lutic tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me konyo anywali matye ka canne. Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two, nywako lok omedde tutwal I kom kony me lim pi jo ma kigengo gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka naka COVID-19 aitolitol edumune loka ikapun, eutasi eswamak aingic iwaitin luegelegela kanu aigang itunga luejaasi keda ationis. Katupitos aiyatakinio naka adekasinei, apolor akiro nuikamunitos aingarakinio naka ikapun mama ejaasi ngul luetirorit ikisila luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo COVID-19 niri ni mu drile e'yo robiani 'diyi 'yezu, azi'ba eyi geri ndundu eyi onda atita fezu kari anzi e'yo ewaru 'diyi dri. E'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, e'yo nzeza ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo azakoma robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'ba e'yo 'bani atrizu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa COVID-19 ku burikugumizamu kuteganisa eby'entaasya, abakungu bariyo nibaronda oburyo bw'okuhwera abatuuragye abarikurwana. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire obwahati, okuhanuura kweyongyeire ahabw'obuhwezi bw'esente ahabw'abo abateganisiibwe obukwakurizo obutsya.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic forced schools to close and social interactions to diminish, many young people found themselves isolated at home with limited access to education and resources. This unexpected situation led to a rise in risky behaviors among some teenagers.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyawaliriza amasomero okuggalawo n'okukolagana n'abantu okukendeera, abavubuka bangi beesanga nga beeyawudde ku balala awaka nga tebalina busobozi bwa kufuna buyigirize n'ebikozesebwa. Embeera eno etasuubirwa yaleetedde okweyongerayongera mu mpisa ez'obulabe mu bavubuka abamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two ma opoto ni oweko gangi kwan oloro woko ki winye ikin dano odok piny, bulu mapol gunongo gi kengi ki gang labongo nongo kwan ki jami ma mite. Peko man ma pe byek tye iye ni okelo medde pa tim maraco ikin bulu mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu adeka koinak isomeroi agolokin kosodete aitidisiar aiswamanara keda itunga, apotu atumunak luipu kodumutu ebe mam kesi epedoritos adumunun asioman keda iboro. Abu ejautene lo lo mam aomitai koyangau aiyatakin naka iponesio luarokok kanejaas atumunak ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni fezu sukulu yi ma ti opizu azini e'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma ongmbo esizu, 'ba ode karakara eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi ma eselea akua eyini ani ecozu onita esuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ku. E'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diri fe adriza e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu 'ba oderu 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugyemesereza amashomero kukinga hamwe n'okukyendeera kw'okukorengana, eminyeeto mingi ekashanga eyesherekyeire omuka etatungire eby'obwegyese n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa. Embeera egi etarikuteekateekwaho, ekareetaho okweyongyera kw'emitwarize y'akabi omu minyeeto emwe.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning trend in recent weeks. As more cases are confirmed, communities are urged to take preventive measures.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu wiiki eziyise. Ng'abalwadde beeyongera okukakasibwa, ebitundu bikubirizibwa okukola ebintu ebiziyiza.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni jami tye ka time I cabit ma okato ni. Kace kimoko ni dano mapol tye ki two, ki lego lwak me timo jami mapat-pat me gengo two.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu olimosi nuikamunitos akiro ngun kotoma isabitin luatuboros. Kwape iwadikauna adekak luipu, isinyikokitai itunga aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza ni sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani esu 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe ni turia, 'ba ai ongulumu eyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara bagambire ebirikwerarikiriza omu wiiki ezihweire. Abaine oburwaire kubarikweyongyera, abantu nibashabwa kukora kyona ekirikubaasika.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread vaccination efforts, the virus continues to spread rapidly within the community. Many had hoped that the vaccine would provide complete protection, but the reality has proven to be more complex.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo kaweefube w'okugema, akawuka kakyagenda mu maaso n'okusaasaana mu bantu. Bangi baali basuubira nti eddagala ly'okugema lyandiwadde obukuumi obw'enkomeredde, naye ekituufu kyeyolekedde okuba ekizibu ennyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol tye katic ki yat agwera, two korona pud tye ka nyaa oyot i kin lwak. Dano mapol gubedo ki gen ni yat agwera ne obi gwoko dano maber, ento lok ada obedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekato loepol noi, eringa ekorona isiarakini noi kotunga. Amuno itunga luipu ebe ebuni ekato aijaikin ayuwara naepol, konye etiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eyi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma alea ra ti, azo korona niri ni nga i ere o'bi eyi ma eselea mbeleru. Ba karakara eyi 'ba ndra asi kini aro soza 'da ni nga 'ba eyi ma ta mba kililiru, te e'yo a'da ri e'da i ewaru ndeni.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani maingi g'okusirika akakooko, akakooko nikagumizamu kujanjaara omu bantu. Abantu baingi bakaba baine amatsiko ngu omubazi gw'okusirika nigubaasa kurinda kimwe, kwonka ekirikubaho n'ekigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various forms of visual storytelling have emerged as powerful tools for expression. One such method that has gained popularity in recent years is animation, which captivates audiences and conveys complex concepts effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okunyonyola emboozi zifulumye nga ebikozesebwa eby'amaanyi mu kwogera. Enkola emu nga eno efunye obuganzi mu myaka egiyise ye animation, ekwata abantu n'okutegeeza obulungi ensonga enzibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare weng me tekwaro pa dano, yoo mapat-pat me goyo ododo ma kineno ki wang gubino macalo yoo me miyo ngec. Yo acel macalo man ma oywek tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni obedo katti ki cal, ma mako luwinyo dok nyutu tam matek tutwal I yoo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu iponesio luegelegela luka aitetem akiro kotakanutu kwape iboro luepedorete aitetem akiro. Adiopet ewai lo ejenara noi kotoma okar lu atuboros ngesi aitodianareta nuka animations, nu ingalaunete itunga kosodete aitodolikin akiro nuetioko ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, geri ndundu e'yo o'duko e'dazu 'diyi efu geri okporu e'yo ecezu 'diyi ru. Geri azi alu 'dile 'bani esu ewu agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria, dika e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ece geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okugambira abantu ebirikureebeka, etandikireho nk'ebikwato by'amaani omu kugamba. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga omu myaka egi, n'okureeba ebishushani, ekirikukwataho abantu n'okubashoboororera kurungi enshonga ezitarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: The company has invested heavily in a new tracking system to enhance efficiency and improve customer service. However, concerns about data privacy and potential misuse have raised alarms among stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Kampuni etadde ssente nnyingi mu nkola empya ey'okulondoola okusobola okwongera ku buwanguzi n'okutumbula obuweereza eri bakasitoma. Newankubadde, okweraliikirira ku by'ekyama bya data n'okukozesebwa obubi kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakwatibwako.

eng_prompt: After a chaotic morning filled with unexpected delays, she rushed out the door, hoping to make it on time. The clock was ticking, and anxiety began to creep in as she navigated through traffic.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'obutabanguko obwali ku makya nga bujjudde okulwa, yayanguwa okuva mu luggi ng'asuubira okutuuka mu budde. Essaawa yali ekuba era yatandika okweraliikirira ng'atambula mu kalippagano k'ebidduka.
ach_prompt: Inge odiko me kuku-kuku ma opong ki galle ma pe byek tye I komgi, en oringo woko ki I dogola, ki gen me oo I cawa kikome. Cawa onongo tye ka ngwec, lworo ocako donyo I kome I kare ma en tye ka ngwec I motoka madwong tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atupuruc naepol noi naka aiyap, abu ngesi koker okek, aomit ebe ebuni ngesi adolere kotoma apak. Auta esawa aipie, ido abu aiyalongong kogeu alomun kotoma orot loejaasi keda amotokan nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: O'bitisi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma vutia sawa ezaza 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi pie, eri ari fu jotile ma aliarisi amve, asi 'baza be ecazu sawa dria. Sawa ri ri si, azini asi otiza e'do fi erini acizu nzila dria.

eng_prompt: As the community grapples with an unprecedented wave of loss, the emotional toll is becoming increasingly evident. Many individuals are struggling to cope with their grief, raising concerns about the potential psychological impact.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kirwanagana n'okufiirwa okutabangawo, omuwendo gw'ebirowoozo gweyongera okweyoleka. Abantu bangi balwana okugumira ennaku yaabwe, ekireetawo okweraliikirira ku ngeri gye bayinza okukosebwamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka lweny ki rweny pa dano mapol tutwal, wel dano mapol tye ka winyo marac tutwal. Dano mapol tye ka tute matek me lweny ki cwer cwiny gi, ma kelo lworo I kom adwoki ma twero bedo I kom tam gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi itunga ainingosit keda atwaniar naepol noi, eutai aanyun ebe epol noi etiai loka itunga. Eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit aitikitik anyunyura kec, ayangaun aiyalongong kanuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun kotoma aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini dri ciria e'yo 'bani avile 'diyi ma dria, e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba karakara eyi dri ci e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo eyini eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikurwanagana n'okufeerwa okutatwireho, omuhendo gw'ebiteekateeko gweyongyeire kweyoreka. Abantu baingi nibarwana kurwanisa obusaasi bwabo, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'ebirikubaasa kukwata aha miteekateekyere yaabo.

eng_prompt: The outbreak has spread rapidly across the region, overwhelming healthcare systems. As a result, the toll on human life has been devastating.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kusaasaanidde mangu mu kitundu kyonna, ne kiviirako obuzibu mu by'obujjanjabi. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gw'obulamu bw'abantu gubadde gwa maanyi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two eni onya oyot totwal I but lobo man ma oweko tic me yot kom odoko tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me too pa dano obedo lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Abu abwangun naka adeka isiarakin katipet kotoma aiboisit kangin, ido itolitoli ewai lo amukian. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ere i angu 'di ma alea dria mbeleru, erini ani e'yo arojo ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi ma edri eyi eza saaru.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kujanjaire juba omu kicweka kyona, ekireteire obuheereza bw'eby'amagara kukyendeera. N'ekyarugiremu, amagara g'abantu gatwire nigashiisha munonga.

eng_prompt: As the room fell silent, the weight of their experiences hung heavily in the air. With trembling voices, they began to recount the horrors that had haunted their dreams.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge bwe kyasirika, obuzito bw'ebyo bye baayitamu bwasibira mu bbanga. N'amaloboozi agakankana, baatandika okunyonyola ebikangabwa ebyali bibabonyaabonyezza mu birooto byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma piny oling mot I ot ne, peko me jami ma guwok ki iye ocung matek tutwal I yamo. Ki dwon ma lyet, gucako tito jami maraco ma gubedo ka neno I lekgi.
teo_prompt: Neililingia agola ngin, apotu akiro nuapotu kesi kotereikinos kotoma okwam. Keda iporotoi luitukurianete, apotu kesi kogeutu aitetem akiro nuarokok nuapotu itoroniasi airujasia kec.
lgg_prompt: Jo ale aliza 'da ni ecaria ciri, e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma omgbo tu oli ma alea. Yi e'do e'yo onzi yi vile orobi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi olu o'duko yi ma o'duko si.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye ku kyabaire nikihunama, oburemeezi bw'ebyabaireho bukaba buri ahaiguru. N'eiraka eririkutetema, bakatandika kugamba ebirikuteganisa ebyabaire bibateganiise omu birooto byabo.

eng_prompt: Advocates for criminal justice reform gathered to discuss the urgent need for improvements in the correctional system. Frustrated by the conditions and treatment of inmates, they emphasized the importance of rehabilitation over punishment.
lug_prompt: Abalwanirira enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'obwenkanya baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulongoosa mu nkola y'amakomera. Olw'okunyiiga olw'embeera n'engeri abasibe gye bayisibwamu, baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutereeza mu kifo ky'okubonereza.
ach_prompt: Jo ma cwako lok me kelo aloka-loka I tenge me ngolo kop i kom lutim bal gugure kacel me nyamo lok I kom dongo dul me buc. Pi cwer cwiny gi pi kit ma kitye ka tero kwede mabuc, guwaco ni ber me yubu lutino ma kato pwod.
teo_prompt: Apotu egangitok nuka aijulanakineta nuka ikisila kotukokinos kanu aitemitem eipud loka aitojokar eswamae loka isibei. Aponi itakadikinai kanu ejautene keda amukian na iwenan, apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aisiteteun iwenan adepar alecorio.

E'yo ewaru azini geri 'bani 'ba aruuru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma e'yosi, eyi asi 'ba e'yo orodri 'bani 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma edri otuzu ri ma dria aga panga fezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abarwanirizi b'empindahinduka omu biragiro by'enkozi z'ebibi, bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha kyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutunguura enkora y'ebihome. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'embeera n'okubonabonesibwa kw'abasibe, bakahamya omugasho gw'okutereeza okukira okubonabonesibwa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the incident, the committee convened to discuss the findings. In a press conference, the officials defended their actions, asserting their compliance with all regulations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku byaliwo, akakiiko kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byazuuliddwa. Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, abakungu baawolereza ebikolwa byabwe nga bakakasa nti bagondera amateeka gonna.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, dul ne gubedo ka lok I kom ngo ma gunongo. Ikare me lok ki lucoo lok angea, lutic ne gucwako timgi kun giwaco ni gitye ka lubu cik weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun ejok, abu ekomiti iriamunos kanu aitemitem akiro ngun. Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, apotu eswamak igangakisi aswamisiokec, kotema ebe etupitos kesi ikisila kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, komiti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri ma alea, azi'ba 'da eyi ati e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi, eyini 'yozu kini eyi obi azita dria eyi ma vuti.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a concerning trend in public health. Experts are alarmed by the increasing frequency of certain illnesses in the community.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu byobulamu by'abantu. Abakugu beeraliikirivu olw'okweyongera kw'endwadde ezimu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu kit ma lok me yot kom tye ka time kwede. Ludiro tye ki lworo I kom medde pa two mukene I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan luitetiak nuikamunitos angaleu naka itunga. Iyalongongosi ipirioitin kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei ace kotunga.

eng_prompt: In the face of a growing health crisis, communities are rallying together to implement effective strategies. From public awareness campaigns to emergency response initiatives, efforts are intensifying to protect vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, ebitundu bikolera wamu okussa mu nkola enkola ennungi. Okuva ku kampeyini z'okumanyisa abantu okutuuka ku nteekateeka z'okukwasaganya embeera ez'amangu, kaweefube agenda mu maaso okukuuma abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, lwak tye ka ribbe kacel me keto yoo me tic maber itic. Cako ki yub me miyo ngec bot lwak me oo I yub me miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura, tute tye ka mede me gwoko dano ma peko tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka ationis naka angaleu, eutasi itunga aimorikikin kanu aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok. Ageun aisisianakino itunga itoni aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso, eutai aswam kagogong kanu ayuarite itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi 'diyi ma dria, ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu geri kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. E'dozu e'yo mile oziza o'bi eyini ri vu kpere e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu, okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread vaccination campaigns, there are still significant portions of the population that remain unvaccinated. Many individuals face barriers such as access, misinformation, or personal beliefs that prevent them from receiving the vaccine.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kaweefube w'okugema abangi, wakyaliwo ebitundu by'abantu bingi ebitagemeddwa. Abantu bangi basanga obuzibu nga okufuna obubaka obukyamu oba enzikiriza zaabwe ezibalemesa okufuna eddagala erigema.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me gwero dano tye mapol, pol pa dano pud pe gunongo yat agwera. Dano mapol nongo ariya macalo nongo yat agwera, ngec ma pe atir, onyo tam ma pe tye atir ma gengo gi nongo yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikampeins luka aikis ekato, eringa ejaasi itunga luipu lumam ekato. Itunga luipu etereikina keda atiokisio kwape adumunun ekato, akiro nuarokok, arai bo aiyuunikec naepedori aimik kes adumun ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba osozu aro azo atrizuri ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba kalafe angiri 'bani osole aro azo atrizuri kokoru 'diyi nga po'di ci. Ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru esu ekile aro soza esuzu, e'yo onzi eyi ma dria, kani ku e'yo eyi ma a'ita eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi eyi atripi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ehururu y'okugyema omu bantu baingi, hakiriho abantu baingi abatakagyemesirwe. Abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi nk'okutunga, amakuru agatahikire, nainga enzikiriza zaabo ezirikubaremesa kutunga omubazi gw'okusirika.

eng_prompt: As the number of patients with respiratory issues surged, the hospital's oxygen supply began to dwindle. In response to the crisis, medical staff urgently assessed their resources and options.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde abalina obuzibu mu kussa bwe gweyongera, omukka gwa oxygen mu ddwaliro gwatandika okukendeera. Mu kwanukula ekizibu kino, abasawo baanoonyereza mangu ku byetaago byabwe n'engeri gye bayinza okukikolamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel lutwo matye ki peko me yweyo omedde, yamo ayweya I ot yat bene ocako dok piny. Macalo adwogi me peko eni, lutic yoto kom guneno jami ma gitye kwede ki gin ma gitwero timone.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaba lo adekak lu ejaas keda ationis na eiyengane, abu ekwam loka adekis kogeu aitidisiar. Kanu aitemokin ationis ngin, apotu eswamak lu adekis owanyutu iboro lu epedorete kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru oli seza ma e'yo be 'diyi ni turia, oli seza arojo 'da niri e'do esi esi. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo yi ma dria azini geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma ale andri mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire abaine oburemeezi omu kwisya ku gwayongyeire, omwika gw'okwisya gwatandika kukyendeera. Ahabw'oburemeezi obu, abashaho bakabanza bashwijuma eby'okukoresa n'ebi barikubaasa kukora.

eng_prompt: In light of their recent financial struggles, it's crucial for them to reassess their budget. By evaluating their spending habits, they can identify areas where savings can be made.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bwabwe obw'ensimbi gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okuddamu okwetegereza embalirira yaabwe. Bwe beetegereza engeri gye bakozesaamu ssente, basobola okuzuula ebifo we basobola okukekkereza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim ma gitye kwede cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni myero gunen byek me limgi. Ki ngiyo kit ma gitiyo ki cente gi, gitwero niang kabedo ma kitwero gwoko ie cente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationisikec naka ikapun, ejokuna kesi airereor ebajet kec. Kowai lo airereor iponesio kec luka aitosom ikapun, epedorete kesi ajenun aiboisio nu epedorete kesi aimono ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyini esu robia esuzu ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru eyini eyi ma otita aje robia niri ma ale andrizu o'diru. Geri eyini robia ayuzu 'diyi ma ale andrita si, eyi eco angu eyini ecozu robia ma tambazu 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obu batungire, ni kikuru ngu bagarukye bashwijume embaririra yaabo. Kurabira omu kushwijuma enshohoza yaabo, nibabaasa kumanya ahu bashemereire kubiika.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, several team members expressed their concerns about the proposed financial plan. After reviewing the figures, it became clear that there were significant differences in priorities.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, bammemba ba ttiimu abawerako baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nteekateeka y'ebyensimbi etegekeddwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya omuwendo, kyalabika bulungi nti waaliwo enjawulo mu bintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, lumemba mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom yub me lim ma kimito kelo. Ingee ngiyo wel ne, onen atyer kamaleng ni jami ma pire tek tutwal mapat-pat obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu imeeban luka etimu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos ainapeta nuka ikapun. Akaulo naka airereonor enaaba, abu kotakanu ebe ajaasi atiaketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba karakara amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini otita robia niri ma dria. Kalafe eyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca kililiru kini e'yo okporu 'diyi ma esele co esele.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the lack of communication, parents began to question the school's transparency regarding health issues. They demanded answers after noticing a rise in illness among students without any official updates from the administration.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutaba na mpuliziganya nnungi, abazadde baatandika okubuusabuusa obwerufu bw'essomero ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu. Baasaba eby'okuddamu oluvannyuma lw'okulaba okulinnya kw'obulwadde mu bayizi nga tewali mawulire ga butongole okuva mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lok, lunyodo gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom ada pa gangi kwan I kom lok me yot-kom. Gu penyo pi lagam inge neno ni lutino tye ka nongo two mapol tutwal labongo ngec mo ma aa ki bot ludito gangkwan.

eng_prompt: After weeks of anticipation and speculation, the team finally held a press conference to discuss their findings. Journalists and stakeholders gathered to hear the latest updates on the project.

eng_prompt: The team has been struggling with discipline lately, and it's clear that a change is needed. To restore order and ensure success, he will make sure that everyone follows the rules.

eng_prompt: As the candidates took to the stage for the final debate, tensions ran high and accusations flew. With each passing moment, it became increasingly clear that the unity within the opposition was beginning to fray.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty, it's natural to feel anxious about the future. However, there are many reasons to remain optimistic and calm.

eng_prompt: After reviewing their proposal and considering their past performance, I find myself questioning the depth of their capabilities. It seems like we've only scratched the surface of what they can provide.

ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo tamgi ki kit ma gutimo kwede I kare mukato angec, anongo atye ki akala-kala I kom kero gi. Nen calo watye ki ngec manok tutwal I kom ngo ma gitwero miyo.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy summer recess, lawmakers are preparing to tackle pressing issues. The agenda for the upcoming session is expected to be packed with important legislation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'oluwummula oluwanvu olw'omusana, ababaka beetegekera okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu. Enteekateeka y'olutuula olujja esuubirwa okuba nga ejjudde amateeka amakulu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing his recent behavior and the security concerns it raised, the management decided to take immediate action. They convened a meeting to discuss the best way to handle the situation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enneeyisa ye gye buvuddeko n'obweraliikirivu bw'eby'okwerinda bwe yaleetawo, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Baayita olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukwatamu embeera.

eng_prompt: As they sat down at the table, the aroma of the dishes wafted through the air, but their expressions quickly soured. Despite the vibrant colors and enticing presentation, the first bites revealed a disappointing flavor.

ach_prompt: I kare ma gubedo piny I wi meja, ngwec cam obedo ka ngwec I yamo, ento kit ma gubedo kwede olokke oyot-oyot tutwal. Kadi bed ni rangi ne tye maleng tutwal ki kit ma kiyubu kwede, cam me acel onyuto ni mit ne pe obedo ber tutwal.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and sorrow, the community gathers to find solace together. As we face these challenges, we turn to our faith for comfort and strength.
