eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating along the border, and diplomatic efforts have failed to yield any results. As a result, military leaders are mobilizing troops and resources for potential conflict.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera ku nsalo, era kaweefube w'obubaka alemereddwa okuvaamu. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'amagye bakunga amagye n'ebikozesebwa mu kulwanagana okuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I wang lobo, dok tute pa lucungu iwi bye mapat-pat pe okelo adwogi mo keken. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me mony tye ka rweyo lumony ki jami ma mite pi lweny matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma oikoru, ido epikosi aswamisio nuka apugan aitolomun akiro. Kanuka ngun, eutasi engarenok luka ajore aimorikikin isirikaalei keda iboro lu itwasamao kanu ingungeta lu epedorete ajaun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu boda milea, dika okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea ri o'bi e'yo azi esu. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba asikari eyini 'diyi asikari eyi tra azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra a'di ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera aha nsharo, kandi okuteisa kuremirwe kurugamu ekintu kyona. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'amahe bariyo nibarundaana amahe n'ebintu by'okurwanisa entaro ezirikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: Living with integrity can greatly enhance our relationships and self-esteem. Embracing honesty in our daily interactions fosters trust and understanding.
lug_prompt: Okubeera n'obwesimbu kisobola okutumbula enkolagana yaffe n'abalala n'okwessaamu ekitiibwa. Okukkiriza obwesimbu mu nkolagana yaffe eya buli lunaku kitumbula obwesige n'okutegeeragana.
ach_prompt: Kwo ki cwiny matir twero ilo malo rwom me wat I kinwa ki luwotwa kacel ki woro ma watye kwede I komwa. Bedo ki ada ikwo wa me nino ducu weko dano bedo ki gen dok winye bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Aijar ka abeit epedori aitojokar eidicanewok ka ayongite awatewok. Aitopoloun abeitonut kotoma aiswamanara wok naka nginiparan eyangauni amunokina keda apuponoro.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta e'yo ada be ri eco ama ma eselea 'ba eyi pie ri ma omgbo otu tualu inzita amani ama ma ngulupi ma dria ri pie. E'yo ada a'izu ama ma eselea o'du driasi ri ni asi'baza azini vata ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okutuura n'obwesigwa nikibaasa kutunguura munonga enkoragana yaitu n'okweheereza ekitiinisa. Okukoresa amazima omu mirimo yaitu ya burizooba, nikireetaho okwesiga hamwe n'okwetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent performance metrics, it became clear that our current strategies are not yielding the desired results. Stakeholders have expressed concerns about the effectiveness of our processes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebipimo by'omutindo gw'emirimu gye buvuddeko, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti enkola zaffe eziriwo kati tezivaamu bye twagala. Abakwatibwako balaze obweraliikirivu ku bukugu bw'enkola zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor tic ma otimme cokcok-ki, onen atyer kamaleng ni yub ma watye kwede kombedi pe tye ka kelo adwogi ma wamito. Dano mapol gunyutu lworo I kom kit ma tic wa tye ka wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor eswamae loka itunga, apotu kojenutu ebe mam iwaitin lu itwasamao kwana itodolikinete akiro nu ekotoi. Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ainapeta wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ngaza o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini geri amani azi ngazu sawa 'disi 'diyi feni e'yo amani lele 'diyi ku. Ba ambo ndundu eyi ece asi otiza eyi geri amani azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugire omu kukora gye, kikarebeka butunu ngu enkora yaitu eriho hati terikureeta ebirikwetengwa. Abarikukwataho boorekire okwerarikirira aha bukoryo bwaitu.

eng_prompt: Patients have voiced their concerns about the quality of treatment they receive. As a result, healthcare providers are under pressure to improve their services, and many individuals are hopeful for positive changes.
lug_prompt: Abalwadde balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi bwe bafuna. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo bali ku puleesa okutumbula empeereza yaabwe, era abantu bangi balina essuubi ly'enkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Lutwo gunyutu lworo gi i kom rwom me kony me yot kom ma ginongo. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma miyo kony me yot kom gitye I lyeto me ilo malo rwom me kony gi, dok dano mapol tye ki gen pi aloka loka maber.
teo_prompt: Apotu adekak itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amukian na edumunenete kesi. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi eswamak luka angaleu keda aiyalongong naka aitojokar ejanakine kec, ido itunga luipu emunoete aijulakineta nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ba azoru 'diyi ece asi otiza yini geri aro eyini esu 'diyi ma wura ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi okpo alia lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, dika 'ba karakara eyi asi'baza be ojata muke 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abarwaire boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo aha mutindo gw'obujanjabi obubarikutunga. N'ekyarugiremu, abaheereza b'eby'amagara bari ahansi y'oburemeezi bw'okwongyera aha buheereza bwabo, kandi abantu baingi baine amatsiko g'empinduka nungi.

eng_prompt: After several attempts to resolve the issues, it has become clear that the quality of assistance provided is lacking. Customers have expressed their dissatisfaction with the current level of support.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako enfunda eziwera okugonjoola ensonga, kyeyoleka bulungi nti omutindo gw'obuyambi obuweebwa teguliiko. Bakasitoma balaze obutali bumativu bwabwe olw'omutindo gw'obuyambi oguliwo kati.
ach_prompt: Ingee temo tyeko lok ne tyen mapol, nen atyer kamaleng ni rwom me kony ma kimiyo peke. Lukastoma gunyutu cwer cwiny gi pi rwom me kony matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitam aitemokin akiro ngun, esubit bala emamei agangat na abeit. Apotu agwelak itodutu amamut aiyalamakec kanu agangat na ejaas kwape kwana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini azakoma fele 'diyi ma wura cani ku. Aje'ba eyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku geri atita eyini fele ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugyezaho kumaraho oburemeezi, kikarebeka butunu ngu obuhwezi oburikuheebwa tiburungi. Bakasitoma boorekire obutashemererwa bwabo ahabw'obuhwezi oburiho obwahati.

eng_prompt: After reviewing her recent transactions, she noticed several unexpected charges. Concerned about her finances, she decided to check her bank account balance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya eby'obusuubuzi bye yakola gye buvuddeko awo, yalabye emisolo egiwerako gye yali tasuubira. Olw'okweraliikirira eby'ensimbi bye, yasalawo okukebera ssente ze ku akawunta ya bbanka.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo jami ma en otimo cokcok-ki, en oneno wel cul mapol ma pe obedo kakuru. Pi lworo madit tutwal I kom lim mege, en omoko tamme me ngiyo wel cente ma en tye kwede I beng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iboro lueswamauna ngesi pac, abu ngesi koany ikapun luipu lumam ngesi aomit. Kanu aiyalongong kanuka ikapunuke, abu ngesi koseu aanyanar ikapunuke luka aingadis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo erini tujari 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri ndre aje 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi karakara. E'yo eri ma robia ma e'yosi, eri asi e'yo 'du eri vile okporo ero robia ta mbazuri ma alia 'diyi ma ale andrizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma eby'obushubuzi bye, akareeba ebishare bingi ebyabaire bitarikuteekateekwaho. Ahabw'okwerarikirira esente ze, akasharamu kukyebera akawunti ye eya banka.

eng_prompt: The financial projections for the upcoming year were more optimistic than reality suggested. Additionally, unexpected expenses arose that strained the available resources.
lug_prompt: Okuteebereza kw'ebyensimbi okw'omwaka ogujja kwali kwa ssuubi okusinga obutuufu bwe bulaga. Okugatta ku ekyo, ebisale ebitasuubirwa byajjawo ne bikosa eby'obugagga ebyaliwo.
ach_prompt: Byek me lim ma obedo tye pi mwaka manyen obedo ber tutwal. Medo i kom meno, wel cente ma pe byek tye I komgi okelo peko I kom lim ma onongo tye.
teo_prompt: Aomisio nuka ikapun luka ekaru lo ebunit araasi nuejokuka adepar nuawomitai. Kilema ngun, apotu ikapun lu mam eomitai ebe ibusakinit kesi aitosom.
lgg_prompt: Otita robia ni eli emupi ri ni 'diyi ndra asi'baza be ndeni aga e'yo a'da ni ece ri ra. Azi dika, afa ayuzaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi efu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esipi ra.
nyn_prompt: Enteebereza y'ebyentatsya y'omwaka ogurikwija ekaba eine amasiko mingi kukira oku yaabaire neeyoreka. Okwongyera ahari ekyo,enshohoza etarikuteekateekwaho ekareetaho oburemeezi ahabintu ebyabaire biriho.

eng_prompt: After weeks of late nights and endless assignments, the students were feeling overwhelmed and exhausted. It was clear that their hard work had taken a toll on their spirits.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga basoma ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero era nga balina n'emirimu egibaweebwa okukola, abayizi baabadde bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa era nga bakooye. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti omulimu gwabwe ogw'amaanyi gwali gubaleetedde okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bedo lacen I dyewor ki tic ma pe tum, lutino kwan onongo gitye ka winyo olo ki olo. Onen atyer kamaleng ni tic matek magitye katimo obalo cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aijar kware keda aswam naepol noi, apuputu esisiak epol noi ido apasit noi. Acai cut ebe aswam kec na aswam agogongu abu koinak kesi aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia, ini eyi ma alea, azini azi eyini fe eyidri 'diyi ma vutia, sukulu anzi eyi ndra eyi ma asi 'deza azini andeza be. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini azi okporu yini nga ri 'du yi ma ava ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okushutama nyekiro n'emirimo etarikuhwa, abeegi bakaba nibahurira baruhire munonga. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu okukora n'amaani kwabo kukareetaho amaani maingi omumyoyo yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the community outreach program expanded its services, more individuals began to seek assistance. Consequently, the list of beneficiaries has grown.
lug_prompt: Pulogulaamu y'okutuusa obubaka mu bantu bwe yeeyongera okugaziwa, abantu bangi baatandika okunoonya obuyambi. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gw'abaganyulwa gweyongedde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me konyo lwak omede ki tic, dano mapol gucako yenyo kony. Macalo adwogi ne, wel joo ma onongo kony omede.
teo_prompt: Neautar ainapeta nuka aitodolikin itunga aiyatakin aijanakinakec, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aimo agangat. Kanuka ngun, apolor enaaba loka lu emedaunak.
lgg_prompt: Otita ongulumu eyini imbata fezu ri ni azi erini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do azakoma nda. E'yo 'disi, 'ba orodri esupi 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okuhitsya obuhwezi omu bantu ku yaasingire obuheereza bwayo, abantu baingi bakatandika kuronda obuhwezi. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikugasirwa gweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in COVID-19 cases, health officials have issued new guidelines. To ensure everyone's safety and prevent further spread of the virus, they should remain at home during the lockdown.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gye buvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bafulumizza ebiragiro ebipya. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli omu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka, balina okusigala awaka mu kiseera ky'omuggalo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gumiyo cik manyen. Me gwoko kwo pa dano weng ki gengo nya pa two corona, omyero gubed gang ikare ma kiloro piny.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nuka COVID-19, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu aicoreta nuitetiak. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere ka aitikitik awea naka ekorona, ekot kes asalakin ore kapak naka agolokinio naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe azita o'diru ni eyi. Le 'ba dria ma aa akuasi sa'wa angu ti opizanirisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bashohwize engyenderwaho nsya. Okureeba ngu buri omwe aine oburinzi n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko, ashemereire kuguma omuka omu bwire bw'akeshereko.

eng_prompt: It's important to check the weather conditions before heading out. If the forecast predicts heavy rain, they should wait a bit before leaving home.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okukebera embeera y'obudde nga tonnavaayo. Singa empewo eraga nti enkuba etonnya, balina okulinda katono nga tebannasimbula waka.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma piny tye kwede mapwod pe icito woko. Kace byek me kot tye ni kot obi cwer matek, omyero gu kuru manok ma peya guweko gang.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol aanyun ekuse ka etepe eringa eloto kinga. Arai ewomitai ebe ebuni edou aitep noi, ekot kes aidar idis eringa anyoun kore.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo angu mile ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu rakaka de nga po'di mi e'doni amve ku. Angu ma o'duko ka 'yo kini ozoo ni nga 'di ra, le eyi ma te were de nga po'di eyi ku akua ku.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okukyebera embeera y'obwire otakatandikire. Entebekanisa y'obwire ku erikworeka enjura nyingi, bashemereire kurinda kakye batakaruga omuka.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling rise in the number of cases among adolescents and young adults. Health officials are increasingly concerned about the spread of infectious diseases within this demographic.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abalwadde mu bavubuka n'abato abakulu. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku kusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu bantu bano.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel lutino matino matye ka nongo two tye ka medde tutwal. Lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom nyaa pa two ma kobo ikin lwak man.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adekasinei kanejaas atumunak keda atumunak luapolok. Iyalongongosi eswamak lu adekis kanu awea na adekasinei nu ikopas kanejaas itunga lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini kalafe 'ba oderu azini 'ba ode 'diyi ma eselea ri tu ra. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be tu e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta 'ba 'di eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire omu minyeeto n'eminyeeto. Abakuru omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira omu bantu aba.

eng_prompt: The emergency room was bustling with activity as doctors and nurses rushed to attend to patients. It was evident that the flu season had taken a heavy toll on the community.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge awajjanjabirwa abalwadde ab'amangu kyabadde kijjudde abantu nga abasawo n'abasawo badduka okujjanjaba abalwadde. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti ssennyiga yali akosezza nnyo abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ot yoto kom onongo opong ki dano mapol tutwal I kare ma daktari ki nac gubedo ka ngwec me konyo lutwo. Onen atyer kamaleng ni two aburu ne obalo kwo pa lwak tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol itunga luipu noi kotoma agola naka adekis naarai apotu imurok keda anasin kikerata aimuke adekak. Acai cut ebe abu adeka naka eimidi itolitol itunga luipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Jo ale aliza e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ri ga tre dakitari azini nasi eyini arizu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eri ndra e'dazaru kini ayi ti influenza niri 'du 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo angiri.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye ky'abarweire ab'ahonaaho kikaba kiijwire emirimo ahabw'okugira ngu abashaho n'abashaho bakahurikiza kuragurira abarwaire. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu oburwire bwa senyiga bukareetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing awareness of the issues surrounding law enforcement practices. This has sparked widespread discussions and protests across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okumanyisibwa okw'amaanyi ku nsonga ezeetoolodde enkola z'okukwasisa amateeka. Kino kireeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okwekalakaasa okw'amaanyi okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye ki ngec i kom lok makwako cik. Man okelo nywako lok ki jemo mapol I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijen naepol noi naka akiro nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka ikisila. Eyangau na ineresinei keda aidiya kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ma mile e'bi tu e'yo 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di fe e'yo nzeza azini ngiringiri kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya enshonga ezirikukwata aha kukuratira ebiragiro. Eki kireesireho okuhanuura n'okwesharinga okwetoroora eihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: As I reflect on the past twelve months, I can't help but smile at all the wonderful moments I've experienced. From unforgettable adventures to cherished time spent with loved ones, each day has brought something special.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ndowooza ku myezi ekkumi n'ebiri egiyise, sisobola butamwenya ku biseera byonna eby'ekitalo bye njolekaganye nabyo. Okuva ku bintu by'otayinza kwerabira okutuuka ku biseera eby'omuwendo by'omala n'abaagalwa bo, buli lunaku luleese ekintu eky'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom dwe apar wiye aryo ma okato angec, pe atwero weko bwunyo I kom jami mabeco ma anongo. Nicake ki I kom jami ma wigi pe biwil I komgi nio wa I kare me mar ma gubedo kwede ki dano gi me amara, nino ducu kelo gin mo ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aomoom nuikamunitos ilapio itomonarei luatuboros, mam eong apedori aimurimuria kanuka iboro luibusiak luejaatar eong. Anyoun kotoma aiboisio numam imurokiniata itoni apak naejok noi naejaatar keda luminan, kanginipaaran ijaikit eong ibore yenitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu mba agapi mudri drini iri 'diyi ma dria, ma econi ku gu cinya sawa onyiru mani ovuzu yi ma alia 'diyisi. E'dozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria kpere sa'wa orodriru 'bani aa'zu 'ba leletu 'diyi pie, o'du dria eji afa azi wura ndusi ni.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ninteekateeka aha myezi ikumi n'ebiri ehwaire, tindikubaasa kureka kumwenya ahabw'obwire burungi obu ntungire. Okuruga ahabintu ebitarikwerabirwa kuhisya aha bwire oburikumara n'abakundwa baawe, burizooba n'ekintu ky'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In the heart of Uganda, the vibrant city of Arua offers a unique blend of culture and opportunity. Residents and visitors alike often remark on the sense of liberation that permeates the atmosphere.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gwa Uganda, ekibuga kya Arua ekijjudde abantu kirimu obuwangwa n'emikisa egy'enjawulo. Abatuuze n'abagenyi batera okwogera ku ddembe eriri mu mbeera.
ach_prompt: I cwiny lobo Uganda, boma madit me Arua tye ki tekwaro ki gum mapat-pat. Lutedero kacel ki wele ipol kare giloko I kom kit ma dano tye ka winyo kwede ni gitye agonya.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet nako Uganda, ejaasi Arua keda inonosio luegelegela keda arerengesio nuegelegela. Apotu itunga keda ipejok kotemasi ebe ejai ailajara naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kangin.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, aku ambu Arua niri ni e'yo suruni azini drileba ndundu eyi fe. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu omu eyi pie e'yo nze e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gwa Uganda, orurembo rwa Arua nirureeta obuhangwa n'emigisha etarikushushana. Abatuuragye hamwe n'abagyenyi nibagamba ngu hariho okushemererwa omu myanya egyo.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, numerous eyewitness accounts and leaked documents have surfaced. These revelations have shed light on the controversial activities that occurred during the election process.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'entiisa, ebyafaayo by'abajulizi bangi n'ebiwandiiko ebifulumye bifulumye. Ebizuuliddwa bino bitangaazizza ku bikolwa ebirimu enkaayana ebyaliwo mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lucaden mapol kacel ki waraga ma okato woko okati. Lok magi onyuto jami mapol i kom tim me apoka-poka ma otime I kare me yer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, aponi kitodiarai akiro nuka ajenak keda apapulai nuipu. Apotu akiro ngun itodutu akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuetioko nuapotu kotakanutu kotoma apak naka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara ndrepi e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria azini kokobi efupi 'diyi efu amve. E'yo 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi 'yepi sa'wa opetaa ni ri ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka erikutangaaza y'ebintu, ebirikugambwa abajurizi baingi hamwe n'ebihandiiko ebirikwetegyerezibwa birugireyo. Ebintu ebi ebirikworekwaho byongyeire omushana aha bikorwa ebyabaireho omu bwire bw'okuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Recent changes in local policies have sparked widespread uncertainty among the community. As a result, many residents are struggling to understand the implications for their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezibaddewo gye buvuddeko mu nkola z'ebyalo zireeseewo obutali bukakafu bungi mu bantu. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi balwana okutegeera ebikosa obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I cik me tedero okelo lworo I kin lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol tye ka tute matek me niang adwogi ne I kom kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka ikisila luka atutubet eyaunitos amamus acamanar kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ationis amisiikin nuepedorete aitodolikin aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru e'yo azita ni angu ma alia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eji asi otiza ongulumu eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo eyi 'yepi eyi ma edri eyi ma alea o'du driasi 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka ezihweireho omu biragiro by'ebyaro, zireesireho okwerarikirira omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi nibarwana kwetegyereza ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: The conflict has escalated dramatically in recent weeks, leading to widespread violence and chaos. As a result, many people have been killed as well.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano bweyongedde nnyo mu wiiki eziyise, ekiviiriddeko obutabanguko n'obwegugungo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi battiddwa.
ach_prompt: Lweny ne omede tutwal I cabit ma okato ni, ma oweko tim gero ki kuku kuku obedo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, kineko dano mapol bene.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta ngun kotoma isabitin lu atuboros, ido ayangau amumu keda amumu naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, aponi koyarai itunga luipu da.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri 'da ma omgbo tu sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea, erini fezu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'di 'ba karakara eyi indi.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko bweyongyeire munonga omu sande ezihweire, ekirikureetaho obwimukiriro n'obutabanguko. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi baisirwe.

eng_prompt: The storm intensified rapidly, catching everyone off guard. Emergency services struggled to respond as the situation escalated.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga gwayongera mangu, ne gukwata buli omu nga teyeetegese. Abakola ku by'amangu baafunye obuzibu okuddamu ng'embeera yeeyongedde.
ach_prompt: Yamo ne omede oyot-oyot tutwal ma owango dano weng. Dul ma miyo kony pi peko ma poto atura onongo tek tutwal me timo gin mo ikare ma peko ne omedde.
teo_prompt: Abu ekwam kiyatakin katipet, ido abu kiteleka itunga kere. Apotu lu engeso kongeroto aswam naarai apolor ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da ma okpo tu mbeleru erini 'ba dria 'bizu mile kokoru. Azi'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi esu ewaru e'yo 'yezu e'yo 'da ma omgbo ni tuzurisi.
nyn_prompt: Eihunga rikongyera amaani ahonaaho, rikatangaaza buri omwe. Abakozi b'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru, bakaremwa kukora ahabw'embeera kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: The position holds significant influence over national policy and governance. As such, it attracts candidates with extensive experience and a strong commitment to public service.
lug_prompt: Ekifo kino kirina kinene kye kikola ku nkola n'enfuga y'eggwanga. N'olw'ekyo, kisikiriza abeesimbyewo abalina obumanyirivu bungi n'obumalirivu obw'amaanyi mu buweereza bwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Kabedo man tye ki twero madit tutwal I kom cik ki tela me lobo. Macalo enoni, kelo lutino kwan ma gitye ki ngec matut ki miti matek me tic pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi adoketait ngin keda apedor naepol noi kotoma ainapeta keda epugae loka akwap. Kwape kwape kangin, ingalauni itunga luejaasi keda amisiarit naepol noi keda ainakina naepol noi naka aijanakin apugan.
lgg_prompt: Pari 'da ma okpo okporu e'yo azita kari ni 'diyi ma dria azini driceza kari niri ma dria ci. Ekile 'dile, eri 'ba pa so'baa nita be angiri azini ava be okporu azi ngazu o'bi eyidri 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gukaba nigukwata munonga aha biragiro n'obwebembezi bw'eihanga. N'ahabw'ekyo, nikishendashenda abesimbireho abaine obukugu bwingi n'okwehayo munonga omu buheereza bwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple discussions and feedback sessions, the team remained steadfast in their original plan. Frustration grew as the deadline approached, and the stakeholders expressed their concerns.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakubaganya ebirowoozo emirundi mingi, ttiimu yasigala munywevu mu nteekateeka yaabwe eyasooka. Obwennyamivu bweyongera ng'ennaku z'omwezi ezisembayo zisemberera era abakwatibwako ne balaga okweraliikirira kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ka lok I kom lok mapol, dul tuku ne pud gucung matek I yubgi macon. Cwer cwiny omede ikare ma nino me agiki ne cok, dok dano mapol bene gunyutu lworo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu ineresinei keda abongonokineta nuipu, apotu itimun kongetakisi aitemonokineta kec. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kinerata aiyalongong naarai apotu apaarasia nuka awasia idunyasi, ido apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza karakara eyi ma eselea, amuti 'da awi okporu otita eyini okori ma alea. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ri ma omgbo tu o'du asizuri ni ecazu ogogo risi, dika 'ba ambo eyi e'da asi otiza eyivile 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuhanuura kwingi n'okugarukwamu ebiteiso, tiimu ekaguma ehamiire aha nteekateeka yaabo ey'okubanza. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'obwiire bw'ahamuheru kuhika haihi, kandi abu kirikukwataho bo boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo.

eng_prompt: After much discussion and consideration, the team reviewed the proposed modifications to the project. Ultimately, they reached a consensus that the alterations were not in line with their original vision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okulowooza ennyo, ttiimu yeetegereza enkyukakyuka ezaateesebwako mu pulojekiti. Mu nkomerero, baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya nti enkyukakyuka zaali tezikwatagana na kirowoozo kyabwe eky'olubereberye.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam mapol, dul ne guneno aloka-loka ma kimito kelo I yub eni. I agiki ne, guwinye ni aloka-loka ne pe rwatte ki neno gi macon.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda aomisio nuipu, abu etimu airereor aijulanakineta nuebeit aswam. Kawasia, apotu kesi kopedosi acamanar ebe mam aijulanakineta ngun arucokina keda aomisioitikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini egata ma vutia, amuti 'da one ojata 'bani lele otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale ra. Asizu, eyi esu ti ecita kini ojata 'dayi aa'ni eyi ma egata okori be ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuteekateeka munonga, tiimu ekashwijuma empindahinduka omu purogyekiti. Ahamuheru, bakaikirizana ngu empindahinduka zikaba zitarikuhikaana n'ekigyendererwa kyabo eky'okubanza.

eng_prompt: The newly elected officials gathered in the grand hall, ready to embark on their journey of public service. As the ceremony commenced, the atmosphere was filled with anticipation and solemnity.
lug_prompt: Abakungu abaakalondebwa baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge ekinene nga beetegefu okutandika olugendo lwabwe olw'okuweereza abantu. Omukolo bwe gwatandika, embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira n'ebikujjuko.
ach_prompt: Lutic ma kiyero gi manyen gucokke I ot madit, ma oyubbe me cako tic gi pi lwak. Ikare ma yub ocake, dano gubedo ki miti madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu aseun luitetiak kotukokinos kotogo loapolon, ekapakina ageun aijaanakin itunga. Neageunia epucit, apol noi aiyalama keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba 'bani pele o'diru 'diyi tra eyi jo ale aliza ambo ri ma alea, eyi ngonde aci eyini azi ngazu o'bi eyidri ri e'dozu. Omu nderi ni e'doria, angu nderi ga asi 'baza azini ayiko si.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru abasya abatoorainwe, baketeerana omu kishengye ekikuru, beteekateekire kutandika orugyendo rwabo rw'okuheereza abantu. Omukoro ku gwatandikire, embeera ekaba eijwire amatsiko n'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and public discontent, the political landscape remains largely unchanged. Analysts predict that the ruling party will maintain its stronghold in the upcoming elections.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi n'obutali bumativu bw'abantu, embeera y'ebyobufuzi esigala nga bw'eri. Abeekenneenya balagula nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kijja kusigala nga kinywevu mu kulonda okujja.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watye ka nongo peko mapol ki cwer cwiny pa lwak, lok me cungu iwi bye pud pe olokke. Lunywak tam gitye ki byek ni dul me cungu iwi-bye matye I loc ne bimedde ki bedo matek I yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu keda amamut aiyalama naka itunga, mam akiro nuka epolitikis ijulakinos. Eomitos angicak ebe ebuni epate lo ipugai aidar agogonguke kotoma aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu azini e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma wura ojata kokoru. Ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi ega kini amuti opi driari nga okpo erini 'diyi ma ta mba opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bwingi n'okwetomboita kw'abantu, eby'obutegyeki tibirikuhinduka. Abacencuzi nibateebereza ngu ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki nikiija kuguma kiine amaani omu karuuru akarikwija.

eng_prompt: In the wake of recent political turmoil, a shift in the landscape has become evident. Emerging leaders are rallying support and challenging the status quo.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko bw'ebyobufuzi obubaddewo gye buvuddeko, enkyukakyuka mu mbeera yeeyolekedde. Abakulembeze abavaayo bakungaanya obuwagizi n'okusomooza embeera eriwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lweny me cungu iwi-bye obedo tye cokcok-ki, aloka-loka I kabedo mapat-pat dong onen. Lutela matye ka dongo gitye ka rweyo cwak ki lweny i kom ngo matye katimme kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu naka epolitikis napac, ejenuna aijulanakineta kotoma akwap. Engarenok lu ebunit ekotosi aimorikikin agangat ka ainingosit ejautene loejai.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki obwahati, empindahinduka omu by'obutegyeki eyorekire. Abeebembezi abarikurugaho bariyo nibarundaana obushagiki n'okuhakanisa embeera eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: As I reflect on the rapidly changing world around us, I can't help but wonder about the future of education. The challenges and opportunities that await primary school children are both exciting and uncertain.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ndowooza ku nsi ekyukakyuka amangu etwetoolodde, sisobola butalowooza ku biseera by'ebyenjigiriza eby'omu maaso. Okusoomoozebwa n'emikisa ebirindiridde abaana b'essomero lya pulayimale binyuma era tebitegeerekeka.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom lobo ma tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal I kabedo ma orumuwa, pe atwero weko tamo I kom anyim pa kwan. Peko ki gum ma tye ka kuro lutino kwan me puraimari tye ma yomo cwiny dok bene pe gi ngeyo.
teo_prompt: Kwape aomoom eong nuikamunitos aijulujuleta nuka akwap, mam eong apedori aimung nuikamunitos oingaren naka asioman. Atiokisio keda arerengesio nu idaritos idwe luka esomero loka epuraimare eraas lu isinyikokitos ido mam ejena.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu wudrikuru ojapi mbeleru ama ma ageia ri ma dria, ma econi asi 'du e'yo onita ma ewu drialeri ma dria ku. E'yo ewaru azini drileba sukulu anzi pramari sukulu'a 'diyi ma drilia 'diyi ayikoru azini e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ninteekateeka aha mpindahinduka y'ensi, tindikubaasa kureka kwebuuza ebiro bya nyensya by'eby'obwegyese. Oburemeezi n'emigisha ebirikutegyerezibwa abaana ba puraimare, nibishemeza kandi tibirikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Health officials reported a concerning rise in symptoms among residents. As a result, testing was ramped up to identify any potential outbreaks.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'obubonero mu batuuze. N'ekyavaamu, okukebera kwayongezebwayo okuzuula okubalukawo kwonna okuyinza okubaawo.

teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata ijenuneta luka adekasinei kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, aponi kiyatakinai ainwakio kanu ajenun adekasinei nuepedorete abwangunor.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ecopi eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otu e'yo 'bani azo eyi o'bizu 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'obubonero omu batuura gye. N'ekyarugiremu, okukyebera kukongyerwamu amaani kumanya okubarukaho kw'oburwaire.

eng_prompt: After assessing the damage caused by the recent storm, the team convened to discuss the necessary steps forward. They recognized the urgency of the situation and began outlining their strategy.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyayonoonebwa omuyaga ogwakayita, ttiimu yatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bisaanyizo by'okugenda mu maaso. Baazuula obukulu bw'embeera era ne batandika okukola enteekateeka yaabwe.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor atiokisio nu abu ekwam koyangau, apotu etimu iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka ejautene kangol kosodete ageun aitemonokin eipone lo ebeit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi oli alio ni o'diru ri fe 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye drile 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu e'yo 'da ma orodri mbeleru eyini ani e'dozu geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu ri e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyasisikaire ahabw'eihunga, tiimu ekashutama kuhanuura aha ky'okukora. Bakareeba oburemeezi bw'embeera kandi batandika kukora enteekateeka yaabo.

eng_prompt: Due to a recent curriculum review, the academic committee decided to streamline the program offerings. As a result, some courses were removed.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuddamu okwetegereza ensoma gyebuvuddeko, akakiiko k'ebyenjigiriza kaasazeewo okulongoosa mu nteekateeka z'ebisomesebwa. N'ekyavaamu, emisomo egimu gyaggibwawo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngiyo kor yub me pwonye ma otime cokcok-ki, dul madoro lok kom kwan omoko tamgi me yubu yub me pwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, kikwanyo courses mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanuka airereonor aisisiaeta pac, abu ekomiti lo asioman koseu aitojokar ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolemunai ikoosin ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru risi, komiti onita ni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du otita onita ni 'diyi otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nze kosi azi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushwijuma engyenderwaho y'eby'obwegyese,akakiiko k'eby'obwegyese kakacwamu kutereeza enteekateeka. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomo agamwe gakaihwaho.

eng_prompt: After exhausting all their options within the organization, they realized they needed a fresh perspective. Frustrated by the lack of support, they decided to explore other avenues for help.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukozesa enkola zaabwe zonna mu kitongole, baakiraba nti beetaaga endowooza empya. Olw'obutaba na buyambi, baasalawo okunoonya engeri endala ez'okufunamu obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Inge tic ki yoo weng ma gitye kwede I dul ne, guniang ni omyero gubed ki tam manyen. Pi peko me nok pa kony, gumoko tamgi me yenyo yoo mukene me nongo kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitosom aseununeta kec kere kotoma orionget, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe ekotosi kesi aomisio nuitetiak. Apotu kesi itakadikisi kanu amamus na agangat, apotu kesi koseutu aimo iponesio ice luka aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini eco 'ye amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ra kini eyi le egata o'diru ni. E'yo atita ako nirisi, eyi asi e'yo 'du geri azi eyini ecozu azakoma esuzu 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukoresa emiringo yaabo yoona omu kitongore, bakareeba ngu nibetenga enteekateeka nsya. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'okuburwa obuhwezi, bakasharamu kuronda emiringo endiijo y'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: After hours of searching the treacherous waters, the coast guard received a distress signal from a stranded fisherman. Despite the rough conditions, the police launched a daring rescue operation to save him.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala essaawa eziwera nga banoonya mu mazzi amabi, abakuumi b'oku lubalama lw'ennyanja baafuna obubaka okuva eri omuvubi eyali asibidde mu nnyanja. Wadde ng'embeera teyali nnungi, poliisi yatandikawo kaweefube ow'obuvumu okumutaasa.
ach_prompt: Inge cawa malac me yenyo pii marac tutwal, lugwok dog nam gunongo dwon me kony ki bot lamak rec mo ma onongo tye i dog nam. Kadi bed ni kwo ne obedo tek, abili gucako tic matek me lare.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isawan luipu luka aimo akipi nuetioko, apotu edarak luka edoket kodumutu aimony kama ejai ekamak agaria. Karaida etiono noi ejautene, apotu ipolisin kitegeasi aswamisioit naka alakun ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa angu ndundu eyi ondazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba angu agei tepi 'diyi esu o'duko e'yo ewaru ni engazu 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi vu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, polisi eyi e'do azi okporu eyini ani ecozu eri epazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eshaaha nyingi barikuronda omu maizi g'akabi, abakuumi b'aha rubaju rw'enyanja bakatunga akahuumuro kuruga aha mushohi owabaire asibire. Oihireho embeera mbi, poriisi ekatandikaho omurimo gw'okumujuna.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed alarming discrepancies in the allocation of government resources. As a result, it has come to light that the coronavirus nineteen funds were misused.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga enjawulo mu ngeri gavumenti gy'egabanyizaamu ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, kizuuse nti ssente z'akawuka ka kolona mu lukumi mu lwenda zaakozesebwa bubi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I yub me poko lim pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, kityeko niang ni kitiyo ki lim me two korona I yoo marac.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ationis naepol noi kotoma aikor iboro luka apugan. Kanuka ngun, aponi kojenunai ebe aponi itolitolunai ikapun luka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo 'bani afa gameteni 'diyi awazu 'diyi ma esele cozu ku. E'yo 'disi, efu e'yo efuzaru kini 'ba ayu robia azo coronavirusniri ma e'yosi geri onzi si.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho, kworeka obutaikirizana omu kugaba eby'obugaiga bya gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, kimanyirwe ngu esente z'akakooko ka korona zikakoresibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: The investigation has revealed several key pieces of evidence. As a result, the authorities are prepared to take action against those involved.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kuzudde obujulizi bungi obukulu. N'ekivuddemu, ab'obuyinza beetegefu okukola ku abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Kwed okatti ki caden mapol ma pigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela tye atera me timo gin mo i kom joo ma timo ne.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic kitodu ajenanut naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina apedorosio aitepesen ngul luejaas toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da esu afa ecetaru 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba eyi ngonde e'yo 'duzu 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kuretsire obujurizi bwingi. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi beeteekateekire kukora ahari abo boona abakukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: Despite the emphasis on academic integrity, many students feel immense pressure to perform well. As a result, some resort to dishonest methods to secure higher grades.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing emphasis on entrepreneurship as a means to boost the economy. Various programs and initiatives have been launched to support aspiring business owners.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic uncertainties, financial experts are emphasizing the importance of long-term financial planning. Many individuals are unprepared for unexpected expenses, making it crucial to build a savings cushion.

Abantu bangi tebeetegekedde kusaasaanya ssente mu ngeri etasuubirwa, ekireetera okuba eky'omugaso okuba n'enteekateeka y'okutereka ssente.

eng_prompt: In recent evaluations of educational performance across the state, significant disparities were observed among various districts. Many schools struggled to meet the minimum academic standards set by the education board.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkola y'ebyenjigiriza mu ggwanga lyonna, enjawulo ey'amaanyi yalabiddwako mu disitulikiti ez'enjawulo. Amasomero mangi gaalwana okutuukiriza omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ogwassibwawo akakiiko k'ebyenjigiriza.

nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma enkora y'eby'obwegyese omu eihanga, hariho entaaniso y'amaani omu disiturikiti ezitarikushushana. Amashomero maingi gakabonabona kuhikiiriza omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese ogwateirweho ekitongore ky'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the number of students taking standardized tests across the region. This trend has highlighted the educational disparities between different types of schools.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu muwendo gw'abayizi abakola ebigezo eby'omutindo mu kitundu kyonna. Enkola eno eraga enjawulo mu by'enjigiriza mu masomero ag'engeri ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lutino kwan matye katimo peny mapat-pat I but lobo man omede tutwal. Man onyuto apoka-poka matye ikit me kwan ikin gangi kwan mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi enaaba loka esisiak lu iswamaete aingito kotoma aiboisit. Itodunit aswamisioit na atiaketait na asioman kiding isomeroi luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, sukulu anzi eyi ma kalafe tu ra sukulu anzi eyi ma obeta eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma kalafe kari 'di ma woko 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'di ece e'yo onita ma esele coza sukulu esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma eselea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habeireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abeegi abarikukora ebigyezo by'omuringo gumwe omu kyanga. Enkora egi eretsireho entaaniso omu by'obwegyese omu mashomero gatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: Despite their efforts to prepare, the majority of the class struggled with the material. As a result, many students failed the English exam.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka okwetegeka, abasinga obungi mu kibiina tebaasoma bulungi. N'ekyavaamu, abayizi bangi baagudde ebigezo by'Olungereza.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni guketo tek me yubbe, pol pa lutino kwan gubedo ki peko me kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol gupoto peny me leb munu.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu aitemonokin, apotu itunga luipu kotwakiasi aisisiaeta ngun. Kanuka ngun, apotu esisiak luipu ibiroros aingito naka Amusugun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo eyini 'ba otita eyi otuzu ra ti, kilasi 'da ma abari eyi esu ewaru e'yo eyini oni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'de obeta munduti niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okweteekateekyera, abeegi abaingi omu kiraasi tibarabaasize kwega. Ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi bakagwa ebigyezo by'orungyereza.

eng_prompt: Many parents are increasingly considering alternative education options for their children. Recent studies have shown a significant disparity in academic performance between private and public schools.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi beeyongera okulowooza ku by'enjigiriza ebirala eri abaana baabwe. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu nsoma wakati w'amasomero g'obwannannyini n'aga gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol tye ka tam I kom yoo mukene me pwonyo lutino gi. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I kin gangi kwan pa gamente ki pa gangi kwan pa wegine.
teo_prompt: Eutasi auriak luipu aomoom nu aiboisio ace nuka asioman kanuka idwekec. Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak atiaketait naepol noi na eswamae kiding isomeroi luka apugan keda luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Tipika karakara eyi curu'do e'yo ega onita ndundu eyi ma anzi eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza onita ma alia sukulu gamete ma pala 'diyi ma eselea sukulu gamete ma pala 'diyi pie ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi nibaronda obundi buryo bw'okwegyesa abaana baabo. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'amaani omu kukora kw'amashomero g'abantu buntu n'aga gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the recent unrest, the mayor addressed the crowd with a sense of urgency. He vowed to take immediate action to restore peace and stability in the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obwegugungo obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, meeya yayogerako eri abantu mu bwangu. Yeeyama okubaako ky'akolawo mu bwangu okuzzaawo emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, meya oloko ki lwak I yoo me ryeko tutwal. En okwonge me timo gin mo oyotoyot me dwoko kuc ki ber bedo ikabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu napac, abu emeya iner nejaas itunga katipet. Abu ngesi kisumun aswam katipet kanu ainyakun ainapakin keda ainapakina kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, meya nze e'yo o'bi yi be mbeleru. So oyo e'yo 'yezu mbeleru asianzu azini asianzu ejizu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho obwahati, meeya akagambira abantu ahonaaho. Akarahira kukora ahonaaho kugaruraho obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In today's challenging economic climate, finding additional sources of income has become increasingly important. Exploring various opportunities can lead to financial stability and growth.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna enzibu ey'ennaku zino, okunoonya ensibuko z'ensimbi endala kifuuse kikulu nnyo. Okunoonyereza ku mikisa egy'enjawulo kisobola okuleetawo obutebenkevu mu byenfuna n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye matek tutwal, nongo yoo mukene me nongo lim odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yenyo gum ma pat pat twero kelo ber bedo ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun, epol ajokis noi adumun iponesio ice luka adumun ikapun. Aingic arerengesio nuegelegela epedori ayangaun ainapakina keda apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ma alia, geri azi 'bani ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi esuzu 'diyi eca curu'do orodriru. Drileba ndundu eyi ma eti ondazu ri eco fe e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu azini zozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu buremeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwa hati, okuronda oburugo bw'entaasya obundi, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Okucondooza aha migisha etari emwe, nikibaasa kureetaho obutereera omu by'entaasya hamwe n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: With the rapid advancement of technology and the increasing reliance on digital solutions, many government services are becoming more accessible. As a result, innovative payment methods are being introduced to streamline processes for citizens.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukulaakulana kwa tekinologiya okw'amangu n'okwongera okwesigama ku tekinologiya wa digito, obuweereza bwa gavumenti bungi bweyongedde okufunibwa. N'ekivuddemu, enkola z'okusasula ez'obuyiiya zitongozebwa okwanguya enkola eri bannansi.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa tet manyen ma tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal ki mede pa jenge I kom diro me kompyuta, tic pa gamente mapol tye ka doko yot tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka kati ki yoo manyen me culu pi konyo anywali me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka etatai loakwana keda eipone lo itwasamaere elago, epatana adolokin aijaanakinio naka apugan. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolomun iwaitin luitetiak lu aitac kanu aitapatan itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologianiri ma zota okposi azini asi'baza ma ongmbo tupi geri oli aliasi 'diyi ma dria ri si, azi gamete ni karakara 'diyi eca curu'do ewakokoru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba geri o'diru 'bani robia ofezu 'diyi e'do geri kari anzi eyini robia ofezu 'diyi ma ayuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka y'amaani omu tekinorogye hamwe n'okweyongyera kwegamira obuheereza bwa digito, obuheereza bwa gavumenti nibubaasa kuhikwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'okushashura ey'omutaano eriyo neetandikwaho, okubaasa kuhwera abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges, individuals with disabilities possess unique strengths and talents. With the right support and opportunities, they can thrive and achieve their goals.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, abantu abaliko obulemu balina amaanyi n'ebitone eby'enjawulo. Nga balina obuyambi n'emikisa emituufu, basobola okukulaakulana n'okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo peko mapol, lugoro gitye ki kero ki mic ma pat. Ki kony ki gum matir, gitwero dongo dok cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu, ejaasi ingwalasik keda agogong keda atalanta nuegelegela. Keda agangat ka arerengesio nuajokak, epedorete kesi apol ka aitodolikin apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu ra ti, 'ba aco be 'diyi ma okpo azini feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyi karakara. Atita kililiru azini drileba kililiru 'diyisi, eyi eco zo ra azini eyi ma e'yo eyi 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu baraabe nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi, abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo, baine amaani n'ebitone by'omutaano. Baine obuhwezi n'emigisha mirungi, nibabaasa kutunguuka kandi bahikiirize ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of careful consideration and weighing her options, she finally came to a conclusion. Friends and family had expected her to choose a more conventional path.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'alowooza n'obwegendereza era ng'apima by'ayinza okusalawo, yasembayo n'atuuka ku kusalawo. Ab'emikwano n'ab'omu maka baali bamusuubira okulonda ekkubo eddala.
ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me tam matut ki tam matut I kom ngo ma en twero timone, en dong otyeko moko tamme. Lurem ki lugang ne gubedo ki byek ni en obilubo yoo macon.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomoom ka aomoom nuipedori ngesi aswam, abu ngesi kodolu aomisioitike. Aomitos ipaperoke keda lukokaleke ebe ebuni ngesi aseun epone loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara erini e'yo egazu kililiru azini e'yo erini eco 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu emu e'yo azi ma dria. Agyipi azini familia ma alia 'diyi ega ndra kini eri nga geri azi 'dileri pe.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, akahendera yaahika aha muheru. Banywani be n'ab'omuka ye bakaba nibateekateeka ngu naija kutoorana omuhanda ogundi.

eng_prompt: After years of passion for riding and repairing bikes, she decided to turn her hobby into a business. Now, she is successfully monetizing her skills in the motorcycle industry.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'avuga era ng'addaabiriza obugaali, yasalawo okukola bizineesi. Kati akozesa bulungi obukugu bwe mu bizineesi ya ppikipiki.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me maro ngwec ki yubu lela, en omoko tamme me weko miti ne odok biacara. Kombedi, en tye ka nongo cente ki I diro ma en tye kwede I biacara me pikipiki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka amin naka airenge keda aitemonokin igalin, abu ngesi koseu aijulakin aswamuke araun ebiasara. Kwana, euta ngesi aitolomun ikapun kotoma aswamuke naka ipikipikin.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani lezu motokari nzuzu azini yi edezu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo erini leleri ojazu tujari ru. Sawa 'disi, eri ondua erini 'diyi ma dria sende eji okalamvu pikipiki niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukunda kuvuga n'okukanika obugaari, akasharamu okuhindura eby'okukunda kwe omu by'obushuubuzi. Obwahati, atungire esente omu kukoresa emyoga ye omu bizinesi ya pikipiki.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the devastation caused by the recent conflict, a group of brave individuals banded together. Fueled by a sense of justice and compassion, they made a vow to stand up for those who could not defend themselves.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebikangabwa ebyava mu lutalo olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, ekibinja ky'abantu abavumu baakolera wamu. Olw'okwagala obwenkanya n'okusaasira, baakola obweyamo okuwolereza abo abaali batasobola kwewozaako.
ach_prompt: Inge neno peko ma lweny okelo cokcok-ki, gurup pa jo matye ki tekcwiny guribbe kacel. Ki cwiny me ngolo kop atir ki kica, gukwonge me cung pi jo ma pe gitwero gwoko gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun atiokisio nuelomunitos kanuka ingungeta, apotu itunga luetioko kimorikikinos. Apotu kesi kisinyikokisi aomisio nuka etube loajokan keda aitim, apotu kesi kisumunoto aigang ngul lumam epedoritos aigang awate kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo agapi o'diru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azi okporu 'diyi eci yi tualu. E'yo liza e'yo liza kililiru azini asi ndriza si, eyi so oyo pa tuzu 'ba ecopi eyi ma agei tepi ku 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba okutabanguka okwaretsirweho entaro ezabaireho juba, guruupu y'abantu b'obumanzi bakakorengana. Ahabw'okugira oburingaaniza n'embabazi, bakarahira kurwanirira abo abatarikubaasa kwerwanirira.

eng_prompt: After years of struggle and conflict, a fragile peace finally settled over the land. The weary warriors laid down their arms, embracing the hope of a brighter future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulwanagana n'obukuubagano, eddembe eritali lya nkalakkalira lyatuuka ku ttaka. Abalwanyi abaali bakooye baateeka emikono gyabwe wansi ne banywerera ku ssuubi ly'ebiseera by'omu maaso ebitangaavu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki lweny, kuc ma pe obedo yot dong ocung iwi ngom ne. Lumony ma guol-li guketo cing gi piny, kun gimako gen me kwo maber I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ejie keda ingungeta, aponi kodolokinai ainapakin kotoma akwap. Apotu lukasurup lu apasit kipikakisi akaninikec kwap, aitogogong amuno naka oingaren na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eli a'di 'diza azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma vutia, asizu asizu asianzu e'yere ni e'do angu 'da ma dria ra. Ba a'di 'dipi andezaru 'diyi 'ba yi ma wu va asi'baza ewu drusiri ma driari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko, obusingye bukye bukabaho ahaitaka. Abarwani abaruhire, bakata emikono ahansi, barikwikiriza amatsiko g'ebiro bya nyensya birungi.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing concerns about safety and health regulations, many educational institutions are reevaluating their plans for the upcoming academic year. As a result, some schools may not open for the new term.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku mateeka g'ebyokwerinda n'ebyobulamu, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gazzeemu okwekenneenya enteekateeka zaago ez'omwaka gw'ebyensoma ogujja. N'ekivuddemu, amasomero agamu gayinza obutaggulawo ttaamu empya.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo matye I kom cik me gwoko ber bedo ki yot kom, gangi kwan mapol tye ka ngiyo yubgi pi mwaka me kwan matye kabino ni. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mukene pe twero yabo pi tem manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naikamunit nuka ayuwara keda angaleu, eutasi isomeroi luipu airereor ainapeta kec nuka ekaru loka aisisia lo ebunit. Kanuka ngun, mam isomeroi ice epedorete apukor kanu atamu naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza mupi drile e'yo azita e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, pari onita ni karakara 'diyi otuta yini eli onita ni emupi ri ma alia 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. E'yo 'disi, sukulu azi 'diyi econi yi ma ti zi tamu o'diruri ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho aha biragiro by'okwerinda n'eby'amagara, amatendekyero maingi gariyo nigashwijuma enteekateeka zaago ez'omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ogurikwija. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero agamwe nigabaasa kutaigura taamu ensya.

eng_prompt: As global demand for energy continues to rise and geopolitical tensions persist, many analysts are predicting a shift in the market. This could lead to significant changes in the cost of essential resources.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze mu nsi yonna bweyongera okulinnya n'obunkenke mu by'obufuzi bweyongera, abeekenneenya bangi bateebereza enkyukakyuka mu katale. Kino kiyinza okuvaako enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu bbeeyi y'ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me mac I wilobo tye ka medde ki medde ki telle I kin lobe mapat-pat, ludiro mapol tye ka byeko aloka loka I cuk. Man twero kelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I wel jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata eipuda lo akim kotoma akwap kere keda aiyalongong naka akwap, eomitos angicak luipu ebe ebuni esokoni aijulakin. Epedori ngin ayangaun aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma itiaisinei luka iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma ongmbo aci ma dria ri ni mu drile tualu e'yo ewaru politiki ni 'diyi pie, 'ba karakara e'yo amaza ni 'diyi e'yo ojaza cuu ma alia ri ega. E'yo 'di eco nga ojata okporu eji aje afa orodriru 'diyiniri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetaago by'amashanyarazi omu nsi yoona nibigumizamu kweyongyera hamwe n'obutaikirizana omu by'obutegyeki, abacencuzi baingi nibateebereza empindahinduka omu katare. Eki nikibaasa kureetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omuhendo gw'ebintu ebikuru.

eng_prompt: After months of economic uncertainty, consumers were finally starting to feel some relief. Many were surprised to see how affordable everyday items had become.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, abaguzi baali batandise okufuna obuweerero. Bangi beewuunyizza okulaba engeri ebintu ebya bulijjo gye byali bifuuse eby'ebbeeyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me peko me lim, luwil dong gucako winyo agonya. Dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma guneno kit ma wel jami me nino ducu odoko yot kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka amamus aijen nuka ikapun, apotu agwelak kogeutu aiyengun. Apotu itunga luipu koumokisi asesen eipone lo epatana adumun iboro lu itwasamao kanginipaaran.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi e'do asizu ava esu ra. Ba karakara eyi eca osutasi eyini e'yo afa 'bani ayu o'du driasi 'diyi ma aje ni ecazu ewakokoru ri ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutegyendesereza omu by'entaasya, abaguzi bakaba batandikire kuhurira obuhuumuro. Abantu baingi bakatangaara kureeba oku ebintu bya buriizooba byabaire nibibaasa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and coordination, the teams gathered for a final briefing. With all equipment in place and personnel ready, the countdown to the event had officially begun.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okukwatagana, ttiimu zaakungaana mu lukungaana olusembayo. Ng'ebikozesebwa byonna biri mu kifo era nga n'abakozi beetegefu, okubala okudda emabega ku mukolo kwatandise mu butongole.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki winye, dul tuku ne gugure pi lok me agiki. Ki jami tic weng ma tye i kabedogi ki lutic ma oyubbe, kwano wel dano me cito I yub ne dong ocake.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin keda arucokina, apotu itimun kotukokinos kanu airiamun nawasia. Keda iboro kere luejaas aiboisit keda eswamak lu ekapakina, aponi kogeunai aimar itunga luka epucit ngol.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini ti ecita ejizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da eyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea asizu. Afa dria 'bani ayuzaru 'diyi pie azini 'ba azi nga'ba 'diyi pie ngonde, kalafe 'bani muzu omu 'da ma alea ri e'do 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, tiimu zikateerana aha ruteerane rw'ahamuheru. Ebyoma byona biri omu myanya hamwe n'abakozi beteekateekire, okubara okuza omu mukoro kutandikire omu butongore.

eng_prompt: Investigations into the recent scandal have revealed troubling connections between various departments and external parties. As a result, some departments are suspected to have worked with the culprits.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza ku buvuyo obwaliwo gye buvuddeko kulaga nti waliwo akakwate wakati w'ebitongole eby'enjawulo n'abantu ab'ebweru w'eggwanga. N'ekyavaamu, ebitongole ebimu biteeberezebwa okuba nga byakolagana n'abazzi b'emisango.
ach_prompt: Kwed I kom bal ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto kubbe matye ikin dul mapat-pat ki dul mapat-pat manonge I lobo ma woko. Macalo adwogi ne, byek tye ni dul mukene gutiyo ki lubal ne.
teo_prompt: Angicak nuikamunitos abilibilio naka ikapun abu kitodu arucokina kiding iriongeta luegelegela keda luka akwapin nukokinga. Kanuka ngun, eomitai ebe iswamatos iriongeta ice keda ngul luiswamaete ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo onzi 'da ma dria 'diyi e'da e'yo ewaru eyi ecipi arakala ndundu eyi ma eselea amuti engapi kari 'di ma alea ku 'diyi pie 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ega kini enyati azi 'diyi nga azi 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza aha mishango eyabaireho juba, kworekire akakwate akari ahagati y'ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe n'abantu b'aheeru. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore ebimwe nibiteekateekwaho kukorera hamwe n'abakozi b'ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events, a thorough investigation is necessary. As part of this process, all the commanders will be questioned.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu kwetaagibwa. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda mu maaso, abaduumizi bonna bajja kubuuzibwa ebibuuzo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, kwed matut mite. Macalo but yub man, ki bipenyo ludito mony weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, ekotoi aingic ejok. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, eponio aingitingit engarenok kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, le 'ba ma vuti onda e'yo nde ma dria kililiru. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga 'ba dria komanda ru 'diyi ozi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events, authorities have decided to take immediate action. They are prioritizing the safety and well-being of the community by addressing the concerns raised by the victims.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, ab'obuyinza basazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Bakulembeza obukuumi n'obulungi bw'ekitundu nga bakola ku kweraliikirira okwaleetebwa abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Gitye ka keto cwiny gi i kom ber bedo pa lwak kun gitiyo i kom peko ma dano ma peko otimme i komgi okelo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, aseutu apedorosio aswam katipet. Eutasi kesi aisingarenit ayuwara keda aijar naka itunga kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nu elimunitos itunga.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with unprecedented challenges, many are left wondering about the current state of affairs. The news reports are filled with updates and developments that shape our daily lives.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi erwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo, bangi basigala beebuuza ku mbeera eriwo kati. Alipoota z'amawulire zijjudde ebipya n'ebigenda mu maaso ebikosa obulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki peko mapol tutwal, dano mapol pud tye ki ngeng I kom ngo matye katimme kombedi. Lok angea opong ki ngec manyen ki jami matye katime I kwowa me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio numam itodunitere, ipu itunga lu ejenete ejautene loka akiro kwape kwana. Ileleba iripotan luka iyemuto keda akiro nuitetiak nuiswamaete kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie, 'ba karakara eyi asi e'yo eyi ma wura curu'do ri ma dria. O'duko efuza 'diyi ga e'yo o'diru azini e'yo yi 'yepi ama edri o'du driasi 'diyi pie tre.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanagana n'oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo, baingi nibasigara nibeebuuza embeera eriho obwahati. Amahurire gaijwire ebirikugyenda omu maisho n'ebirikugyenda omu maisho ebirikukwata aha magara gaitu aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: As the global oil market fluctuated, many industries began to feel the impact. Consequently, transportation costs surged, leading to higher prices at the pump.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale k'amafuta mu nsi yonna kakyuka, amakolero mangi gaatandika okukwatibwako. N'ekyavaamu, ebisale by'entambula byalinnya, ekyaviirako emiwendo okulinnya ku bbaasi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma cuk me moo I wilobo lung olokke, dul mapat-pat ocako winyo adwogi ne. Macalo adwogi ne, wel cul me wot omede, ma oweko wel omede malo.
teo_prompt: Nejulakinor esokoni loka akinyet kotoma akwap kere, apotu ikampunin luipu kogeutu apupokinio. Kanuka ngun, apotu itiaisinei luka elose kiyatakinos, ido abu koyangau itiaisinei luikiara noi.
lgg_prompt: Odu ma cu wudrikurusi ndulu ri ni i ojazurisi, okalamvu karakara eyi e'doki e'yo 'da ma e'yo ega. E'yo 'disi, aje acipa ni 'diyi tu uru, e'yo fepi aje yi ma omgbo tuzu pari acizu 'diyi ma alia uru.
nyn_prompt: Obutare bw'amajuta omu nsi yoona ku bwabaire nibuhindahinduka, amakorero maingi gakatandika kuhurira oburemeezi bwabwo. N'ekyarugiremu, ebishare by'engyenda bikaruga ahaiguru, ekyarugiremu emihendo y'ahaiguru aha pumpu.

eng_prompt: For many individuals, the stability and routine that a job provides are essential for their sense of security. The uncertainty of financial independence can lead to anxiety and fear about the future.
lug_prompt: Eri abantu bangi, obutebenkevu n'obutebenkevu omulimu bwe gubawa bikulu nnyo mu kuwulira obukuumi bwabwe. Obutali bukakafu bw'okweyimirizaawo mu by'ensimbi busobola okuleeta okweraliikirira n'okutya ku biseera by'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Pi dano mapol, bedo ki kuc kacel ki tic ma kare ki kare obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi bedo ma cwinygi opye mot. Bedo agonya I lok me lim twero kelo lworo I kom anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanejaas itunga luipu, ainapakina keda ainapakina na ijaikini aswamukec eraasi nuepolok noi kanu ayuwara kec. Ationis na aipugaikin bon kotoma ikapun epedori ayangaun aiyalongong keda akuriau nuikamunitos oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi dri, asianzuru azini e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa driasi azi eyini fe ri eri orodriru eyini aa'zu ageitema be. E'yo 'bani ecozu aa'zu yi ma ngulupisi e'yo robianiri ma dria ku ri eco fe asi otiza azini orisi ewu drialeri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi, obusingye n'obuhwezi obu emirimo yaabo erikubareetera, nibikuru munonga ahabw'okumanya ngu baine oburinzi. Obutabaasa kwetegyeka omu by'esente nikibaasa kureeta okwerarikirira n'okutiina ebiro bya nyensya.

eng_prompt: In today's uncertain economic climate, many individuals find themselves trapped in jobs they dislike. Financial security has become a crucial factor in making the decision to pursue new opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna etali ntebenkevu leero, abantu bangi beesanga mu mirimu gye batayagala. Obutebenkevu mu by'ensimbi bufuuse ensonga enkulu mu kukola okusalawo okugoberera emikisa emipya.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye mapol, dano mapol gitye i dog tic ma pe gimaro. Bedo ki cente ma oromo dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I moko tam me yenyo gum manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loaronon loka ikapun, ewanyunitos itunga luipu ebe ejaas aswamisinei nu mam kesi ekotos. Agogong naka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun aseunet naka aimo arerengesio nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi azi eyini le ku 'diyi ma alea ci. Robia ma tambaza eca curu'do e'yo okporu 'bani e'yo 'duzu drileba o'diru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'eby'entaasya butarikwetegyerezibwa, abantu baingi nibesibira omu mirimo ei batarikukunda. Okutunga esente, kihindukire enshonga nkuru y'okusharamu kukora emirimo misya.

eng_prompt: In today's uncertain economic climate, financial planning has become more important than ever. As a result, individuals are increasingly prioritizing their savings to secure their future.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna etali nnambulukufu leero, okuteekerateekera ebyensimbi kifuuse kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. N'ekivuddemu, abantu beeyongera okukulembeza ssente ze batereka okusobola okukuuma ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko me lim matye ni, yubbe pi tic ki lim pire tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gitye ka keto cente gi me gwoko anyim gi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loaronon loka ikapun, erai aitemonokin nuka ikapun ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka ngun, epeleikinitos itunga aimono ikapun kanu aingarakin kes koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia, otuta e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria ri eca orodriru aga oku driorisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi robia eyi ma ta mbazu ewu drialeri ma tambazu ri 'du e'yo okporu ndeni.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for better healthcare solutions, the organization is exploring innovative ways to enhance community well-being. Their goal is to ensure that everyone can receive the care they need without unnecessary barriers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, ekitongole kinoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okutumbula embeera z'abantu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukakasa nti buli omu asobola okufuna obujjanjabi bwe yeetaaga awatali kuziyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom maber, dul ne tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak. Miti gi tye me neno ni dano weng gunongo kony ma gimito labongo gengo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian najokan, euta erionget aingic iwaitin lu itojokarere aijar naka itunga. Alosikinetekec erai awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumun amukian na ekotos kesi komam aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo arojo ni muke 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, amuti 'di ni geri o'diru 'diyi onda ongulumu eyi ma edri otuzu. Asisile yiniri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco azakoma eyini le 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'eby'amagara marungi, ekitongore kiriyo nikicondooza emiringo y'okutunguura entuura y'abantu. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga obuheereza obu arikwetenga hatariho oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals neglect regular check-ups and ignore warning signs from their bodies. As a result, they may be caught off guard by serious health concerns that could have been addressed earlier.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balagajjalira okukeberebwa buli kaseera n'obubonero obulabulwa okuva mu mibiri gyabwe. N'ekivuddemu, bayinza okukwatibwa nga tebali bulindaala olw'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'amaanyi ebyandibadde bikolebwako emabegako.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe gi keto cwinygi I kom pime kare ki kare ki bene pe gi keto cwinygi I kom lanyut me poyo wic ma tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, peko me yot kom ma onongo twero timme con twero mako gi atura.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu epalunit ainwakio duc ido mam epalunit aanyuneta nu ikwenyarete kotoma akwan kec. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kesi ajaut keda atiokisio nuka angaleu nuepedorete aitemokin sek.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asikini eyi ma rua andrita sa'wa driasi ri ku dika eyi e'yo bile ndu liza engapi eyi ma rua 'diyi ma dria ri ku. E'yo 'disi, e'yo eyi ma rua ala ma dria okporu 'bani ndra eco 'ye e'yo eyi ma aza ko drioru 'diyi eco nga eyi esu mile kokoru ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibarikufayo kukyeberwa buri kaire kandi tibarikufayo aha bubonero oburikubarabura kuruga omu mibiri yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibabaasa kutangirirwa ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaani obwabaire nibubaasa kukorwaho kare.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the hospital corridors, I couldn't help but notice the somber atmosphere that enveloped the wards. Each room held stories of resilience and struggle, filled with individuals facing their toughest battles.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambula mu kkubo ly'eddwaliro, nnalaba embeera embi eyali mu bisenge. Buli kisenge kyalimu emboozi z'obuvumu n'okulwana, nga zijjudde abantu nga boolekedde entalo zaabwe ezisinga okukaluba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I korot me ot yat, aneno kit ma ot yat onongo tye kwede. Kicika acel-acel obedo ki ododo me tekcwiny ki lweny, ma opong ki dano ma gitye ka lweny matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korido loka adekis, abu eong apedori aanyun ejautene loaronon loka iwodi. Ejaasi agola ngin keda akiro nuikamunitos agogongu keda ainingosit, ipu itunga luetereikina keda atiokisio nuetioko kakere.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria pari arojo ni 'diyi ma aliasi, ma econi ndra e'yo ewaru wadi eyi ma alea 'diyi ndre ku. Jo ale aliza alu alu 'diyi ma alia o'duko e'yo asi driza ni azini a'di 'diza ma dria 'diyi ga tre, 'ba yi ma ngulupi yini dri fuzu a'di yini okporu ndeni 'diyi be 'diyi be tre.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu bishengye by'eirwariro, nkaba ntarikubasa kureka kureeba embeera y'oburemeezi eyabaire eri omu bishengye. Buri kishengye kikaba kirimu emboozi z'okurwanisa n'okurwana, ziijwire abantu abarikurwanisa entaro zaabo ezigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: As the tension in the room escalated, everyone exchanged worried glances, fearing the worst. The detective's voice trembled as he revealed the shocking news about the ongoing investigation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kisenge, buli omu yatunuulira munne nga yeeraliikirira, ng'atya ekisinga obubi. Eddoboozi lya bambega lyatidde bwe yafulumizza amawulire ag'entiisa agakwata ku kunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde I ot, dano weng gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom gin ma obitimme. Dwon lakwed ne obedo ka myel ikare ma otito lok angea ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal I kom kwed matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kotoma agola, apotu itunga kere kowanyutu aiyalongong, ekuriaka nuarokok. Abu eporoto ngol kokuriaka nalimoria ngesi iyemuto luitukurianete nuikamunitos aingic na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako jo ale aliza ma alia ri ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, 'ba dria e'da yi ma eselea asi otiza si, yini orisi e'yo onzi ndeni ri si. Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi ma o'duko ri 'ye urisi erini e'yo onzi ecezu e'yo vuti ondaza ni mupi drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko omu kishengye ku bwayeyongyeire, buri omwe akareeba munonga, arikutiina ekirikukirayo oburungi. Eiraka ry'omwebembezi w'eihanga riketenga obu yaabaire nayoreka amahurire ag'omutaano agarikukwata aha kucondooza okuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Despite their busy schedules, many felt they should have made more of an effort to see him. Friends and family expressed disappointment over their absence during such a critical time.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalina eby'okukola bingi, bangi baalowooza nti bandikoze kyonna ekisoboka okumulaba. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda baalaga obwennyamivu olw'obutabaawo mu kaseera akazibu bwe katyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni onongo gitye ki jami mapol me atima, dano mapol gutamo ni omyero guket tek me nene. Lurem ki lugang gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi bedo peke gi ikare me peko eni.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges they faced, their passion for creativity remained unwavering. The band members gathered in the studio, fueled by their shared love for music.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa, okwagala kwabwe eri obuyiiya kwagenda mu maaso. Bammemba ba bbandi baakuŋŋaanidde mu situdiyo nga bakubirizibwa okwagala kwabwe eri ennyimba.

teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda atiokisio nuipu, apotu aminakec naka aitolomunun iboro kibiroros. Apotu imeban luka abenyak kotukokinos ositudio, kanu amina kec naka ikososinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma talasi, leta eyini e'yo ndundu eyi edezu ri awi okporu. Ba ongulumu ongo cozani 'diyi tra yi pari e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma alia, yi ma leta tualu ongoniri ma e'yosi.

eng_prompt: Authorities conducted a thorough investigation into the recent surge of traffic violations in the area. After gathering evidence, they identified several drivers who repeatedly disregarded the law.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baakola okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku kweyongera kw'obumenyi bw'amateeka bw'ebidduka mu kitundu gye buvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi, baazuula abavuzi b'ebidduka abawerako abaagaana okukolera ku mateeka.

teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio ongicata noi nuikamunitos abilibilio naka ikisila luka irotin kotoma aiboisit. Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret, apotu kesi kodumutu iderepan luipu lumam apodokinit ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi 'diyi 'ye vuti ondaza kililiru e'yo 'ba nzila onyoza ni 'diyi ma ongmbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu dereva karakara eyini azita vuti obipi 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents, authorities have decided to increase security measures. As a result, the roads are under heavy supervision.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, ab'obuyinza basazeewo okwongera ku by'okwerinda. N'ekivuddemu, enguudo ziri mu kulondoolwa okw'amaanyi.

teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac, apotu apedorosio kiyatakisi nuka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, eutai aanyanar irotin noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nzila 'da eyi ma pamvu andri okporu.

eng_prompt: For safety reasons, access to certain locations is restricted. Please be aware that the area is out of bounds.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eshonga z'eby'okwerinda, okuhika omu myanya emwe tikirikwikirizibwa. Nyabura we manya ngu omwanya tigurikwikirizibwa.

lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakola enteekateeka n'obwegendereza era nga balina essuubi, ttiimu yalemererwa okulowooza ku kabi akayinza okubaawo. N'ekinaavaamu, ekikolwa kijja kuvaamu ebintu ebibi.
