eng_prompt: After months of planning and construction, the community is excited to see improvements in local infrastructure. Residents have long awaited the completion of essential services to support their growing needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okuzimba, ekitundu kisanyuse okulaba enkulaakulana mu bintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Abatuuze baludde nga balindirira okumalirizibwa kw'obuweereza obw'omugaso okusobola okubeezaawo ebyetaago byabwe ebigenda byeyongera.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubu ki gedo, lwak tye ki yomcwiny me neno dongo lobo I kabedo gi. Lutedero gubedo kakuru pi kare malac tyeko yub me konyo lutedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aiduk, iyalamasi itunga asesen aitojokaareta kotoma aiboisio. Idarete itunga adaun apak naepol noi angetakin aiboisio nuepolok kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec lu iyasete.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi sizu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi ayikosi e'yo angu ezoma ni angu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndrezu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi te sa'wa ezu e'yo 'bani azi orodriru eyini 'diyi dezu eyini ani afa eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okuteekateekyera n'okwombeka, abantu bashemereirwe kureeba entunguuka omu byombeko byabo. Abatuuragye batwire nibategyereza okuhendera kw'obuheereza bw'omugasho, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo ebirikuguma nibikura.

eng_prompt: The community had been facing numerous challenges, prompting local volunteers to come together for a cleanup initiative. With determination and teamwork, they set out to improve the neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi, ekyaleetedde bannakyewa b'omu kitundu okwegatta ku kaweefube w'okuyonja. Olw'obumalirivu n'okukolera awamu, baatandika okulongoosa ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kanongo peko mapol tutwal ma oweko lutic me kabedo ne guribbe kacel me yubu lengo. Ki tek cwiny kacel ki tic kacel, gucako yubu kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuipu, ido abu isinyikok itunga luka atutubet aimorikikin kanu aitalaun. Keda agogongu keda aswam nepepe, apotu kesi kogeutu aitojokar aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini ani 'ba owitaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emuzu tualu e'yo angu 'da ma ale inizu ri 'yezu. Asi 'baza azini azi ngaza tualu ri si, eyi e'do angu ama agei ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu babaire nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi, ekyareteire abantu b'omukyanga kwegaita hamwe, kugira ngu bakore omurimo gw'okuboneza. Ahabw'amaani n'okukorera hamwe, bakatandika kutunguura ebyaro.

eng_prompt: The volunteers were eager to contribute to the community and support those in need. After receiving orientation, they were excited to engage with patients and staff alike.
lug_prompt: Bannakyewa baali beetegefu okuwaayo mu kitundu n'okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu. Oluvannyuma lw'okulambikibwa, baali basanyufu okukolagana n'abalwadde n'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Lumii kony gubedo ki miti me miyo kony bot lwak ki konyo lupeko. Ingee nongo pwony, cwiny gi obedo yom me lok ki lutwoo ki lutic.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luka aiyeyea aijaikin agangat nejaas itunga lu ican. Akaulo naka adumun aicoreta, eyalamasi kesi noi einer keda adekak keda eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Ba owi'ba 'diyi ma ava ndra afa fezu ongulumu eyini azini atita fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri. Bani imbata esuzu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ndra ayikosi e'yo nzezu 'ba azoru 'diyi pie tualu azi'ba eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abaheekyera bakaba nibenda kuhayo omu bantu n'okuhwera abatarikwebaasa. Bwanyima y'okutunga obuhabuzi, bakashemererwa kugamba n'abarwaire hamwe n'abakozi.

eng_prompt: After weeks of investigation, the journalist finally obtained the crucial documents. With the evidence in hand, the story was about to take a dramatic turn.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'anoonyereza, bannamawulire baasobola okufuna ebiwandiiko ebikulu. Olw'obukakafu obwali mu ngalo, emboozi yali enaatera okukyuka mu ngeri ey'ekitalo.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi cabit mapol, lacoo lok angea ne onongo waraga ma pigi tego. Ki caden matye I cing, lok ne onongo dong cok lokke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic, abu arotan iyemuto kodum apapulai nuepolok. Keda aitogogongoret, ebuni akiro aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti vuti ondaza ma vutia, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi esu asizu kokobi orodriru 'diyi ra. E'yo e'dapi kini e'yo 'da i'ye ra ri si, e'yo 'da ndra e'do i oja saaru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okucondooza, abanyamakuru bakahendera batunga ebihandiiko bikuru. Ahabw'obuhame obubaire buriho, eshonga ekaba eri haihi kuhinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: The once-thriving rural community has seen a significant decline in its population over the years. Many families have moved to urban areas in search of better opportunities.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo abaali bakulaakulana bakendedde nnyo emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo. Amaka mangi gasengukidde mu bibuga okunoonya emikisa emirungi.
ach_prompt: Kabedo me caro ma onongo tye ka dongo tutwal-li dong welgi odok piny tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Gangi mapol gudak I boma me yenyo gum me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Itunga lu ocaalo lu apol noi kes ewanyunitos aibiror naka enaaba loka itunga kokaru lu atuboros. Apotu ikalia luipu koloto otaunin aimo arerengesio nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu caluru 'diyi ma alia andra okporu 'diyi ndre e'yo 'ba yini ma kalafe esizu eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia ra. Familia karakara eyi mu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro abaabaire nibatunguuka, bareebire okukyendeera kw'abantu baabo okumara emyaka mingi. Amaka maingi gafurukire omu ndembo kuronda emigisha mirungi.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated and uncertainty loomed, fear gripped the hearts of the citizens. In search of safety and stability, many people ran away from the country.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera n'obutali bukakafu bweyongera, okutya kwakwata emitima gya bannansi. Mu kunoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu, abantu bangi badduka mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lworo omako cwiny anywali mapol ikare ma telle omedde. I yenyo ber bedo ki kuc, dano mapol oringo woko ki I lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor atiokisio keda amamus acamanar, abu akuriau kodum itunga luka akwapuwok. Kanu aimo ayuara ka ainapakina, apotu itunga luipu kokerata akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni tuzu uru azini e'yo ewaru ni e'daria, ori 'du kari anzi eyi ma asi. Ageitema azini asianzu ndazu, 'ba karakara apa kari ma aliarisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire, okutiina kukakwata emitima y'abatuuragye. Ahabw'okuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana, abantu baingi bakahunga omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the region has faced significant turmoil due to ongoing conflicts and natural disasters. As a result, countless individuals have been forced to flee their homes in search of safety and stability.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kifunye obuvuyo obw'amaanyi olw'obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso n'obutyabaga obw'obutonde. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bawaliriziddwa okudduka mu maka gaabwe okunoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, but lobo man obedo ki kuku-kuku mapol pi lweny ki peko ma poto atura matye kawot anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol guringo gangi gi me yenyo kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina aiboisit keda amumu naepol noi kanuka ingungeta keda atiokisio nu akwap. Kanuka ngun, aponi kobuikinai itunga luipu akerit oreriakec aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, angu 'da esu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi tualu e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi apa aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi angu tambaza azini asianzu ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi,ekyanga kitungire akaimukiriro ahabw'entaro n'ebihikiirizi ebirikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bagyemesereziibwe okuruga omu maka gaabo kuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances and ongoing concerns about public safety, the government has made a critical decision. As a result, the elections have been postponed.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa n'okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'abantu, gavumenti ekoze okusalawo okw'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, okulonda kwongezeddwayo.
ach_prompt: Gamente omoko tam matek tutwal pi peko matye ka time ki lworo matye I kom ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, kicoro nino me yer ne anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai keda aiyalongong naka ayuwara naka itunga, eswama apugan aseunet naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiekikinai aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza o'bi eyini ri ma dria, gamete 'du e'yo azi okporu ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba idri opeta 'da ma o'du drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etarikuteekateekwaho hamwe n'okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu, gavumenti ekozire encwamu y'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, oburuuru bwongyeirweyo.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the team was unable to gather all the necessary data on time. As a result, the information was received late.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, ttiimu teyasobodde kukungaanya biwandiiko byonna ebyetaagisa mu budde. N'ekyavaamu, obubaka bwafunibwa kikeerezi.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura, dul ne pe onongo twero coko ngec weng ma mite ikare ki kome. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo ngec ne let tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, mam etimu abu kopedo atukun akiro kere kotoma apak. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiyapai adumun akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyisi, amuti 'da awini e'yo dria lele 'diyi oku sa'wa dria si ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba esu o'duko nderi vile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etarikuteekateekwaho, tiimu ekaba etarikubaasa kurundaana ebihandiiko byona ebirikwetengwa omu bwire. N'ekyarugiremu, amahurire gakakyerererwa.

eng_prompt: Before any educational or cultural institutions can commence operations, they must adhere to strict regulatory guidelines. This ensures that all facilities meet the necessary standards for safety and quality.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ebyenjigiriza oba eby'obuwangwa nga tebinnatandika mirimu, birina okugoberera ebiragiro ebikakali. Kino kikakasa nti ebifo byonna bituukana n'omutindo n'obukuumi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod gangi kwan onyo tekwaro mo keken pe ocako tic, omyero gubed ka lubu cik matek tutwal. Man neno ni jami weng tye ki rwom ma mite me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Erongo isomeroi keda atekerin epedorete ageun aswam, ekot kes atupakin aicoreta nu ikisila. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe itodolikinete aiboisio kere adoketait naka ayuwara keda adoketait najokan.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di pari onita ni azini suruni 'diyi e'doni azi ngazu ku, le eyi ma obi azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti. Diri ne ra kini afa dria 'diyi ma wura kililiru e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma tambazu azini wura kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese nainga eby'obuhangwa gatakatandikire kukora, gashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'amaani. Eki nikihamya ngu ebyombeko byona nibihikiiriza omutindo gw'eby'okwerinda n'omutindo.

eng_prompt: Before attending classes, students were eager to find out the status of their schools amid ongoing regulations. They needed to gather information regarding any changes to their educational institutions' operational permissions.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannagenda mu bibiina, abayizi baali beesunga okumanya embeera y'amasomero gaabwe wakati mu mateeka agagenda mu maaso. Baali beetaaga okukungaanya obubaka obukwata ku nkyukakyuka zonna mu lukusa lw'amatendekero gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gucako kwan, lutino kwan gubedo ki miti me niang kit ma gangi kwan gi tye kwede kadi bed ni cik tye kamedde anyim. Onongo omyero gucok ngec i kom aloka-loka mo keken matye I twero me tic pa gangi kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Erongo elosete atukono, ekotosi esisiak ajenun ejautene loka isomeroikec kotoma aitikitik ikisila lu elosi akonye. Ekotosi kesi aituk akiro nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka alasisi nuka isomeroi kec.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi e'doni kilasi eyi ma alea ku, sukulu anzi eyi le saaru e'yo eyini sukulu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi onizu azita eyi ma eselea. Le eyi ma tra o'dukoti ojata ci 'diyi ma dria kokobi sukulu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi batakatandikire kwega, bakaba baine ekihika ky'okumanya ebirikukwata aha mashomero gaabo, ahabw'ebiragiro ebyabaire nibigyenda omu maisho. Bakaba beine kurundaana amakuru agarikukwata aha mpindahinduka omu baruha z'amashomero gaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing debates about educational access, there are concerns about the legality of certain institutions operating without proper authorization. As a result, some schools may open illegally.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okukubaganya ebirowoozo okugenda mu maaso ku kufuna ebyenjigiriza, waliwo okweraliikirira ku mateeka g'amatendekero agamu agakolera awatali lukusa. N'ekivuddemu, amasomero agamu gayinza okuggulawo mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me laro lok matye kawot anyim I kom nongo kwan, tye lworo I kom twero pa gangi kwan mukene me tic labongo twero maber. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mukene twero yabo gi iwi alii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos asioman, ejai aiyalongong nuikamunitos apedorosio nuka isomeroi ice luiswamaete komamei apedor. Kanuka ngun, epedorete isomeroi ice apukor komam etupitos ekisil.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara ni mupi drile e'yo onita ma esuta ma dria ri ma omvitaniria, asi otiza ci e'yo 'bani sukulu azi 'diyi ma azi ngazu rukusa kililiru kokoru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, sukulu azi 'diyi eco ti zi geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okuhanuura okurikugyenda omu maisho aha by'obwegyese, hariho okwerarikirira aha mateeka g'amatendekyero agamwe agarikukora hatariho rusa. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero agamwe nigabaasa kwigura omu buryo butahikire.

eng_prompt: Due to a series of unexpected events, the local authorities had to make a difficult decision. As a result, the schools were closed for various reasons.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebibaddewo ebitasuubirwa, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baalina okusalawo okukaluba. N'ekyavaamu, amasomero gaggalwawo olw'ensonga ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Pi jami mapol ma otimme atura, lutela me tedero omyero gumok tam matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kiloro gangi kwan pi tyen lok mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanuka iboro lumam eomitai, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kiswamata aseunet naetiono noi. Kanuka ngun, aponi kogolokinai isomeroi kanu akiro nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba opi sukulu eyi ma ti e'yo ndundu eyi si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebintu ebitarikuteekateekwaho, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakaba baine kukora encwamu egumire. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero gakakingwa ahabw'eshonga nyingi.

eng_prompt: As we navigate through the current economic climate, it's important to stay adaptable. The leadership team has been discussing potential strategies to enhance our operations.
lug_prompt: Nga tuyita mu mbeera y'ebyenfuna eriwo kati, kikulu okusigala nga tukyusakyusa. Ttiimu y'obukulembeze ebadde eteesa ku ngeri z'okutumbula emirimu gyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka wot I kare me can lim matye kombedi, pire tek tutwal ni omyero walok kit ma jami tye kwede. Dul pa lutela gubedo ka nywako lok I kom yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me tic wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina oni keda ejautene loka ikapun loakwana, ejokuna noi aijulanakineta. Auta etimu lo engarenone aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokaret aswam wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani acizu e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani curu'do 'diyi ma aliarisi, eri orodriru aa'zu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. Amuti driceza niri e'bi agbatara gba geri azi ngazu amavile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikuraba omu mbeera y'eby'entaasya eriho hati, n'eky'omugasho kuguma nitwetegyereza. Tiimu y'obwebembezi etwire nehanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguura emirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: After the estate was sorted through, it became clear that not everything had been accounted for. Family members began to notice that some of the late musician's things are missing.
lug_prompt: Bwe baamala okusunsula eby'obugagga, kyazuuka nti si buli kimu nti kyali kibaliriddwa. Aba famire baatandika okukiraba nti ebimu ku bintu by'omuyimbi eyafa byabula.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede, onen atyer kamaleng ni pe jami weng ki ngolo korgi. Jo me ot ne gucako niang ni jami pa lawer ma otoo ni mukene orweny woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor iboro, aponi kojenunai ebe mam iboro kere iwadikauna. Apotu lukokale kowanyutu ebe emamiatatar iceboro luka ayoon loatwan.
lgg_prompt: Bani lonyi 'da ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba awini e'yo dria 'diyi 'du ku. Ba familia ma alia 'diyi e'do ndre kini 'ba avuri ma afa azi avi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushoroora eby'obugaiga, kikarebeka butunu ngu ti buri kimwe kikaba kyabairwe. Abanyabuzaare bakatandika kwetegyereza ngu ebintu bimwe by'omweshongozi owafiire bikabura.

eng_prompt: After months of speculation and anticipation, the band finally announced their highly awaited comeback tour. Fans eagerly gathered for the press conference, hoping for exciting news about new music and performances.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteebereza n'okusuubira, bbandi yasembayo okulangirira okulambula kwabwe okwali kulindiriddwa ennyo. Abawagizi baakungaanidde mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire nga basuubira okufuna amawulire agakwata ku nnyimba n'abayimbi abapya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me byek ki byek, dul me wer ne dong otyeko cwalo lok angeya I kom wot gi me dwogo. Lucwak gucokke pi lok ki lucoo lok angea ki miti madit tutwal, kun gitye ki gen me winyo lok angeya ma yomo cwiny I kom wer ki luwer manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomisio keda aomisio, abu egurupu ngol kolimo ebe ebuni kesi abongokin. Apotu egangitok kotukokinos kanu einer keda lu iyemuto, aomitos ebe epote kesi adumun akiro nuikamunitos ikososinei luitetiak keda aitodianareta.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, amuti avita ni 'da azi asizu e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ma dria. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tra eyi avasi e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie, eyini asi 'bazu e'yo ndrizaru ongo o'diru 'diyi ma dria tualu avita eyi 'yepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okuteebereza n'okuteekateeka, aba bbandi bakahendera bamanyisa oruramburo rwabo orwabaire nirutegyerezibwa munonga. Abahagizi baketeeranira hamwe omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, barikwesiga amakuru agarikushemeza agarikukwata ahabyeshongoro ebisya hamwe n'ebyeshongoro.

eng_prompt: As our project continues to expand, we are bringing in fresh talent to enhance our capabilities. To ensure they are well-prepared, a comprehensive training program has been implemented.
lug_prompt: Nga pulojekiti yaffe egenda mu maaso okugaziwa, tuleeta ebitone ebipya okutumbula obusobozi bwaffe. Okusobola okukakasa nti beetegese bulungi, enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa mu bujjuvu ekoleddwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub megwa tye kamede ki dongo, watye ka kelo dano manyen me medo kero wa. Me neno ni guyubbe maber, ki keto yub me pwonye I tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini epurojekt wok apoloun, iuta sio ayangaun itunga luitetiak luejaasi keda atalanta kanu aikeuna apedorosiowok. Kanu awanyun ebe ekapakina kesi ejok, etolomun ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro.
lgg_prompt: Otita amavileri ni mu drile zoria, ama 'ba talanta be o'diru 'diyi eji ecota amani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Bani nezu ra kini eyi otu eyi kililiru, 'ba e'do otita imbatani 'ba dria eyini 'diyi 'ye 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti yaitu ku erikugumizamu neeyeyongyera, turiyo nitureeta entaranta nsya kutunguura emyoga yaitu. Okureeba ngu beeteekateekire kurungi, enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu etandikirweho.

eng_prompt: As the season approaches, coaches are assessing their players' performance and readiness. Many are expressing concerns about the level of preparation within certain teams.
lug_prompt: Sizoni bw'esembera, abatendesi beetegereza omutindo gw'abazannyi baabwe n'obwetegefu bwabwe. Bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku mutindo gw'okwetegekera mu ttiimu ezimu.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me pyem tye ka cok, lupwonye tye ka neno kit ma lutuku gi tye katuku kwede. Dano mapol tye ka nyutu lworo gi i kom yub matye I dul tuku mukene.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak, eutasi etuutoorok airereor eswamae loka aboliak kec keda akapakina kec. Itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongo kanu aitemonokineta nuka itimun ice.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni ecaria, imba'ba mupira avipi 'diyi eyi ma agata azini ngondeza ma ale andri. Ba karakara eyi asi otiza e'da wura otuta ni amuti azi 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'emizaano ku burikuhika haihi, abatendeki bariyo nibashwijuma emikorere y'abazaani baabo hamwe n'okweteekateekyera kwabo. Baingi nibereka okwerarikirira aha rurengo rw'okweteekateekyera omu tiimu ezimwe.

eng_prompt: Many children around the world are not receiving the foundational skills they need to succeed. It is essential to address the gaps in our current educational systems.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna tebafuna bukugu bwe beetaaga okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Kya mugaso okumalawo ebituli mu nkola yaffe ey'ebyenjigiriza eriwo kati.
ach_prompt: Lutino mapol I wilobo pe gitye ka nongo diro ma mite me cobo miti gi. Pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko matye I yub me kwan ma watye kwede kombedi.
teo_prompt: Idwe luipu kotoma akwap kere mam edumununete acoa na ekotos kesi kanu akerianar. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin atiokisio nuka asioman wok.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi isuni ondua okporu eyini le drile suzaru 'diyi ku. Eri orodriru e'yo onzi ama vile geri onita ni curu'do 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abaana baingi omunsi yoona tibarikutunga emyoga ei barikwetenga kubaasa kuba abasinguzi. N'eky'omugasho kukora aha buremeezi oburi omu nkora yaitu y'eby'obwegyese eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions with potential investors, we have identified several key partners willing to support our initiative. As a result, we are optimistic about securing the necessary financial backing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'abasigansimbi abayinza okujja mu bizineesi, tufunye abantu ab'enjawulo abeetegefu okuwagira enteekateeka yaffe. N'ekivuddemu, tulina essuubi ku kufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ki lutim biacara, wanongo lurem mapol ma gitye atera me cwako yub megwa. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ki gen I kom nongo kony me lim ma mite.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda agwelanarak, idumunit sio ipaupa luipu lu ekapakina aigang aswam wok. Kanuka ngun, ijaasi sio keda amuno naka adumun agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia 'ba lonyi vuti alezani ecopi ra 'diyi pie, ama isu 'ba azi ngapi ama be avasi 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, ama asi'baza be atita robia ni lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'abashubuuzi, tutungire abantu baingi abarikwenda kushagika enteekateeka yaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, twine amatsiko g'okutunga obuhwezi bw'esente oburikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for skilled workers, the organization has developed a comprehensive training program. To maximize its impact, they plan to train people in several parts of the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'abakozi abalina obukugu obweyongera, ekitongole kikoze enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa mu bujjuvu. Okutumbula enkola yaayo, bategese okutendeka abantu mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic ma ludiro, dul ne oyubu yub me pwonye mapol. Me medo adwogi ne, gitye ki yub me pwonyo dano I but lobo man mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuka aitutuoro. Kanu aitodolikin aswamuke, itemonokinete kesi aituutoonor itunga kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba onduaru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do otita imbatani 'diyi dria. E'yo erini 'ye ri ma omgbo otuzu, eyi otuta 'ye 'ba eyi imbazu kari 'di ma woko ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi abakugu kweyongyera,ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Kubaasa kukora kihango, nibateekateeka kutendeka abantu omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe omw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After gathering all the necessary information from various sources, he sat down at his desk. With a clear focus and determination, he began to craft the narrative.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obubaka bwonna obwetaagisa okuva mu nsonda ez'enjawulo, yatuula wansi ku mmeeza ye. N'okussaayo omwoyo n'obumalirivu, yatandika okukola ennyiriri.
ach_prompt: Inge coko ngec weng ma mite ki I kabedo mapatpat, en obedo piny I wi kom mege. Ki keto cwinye kacel ki tek cwiny, en ocako yubu lokke.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun akiro kere nu ekotoi kama ejaasi iponesio luegelegela, abu ngesi iboikin toma oicolongike. Keda apeleikinet naepol noi keda apodokinit, abu ngesi kogeu aitolomun akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo dria lele 'diyi trazu engazu pari ndundu eyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, eri ri i vile desiki ma dria. Asi 'baza kililiru azini asi 'baza be, eri e'do e'yo eceza 'da ede.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana amakuru goona agarikwetengwa kuruga omu myanya etari emwe, akashutama ahansi aha ntebe ye. Ahabw'okwerinda n'amaani, akatandika kukora enshonga.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and criticism, his unwavering dedication to the cause inspired those around him. As a result, he had many supporters.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi n'okunenya, obumalirivu bwe obw'amaanyi ku nsonga eyo bwazzaamu amaanyi abo abaali bamwetoolodde. N'ekyavaamu, yafuna abawagizi bangi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orwatte ki peko mapol kacel ki koko mapol, keto cwinye I kom tic ne okonyo jo ma orumu. Macalo adwogi ne, en onongo tye ki lucwak mapol.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda atiokisio nuipu keda aitoroneta, abu ainakina ke mama ejai akiro ngun kisinyikok ngul luejaasi keda ngesi. Kanuka ngun, ajaasi ngesi keda egangitok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi esuzu azini e'yo nzezu ra ti, asi 'baza erini e'yo 'da ma dria ri fe ava 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, eri ma 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ga tre.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi n'okujumirirwa, okwehayo kwe ahabw'ekigyendererwa kikagumyaho abo abaabaire bamwetooroire. N'ekyarugiremu, akaba aine abashagiki baingi.

eng_prompt: We have just received breaking news about the recent developments in the local community. Our reporter will tell us more.
lug_prompt: Twaakafuna amawulire agakwata ku bigenda mu maaso mu kitundu. Omusasi waffe ajja kutubuulira ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Pud wanongo lok angea manyen I kom jami matye katime I kabedo wa. Lacoo lok angea wa obinyutiwa jami mapol.
teo_prompt: Idumunit sio iyemuto lu iswamasi pac kotoma atutubet. Ebuni arotan iyemutokosi alimokin sio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ama esu nga lu o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi e'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Ama vile 'ba osisiani 'diyi nga ama dri e'yo nze dika.
nyn_prompt: Tutungire amahurire ag'omutaano agarikukwata aha ntunguuka eriho omu byaro. Omushaki waitu naija kutugambira ebirikukiraho.

eng_prompt: After months of unrest and escalating tensions within the facility, the authorities decided it was time to transfer him. Concerns about his safety and the potential for further conflict prompted the decision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutabanguko n'obunkenke mu kkomera, ab'obuyinza baasalawo nti kye kiseera okumukyusa. Okweraliikirira ku by'okwerinda kwe n'obusobozi bw'obukuubagano obulala byaviirako okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny ki telle I ot yat, lutela gumoko ni kare dong oromo me kobo kome. Lworo pi ber bedo mege ki lweny mukene ma twero bedo tye aye okelo moko tam eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka amumu keda aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu apedorosio koseutu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin ngesi. Apotu aiyalongongo nuikamunitos ayuwara ke keda atiokisio nuipu koyangautu aseunet ngin.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo asi omiza ni tupi pari 'dupi 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo kini eri sa'wa 'bani eri ojazu ri'I. Asi otiza e'yo ageitema eriniri ma dria azini e'yo ecopi e'dozu drile 'diyi fe e'yo 'duza 'di ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutabanguko n'obunkenke omu eirwariro, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okumuhindura. Okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kwe hamwe n'oburemeezi obundi, nibyo byareesireho okusharamu.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise, he hurriedly packed his bags for the long journey ahead. He knew that time was running out, and there was one person he needed to speak to before departing.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo, yayanguwa okupakinga ensawo ze okutandika olugendo oluwanvu. Yali akimanyi nti obudde bwali buweddewo, era waliwo omuntu omu gwe yali yeetaaga okwogera naye nga tannasimbula.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng ocako aa malo, en oyubo kicaa ne oyot-oyot pi wot mabor ma tye anyim. En onongo ngeyo ni kare ne tye ka tum, dok tye ngat acel ma omyero olok kwede mapwod pe oweko.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo, abu ngesi kisingaren aipikakin iboroke kanuka alosit naelwana. Ajeni ngesi ebe eutasi ainap apak, ido ejai idiopetunganan yenibusakinit ngesi einer eringa eloto.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria efuria, eri ombe i vile jurua 'diyi mbele mbele aci ezu drilia. Ni ndra ra kini sawa ri i deria, dika 'ba azi alu erini le e'yo nzezu eri be de nga po'di ku.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurugaho, akarahuka kuteeka enshaho ze ahabw'orugyendo ruraingwa oruri omu maisho. Akaba naamanya ngu obwire bukaba nibuhwaho, kandi hakaba hariho omuntu omwe ou yaabaire nayetenga kugamba nawe atakagyire.

eng_prompt: Everyone who met him felt an undeniable connection, as if he possessed a rare spark that set him apart from the rest. His unique perspective on life and infectious enthusiasm left a lasting impression on everyone around him.
lug_prompt: Buli omu eyamusisinkana yawulira akakwate akatasobola kugaanibwa, nga bweyalina ekintu ekitali kya bulijjo ekyamufuula ow'enjawulo ku balala. Endowooza ye ey'enjawulo ku bulamu n'obwagazi obusiigibwa byaleka ekifaananyi eky'olubeerera ku buli muntu eyali amwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: Dano weng ma gurwate kwede guwinyo kubbe ma peke ki akala-kala, calo onongo tye ki gin mo ma pe nen ma opoke ki joo mukene. Neno mege ma kite dok pat I kom kwo kacel ki mit kom ma en obedo kwede oweko lanyut maber tutwal I kom dano weng ma orumu.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan luapotu kiriamunos keda ngesi apuputu arucokina, bala ajaasi ngesi keda iboro luitegelikina luitegelikina kotoma luce. Aomisioitike na itegelikina nuikamunitos aijar keda aiyalama ke abu kojalak itunga kere luejaasi keda ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria ndra dri fu'ba eri be 'diyi etumu e'yo 'bani ega kokoru, ekile erini ovuzu e'yo azi nduni be erini eri 'bazu ndu 'ba azi 'diyi vurisi. E'yo erini ega idri ma dria azini ava erini 'bazu 'ba dria eri ma ageia 'diyi ma dria ri ku e'yo azi okporu ni i ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe owabaire amubugana akahurira akakwate k'amaani, nk'orikushusha ngu akaba aine ekintu kitari kya buriijo ekyabaire kimutaanisa n'abandi. Enteekateeka ye ey'omutaano aha magara hamwe n'okushemererwa kwe kukasigaho ekiteekateeko ky'omutaano ahari buri omwe owabaire amwetooroire.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the new policies implemented by the administration, many students expressed their concerns during the recent town hall meeting. They feel that the changes limit their freedom and do not consider their needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya amateeka amapya agaateekebwa mu nkola abakulembeze, abayizi bangi baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe mu lukiiko lwa town hall olwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Bawulira nti enkyukakyuka zikugira eddembe lyabwe era tebafaayo ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo cik manyen ma ludito gu keto itic, lutino mapol gunyutu lworo gi ikare me kacokke ma otime cokcok-ki. Gitamo ni aloka-loka ne gengo bedo agonya gi dok pe tamo I kom miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ainapeta nuitetiak nuka eyaitene, apotu esisiak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kotoma airiamunet naka etaun hall. Eomitos kesi ebe imikit aijulanakineta ailajara kec ido mam epodokinitos ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita o'diru driceza ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, sukulu anzi karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini ri mitingi aku ambu town hall niri ma alea ri ma alea. Eyi ega kini ojata 'da eyi ma drilemgbo oga dika eyi egani e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebiragiro ebisya ebyateirweho abebembezi, abeegi baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo omu rukiiko orwabaireho aha town hall. Nibateekateeka ngu empindahinduka nizikyendeeza obugabe bwabo kandi tibarikuteekateeka ahabyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: We must hold ourselves to higher standards and promote respect for one another. When individuals act in ways that harm others, it undermines the very fabric of our community.
lug_prompt: Tulina okunywerera ku mutindo ogw'oku ntikko n'okutumbula okussa ekitiibwa mu bannaffe. Abantu bwe beeyisa mu ngeri ezikosa abalala, kityoboola embeera y'ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Omyero wabed ki rwom ma lamal me woro luwotwa. Ka dano acel acel otimo jami ma kelo awano i kom luwotgi, man balo rwom me kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Ekot oni aitodolikin adoketait naepol noi kosodete aitopolor ayongit nejai yenice. Arai iswamaete itunga koipone kalo emunarete luce, emunarete aiboisio nuka itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Le ama ma 'ba ama ma ngulupi wura muke 'diyi ma alea dika ama ma fe inzita ama eselea. Ba azi 'diyi ka 'ye e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni nya'biliko fepi 'diyi 'ye, eri ongulumu amavile 'diyi eza.
nyn_prompt: Tushemereire kukuratira omutindo gw'ahaiguru kandi tukuzaana. Abantu ku barikukora omu miringo erikugwisa kubi abandi, nikishiisha entuura y'eihanga ryaitu.

eng_prompt: The ongoing strikes have disrupted the academic environment significantly. As a result, many students find it challenging to focus on their coursework.
lug_prompt: Okwekalakaasa okugenda mu maaso kutaataaganyizza nnyo embeera y'ebyenjigiriza. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi bangi bakisanga nga kizibu okussa essira ku misomo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Jemo matye kawot anyim obalo gangi kwan tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol ginongo tek tutwal me keto cwiny gi i kom tic gi me gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Apotu aidiya na elosi akonye itolitoli aiboisio nuka asioman. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit esisiak luipu apodokinit aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri mupi drile 'diyi eza e'yo onita ni 'diyi saaru. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi eri esu ewaru asi 'bazu eyi ma onita ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Akeimukiriro akarikugyenda omu maisho, katabukire munonga eby'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi nikibagumira kuta omutima aha mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After centuries of tradition and power, the monarchy faced a significant shift in authority. The people rallied for change, demanding that the estate be returned to its rightful owners.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ebyasa by'obuwangwa n'obuyinza, obwakabaka bwafuna enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu buyinza. Abantu baakubye olukungaana olw'enkyukakyuka, nga baagala ettaka lizzibweyo eri bannannyini lyo abatuufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cencwari mapol me tekwaro ki loc, loc pa rwot oloke tutwal. Dano gulego pi aloka-loka kun gi lego ni myero kidwok ngom eni bot wegge gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apugan keda apugan, abu ekabaka kodum aijulanakineta nuapolok kotoma apugan. Apotu itunga kitukokinos kanu aijulakin, ekotosi ainyakar alupok mama ejaasi ikulepek kec luka abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bini azini opi nyaza ma vutia, opi ma opi nyaza isu ojata okporu okpo alia ni. Ba 'da eyi tra eyi ojata ai'zu, eyini lezu 'ba ma ogo angu 'da eyi ma eipika a'da 'diyi vu vile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebyasha by'obuhangwa n'obutegyeki,obukama bukareeba empindahinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi. Abantu bakesharinga kwenda empinduka, barikwenda ngu eitaka rikagarurwa bakama baryo abahikire.

eng_prompt: After years of unresolved conflicts and misunderstandings, their relationship has deteriorated significantly. Despite her attempts to reach out, the rifts seem too deep to mend.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukuubagano n'obutategeeragana obutagonjoolwa, enkolagana yaabwe eyonoonese nnyo. Wadde ng'agezaako okutuukirira, enjawukana zirabika nga za maanyi nnyo okugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me telle ki telle ma pe ki tyeko, wat ikin gi oballe tutwal. Kadi bed ni en oteme me cobo miti ne, apoka-poka ne tye matut tutwal ma pe twero yube.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ingungeta keda amamus acamanar, adisiar noi eidicanekec. Karaida etamit ngesi adolokin, esubit bala mam epedorio aitemokin atiokisio ngun.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri azini erita ako yi ma eselea 'diyi ma vutia, yi ma esele co onzi onzi. Erini tro o'bizu yi ecizu ra ti, esele coza 'diyi ena kile aliru tu 'bani ecozu yi otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutaikirizana n'obutetegyerezana, enkoragana yaabo esiisire munonga. N'obu araabe yaagyezaho kuhikaana nabo, enjatika zireebeka nk'ez'amaani munonga zitarikubaasa kugarurwaho.

eng_prompt: The initial findings raised several questions that needed to be addressed. As a result, the team decided to delve deeper into the matter.
lug_prompt: Ebizuuliddwa ebyasooka byaleetawo ebibuuzo ebiwerako ebyetaaga okukolebwako. N'ekyavaamu, ttiimu yasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza ku nsonga eyo.
ach_prompt: Adwogi me kwed ma okwongo okelo lapeny mapol ma omyero kigam. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ne gumoko tamgi me timo kwed matut I kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu akiro nusodit kitolomutu aingiseta nuipu nuibusakinit aitemokin. Kanuka ngun, abu etimu koseu aingic akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani esu okorisi 'diyi eji zita karakara lepi 'bani azi ngazu yi ma dria ra 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'da ma eti ondazu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugiremu bikareetaho ebibuuzo bingi ebirikwetenga kukorwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, tiimu ekasharamu kwongyera kucondooza aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Following a heated altercation during the school assembly, several students were apprehended by the authorities. The situation escalated quickly, leading to a chaotic scene on campus.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi mu lukungaana lw'essomero, abayizi abawerako baakwatibwa ab'obuyinza. Embeera yayonooneka mangu, ekyaviirako akavuyo ku ttendekero.
ach_prompt: I ngee laro lok ma obedo tye ikare me gure pa lutino kwan, lutela omako lutino mapol. Lok ne omedde oyot-oyot ma oweko kuku kuku obedo tye I gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka engunget loepol noi kotoma airiamunet naka esomero, apotu apedorosio ikamasi idwe luipu. Abu ejautene kiyatakin katipet, ido abu koyangau amumu kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako okporu ni ma vutia okuta sukulu niri ma alea, 'ba drice'ba eyi obi sukulu anzi karakara eyi. E'yo 'da ma omgbo tu mbeleru, erini fezu ngiringiri angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutongana kw'amaani omu rukiiko rw'eishomero, abeegi baingi bakakwatwa ab'obushoborozi. Embeera ekeyongyera ahonaaho, ekyarugiremu akavuyo aha itendekyero.

eng_prompt: Many students are already struggling to afford their education, and raising costs will only add to their financial burden. The university should consider the impact of such a decision on its diverse student body.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bazibuwalirwa dda okusasulira okusoma kwabwe, era okulinnyisa ebisale kijja kwongera ku buzito bwabwe obw'ensimbi. Yunivasite erina okulowooza ku ngeri okusalawo ng'okwo gye kuyinza okukosaamu abayizi baayo ab'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol dong gitye ka tute matek me culu pi kwan gi, ki medo wel cente bimedo peko me lim I komgi. Gang kwan me yunibaciti omyero otam I kom adwoki pa moko tam eni I kom lutino kwan ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Eutasi esisiak luipu ainingosit kanu adumun ikapun luka asioman kec, ido aiyatakin ikapun luka esomero iyatakinete kesi noi. Ibusakinit eUnibasiti aomoom nuepedorete aseunet ngin aitodolikin esisiak luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci robia esuzu sukulu'a, dika aje otuza ni nga lu eyi ma robia ma omgbo otu. Le univasiti ma ega e'yo e'yo 'duza 'dileri ni eco 'ye sukulu anzi erini ndundu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibarwana kushashurira eby'obwegyese bwabo, kandi okwongyera aha bishare, nikiija kwongyera aha buremeezi bwabo bw'esente. Yunivasite eshemereire kuteekateeka aha kabi ak'okusharamu nk'okwo, aha beegi baayo ab'emiringo etari emwe na emwe.

eng_prompt: The situation is still developing, and we are gathering more information. Please stay tuned for further details as they become available.
lug_prompt: Embeera ekyagenda mu maaso era tukyakung'aanya amawulire amalala. Bambi sigala ng'oli bulindaala okumanya ebisingawo nga bwe bijja.
ach_prompt: Lok ne pud tye ka dongo, dok watye ka nongo ngec mukene. Tim ber ibed iwi yamo pi ngec mukene mapud tye.
teo_prompt: Eringa ejautene elosi akonye, ido iuta sio atukun akiro nuipu. Kilipit ibusakinit jo ajaut keda akiro nuipu kwape edumunio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di nga po'di zo dika ama e'yo eyi tra dika. Kirikiri le mi aa mile be e'yo azi eyi ma dria eyini ecazu 'bo ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Embeera ekiriyo neetunguuka, kandi turiyo niturundaana ebirikukiraho. Nyabura we guma oyeteekateekire kumanya ebirikukiraho ku birikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings and reminders about compliance, the market activity has become increasingly erratic. Many participants seem to be disregarding established guidelines in their pursuit of quick profits.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okulabulwa kungi n'okujjukizibwa ku kugondera amateeka, emirimu gy'akatale gyeyongedde okutaataaganyizibwa. Abeetabamu bangi balabika ng'abatafaayo ku mateeka agaateekebwawo mu kunoonya amagoba ag'amangu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki ciko dano mapol me lubu cik, tic me cuk tye ka medde anyim. Nen calo dano mapol pe tye ka lubu cik ma kiketo pi nongo magoba oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai ka aiitun luipu nuikamunitos aitup ikisila, mam esokoni iswamai ejok. Esubit bala mam itunga luipu epodokinitos aicoreta nu itolomunitai kanu adumun ameda na atipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza azini e'yo 'bani egazu azita vuti obiza ma dria 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, e'yo cuu ni 'diyi eca curu'do ewaru. Ba karakara fi'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da kile azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obi orodri mbeleru 'diyi ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi n'okwijusya ebikwatiraine n'okukuratira ebiragiro, emirimo y'akatare eyeyongyeire kuba etarikwetegyerezibwa. Abeejumbiremu abingi nibareebeka nk'abarikwehuzya ebiragiro ebiteirweho omu kuronda amagoba ag'ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Residents are growing increasingly concerned about their safety. Reports of missing persons have surged in recent weeks, raising alarms in the community.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bwabwe. Amawulire agakwata ku bantu ababuze geeyongedde mu wiiki eziyise, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero tye ka medde ki paro pi ber bedo gi. Lok me rweny pa dano omede tutwal I cabit ma okato ni, ma okelo lworo I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga aiyalongong kanu ayuwara kec. Apolor akiro nuikamunitos itunga lu eoliorete kotoma isabitin lu atuboros, eyangauni aiyalongong kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi otiza ageitema eyini ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. O'duko 'ba yini avizu 'diyi ma ongmbo tu sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea ra, e'yo 'da fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu orisi.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye beeyongyeire kufayo ahaby'okwerinda kwabo. Ripoota z'abantu abarikubuzibwaho zeyongyeire omu sabiiti ezihweire, ekireesireho okwerarikirira omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After conducting thorough research and analyzing various sources, we can confidently draw conclusions. Our discussions have led us to a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwekenneenya ensibuko ez'enjawulo, tusobola okusalawo n'obwesige. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwaffe kutuleetedde okutegeera obulungi ensonga.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki ngiyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo ngec, watwero moko tam ki tek cwiny. Nywako lok wa okelo niang matut I kom lokke.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka airereonor aiboisio nuegelegela, ipedori oni aitolomun aomisio. Apotu ipegeta wok ingarakisi oni amisiikin akiro ngun ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'yezu azini geri ndundu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama eco e'yo 'du asi'baza asi'baza be ra. E'yo amani onze 'diyi fe ama ni e'yo nde va kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okushwijuma oburugo butari bumwe na bumwe, nitubaasa kuhendera twine obwesigye. Okuhanuura kwaitu kutuhwereire kwetegyereza gye enshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for interoperability and cost efficiency in the telecommunications industry, stakeholders are exploring collaborative solutions. This initiative aims to streamline operations and reduce the financial burden on service providers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okukwatagana n'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya mu makolero g'ebyempuliziganya, abakwatibwako banoonyereza ku ngeri y'okukwataganamu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okwanguya emirimu n'okukendeeza ku buzito bw'ensimbi ku bawa obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me tic kacel ki dwoko piny wel cente ma mite I tenge me cim, joo ma timo tic mapat-pat tye ka yenyo yoo me tic kacel. Yub man tye ki miti me yubu tic ki dwoko piny rwom me lim I kom joo ma miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo iyatakinet lo aiswamanara ka aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun kotoma okampuni loka isimun, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu aimorikikin. Alosikinet na erai aitapatan aswam ka aitidisiar eipuda lo ikapun mama ejaasi ngul lu ijaanakinete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ti icita ni azini aje ma omgbo esizu okalamvu o'dukoti edrizu ri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, 'ba ambo ndundu 'diyi geri ti icita ni 'diyi onda. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo robia ni 'ba azakoma fe'baa 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'empurizagana n'eby'empurizagana nibyetengwa munonga, ab'eby'empurizagana bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okukorera hamwe. Ekigyendererwa ky'omurimo ogu n'okushemeza emirimo n'okukyendeeza aha buremeezi bw'esente ahari abo abarikuhereza obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing budgetary constraints and the need for fiscal reform, the government has decided to review its compensation policies. As a result, there will be a change in the payment structure for civil servants.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obuzibu bw'embalirira obugenda mu maaso n'obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka mu by'ensimbi, gavumenti esazeewo okwetegereza enkola yaayo ey'okuliyirira. N'ekinaavaamu, wajja kubaawo enkyukakyuka mu nsasula y'abakozi ba gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me byek lim matye kawot anyim ki miti me kelo aloka-loka I lok kom lim, gamente omoko tamme me ngiyo kit ma kiculu kwede dano. Macalo adwogi ne, aloka-loka bibedo tye I yub me cul pa lutic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ebajet keda eipud loka aijulanakineta nuka ikapun, aseun apugan airereor ainapeta ke nuka atacakinio. Kanuka ngun, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma aitac eswamak luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako bajeti ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi azini lezu ojata e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete asi e'yo 'du geri erini 'ba yi ofezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu ra. E'yo 'disi, ojata mu adri geri 'bani azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ofezu ri ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okuhindura omu by'emishoro, gavumenti eshaziremu kushwijuma enkora yaayo y'okurihirira abantu. Ekyarugiremu, nihaza kubaho empindahinduka omu mishara y'abakozi ba Gavumenti.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the budget and performance metrics, the committee has decided to make adjustments to the compensation structure. This decision aims to retain top talent and ensure competitive pay within the industry.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi embalirira n'enkola y'emirimu, akakiiko kasazeewo okukola enkyukakyuka mu nsengeka y'okuliyirira. Ekigendererwa ky'okusalawo kuno kwe kusigaza ebitone eby'oku ntikko n'okulaba ng'omusaala guvuganya mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor byek me lim ki kit ma tic tye kawot kwede, dul ne omoko tamgi me kelo aloka-loka I yub me cul. Miti me moko tam man obedo me weko dano ma gitye ki diro me tic ki dok me neno ni wel mucara tye marom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor nuikamunitos ebajet keda eswamae, aseun ekomiti aijulakin epone loka atacakinio. Alosikinet naka aomisioit ngin erai kanu aidar itunga luejaasi keda atalanta naepol noi kosodete awanyun ebe ejai abolobol naka ikapun kotoma okampuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita ajeni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'du e'yo ojata 'yezu geri 'bani 'ba ofezu 'diyi ma dria ra. Asisile e'yo 'duza 'di niri lezu 'ba talanta okporu 'diyi ma ta mbazu dika lezu 'ba ma esu musara a'bala ru okalamvu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi embaririra hamwe n'ebikwatiraine n'emirimo, akakiiko kashaziremu kukora empindahinduka omu nteekateeka y'okurihirira abantu. Ekigyendererwa ky'ensharamu egi n'okusigaza abaine etaraanta n'okureeba ngu hariho okurwanira kw'emishaara omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After carefully reviewing the circumstances and considering the perspectives of all parties involved, it has become clear that the chosen course of action lacks equity. Implementing this policy will not only disadvantage certain groups but also undermine the overall morale of the team.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera n'obwegendereza n'okulowooza ku ndowooza z'abantu bonna abakwatibwako, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ekyo kye baasalawo okukola tekyali kya bwenkanya. Okuteeka etteeka lino mu nkola tekijja kukoma ku kukosa bibiina ebimu naye era kijja kutyoboola empisa za ttiimu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro ngo matye katimme ki tam pa dano weng makwako lok eni, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo ma kiyero me timo ne pe ber. Keto cik man itic pe bi balo ber bedo pa dul mogo keken ento bene bi balo cwiny dano weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene keda aomisio nuka itunga kere, ecai cut ebe mam aseun aswamisioit ngin ejokuna. Aitodolikin ainapeta nu mam ebuni aitolitol igurupun ice konye ebuni aitidisiar iponesio luka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu kililiru azini 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma egata egazu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kini e'yo 'bani 'du 'di 'yezu ri ovuni e'yo ada be ku. Azita 'di ma vuti obizuri ngani lu ongulumu azi 'diyi eza ku te eri nga vini 'ba amuti nde 'diyi ma adriza onzi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enshonga n'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'abantu boona abarikukwatwaho, kimanyirwe butunu ngu enkora erikutooranwa terimu buringaaniza. Okuta ebiragiro omu nkora, tikirikwija kureetera guruupu ezimwe oburemeezi, kureka nikwija kuremesa n'emitwarize ya tiimu yoona.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent cost of living adjustments and the need to retain skilled professionals, the government has decided to review compensation packages. After careful consideration, it has been determined that the wages for each civil servant are to be increased.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi y'ebintu gye buvuddeko n'obwetaavu bw'okusigaza abakugu, gavumenti esazeewo okwetegereza enteekateeka z'okuliyirira. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, kisaliddwawo nti emisaala gya buli mukozi wa gavumenti girina okwongezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel cente me kwo matye kamede cokcok-ki ki miti me weko lutic ma ludiro, gamente omoko tamme me ngiyo kit ma kiculu kwede dano. Ingee tam matut, kimoko ni omyero kimed mucara pa lutic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijulakin etiai loka aijar keda eipuda lo aidar ipirioitin lu emisiaritos, abu apugan ocam airereonor ikapun lu atacakinio. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, etutubitai ebe ibusakinit aiyatakin eropit loka eswamak luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata aje idri nyazaniri ma dria eturisi azini lezu 'ba onita be 'diyi ma ta mbazu, gamete asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'bani 'ba yi ofezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu ra. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo kini 'ba ma otu musara azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire, hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okusigaza abakugu, gavumenti eshaziremu kushwijuma enteekateeka y'okurihirira abantu. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, kimanyirwe ngu emishaara ya buri mukozi wa gavumenti neeza kwongyezibwa.

eng_prompt: Health officials are reporting a concerning rise in illness across the community. Symptoms are spreading rapidly, leading to increased hospital visits.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baloopa okulinnya kw'obulwadde okweraliikiriza mu kitundu kyonna. Obubonero busaasaana mangu, ekiviirako okugenda mu malwaliro okweyongera.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka waco ni wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde tutwal I kabedo mapatpat. Lanyut tye ka nya oyot, ma oweko dano mapol tye ka cito I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak lu adekis alimor ebe iyata adekasinei kotoma aiboisio kere. Eutasi awanyuneta nuka adekasinei aisiarakin katipet, ido eyangauni aipejonokin adekis aiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'duko fe e'yo azo ma omgbo ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria. Wura azo 'da ma wura eyi i ere mbeleru eyini ani fezu 'ba eyini acizu arojoa 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara nibagira ngu oburwaire bweyongyeire omu bantu. Obubonero buriyo nibujanjaara juba, ekirikureetera abantu baingi kuza omu irwariro.

eng_prompt: Health officials have identified a potential outbreak in the area. As a precaution, individuals showing symptoms are being closely monitored.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bazudde okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu kitundu. Ng'obwegendereza, abantu abalaga obubonero balondoolebwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gunongo peko me poto pa two I kabedo eni. Macalo yoo me gwokke, dano matye ki lanyut tye kaneno gi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis kojenutu adeka na aticepak ebuni abwangun kotoma aiboisit. Kwape ayuwara, itunga lu itodunitos awanyununeta nuka ekorona eutasi aanyanar ejok.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu e'yo azo korona niri ni eco e'do angu 'da ma alea ra. Ekile e'yo eyi ma tambazu, 'ba 'ba eceta eyi e'dapi 'diyi ma pamvu one geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara bamanyire okubarukaho kw'endwara omu kyanga. Nk'eky'okwerinda, abantu boona abaine obubonero bariyo nibabashwijuma.

eng_prompt: Investigators are currently analyzing the situation to determine what went wrong. Initial reports suggest that there may have been multiple contributing factors.
lug_prompt: Bambega mu kiseera kino beekenneenya embeera okuzuula ekyabaddewo. Lipoota ezisooka ziraga nti wandibaddewo ensonga eziwerako ezaaviirako.
ach_prompt: Lutim kwed kombedi gitye ka ngiyo ngo ma otimme me niang ngo ma okato marac. Adwogi tic ma okwongo nyutu ni twero bedo ni jami mapol aye okelo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Eutasi kwana angicak airereonor ejautene kanu ajenun ibore yenerono. Itodunitos iripotan lusodit ebe aticepak ajaasi iboro luipu luapotu koyangautu ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi curu'do e'yo 'da ma ale andri afa i 'yepi onzi ri onizu. O'duko okorisi 'diyi ece kini e'yo fepi e'yo 'di 'yezu 'diyi ndra karakara.
nyn_prompt: Abakyondoozi obwahati bariyo nibashwijuma embeera kumanya ekyabaire kitahikire. Ripoota z'okubanza nizooreka ngu habaire hariho enshonga nyingi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent reports about unsafe working conditions overseas, community leaders have gathered to discuss the importance of awareness and preparation. They emphasized the need for young people to understand the potential risks involved in seeking employment in foreign countries.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku alipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ku mbeera y'emirimu etali nnungi mu nsi z'ebweru, abakulembeze b'ebitundu bakungaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okumanyisa abantu n'okwetegekera. Baakakasizza obwetaavu bw'abavubuka okutegeera akabi akali mu kunoonya emirimu mu nsi z'ebweru.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki I kom kwo me tic ma pe ber I lobo ma woko, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako lok I kom ber pa miyo ngec ki yubbe. Guwaco ni omyero bulu guniang peko ma twero bedo tye ikare me yenyo tic ilobo ma woko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos iripotan luitetiak nuikamunitos ejautene loaronon loka aswam kakwapin nukokinga, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aisisianakin keda aitemonokin. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka atumunak amisikin atiokisio nu ejai kotoma aimo aswamisinei kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru e'yo azi ngaza muke kuri ma dria kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu orodri mile oziza ni azini otuta ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo 'ba ode eyini e'yo ewaru eyini eco esu eyini azi ndazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi vazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha mbeera mbi y'emirimo omu mahanga g'aheeru, abebembezi b'ebyanga bateeranire hamwe kuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okumanyisa abantu n'okwetebekanisa. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'eminyeeto kwetegyereza akabi akari omu kuronda emirimo omu mahanga g'aheeru.

eng_prompt: Many individuals dream of exploring new cultures and advancing their careers overseas. However, the reality of working in a foreign country can often lead to unexpected challenges and hardships.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baloota ku kunoonyereza ku buwangwa obupya n'okutumbula emirimu gyabwe mu nsi z'ebweru. Newankubadde, obutuufu bw'okukolera mu nsi engwira buyinza okuleeta okusoomoozebwa n'ebizibu ebitasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki lek me nongo ngec me tekwaro manyen ki dongo ticgi ilobo ma woko. Kadi bed kumeno, lok ada me tic I lobo ma woko ipol kare kelo peko ki peko ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ejaasi keda airujasia nuka aingic inonosio luitetiak ka aitopolor aswamukec kakwapin nukokinga. Konye, abeit naka aswam kotoma akwapin nukokinga epedori ayangaun atiokisio nu mam iwomitai.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi orobi esu e'yo suruni o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu dika eyi ma azi eyi ma zozu kari amve 'diyi ma alea. Kani si, e'yo a'da azi ngazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'bani ega ku 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaroota okurambura eby'obuhangwa ebisya n'okutunguura emirimo yaabo aheeru y'eihanga. Kwonka, amazima g'okukorera omu mahanga g'aheeru nigabaasa kureetaho oburemeezi n'oburemeezi obutatebekanisiibwe.

eng_prompt: After years of innovative marketing strategies and exceptional customer service, the brand quickly gained a loyal following. As word spread about their high-quality products, more and more consumers began to take notice.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukodyo bw'okutunda obuyiiya n'obuweereza obw'enjawulo eri bakasitoma, ekika kyafuna mangu abagoberezi abeesigwa. Amawulire bwe geeyongera okusaasaana ku mutindo gw'ebintu byabwe, abantu bangi baatandika okubitegeera.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto diro me cat manyen ki miyo kony maber tutwal ki luwil, dul ne oyot-oyot tutwal me nongo lulub korgi. I kare ma lok i kom jami gi ma rwom gi malo omedde, luwil mapol gucako niang I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitolomun iwaitin luitegelikina luka agwelanar keda aijanakin naejok noi mama ejaasi agwelak, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu. Nealalakinia akiro nuikamunitos iborokec luka adoketait naepol, apotu agwelak luipu kogeutu aijen.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia geri o'diru tujari 'yezu 'diyi tualu azi ngaza onyiru tu aje'ba eyini 'diyi pie, okalamvu nde isu 'ba e'yo a'ita be 'diyi mbeleru. E'yo yi erezu yi vile afa onyiru 'diyi ma dria 'borisi, 'ba aje'ba ru 'diyi e'do e'yo 'du yi ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: Due to mounting financial pressures and a series of regulatory violations, the company found itself in an untenable position. After exhausting all possible alternatives, the board made a difficult decision.

ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim matye kamede ki turu cik mapol, dul ne onongo tye I kabedo ma pe twero cung iye. Ingee tic ki yoo mapat-pat weng, dul madoro tic omoko tam matek tutwal.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation about his whereabouts, the media was eager to get his side of the story. With the controversy surrounding his recent actions, they knew he was the key to understanding the situation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga bateebereza gy'ali, bannamawulire baali beetegefu okufuna oludda lwe ku nsonga. Olw'okusika omuguwa okwaliwo ku bikolwa bye gye buvuddeko awo, baali bakimanyi nti ye yali ekisumuluzo ky'okutegeera embeera.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me byeko kama en tye iye, lucoo lok angea onongo gitye ki miti me nongo lok mege I kom lokke. Ki apoka-poka ma obedo tye I kom tim ma en otimo cokcok-ki, guniang ni en obedo lagony me niang ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio nuikamunitos aiboisit ke, ekotosi arotak iyemuto adumun akiroke nuikamunitos akiro ngun. Keda ingungeta luejaasi toma aswamisio ke pac, ejenete kesi ebe ngesi epone loka amisiikin ejautene.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and rising threats, it is crucial for individuals to take proactive measures. Awareness of potential dangers can empower communities to safeguard their well-being.

eng_prompt: After years of disputes between neighboring property owners, tensions finally escalated to a legal battle. The community had been divided over the rightful ownership of the disputed land.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling rise in neurological disorders among children in certain regions. Health officials are alarmed by the growing prevalence of nodding disease, a condition that has devastating effects on affected communities.
