eng_prompt: Many individuals find themselves entangled in lengthy legal battles. As a result, the judicial process often drags on for months or even years.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beesanga mu ntalo z'amateeka empanvu. N'ekivuddemu, emitendera gy'amateeka gitera okulwawo okumala emyezi oba n'emyaka.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo gitye I lweny ma tero kare malac tutwal I kot. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me ngolo kop ipol kare tero dwe onyo bene mwaki mapol.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu edumununete awate kec kotoma ojisinei luewojak noi. Kanuka ngun, eyangaikinete ainapeta nuka etube ilapio arai bo ikar luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi e'yo a'di 'diza azita palaa sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, e'yo dwani ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi mu drile mba eyi ma alea, kani ata eli eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibeshanga bari omu ntaro z'ebiragiro ezirikumara obwire buraingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora y'oburamuzi neekira kutwara ameezi nainga emyaka.

eng_prompt: After weeks of investigation and countless interviews, he finally pieced together the puzzle. Everyone had their version, but he was determined to uncover the truth.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwerako ng'anoonyereza n'okubuuza abantu bangi ebibuuzo, yasobola okuzuula eky'okuddamu. Buli omu yalina endowooza ye, naye yali mumalirivu okuzuula amazima.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kwed ki lok ki dano mapol, en otyeko tyeko tyeko lokke. Dano weng gubedo ki tam gi, ento en omoko tamme me niang lok ada.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic keda aingisingisio nuipu, abu ngesi kopedo aimorikikin akiro ngun. Nginitunganan ajaasi keda akiro ke, konye ekapakina ngesi aingic abeit.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti vuti ondaza ma vutia azini ozita karakara yi ma tia 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu e'yo nde ma ti 'be tualu. Ba dria ma e'yo yi ma ngulupisi ci, te eri ndra asi 'ba e'yo adari esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okucondooza hamwe n'okubuuza abantu bingi, akahendera yaatunga eky'okugarukamu. Buri omwe akaba aine enteekateeka ye, kwonka akaba amaririire kumanya amazima.

eng_prompt: Despite the initial guidelines outlining their limited role, the members began to express their opinions on the matter. Tensions rose as the project progressed, leading to confusion about the committee's responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ebiragiro ebyasooka byalaga omulimu gwabwe omutono, bammemba baatandika okuwa endowooza zaabwe ku nsonga. Obunkenke bweyongera nga pulojekiti egenda mu maaso, ekyaviirako okutabulwa ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'akakiiko.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik me acaki onongo waco ni ticgi nok, lumemba ne gucako miyo tamgi I kom lokke. Lworo omedde I kare ma yub ne tye ka wot anyim, ma oweko anywena-nywena obedo tye I kom tic pa dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Karaida itetemitai nutupitono ebe ikidioko aswamukec, apotu imeban kogeutu einer aomisio kec nuikamunitos akirot ngin. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kotoma opurojekt kangol, ido abu koyangau aitolitol nuikamunitos aswam naka ekomiti.
lgg_prompt: Azita okori ni tro e'dazu ra ti azi yini ma ongmbo ni ovuzu were ri ma talasi, 'ba memba ru 'diyi e'do egata yini e'da e'yo nde ma dria ra. E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi tu uru otita 'da ni muzu drile ri ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyini ani aa'zu e'yo eyi ma dria ku e'yo committee ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro ebyabaire nibyoreka omurimo gwabo mukye, ba memba bakatandika kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo aha nshonga egyo. Obunkenke bukakurakurana na purogyekiti erikugyenda omu maisho, ekyarugiremu okubuzabuzibwa aha bujunanizibwa bw'akakiiko.

eng_prompt: After weeks of contemplation, she finally decided it was time to address the ongoing tension between them. Determined to clear the air, she will send a letter to her rival.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwerako ng'alowooza, yasalawo nti ekiseera kyali kituuse okutereeza obunkenke obwaliwo wakati waabwe. Ng'amaliridde okugogola embeera, ajja kuwaayo ebbaluwa eri gw'avuganya naye.
ach_prompt: Ingee lwodo lok pi cabit mapol, en omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me tyeko telle matye ikingi. Kit ma en omoko tame me tyeko lok ne, en bicwalo waraga bot ngat ma tye ka pyem kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aomoom, abu ngesi kodum ebe erai apak na aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas kidingikec. Apodokinit aitemokin akiro ngun, ebuni ngesi aijukar ebaluwa mama ejai loeboloboloete keda ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani egazu drinia 'bori ma vutia, asizu 'du asi kini sawa 'di ca e'yo ewaru yi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Asi 'baza be e'yo 'da ma aza kozu, eri nga waraga idri 'ba erini baka sezu eri be 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuteekateeka, akahendera yacwamu ngu nibwo bwire bw'okugonjoora obunkenke oburi ahagati yaabo. Ahabw'okugira ngu amaririire kwihaho oburemeezi, naija kwohereza ebaruha owaabaire naamuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple warnings about their behavior, the employees continued to disregard the established guidelines. Their actions ultimately led to serious consequences for the team.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalabulwa emirundi egiwera ku nneeyisa yaabwe, abakozi beeyongera okubuusa amaaso ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo. Ebikolwa byabwe byavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki ciko gi tyen mapol I kom timgi, lutic gumede ki kwero lubu cik ma kiketo. Timgi okelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom tim ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai kesi nuikamunitos iponesiokec, apotu eswamak inyikokisi apalunit aicoreta. Apotu aswamisiokec koyangautu atiokisio nejai etimu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani bile ndu liza fezu yi ma adriza ma dria ra ti, azi'ba 'da eyi mu drile azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku. Yeta yini 'diyi fe asizu e'yo onzi yi 'ye amuti yi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize yaabo, abakozi bagumiizemu kutahurikiza ebiragiro ebyateirweho. Ebikorwa byaabo bikarugwamu ebihikiirizi by'amaani aha tiimu.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to escape their mounting debts, the couple devised a shocking plan. They believed that staging a kidnapping would draw attention and sympathy, allowing them to disappear from their troubles.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwewala amabanja gaabwe agagenda geeyongera, abafumbo bano baakola enteekateeka ey'entiisa. Baalowooza nti okuwamba abantu kwandibasanyusizza n'okubasonyiwa, ne kibasobozesa okuva mu bizibu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek tutwal me gwokke ki I banya ma obedo kamede, lunyom ne guyubu yub mo ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni timo tim me mako dano bikelo cwiny ki kica, weko gi rweny ki I peko gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam naepol noi naka alakun apesenin kec, apotu ekiliokit keda aberu kiswamautu aitemonokinet naetiono noi. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitolot aikamanario naka itunga ebuni ayangaun aitim keda aitim, ijaikini kesi aibiror kotoma atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu tujara 'yezu mari yini tupi tu 'diyisi, 'ba iri 'diyi e'do otuta azi onzi ni. Yi a'i ra kini e'yo 'bani 'ba 'duzu okpo alia ri ni nga 'ba ma asi fe eyidri azini asi ndriza fe eyini ani e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi avizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho munonga okwetantara amabanja gaabo, abashwereine bakakora enteekateeka erikutangaaza. Bakaba nibateekateeka ngu okubuzaho abantu nikiija kureetaho okwetegyerezibwa n'okusaasibwa, ekireije kubabaasisa okwetantara oburemeezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation into their suspicious activities, law enforcement officials finally gathered enough evidence. The suspects were taken into custody early this morning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bikolwa byabwe ebiteeberezebwa, abakwasisa amateeka baasembyeyo okukung'aanya obujulizi obumala. Abateeberezebwa baakwatiddwa ku makya nnyo leero.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom timgi ma byek tye I komgi, lutic ma gwoko cik i agiki ne gucoko caden ma oromo. Kimako jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi odiko matin.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol noi nuikamunitos aswamisinei kec, apotu ipolisin kodumutu ajenanut naedolit. Aponi owenarai lu ekamunitai atupuruc na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'yeta yini 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi oku asizu afa ecetaru 'diyi ra. Ba 'du 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo 'diyi arujoa o'biti 'dosi drioru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa aha bikorwa byabo ebirikuteekwateekwaho, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakahendera barundaana obujurizi oburikumara. Abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro, bakwasirwe omu kihome omu kasheshe k'erizooba.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to resolve the situation, the group decided to comply with the demands. After much debate, they ultimately agreed that sending money was the only way to ensure their safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola embeera, ekibinja kyasalawo okugondera ebyetaago. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga ddene, oluvannyuma bakkiriziganya nti okusindika ssente y'engeri yokka ey'okukuumamu obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek tutwal me tyeko peko ne, dul ne omoko tamgi me cobo miti gi. Ingee laro lok mapol, gumoko ni cwalo cente keken aye yoo me gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam naepol noi aitemokin ejautene, apotu egurupu ocamutu aitup nu ekotosi kesi. Akaulo naka epeget loepol, apotu kesi ocamutu ebe aijukar ikapun ngesi epone ediope bon loka ayuwar kesi.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu okporu, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'bani le 'diyi 'yezu. Agbatara angiri ma vutia, eyi ai ra kini geri lu eyini ecozu eyi ma tambazu ri robia ma ti pezu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho munonga kumaraho oburemeezi, guruupu ekasharamu kukuratira ebyetengo. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, bakaikirizana ngu okwohereza sente nigwo muhanda gwonka gw'okurinda amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After a long journey filled with anticipation, the players gathered their belongings and prepared to step off the bus. Excitement buzzed in the air as they approached the venue for the big event.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olugendo oluwanvu olwali lujjudde okweraliikirira, abazannyi baakuŋŋaanya ebintu byabwe ne beetegekera okuva mu bbaasi. Essanyu lyabunye mu bbanga nga bwe basemberera ekifo ky'omukolo omunene.
ach_prompt: Ingee wot mabor ma opong ki byek, lutukoni guguro jami gi ka giyube me weko bac. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma gubedo cok ki kabedo me yub madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka alosit apak naepol noi, apotu aboliak kitukokinos iborokec kosodete aitemonokin anyoun kobasi. Apol noi aiyalama kotoma okwam neyapiete kesi aiboisit naka epucit loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Aci izuru asi 'baza be 'bori ma vutia, 'ba avitani 'diyi tra yi ma afa yi azini yi otu yi fuzu basiarisi ra. Ayiko fu angu ma alea eyini ecazu pari 'yeta ambo 'da ni ri ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orugyendo ruraingwa, abazaani bakarundaana ebintu byabo beeteekateekyera kuruga omu baasi. Okushemererwa kukarebeka omu mwanya baaba bari haihi n'omwanya gw'omukoro muhango.

eng_prompt: Excitement filled the air as the teams prepared for the championship. Fans packed their bags and set off on a journey to support their favorite players.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga nga ttiimu zeetegekera empaka za bannantammegwa. Abawagizi baakungaanya ensawo zaabwe ne batandika olugendo okuwagira abazannyi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma tim ne tye ka yubbe pi pyem tuku odilo. Lucwak tuku guyubo kicaa gi ka gucako wot me cwako lutuku ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma okwam kwape iuta itimun aitemonokin kanuka abolobol. Apotu egangitok ipikakisi ipukoi kec kosodete alosit aigang aboliak kec.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu oli alia amuti avita ni 'diyi ni yi oturia avita avita ni 'diyi ma alia. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tra yi vile jurua 'diyi azini yi e'do aci yini atita fezu 'ba avita avipi yini lele tu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Akashemererwa kakaija omu mwanya obu tiimu zaabaire nizetebekanisiza empaka z'empaka z'omupiira. Abahagizi bakapakira enshaho zaabo batandika orugyendo rw'okushagika abazaani baabo abu barikukunda.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and anticipation, she finally arrived at the bustling airport. Her heart raced with excitement as she scanned the crowd for familiar faces.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'okusuubira, yatuuka ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi ekirimu abantu abangi. Omutima gwe gwali gukulukuta olw'essanyu bwe yali anoonya ffeesi ze yali amanyi mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe ki byek, en dong oo I bar dege ma dano dwong iye tutwal. En obedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma obedo ka ngiyo wang dano ma en ngeyo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitemonokin keda aomisio, abu ngesi kodolu kosawe loka idegei loejaasi keda itunga luipu noi. Abu etau ke kobwo kanu aiyalama nautar ngesi airereor itunga kanu aanyun ereetin lu ajenete ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otuta 'yezu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca asizu ndege pari 'ba eyini acizu 'diyi ma alea ra. Eri ma asi nzu avasi erini 'ba ongulumua 'diyi ma ale andriria andretia erini nile 'diyi ndreria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateeka, ahamuheru akahika aha kishayi ky'enyonyi ekyabaire kirimu abantu baingi. Omutima gwe gukateera munonga ahabw'okushemererwa obu yaabaire naashwijuma abantu kureeba amaisho agu yaabaire naamanya.

eng_prompt: After months of feeling lonely and unfulfilled, he finally decided to open his heart again. It was unexpected, but he found himself drawn to someone new.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'awulira ekiwuubaalo era nga tamativu, yasalawo okuddamu okuggulawo omutima gwe. Kyali tekisuubirwa naye yeesanga ng'asikirizibwa eri omuntu omupya.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me bedo kene dok ma pe cwinye yom, en dong oyero me yabo cwinye odoco. Obedo gin ma pe byek tye I kome, ento en onongo ni en tye ki miti I kom ngat mukene manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyalongong ido komamei aiyalama, abu ngesi koseu apukor etau ke bobo. Mam ngesi aomit ngun, konye abu ngesi kodum ebe emina ngesi itunganan yenitetet.
lgg_prompt: Mba erini aa'zu a'dule azini ava kokoru 'bori ma vutia, asizu asi 'du asi i ma asi ma ti zi dika. Eri ndra e'yo erini ega kuri'i, te eri isu i ma asi 'ba azini o'diru vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okushemererwa n'okugira eihamba, akasharaho kwiguraho omutima gwe ogundi murundi. Kikaba kitarikwetegyerezibwa, kwonka akeeshangwa naakundwa omuntu omusya.

eng_prompt: Due to a recent violation of company policy, management has decided to take disciplinary action. As a result, he is not allowed to work anymore.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumenya amateeka ga kampuni gyebuvuddeko awo, abaddukanya kampuni basazeewo okubakangavvula. N'ekyavaamu, takyakkirizibwa kukola.
ach_prompt: Pi bal me turu cik me kampuni ma otime cokcok-ki, ludito dul ne gumoko tamgi me miyo pwod. Macalo adwogi ne, pe dong kiyee ki en me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibil ainapeta nuka ekampuni pac, abu eyaitene kitutub aitisilario. Kanuka ngun, mam bobo ecamakitai ngesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo azita kamboni ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, 'ba driceza ni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo driceza ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba leni eri dri azi ngazu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhenda ebiragiro bya kampuni, abarikukurira ekitongore bashaziremu kubonerezibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, tarikwikirizibwa kukora.

eng_prompt: In order to finalize her proposal, she needs to present her ideas to the board. Time is running out, and their feedback is crucial for her project’s success.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okumaliriza ekiteeso kye, yeetaaga okwanjula ebirowoozo bye eri akakiiko. Obudde buweddewo, era okuddibwamu kwabwe kwa mugaso nnyo ku buwanguzi bwa pulojekiti ye.
ach_prompt: Me tyeko tam ma mege, omyero en otit tam ma mege bot dul madoro tic. Cawa tye ka tum, dok tamgi pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu angetakin aomisioitike, ibusakinit ngesi aitodiar aomisioke mama ejaasi lukapolok. Euta apak ainang, ido epolok noi aomisio kec kanu akerianut naka epurojekt ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini leleri dezu, le eri ma ece egata ivile 'diyi board dri ra. Sa'wa ni i deria, dika egata yini 'diyi orodriru e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kumaririza ekiteiso kye, ashemereire kworeka ebiteekateeko bye omu kakiiko. Obwire buriyo nibuhwaho, kandi okugarukamu kwabo n'okw'omugasho munonga aha businguzi bwa purogyekiti ye.

eng_prompt: Despite her best efforts to keep track of her schedule, she found herself overwhelmed with work. As a result, she had missed the previous meeting.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yakola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba nti agenda mu maaso n'emirimu gye, yawulira ng'emirimu gimusukkiridde. N'ekyavaamu, yali abuze olukungaana olwasooka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en otute matek me lubo yub ma en tye kwede, en onongo ni tic tye mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, en okeng kacokke ma okato.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi iswama nuepedori kere kanu aitodolikin ainapeta ke, abu ngesi kodum ebe epol ngesi keda aswam. Kanuka ngun abu ngesi kotwania airiamunet natubor.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro okpo 'bazu sawa erini 'diyi ma vuti obizu ra ti, eri isu i azi be tre. E'yo 'disi, eri ece ndra mitingi andra okori ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kukuratira enteekateeka ye, akeeshangwa aine emirimo mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, akafeerwa orukiiko orwahwaireho.

eng_prompt: The ownership of the land has been a topic of debate for years. Many residents are unsure about the boundaries and who has rights to the various parcels.
lug_prompt: Obwannannyini ku ttaka lino bubadde bwakubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo okumala emyaka. Abatuuze bangi tebakakasa nsalo n'ani alina obuyinza ku poloti ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Laro ngom eni obedo lok me laro lok pi mwaki mapol. Lutedero mapol pe tye ki ngec matut I kom wang lobo ki anga matye ki twero I kom jami mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Angosibib naka alupok erai akirot na epeget adaun ikar luipu. Mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos ikoruo keda lu ejaas keda apedorosio nuka alupok nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nyaku 'da ma eipika niri ebi ovu e'yo agbatara ni eli karakara eyi ma alea. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi nini e'yo boda eyini 'diyi ma dria ku dika a'di ma drilemgbo angu ndundu 'da eyi ma dria ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Obugabe bw'eitaka, butwire nibuhanuurwaho kumara emyaka mingi. Abatuuragye abaingi tibarikuhamya ensharo hamwe n'oha oine obugabe aha paasi ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing financial difficulties and lack of funding, the management has made a difficult decision. After careful consideration, they have concluded that the facility can no longer sustain its activities.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ensimbi ebigenda mu maaso n'ebbula ly'ensimbi, abakulembeze bakoze okusalawo okukaluba. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, baamalirizza nti ekifo tekisobola kuddukanya mirimu gyakyo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim matye kawot anyim ki bedo peke pa lim, ludito tic gumoko tam matek tutwal. Ingee tam matut, gumoko ni ot yat ne dong pe twero medde ki ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nuka ikapun keda amamus na apiyai, eswamau eyaitene aseunet na etiono. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu kesi kongicutu ebe mam bobo aduketait ngin epedori ainyikokin aswamuke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu robia ako be, driceza 'da 'du e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu e'yo kini pari 'da econi curu'do azi erini 'diyi 'ye ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'eibura ry'esente, abarikukurira ekitongore bakozire encwamu egumire. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, baherize kuhendera ngu eikorero tiririkubaasa kugumizamu n'emirimo yaryo.

eng_prompt: With advancements in mobile technology and customer service, telecom companies have streamlined the process for users. As a result, individuals no longer face long delays when dealing with lost or damaged sim cards.
lug_prompt: N'enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya w'amasimu n'obuweereza eri bakasitoma, kkampuni z'amasimu zitereezezza enkola eri abakozesa. N'ekivuddemu, abantu ssekinnoomu tebakyalina kulwawo nga bakolagana ne kaadi z'amasimu ezaabuze oba ezaayonoonese.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa diro me cim cing ki kony ma kimiyo ki luwil, dul cim mapat-pat oweko tic obedo yot tutwal ki luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano pe dong nongo galle mapol ka gitye ka tic ki kad me cim ma orweny onyo ma obale.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka etatai loakwana keda ejanakine lo agwelak, epatana ikampunin luka isimun aitemokin nu itwasamaete kesi. Kanuka ngun, mam bobo itunga etereikina keda aiyap naepol noi kotoma aitemokin akaadin nuka isimun luemamete arai lu emunaritos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia simu ni 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu tualu azakoma feza aje'ba eyini risi, amuti simu ni 'diyi otu geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi 'ba eyini. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi esuni curu'do sawa ezaza angiri ku yini e'yo 'yezu kadi simu ni avile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka omu tekinorogye y'esimu hamwe n'obuheereza bw'abaguzi, kampuni z'eby'empurizagana zitunguurize emirimo y'abarikugikoresa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu tibarikukyerererwa kukora aha kaadi z'esimu ezabuzire nainga ezononekire.

eng_prompt: Due to a significant decline in demand for traditional mobile services, the telecommunications industry faced unprecedented challenges. As a result, the companies had stopped issuing sim cards.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'obwetaavu bw'empuliziganya y'oku ssimu eya bulijjo, ebyempuliziganya byafuna okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo. N'ekyavaamu, kampuni zaali zikomye okugaba kaadi z'amasimu.
ach_prompt: Pi dwogo piny pa miti pa lutic me cim macon, tic me cim onongo peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ne gujuko miyo kad me cim.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aikidiokus na eipud loka isimun lukolo, abu erionget loka isimun kodum atiokisio nuipu noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikampunin ngun kopalasi aijaikin akaadin nuka isimun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo simu ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra ri ma e'yosi, okalamvu e'yo oyuza ni 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru ndundu 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, amuti nde 'diyi ku kadi simu ni 'diyi feza ja.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeera kw'eby'empurizagana y'amasimu eya ira, eby'empurizagana bikashanga oburemeezi butari bwa buriijo. Ekyarugiremu, kampuni zikaba zirekyeireho okugaba kaadi z'esimu.

eng_prompt: Many families in the area are struggling to make ends meet. With rising costs of living, basic necessities have become increasingly difficult to manage.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu galwana okweyimirizaawo. Olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya, ebintu ebyetaagibwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo byeyongedde okuba ebizibu okuddukanya.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol me kabedo eni gitye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Ki mede pa wel cente me kwo, jami ma mite pi kwo dong odoko tek tutwal me tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu luka atutubet ngin eutasi ainingosit kanu aijar. Keda aiyatakin na etiai loka aijar, etiono noi adumun iboro luipudasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Familia angu 'da ma alea karakara 'diyi dri ci afa dria esuzu. Aje idri nyazani tuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi eca curu'do mbazaru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga gaine oburemeezi bw'okwebaisaho. Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera, ebyetengo by'abantu bigumire kukora.

eng_prompt: The company has been struggling financially for several years, accumulating significant liabilities. As a result, a lot of money is needed to clear the debt.
lug_prompt: Kampuni ebadde erwanagana mu by'ensimbi okumala emyaka egiwerako, ng'erina amabanja mangi. N'ekivuddemu, ssente nnyingi zeetaagibwa okusasula ebbanja.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo ka canne ki lok me lim pi mwaki mapol, ma oweko tye ki banya mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, cente madwong mite me culu banya ne.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ekampuni ngol keda ationis naka ikapun adaun ikar luipu, ido ejaasi keda apesenin nuipu noi. Kanuka ngun, ekotoi ikapun luipu kanu aitac apesenin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi dri ci e'yo robia nirisi eli karakara eyi ma alea, erini e'yo mari ni 'diyi trazu 'bo. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma esu robia angiri mari 'da ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kitwire nikitahirira omu by'empiiha kumara emyaka mingi, kitungire amabanja maingi. N'ekyarugiremu, esente nyingi nizetengwa kushashura eibanja.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for healthcare professionals, the government has announced a new initiative to recruit medical personnel from abroad. This move aims to address the shortage of qualified doctors in the country.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abasawo obweyongera, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuyingiza abasawo okuva ebweru w'eggwanga. Kino kigendererwamu okumalawo ebbula ly'abasawo abakugu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic yoto kom, gamente otito yub manyen me coyo lutic yoto kom ki ilobo ma woko. Yub man tye me tyeko peko me nok pa ludaktari ma gukwano I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka eswamak luka angaleu, abu apugan kolimo epone loitetet loka aitolom eswamak luka adekis luka akwapin nukokinga. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin ekadakada loka imurok lu itutuoritai kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu risi, gamete azi e'yo o'diru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi sizu engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'di lezu e'yo dakitari onita be kari ma alia 'diyi ma ako ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'abakugu omu by'amagara obweyongyeire, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okuheereza abashaho emirimo kuruga aheeru y'eihanga. Ekigyendererwa n'okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eibura ry'abashaho abatendekirwe omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: After weeks of discussions and negotiations, the team finally reached a consensus. With all stakeholders on board, they eagerly awaited the final approval.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateesa n'okuteesa, ttiimu yatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Nga bonna abakwatibwako bali wamu, balindirira n'obwagazi okukakasibwa okusembayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me nywako lok ki winye, joo ne dong guwinye. Ki joo weng matye ki twero I kom lok eni, gubedo kakuru ki miti me nongo twero me agiki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, abu etimu kodolok acamanara. Keda itunga kere luejaasi toma, apotu kesi idarakisi noi aitigogongio na awasia.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara e'yo onzezu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu ti ecita ra. Ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi pie, eyi te asi driasi driwala asizu ri te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuhanuura n'okuteesa, tiimu ekahendera yaikirizana. Baine boona abu kirikukwataho, bakarinda n'ekihika kwikirizibwa okw'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of repeat offenders in the community, local authorities seem to be turning a blind eye. Many residents are frustrated and confused by the lack of action taken to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Wadde omuwendo gw'abamenyi b'amateeka abazzeemu mu kitundu gweyongedde, ab'obuyinza balabika tebafaayo. Abatuuze bangi bennyamivu era batabuddwa olw'obutakola ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel lutim bal matye ka medde tutwal I kabedo wa, lutela me tedero nen calo pe tye ka neno ne. Lutedero mapol cwinygi pe yom dok pe gingeyo ngo me atima me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga lu iswamaete abilak ikisila kotoma atutubet, esubit bala mam apedorosio nuka atutubet epalunit. Apotu itunga luipu itolitolunos naarai emamei ibore iswamao kanu aitemokin ationis ngin.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea ra ti, 'ba okpo e'ipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da kile mile ozi e'yo eyi ma dria ku. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ovu candisi azini osuzaru e'yo 'bani 'ye e'yo 'da ma aza kozu kurisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abakozi b'ebihagaro omu byaro, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro nibareebeka nk'abarikuziba amaisho. Abatuuragye abaingi tibarikwetegyerezibwa ahabw'okuba tihaine ekikozirwe kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Despite their growing international presence, the organization has yet to establish a foothold in this region. As a result, they do not have a representative in the country.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okubeerawo kwabwe okw'ensi yonna okweyongera, ekitongole tekinnaba kuteekawo kigere mu kitundu kino. N'ekyavaamu, tebalina bakiise mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul ne tye ka dongo I wilobo lung, pud pe otyeko cako tic I but lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, pe gitye ki lacungu pigi I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata kesi kotoma akwapin nukokinga, eringa atukot ngin epedori aibwo kotoma aiboisit kana. Kanuka ngun, emamete kesi keda abwoikinitok kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu kari yi ma eselea tuzu ra ti, amuti nde nga po'di pa so angu 'di ma alia ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria kari 'di ma alea ni yo.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'ekitongore omunsi yoona, tikikabaasize kuhika omu kicweka eki. N'ekyarugiremu, tibaine mujwekyerwa omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: With the company's recent restructuring, his influence over the hiring decisions has grown significantly. Now, he holds the power to determine who stays and who goes.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu kampuni gye buvuddeko awo, obuyinza bwe ku kusalawo kw'abapangisa bweyongedde nnyo. Kati, alina obuyinza okusalawo ani asigala n'ani agenda.
ach_prompt: Ki aloka-loka ma otimme I dul ne cokcok-ki, en dong tye ki twero madit tutwal I kom moko tam me coyo lutic. Kombedi, en tye ki twero me moko anga matye kadong ki anga matye kacito.
teo_prompt: Keda aijulanakineta nuka ekampuni, apolor noi apedoroke nuka aitolom itunga. Kwana, ejaasi ngesi keda apedor naka aseun itunganan yenibusakinit aiboi keda yenibusakinit alosit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti 'da ni ojazu o'diru risi, eri ma okpo e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu 'diyi ma dria ri tu ra. Sawa 'disi, eri ma okpo 'ba aa'pi azini mupi 'diyi opezu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhindura kampuni obwahati, obujunaanizibwa bwe omu by'okupangisa abantu bweyongyeire munonga. Hati, aine obushoborozi bw'okusharaho abarikugumaho n'abarikugyenda.

eng_prompt: Many interns in the industry are often faced with the harsh reality of unpaid positions. As they seek valuable experience, they might find themselves in situations where compensation is not guaranteed.
lug_prompt: Abatendekebwa bangi mu mulimu guno batera okwolekagana n'embeera enzibu ey'okubeera mu bifo ebitasasulwa. Nga banoonya obumanyirivu obw'omugaso, bayinza okwesanga mu mbeera nga tebategekeddwa kuliyirirwa.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol matye ka pwonye I tic eni ipol kare ginongo peko me tic ma pe ki culu gi. I kare ma gitye ka yenyo ngec ma pigi tego, giromo nongo gi I kabedo ma pe ki culu gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu itutuoritai kotoma aswam kangin ejaas keda ationis na aiboisio nu mam etacio. Kwape eutasi kesi aimo amisiarit naepol, epedorete kesi adumun awate kec toma ojautene lomam ecamakitai kesi atacakinio.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara onita onipi okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru pari 'bani ofele kuri be. Eyi ka e'yo orodriru eyini esu 'diyi nda ria, eyi eco eyi esu e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi ofezu ku 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abaingi abarikwegyezamu omu by'obushubuzi, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'emyanya etarikushashurwa. Kubarikuba nibasherura obumanyirizi bw'omugasho, nibabaasa kwesanga omu mbeera ezitarikubaririra.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain order and safety within the community, all employees must adhere to established regulations. These guidelines ensure that everyone understands their responsibilities and the consequences of their actions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, abakozi bonna balina okugoberera amateeka agaateekebwawo. Ebiragiro bino bikakasa nti buli omu ategeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwe n'ebinaava mu bikolwa bye.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo ikin lwak, lutic weng omyero gulub cik ma kiketo. Cik magi neno ni dano weng guniang tic gi ki adwoki me tim gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ainapakina keda ayuwara kotoma atutubet, ekot eswamak kere atupakinit ikisila lu itolomunitai. Aicoreta nu itodunitos ebe itunga kere ejenete aswamukec keda nuelomunete kotoma aswamisiokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza azini ageitema ma ta mbazu ongulumu eyi ma alea, le azi'ba dria eyi ma obi azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti. Azita 'diyi ne ra kini 'ba dria ni eyi ma azi eyi ma dria azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma vutia 'diyi va.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi boona, okubaasa kurinda obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu, bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho. Ebiragiro ebi nibyoreka ngu buri omwe naayetegyereza obujunanizibwa bwe hamwe n'ebirikuruga omu bikorwa bye.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising between the organization and local authorities over recent policy changes. As a result, their relationship has soured significantly.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati w'ekitongole n'abakulembeze b'ebyalo olw'enkyukakyuka mu nkola gye buvuddeko. N'ekivuddemu, enkolagana yaabwe eyonoonese nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin dul enoni ki lutela me tedero pi aloka loka ma otimme cokcok-ki. Macalo adwogi ne, wat ikin gi oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor ingungeta kiding erionget keda apedorosio nuka atutubet kanu aijulanakineta nuka ikisila. Kanuka ngun, amunar noi eidicanekec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebi tu amuti 'da ma eselea okpo e'ipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie e'yo ojata o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma esele co e'yo eyi ma eselea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'ekitongore n'ab'obushoborozi ahabw'empindahinduka y'ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, omukago gwabo gusisikara munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite their shared goals and initial enthusiasm, tensions began to rise among the team members. As disagreements escalated, communication broke down completely.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalina ebiruubirirwa bye bimu n'obunyiikivu obwasooka, obunkenke bwatandika mu bammemba ba ttiimu. Obutakkaanya bwe bwagenda bweyongera, empuliziganya yayonooneka ddala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki miti kacel ki mit kom I acakkine, telle ocako dongo ikin lumemba me dul tuku ne. I kare ma telle omedde, lok oket tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apeleikinata keda aiyalama, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin kanejaas imeban luka etimu. Neapolor amamus acamanar, abu einer kibiror cut.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini tualu ava yini okorisi 'diyi ma talasi, asi otiza e'do tu 'ba amuti nde ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo nzeza e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebigyendererwa byabo hamwe n'okushemererwa kwabo, obunkenke bukatandika ahagati y'abanyakibiina. Obutaikirizana ku bwayeyongyeire,empurizagana ekaremwa kimwe.

eng_prompt: Despite her recent progress, the challenges in her life seem to multiply. Each day brings new obstacles that require her attention and care.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yakulaakulana gye buvuddeko, okusoomoozebwa mu bulamu bwe kweyongedde. Buli lunaku luleeta ebizibu ebipya ebyetaaga okufaayo kwe n'okulabirirwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en odongo I kare ma okato cokcok-ki, peko ma en tye kwede I kwone tye ka medde. Nino ki nino kelo peko mapol ma mito ni en oket cwinye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat ngesi ejok, esubit bala iyata atiokisio nuka aijarake. Kanginipaaran eyangauni atiokisio nuitetiak nu ekotosi ngesi apodokinit ka aidar.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro zozu o'diru ra ti, e'yo ewaru eri ma edri ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. O'du alu alu ni e'yo ewaru o'diru lepi eri ma asi fezu azini eri ma ta mbazu 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka,oburemeezi omu magara gye nibweyongyera. Buri eizooba nirireeta oburemeezi obusya oburikwetenga okufayo kwe n'okureeberera.

eng_prompt: Despite their close bond, it was clear that their paths were destined to diverge. The truth weighed heavily on her heart as she realized the implications of their connection.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalina enkolagana ey'oku lusegere, kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti amakubo gaabwe gaali gaawukana. Amazima gaazitowa nnyo ku mutima gwe bwe yategeera ebiyinza okuva mu kukwatagana kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki wat macok ikin gi, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo meggi pe bibedo marom. Lok ada ne obedo tek tutwal I cwinye I kare ma oniang adwogi me kubbe meggi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda eidicane loajokan, aticepak epedorete kesi aitiak iponesiokec. Abu abeit itolitol ngesi noi nawanyunia ngesi atiokisio nuka arucokina kec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma eselea ti ecita be ra ti, eri ndra e'da kililiru kini geri yini 'diyi ndra ndu ndu. E'yo adari 'du eri ma asi nzizaru erini e'yo yi ma esele cozu yi ma eselea 'diyi ni e'dazurisi.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okukwatanisa kwabo,kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu emihanda yaabo ekaba neeza kutaana. Amazima gakamuremera aha mutima ku yaayetegyereize oburemeezi bw'okukwatanisa kwabo.

eng_prompt: As the conversation grew more strained, they exchanged uneasy glances, sensing a shift in the atmosphere. The once unbreakable bond they shared now felt fragile and uncertain.
lug_prompt: Emboozi bwe yagenda yeeyongera okuba ey'obunkenke, buli omu yatunuulira munne mu ngeri etategeerekeka bulungi, nga balaba enkyukakyuka mu mbeera. Omukwano gwabwe ogwali tegusobola kusazibwamu kati gwali tegunywevu era nga tegukakafu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok ne odoko tek tutwal, gubedo ka lokke I wanggi, kun giwinyo aloka-loka I kabedo gi. Wat ma onongo tye ikin gi kombedi nen calo goro dok pe tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Neipolor akiro ngun, apotu kesi kowanyutu aijulanakineta kotoma ojautene. Aimorikikina naejaatar kesi kapakio nukokau epupete kwape naemamei ajokis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ni ecazu ewaru, yi oja yi ma mile e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, yini e'yo ojazu angu 'da ma alea ri ndrezu. E'yo ndra yi ma eselea okporu tu 'diyi curu'do e'da yi okpo kokoru azini e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okugaaniira ku kwayeyongyeire kuba okw'akabi, bakatandika kureebana batarikushemererwa, barikwetegyereza empindahinduka omu mbeera. Omukago ogwabaire gutarikubaasa kushatuka, obwahati gukaba nigureebeka nk'ogutaine maani.

eng_prompt: The company has strict policies regarding the distribution of resources. Employees must ensure that all equipment remains within the designated areas.
lug_prompt: Kampuni erina amateeka amakakali agakwata ku kugaba eby'obugagga. Abakozi balina okukakasa nti ebyuma byonna bisigala mu bifo ebiragiddwa.
ach_prompt: Dul ne tye ki cik matek tutwal I kom poko jami. Lutic omyero gunen ni jami tic weng odong ikabedo ma ki keto ie.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ekampuni ngol keda ainapeta nuegogong nuikamunitos aikor iboro. Ekot eswamak awanyun ebe ibusakinit iboro kere asalakin aiboisio nuebeit ajaut.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ma azita okporu 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza ma dria ci. Le azi'ba eyi ma ne ra kini afa dria eyini ayuzaru 'diyi aa angu 'bani lele 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni eine ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata aha kugaba ebintu. Abakozi bashemereire kureeba ngu ebikwato byona biguma omu myanya erikuba eteirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges the company has faced, the new CEO has outlined a strategic plan. As part of this initiative, he is making changes in the organization.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula okusoomoozebwa kampuni kwe yasanga gyebuvuddeko, akulira kkampuni empya alaze enteekateeka ennungi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, akola enkyukakyuka mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma dul ne okato ki iye cokcok-ki, ladit tic manyen okatti ki yub maber. Macalo but yub man, en tye ka kelo aloka-loka I dul ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetereikina keda ekampuni, abu lokapolon loitetet kitodu ainapeta. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, euta ngesi aswam aijulanakineta kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amuti nde ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, dricere o'diru 'da e'da otita azi okporu ni i. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eri ojata eji amuti 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu kampuni etungire, mukuru w'ekitongore omutsya akooreka enteekateeka y'amaani. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ariyo naakora empindahinduka omu kitongore.

eng_prompt: The team was divided into smaller groups to tackle various aspects of the project. Each member was assigned specific responsibilities based on their skills and expertise.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yayawuddwamu obubinja obutono okukola ku nsonga ez'enjawulo eza pulojekiti. Buli mmemba yaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa obwenjawulo okusinziira ku bukugu n'obukugu bwe.
ach_prompt: Kipoko dul pa lutic ne I dul matino-tino me tic I kom jami mapat-pat makwako yub eni. Kimiyo tic ki lamemba acel-acel malubbe ki diro ki ngec ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Aponi otiakinai etimu ogurupun ludidik kanu aitemokin akiro nuegelegela nuka epurojekt. Aponi ijaikinai ngol emeeba aswam kotupitete acoasineikec keda acoasineikec.
lgg_prompt: Ba awa amuti 'da ma esele ongulumu werea 'diyi ma alea e'yo otita 'da ni ndundu 'diyi 'yezu. Ba fe azi 'ba alu alu ni eyi ma dria eyi ma ondua azini nita eyini 'diyi vusi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of each team member's strengths and weaknesses, the management decided to restructure the project assignments. This decision aimed to enhance overall productivity and ensure that everyone was working in areas where they could excel.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi amaanyi n'obunafu bwa buli mmemba wa ttiimu, abaddukanya pulojekiti baasalawo okuddamu okutegeka emirimu gya pulojekiti. ach_prompt: Ingee niang maber tutwal I kom kero ki goro pa lamemba acel acel me dul tic, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me yubu tic mapat-pat me yub eni. Miti me moko tam man obedo me medo rwom me tic ki neno ni dano weng tye katimo ticgi maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor kagogong keda agogong naka ngol emeeba loka etimu, abu eyaitene kitutub aswamisinei nuka epurojekt. Alosikinet naka aseunet kangin arai aitojokar aswam ka awanyun ebe iswamaete itunga aiboisio nu epedorete kesi aswam ejok.

eng_prompt: After several minutes of silence, the tension in the room became palpable. Finally, she took a deep breath and began to clarify what had happened.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka idakikan luipu luka aililing, abu aiyalongong kotoma agola ngin kojenar. Kawasia abu ngesi kopuko ekwam noi kosodi ageun aitetem nuapotu kotakanutu.
lgg_prompt: Dakika 'bani ovuzu ciri ma vutia, asi otiza jo ale aliza ma alia ri eca e'dazaru. Asizu, eri 'du ava aliru azini e'do e'yo i 'yepiri ece.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of the team's performance, the coach decided to make some changes. As a result, his competitor is allowed to leave the group.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi enkola ya ttiimu, omutendesi yasalawo okukola enkyukakyuka ezimu. N'ekyavaamu, amuvuganya akkirizibwa okuva mu kibiina.

lgg_prompt: Amuti avitani 'diyi ma agata ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, embapi avitaniri asi e'yo 'du ojata azi 'diyi 'yezu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe 'ba ageti otipi eri be 'diyi dri amuti nde kuzu ra.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent decisions made by the previous administration, he felt a deep sense of disappointment. The impact of those choices has left many questioning the direction of the organization.

eng_prompt: After weeks of uncertainty about the project's direction, he finally decided it was time to address his concerns. He approached the office, steeling himself for a difficult discussion.

ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bedo ki akala-kala I kom kit ma yub eni obucito kwede, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me lok I kom par ma en tye kwede. En ocito I opic kun tye atera me nywako lok matek.

lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo azi 'da ma driceza ma dria ku, asizu 'du asi kini sa'wa ca e'yo eri ma asi otiza 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Eri emu ofisi'a, i otuta e'yo nzezu e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: To support local economies and promote sustainable agriculture, community leaders must take proactive steps. One effective approach is to create initiatives that connect farmers directly with consumers.

ach_prompt: Me tyelo kor biacara me tedero ki cwalo rwom me pur I rwom ma lamal, lutela me tedero omyero gutii ki diro. Yoo acel maber aye me kelo yub ma kubu lupur ki luwil.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the initial reports and gathering witness statements, the team concluded that more details were necessary to fully understand the situation. Consequently, the incident is explained further.

eng_prompt: In an effort to expand its operations and increase capital, the company has decided to go public. As part of this initiative, they are offering an opportunity for investment.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugaziya emirimu gyayo n'okwongeza entandikwa, kampuni esazeewo okutunda ebintu byayo mu lujjudde. Nga ekitundu ku nteekateeka eno, bawa omukisa mu by'okusiga ensimbi.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azi ngaza erini 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu azini robia tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'di asi 'du e'yo muzu o'bi eyidri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, yi drileba fe lonyi vuti alezani.

eng_prompt: As the sun set over the horizon, the villagers gathered around the fire, eager to hear the next chapter of the tale. With bated breath, they leaned in closer, knowing that the adventure was far from over.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali egwa, abantu b'oku kyalo baakuŋŋaanira okwetooloola omuliro nga baagala nnyo okuwulira essuula eddako mu lugero. Nga bakutte omukka, beesigamye kumpi, nga bakimanyi nti olugendo lwali luli wala okuggwa.

teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror, apotu itunga luka ecalo kimorikikinos akim, ekotosi noi aipup atutubet naetupakini naka akiro ngun. Keda aimony, apotu kesi kisingarenos, ejenete ebe elosi aitodolikin aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria angu ma dria, 'ba calua 'diyi tra yi aci ma ageyia, ava be e'yo emupi 'diyi erizu. O'duko si, eyi si eyi ogogo, eyini nii ra kini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi de nga po'di ku.

eng_prompt: As the sun sets over the city, tensions rise and the streets become a battleground. Law enforcement has ramped up their efforts to crack down on the escalating crime wave.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bw'egwa mu kibuga, obunkenke bweyongera era enguudo zifuuka ekifo eky'olutalo. Abakuumaddembe bongedde amaanyi mu kaweefube w'okufufuggaza obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera.

teo_prompt: Neilibunor akolong koibuga, iyata aiyalongong kosodi irotin araun aiboisio nu ejie. Apotu ipolisin iyatakisi aswamukec kanu aitikitik abilibilio naka ikisila.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and rising concerns about public safety, it is crucial for everyone to take precautions. Awareness and vigilance can help prevent potential dangers in our daily lives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bukuumi bw'abantu, kikulu nnyo buli omu okwegendereza. Okumanyisibwa n'obwegendereza bisobola okuyamba okutangira obuzibu obuyinza okubaawo mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lworo ma tye kamedde I kom ber bedo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ni dano weng omyero gugwoke. Ngec ki bedo ma wangwa twolo twero gengo peko ma twero bino ikwo wa me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac keda aiyalongong naepol noi kanu ayuwara naka itunga, ejok itunga kere ayuwar. Aitijenaret keda acobeu ingarakini aitikitik atiokisio kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini asi otiza tupi e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria, eri orodriru 'ba dria eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile oziza azini mile be ri eco fe e'yo onzi eyi atrizu edri amavile o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho munonga buri omwe kwegyendesereza. Okumanyisibwa n'okwetegyereza, nikibaasa kutuhwera kwetantara akabi omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: As friends and family gathered to celebrate the special occasion, he felt compelled to share his thoughts. With a microphone in hand, he prepared to address the crowd, reflecting on the past year and his hopes for the future.
lug_prompt: Nga mikwano gye n'ab'omu maka ge bakungaana okujaguza olunaku olw'enjawulo, yawulira ng'alina okugabana ebirowoozo bye. Ng'akutte mayirofooni mu ngalo, yeetegese okwogera eri abantu, ng'alowooza ku mwaka oguwedde n'essuubi lye eri ebiseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lurem ki lugang gugure me kwero nino enuni, en obedo ki miti me nywako tam ma mege. Ki mairofon I cinge, en oyubbe me lok ki lwak, kun tamo I kom mwaka ma okato ki gen ma en tye kwede pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Neautar ipaper keda lukokale atukonokin ainumunum aparan na itegelikina, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi aimor aomisioke. Keda emikrofoni, abu ngesi kopedo einer nejaas itunga, aomoom nuikamunitos ekaru lo atuboros keda amuno naka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma agyipi eyi tualu familia eyi pie oku eyini omu 'da inzizu risi, eri ama asi kini eri ega e'yo i ma dria 'diyi awa ra. Maikrofoni be dria, eri otu i e'yo nzezu o'bi yi be, erini e'yo egazu eli agapi 'bo ri ma dria azini asi'baza erini ewu drialeri ma driari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abanyabuzaare hamwe n'ab'omuka baketeerana kujaguza omukoro gw'omutaano, yahurira naagyemeserezibwa kugamba ebiteekateeko bye. Arikukoresa mairofooni omu ngaro, akeeteekateekyera kugambira abantu, arikuteekateeka aha mwaka oguhwaire hamwe n'amatsiko ge aha nyensya.

eng_prompt: After thorough verification and cross-referencing with multiple sources, we can confidently conclude that the findings are reliable. Our team has meticulously reviewed every detail to ensure precision.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okukakasa ennyo n'okukwatagana n'ensibuko ez'enjawulo, tusobola okugamba n'obwesige nti ebizuuliddwa byesigika. Ttiimu yaffe yeekenneenyezza n'obwegendereza buli kalonda okukakasa obutuufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee niang maber tutwal ki ngiyo ki kama ki aa ki iye mapol, watwero moko ki tek cwiny ni nongo ne gene. Dul pa lutic megwa gukwedo lok weng me neno ni lok weng tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka aingic keda iponesio luegelegela, ipedori oni ajenun ebe emunoi akiro ngun. Apodokinit etimukosi akiro kere kanu awanyun ebe iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama eco asi'baza be kini e'yo 'bani esu 'diyi asi'baza be. Ama vile amuti 'diyi ma ale andri e'yo dria eyi ma ale kililiru nezu ra kini eyi e'yo ada.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, authorities finally identified the culprit behind the illegal land acquisition. Community members expressed relief as news broke of the arrest.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza kyaddaaki baazudde abazzi b'emisango abaali emabega w'okugula ettaka mu bumenyi bw'amateeka. Abantu b'omu kitundu baalaga obuweerero ng'amawulire gafulumye ku kukwatibwa.

eng_prompt: The bustling markets near the border attract traders from both sides, creating a vibrant exchange of products. As a result, commerce thrives in this area, fostering a dynamic economic environment.
lug_prompt: Obutale obujjudde abantu okumpi n'ensalo busikiriza abasuubuzi okuva ku njuyi zombi, ekireetawo okusuubulagana okw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, eby'obusuubuzi bikulaakulana mu kitundu kino, ekitumbula embeera y'ebyenfuna.

lgg_prompt: Cu 'ba eyini aa'zu tualu boda milea 'diyi 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi eji engazu kalati iri 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, tujari ni tu angu 'di ma alea, dika eri fe angu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu.

eng_prompt: Vaccines play a crucial role in public health by preventing the spread of infectious diseases. Ensuring that children receive their immunizations on schedule is essential for their well-being.

eng_prompt: In response to public feedback and the need for greater accessibility, the government has undertaken a review of its identification card procedures. As a result, significant changes have been implemented to streamline the application process.

lug_prompt: Wadde nga nnali njagala nnyo bizineesi eno era nga nnalina enteekateeka ennungi ey'okutunda ebintu, kyanzibuwalira okutuukagana n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu eyali egenda yeeyongera. Nnakizuula mangu nti olw'obutaba na buyambi bumala, ebirooto byange eby'obuwanguzi byali bigenda mu maaso.

eng_prompt: After months of collaboration and shared vision, the two organizations finally unveiled their joint initiative. This groundbreaking alliance aims to celebrate excellence in their respective fields.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's promises of support, many farmers found themselves struggling to cultivate their crops. As a result, they received inadequate resources that hindered their agricultural efforts.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti yasuubiza okubawa obuyambi, abalimi bangi beesanga nga bazibuwalirwa okulima ebirime byabwe. N'ekyavaamu, tebaafuna bikozesebwa bimala ekyalemesa okulima kwabwe.

eng_prompt: Despite our initial optimism and the strategies we implemented, the results have not met our expectations. We had hoped for a significant improvement in performance, but the numbers tell a different story.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about youth unemployment, government officials have convened to discuss potential strategies. Recent studies have highlighted the urgent need for targeted initiatives to support young job seekers.

ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom bedo peke pa tic ikin bulu, lutic pa gamente gubedo kacoke me nywako tam I kom yoo mapat-pat ma twero tic kwede. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni miti tye pi yub mapat-pat me konyo bulu ma tye ka yenyo tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka amamus na aswamisinei kanejaas atumunak, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin. Aingic napac itodunit eipud loka aitolomunun iboro luingarakinete atumunak aimo aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo 'ba ode azi ndapi 'diyi atizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo omu minyeeto, abakuru omu gavumenti batebekaniise kuhanuura aha mihanda erikubaasa kukoresibwa. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'okuhwera eminyeeto erikuronda emirimo.

eng_prompt: Despite extensive debates and public support, lawmakers have struggled to reach a consensus on the proposed legislation. As a result, the age limit bill has not yet been passed.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'obuwagizi bw'abantu, ababaka bafunye obuzibu okukkaanya ku mateeka agateeseddwa. N'ekyavaamu, etteeka erikwata ku kkomo ku myaka terinnayisibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano gubedo ka laro lok ki cwak mapol, luwang lwak I ot moko cik onongo tek tutwal me winye I kom cik ma kimito kelo. Macalo adwogi ne, cik manyen me gengo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo nyayo
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ipegeta luipu keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, etiono noi mama ejaasi imeeban luka airabet adolokin acamanar kanuikamunitos ekisil loitemokinitai. Kanuka ngun, mam ber ecamakitai ekisil loka aitikitik ikaru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara angiri ni azini atita o'bi eyini 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi esu ewaru ti ecita ejizu azita 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'duni nga e'yo eli liza ma dria ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhanuura kw'amaani n'obuhwezi bw'abantu, abajwekyerwa b'eishengyero baine oburemeezi bw'okwikirizana aha kiteiso ky'ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, eiteeka ry'ekikomo ky'emyaka tirikahinguzibwe.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the project details, the team gathered to discuss their ideas. Each member was encouraged to contribute their thoughts before the final presentation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebikwata ku pulojekiti, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku birowoozo byayo. Buli mmemba yakubirizibwa okuwaayo ebirowoozo bye nga ennyanjula esembayo tennakolebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom yub eni, joo ne gugure me nywako tam gi. Kicuku cwiny lumemba weng me miyo tamgi mapwod pe kicwalo lok me agiki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuka epurojekt, apotu etimu kiriamunos kanu aitemitem aomisiokec. Aponi isinyikokinai itunga kere aijaikin aomisiokec erongo aitodiaret nawasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu egata eyivile 'diyi ma dria. Ba ai 'ba dria memba ru 'diyi egata yini 'diyi fezu de nga po'di 'ba awini e'yo ece asizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma purogyekiti omu bwijwire, tiimu ekateerana kuhanuura aha biteekateeko byaayo. Buri muntu akahigwa kuheereza ebiteekateeko bye atakagiire omu rubazo rw'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: The situation in the city has escalated dramatically over the past few days. Tensions have reached a boiling point, leading to widespread unrest and violence.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kibuga yeeyongedde nnyo mu nnaku eziyise. Obunkenke butuuse ku ntikko, ekiviiriddeko obutali butebenkevu n'obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: Ngo matye katimme I boma ne omede tutwal I nino ma okato ni. Lworo omede matek tutwal ma oweko lweny ki tim gero onya tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ejautene koibuga apakio nu atuboros. Adolutu ingungeta adoketait naepol noi, ido eyangauni amumu keda amumu naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ma omgbo tu uru o'du agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ca ongmbo angiri si, e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu rurembo eyeyongyeire munonga omu biro ebi. Obunkenke buhikire aha rurengo rw'amaani, ekirikureetaho obutabanguko n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose in the crowded room, the organizers realized they needed to address the growing unrest. With voices escalating and emotions running high, they stepped forward to regain control of the situation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kisenge ekijjudde abantu, abategesi baakiraba nti beetaaga okukola ku butabanguko obweyongera. Ng'amaloboozi geeyongera n'enneewulira zigenda waggulu, baavuddeyo okuddamu okufuga embeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde I ot ma dano dwong iye, luyub ne oniang ni omyero gu lok I kom jemo matye kamede. Ki dwon matye kamedde ki kit ma cwiny gi tye ka ngwec kwede, gucito anyim me nongo twero i kom ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Neapolor aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit naejaasi keda itunga luipu, apotu luitemonokinak kojenutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aitemokin nuka amumu naepol noi. Keda iporotoi luepolok noi keda aiyalongong, apotu kesi kogeutu aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu pari 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba otupi 'diyi esu ra kini le eyi ma ko e'yo e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza. O'duko yini tuzu uru azini e'yo yi 'yepi uru 'diyisi, yi mu drile e'yo nde ma okpo esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu kishengye ekyabaire kirimu abantu baingi, abatebekanisa bakareeba ngu bashemereire kukora aha butabanguko obwabaire nibweyongyera. Ahabw'amahurire g'okweyongyera hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'amaani, bakaza omu maisho kugaruraho obushoborozi aha nshonga.

eng_prompt: After implementing a series of strategic reforms and attracting foreign investment, the nation began to see significant changes. Analysts noted a positive shift in key indicators, signaling a turnaround in economic performance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okussa mu nkola enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi n'okusikiriza bamusigansimbi abava ebweru, eggwanga lyatandika okulaba enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi. Abakugu mu by'enfuna balabye enkyukakyuka ennungi mu bintu ebikulu ebiraga enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Inge keto aloka-loka mapol I tic ki kelo lutim biacara ma aa ki lobo mawoko, lobo ne ocako neno aloka-loka madit tutwal. Lunywak tam gunongo aloka-loka maber I jami ma pigi tego ma nyutu aloka-loka I timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitegear aijulanakineta nuipu ka ayangaun agwelanarak luka akwapin ace, abu akwap kogeu asesen aijulanakineta nuepolok noi. Apotu angicak kowanyutu aijulanakineta kotoma aanyuneta nuapolok, itodunitos aijulanakineta kotoma aswam naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata okporu 'diyi 'yezu azini lonyi vuti aleza engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ejizu 'bori ma vutia, kari 'di e'do ojata okporu 'diyi ndre ra. Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi ndre ojata kililiru e'yo orodriru e'dapi kini e'yo lonyi ni 'diyi oja i ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutaho empindahinduka nyingi n'okureeta abashubuzi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga, eihanga rikatandika kureeba empinduka y'amaani. Abacencuzi bakareeba empindahinduka omu bintu ebikuru, ekirikworeka empindahinduka omu ntwaza y'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the Ugandan government has prioritized economic development and infrastructure improvement. As part of this initiative, various sectors have received significant funding and support.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti ya Uganda ekulembezza enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula ebizimbe. Ng'ekitundu ky'enteekateeka eno, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bifunye obuyambi n'obuyambi obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente me Uganda oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo lobo ki dongo lobo. Macalo but yub man, tenge mapat-pat gunongo kony me lim madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, abu apugan nako Uganda isingarenit apol naka ikapun keda aitojokar adukena. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, adumutu iriongeta luipu agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, gamete Uganda niri 'ba okpo e'yo angu ezoma ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, esele ndundu eyi esu atita azini robia angiri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi,gavumenti ya Uganda eteire omutima aha ntunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okutunguura ebyombeko. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bitungire esente n'obuhwezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the government faced mounting pressure over financial discrepancies. As a result, the Speaker of Parliament has withheld tax charges.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, gavumenti yayolekagana n'okunyigirizibwa okw'amaanyi olw'obutakwatagana mu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, Sipiika wa paalamenti alemesezza emisolo.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, gamente onongo lyeto madit tutwal pi peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, Lador ot moko cik ojuko culu mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, abu apugan kodum aiyalongong naepol noi kanuka amamus na ikapun. Kanuka ngun, abu eraban loka airabet kimik aitac isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, gamete esu okpo tupi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma esele coza ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, anzenzea ei koloseni niri oga musoro ofeza si.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, gavumenti ekatunga oburemeezi obweyongyeire ahabw'obutakwatanisa omu by'empiiha. N'ekyarugiremu, Sipiika w'eishengyero ayemereize okushorooza emishoro.

eng_prompt: Given the vital role that farmers play in ensuring food security and sustaining the economy, it is essential to support them in every possible way. Imposing taxes on farmers could hinder their ability to operate effectively and invest in their crops and livestock.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mulimu omukulu abalimi gwe bakola mu kukuuma emmere n'okuyimirizaawo ebyenfuna, kya mugaso okubawagira mu buli ngeri esoboka. Okussa emisolo ku balimi kiyinza okubalemesa okukola obulungi n'okusiga ensimbi mu birime byabwe n'ebisolo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tic ma pire tek ma lupur timo me neno ni cam tye ma oromo ki gwoko lim me lobo, pire tek tutwal me konyogi I yoo weng ma twere. Keto mucoro iwi lupur twero gengo gi me tic maber ki keto lim I kom cam gi ki dyangi gi.
teo_prompt: Keda aswam naepol noi na iswamaete akoriok kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi kesi keda inyamat luipu ka aidar edumune loka ikapun, ejok aingarakin kes koponesio kere. Aibwaikin isolosinei mama ejaasi akoriok emina aitikitik kesi aswam ejok ka aipikakin ikapun kec toma iraanakec keda ibarenakec.
lgg_prompt: Azi orodriru ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyini ꞌye nyaka ma tambazu azini eꞌyo robiani ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazuri ma eꞌyosi, eri orodriru ꞌba ma fe yi dri atita geri cirisi. Musoro 'bazu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma dria ri eco e'yo yini azi ngazu kililiru dika lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu ori yini 'diyi ma alia azini anyapa yini 'diyi pie ri atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omugasho gw'amaani ogu abahingi n'abariisa baine omu kureetaho eby'okurya n'okureeberera eby'entaasya y'eihanga, n'eky'omugasho kubayamba omu miringo yoona. Okutaho emishoro aha bahingi n'abariisa nikibaasa kubaremesa kukora kurungi n'okuta esente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo hamwe n'amatungo gaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the agricultural sector, the government has announced new financial incentives. This includes measures aimed at easing the burden on farmers who cultivate essential crops.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyambako ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi, gavumenti erangiridde ensimbi empya. Kino kitwaliramu enkola ezigendereddwamu okukendeeza omugugu ku balimi abalima ebirime ebikulu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tenge me pur, gamente okatti ki yub me miyo kony me lim manyen. Man obedo yoo me dwoko piny rwom me tic pa lupur ma puru cam ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang erionget loka akor, abu apugan kolimo ikapun luitetiak. Imoriaritos nu aitapatan akoriok lu ekoriete iraan lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu esele agrikica niri atizu, gamete azi atita robia ni o'diru 'diyi. Di ma alia e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ori orodriru 'diyi ezo'ba 'diyi ma dria ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa,gavumenti erangiriire esente nsya. Eki nikitwariramu enkora erikugyenderera okukyendeeza omugugu gw'abahingi abarikuhinga ebihingirwe ebikuru.

eng_prompt: The candidates have been campaigning tirelessly across the state. With the election just days away, their teams are strategizing on how to reach undecided voters.
lug_prompt: Abeesimbyewo babadde bakuba kampeyini awatali kukoowa okwetooloola eggwanga. Ng'ebula ennaku ntono okulonda kubeerewo, ttiimu zaabwe zikola enteekateeka ku ngeri y'okutuuka ku balonzi abatasalawo.
ach_prompt: Lucungu gubedo ka bito kwi labongo yweyo I but lobo man mapat-pat. I kare ma odong nino manok keken me oo I yer, dul pa lubol kwir gi tye ka yubu yoo me oo bot lubol kwir ma pe gumoko tam gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu abwoak iswamata ikampeins noi kotoma akwap kere. Keda apaarasia idis bon ageun aseo, eutasi itimunakec aitemonokin eipone lo adolokin aseak lumam eseunitos aseun.
lgg_prompt: Ba pa tupi 'diyi ebi ti odaza 'ye okpo kokoru kari 'di ma alea ndulu. O'du were si opetaa ma alia, amuti yini 'diyi otita eyi 'ye geri eyini ecozu cazu 'ba voti 'bepi e'yo 'dupi ku 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Abesimbireho batwire nibaronda akaruuru omu ihanga ryona. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaruuru kari haihi kubaho ebiro bikye, tiimu zaabo ziriyo nizikora enteekateeka y'okuhika aha babateezi b'akaruuru abatakasharamu.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, political activity is intensifying across the country. Supporters are rallying to promote their candidates and policies.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, eby'obufuzi byeyongedde okwetooloola eggwanga. Abawagizi bakungaana okutumbula abesimbyewo baabwe n'enkola zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me yer tye cok, tic me cungu iwi bye tye ka mede I but lobo man mapat-pat. Lucwak tye ka gure me tyelo kor lucungu gi ki cik gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, eyatakinos aswamisio nuka epolitikis kotoma akwap. Eutasi egangitok airiamun kanu aitopolor abwoak kec keda ainapeta kec.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Ba atita fepi 'diyi okuta eyi 'ye 'ba pa tupi eyivile 'diyi ma e'yo otuzu azini azita eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ririkuhika haihi, eby'obutegyeki nibyeyongyera omu ihanga ryona. Abashagiki bariyo nibateerana kutunguura abesimbireho baabo hamwe n'ebiragiro byabo.

eng_prompt: In order to encourage collaboration and diverse perspectives, the teacher decided to rearrange the students. After assessing their strengths and weaknesses, she announced the new team assignments.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukubiriza enkolagana n'endowooza ez'enjawulo, omusomesa yasalawo okukyusa mu nteekateeka y'abayizi. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya amaanyi n'obunafu bwabwe, yalangirira emirimu emipya egyaweebwa ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Pi cuku cwiny lutino me ribe kacel ki bedo ki tam mapat-pat, lapwony oketo lutino kwan I dul mapat-pat. Ingee niang kero ki goro gi, en onyuto tic manyen ma kimiyo ki dul tuku ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit aiswamanara keda aomisio nuegelegela, abu esisianakinan kicorak esisiak. Akaulo naka airereor agogongu kec keda agogongu, abu ngesi kolimo aswam naitetet naka etimu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti icita ni tualu egata ndundu eyi pie 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, imba'ba eyi 'du e'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea 'diyi otuzu o'diru. Erini yi ma okpo azini okpo koko 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri azi amuti 'da ma azi o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'emiteekateekyere etarikushushana, omwegyesa akasharamu kuhindura entebekanisa y'abeegi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma amaani n'obunafu bwabo, akarangirira emirimo misya ei tiimu yaabaire neija kukora.

eng_prompt: As the night wore on and the music faded, a few guests began to glance at their watches. The atmosphere shifted, and it became clear that not everyone was in the mood to stay until the end.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo n'ennyimba ne zikendeera, abagenyi abatonotono baatandika okutunula ku ssaawa zaabwe. Embeera yakyuka era ne kyeyoleka bulungi nti si buli omu nti yali ayagala okusigala okutuusa ku nkomerero.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma piny odoko col dok wer ocako rweny, wele mogo gucako neno cawa gi. Kabedo ne olokke, dok onen atyer kamaleng ni pe dano weng tye ki miti me bedo nioo I agiki.
teo_prompt: Nealosi akware kosodi ikososinei aibiror, apotu ipejok lu ikidioko kogeutu airereor isawanakec. Abu ejautene kijulakin, ido abu kojen ebe mam itunga kere ekotosi aiboi kitoni angetakinet.
lgg_prompt: Ini ni muzu drile azini ongo ni e'doria, omu were 'diyi e'do yi ma sawa ndre. Angu nderi oja'i, azini eca e'da kini 'ba dria ovuni ava aa'zu kpere asizuri ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Ekiro ku kyabaire nikigyenda omu maisho kandi n'ebyeshongoro nibihwaho, abagyenyi bakye bakatandika kureeba eshaaha zaabo. Embeera ekahinduka, kandi kikarebeka butunu ngu ti buri omwe ngu akaba aine ekyetengo ky'okugumaho mpaka aha muheru.

eng_prompt: In the upcoming election, it is crucial for each political party to present a unified front. To achieve this, they have decided that each party will nominate one representative to voice their platform.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okujja, kikulu nnyo buli kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi okwanjula oludda olumu. Kino okusobola okukituukako, basazeewo nti buli kibiina kijja kusimbawo omuntu omu okukiikirira ekibiina kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I yer matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal ni dul me cungu iwi bye weng omyero gubed ma guribe. Me cobo man, gumoko tamgi ni dul me cungu iwi bye weng gubi cimo lacungu acel me cung pi dul gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo naebunit, epolok noi kangin epate aitodiar aimorikikina. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, aseutu kesi ebe ibusakinit kangin epate aipikakin abwoikinitokokec kanu aitodiar akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa emupi ri ma alea, eri orodriru amuti dria politiki ni 'diyini ti ecita ejizu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eyi 'du e'yo kini amuti alu alu ni nga 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ope eyini ani e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru akarikwija, nikikuru buri kibiina ky'obutegyeki kworeka obumwe. Okuhikiiriza eki,basharamu ngu buri kibiina nikiija kutoorana omwe aha bakiiki okworeka enteekateeka zaakyo.

eng_prompt: In times of unrest, it is crucial for law enforcement to maintain order and uphold the law. However, their presence can sometimes escalate tensions rather than resolve them.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutabanguko, kikulu nnyo abakuumaddembe okukuuma emirembe n'okukwasisa amateeka. Kyokka, okubeerawo kwabwe ebiseera ebimu kusobola okwongera ku bunkenke mu kifo ky'okubugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kuku-kuku, pire tek tutwal ki joo ma gwoko cik me gwoko kuc ki gwoko cik. Kadi bed kumeno, bedo tye gi ikare mukene medo telle me kaka tyeko ne.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu amumu, ejokuna noi itunga lu ikisila aidar ainapakina ka aitup ikisila. Konye, epedori ajaut kec aiyatakin atiokisio itia aitemokin kes.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi, eri orodriru 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ni azita ma ta mbazu. Kani si, eyi ma aa'ta ni sa'wa azi 'diyisi e'yo eyi ma aza ko ri ma omgbo otu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ri ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko, nikikuru ab'eby'obutegyeki kurinda obusingye n'okukuratira ebiragiro. Kwonka, okubaho kwabo obumwe n'obumwe nikubaasa kwongyera obunkenke omu mwanya gw'okubumaraho.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and integrity of the process, we have implemented multiple layers of protection. All participants will be briefed on the protocols in place.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obutebenkevu bw'enkola, tutaddewo obukuumi obw'enjawulo. Abeetabamu bonna bajja kutegeezebwa ku mateeka agaliwo.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo pa yub eni, waketo rwom me gwoko kuc mapol I tic. Kibi pwonyo dano weng matye I yub eni I kom cik matye.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara ka ainapakina naka ainapeta, ipikakinit sio iboro luipu luka ayuwara. Eponio aitijenikin itunga kere nuikamunitos ainapeta nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ma tambazu kililiru, ama 'ba e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi kalafe karakara. Ba nga 'ba dria fi'ba 'diyi dri e'yo nze azita o'bale 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okwerinda nibikorwa kurungi, twataho eby'okwerinda bingi. Abeejumbiremu boona nibaija kumanyisibwa ebiragiro ebiriho.

eng_prompt: As society evolves, it becomes increasingly clear that fresh perspectives are essential for progress. The wisdom of experience must now make way for the innovative ideas of youth.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kikulaakulana, kyeyoleka bulungi nti endowooza empya za mugaso mu nkulaakulana. Amagezi agava mu bumanyirivu kati galina okuwa ekifo ebirowoozo by'abavubuka ebiyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye ka dongo, nen atyer kamaleng ni tam manyen obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo. Ryeko ma aa ki I kom jami ma otimme I kare macon omyero omi kare ki tam manyen pa bulu.
teo_prompt: Nejulanakina itunga, ejenuna noi ebe epolok noi aomisio nuitetiak kanu apol. Ibusakinit kwana acoa naka amisiarit aijaikin aiboisit naka aomisio nuitetiak nuka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zoria, eri e'da kililiru kini egata o'diru 'diyi orodriru angu ezoma ni. Ondua e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ri ma fe curu'do pari egata o'diru 'ba ode eyini 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugyenda nibahinduka, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu emiteekateekyere misya n'ey'omugasho aha ntunguuka. Obwengye bw'obumanyirizi obwahati bushemereire kuheereza omwanya ebiteekateeko ebisya by'eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, it became clear that there were significant discrepancies in the financial records. As a result, the auditors uncovered a shocking truth: the funds have been embezzled.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, kyazuulibwa nti waaliwo obutakkaanya obw'amaanyi mu biwandiiko by'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baazudde amazima ag'entiisa nti ensimbi zaabulankanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut, onen atyer kamaleng ni coc me lim ne pe tye kakare. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gunongo lok ada ma kelo lworo madit tutwal: lim ne kikwalo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, aponi kojenunai ebe ajai atiokisio nuipu kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu engican kodumutu abeit naetiono noi: ekokotai ikapun ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo yi 'yepi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo robia ma ale andri'baa 'diyi esu e'yo adaru okporu ni: 'ba eza robia 'da eyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho obutaikirizana omu bihandiiko by'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, ababazi b'ebitabo bakajumbura amazima g'omutaano, esente zikakoresibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about public health and the increasing demand for medical services, officials have recognized the need for significant improvements. As a result, they have prioritized funding and support for various healthcare initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku byobulamu by'abantu n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, bakulembezza ensimbi n'obuyambi eri enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom pa lwak ki miti me kony me yot kom matye kamede, lutic guniang ni omyero kimed rwom me kony me yotkom. Macalo adwogi ne, guketo cente ki kony pi yub mapat-pat me yot-kom obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naepol noi naka angaleu naka itunga keda eipuda loepol noi loka amukian, apotu eswamak kojenutu eipud loka aitojokaario naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi isingarenikisi agangat na ikapun kanu amukian na aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria tualu e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri be, azi'ba eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu e'yo eyi ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'ba okpo robia esuzu azini atita fezu otita arojo ni ndundu 'diyini.
