eng_prompt: The annual festival was in full swing, drawing attention from all corners of the region. As the sun rose, excitement filled the air, signaling the start of the long-awaited competition.
lug_prompt: Omukolo ogutegekebwa buli mwaka gwali mu bujjuvu, nga gusikiriza abantu okuva mu buli kanyomero k'ekitundu. Enjuba bwe yavaayo, essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga, nga kiraga entandikwa y'empaka ezibadde zisuubirwa okumala ebbanga.
ach_prompt: Kwer ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka ne obedo I rwom ma lamal tutwal, ma okelo miti I but lobo man weng. I kare ma ceng tye ka aa malo, yomcwiny opong I yamo, ma onyuto acaki pa pyem ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Arai epucit ngol lo itolosio kangol ekaru lo apol noi, ido abu koyangau itunga kotoma aiboisio kere nuka aiboisit kangin. Nealosior akolong, apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam, itodunit ageunet naka abolobol naedaunitai apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Omu eli vusi ri ndra e'yo dria ma alea, e'yo 'duza engazu angu kala dria angu 'di ma alea 'diyi vu. Etuka ni efuria, ayiko ga angu ma alea, ece kini abala 'bani ebi te sawa ezu 'diyi e'do 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'okujaguza ogurikubaho buri mwaka gukaba nigugyenda omu maisho, gukareetaho amaani kuruga omu bicweka byona eby'ekyanga. Omushana ku gwatandikire kurugaho, okushemererwa kweyongyeire omu mwanya, ekyaretsireho entandikwa y'empaka ezabaire zitegyekirwe kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: Many new parents find themselves struggling to soothe their babies during the first few months of life. One common issue they encounter is excessive crying, often attributed to a condition known as colic.
lug_prompt: Abazadde abapya bangi beesanga nga balwana okukkakkanya abaana baabwe mu myezi egisooka egy'obulamu. Ekimu ku bizibu bye basanga kwe kukaaba ennyo, emirundi egisinga kiva ku mbeera emanyidwa nga colic.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol ginongo tek tutwal me kweyo cwiny lutinogi I dwe me acel me kwogi. Peko acel ma gi nongo ipol kare obedo koko madwong tutwal, ma pol kare tye macalo adwogi me peko ma kilwongo ni colic.
teo_prompt: Auriak luipu luitetiak ewanyunete ebe etiono aitidisiar idwekec kotoma ilapio idis lusodit luka aijarakec. Ationis adiope na etapit kesi adumunun ngesi aimony naepol noi, ido duc eyangaunitai kanuka ejautene loenyaritai colic.
lgg_prompt: Tipika o'diru karakara eyi eyi esu eyi dri ci eyi ma odekua eyini asi omiza fezu imba oko eyi ma edri ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo azi alu eyini esu tualu ri eri owuza ambamba, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua omvele colic ru ri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi abasya nibashanga oburemeezi bw'okuhuumuriza abaana baabo omu myezi mikye y'okubanza y'amagara gaabo. Ekizibu kimwe ekirikukira kubaho n'okurira munonga, ekirikukira kubaho ahabw'oburwaire oburikumanywa nka colic.

eng_prompt: Due to potential risks associated with certain natural remedies, healthcare professionals often advise caution. It is important for expectant mothers to be aware of the safety of various substances they may consider using.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulabe obuyinza okuva mu kukozesa eddagala ly'obutonde, abakugu mu byobulamu bakubiriza okwegendereza. Kikulu bamaama abali embuto okumanya obukuumi bw'ebintu eby'enjawulo bye bayinza okulowoozaako okukozesa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma twero bedo tye ikare me tic ki yat ma lubanga aye ocweyo, ludiro me yot kom ipol kare miyo tam me gwoke. Pire tek tutwal pi mon ma oyac me ngeyo ber pa jami mapat-pat magitwero tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nuepedorete alomanar keda ikee luka Edeke, icorete ipirioitin luka angaleu acoikina. Erai ibore yenepol noi angor nuepotiete aijen nuka ayuwara naka ikee luegelegela luepedorete kesi aitosom.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ecopi ecipi aro nyakuni 'diyi be 'diyisi, 'ba onita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi imbata fe 'ba eyi ma aa milesi. Eri orodriru ayia okporovu ru 'diyini aa'zu mile be e'yo afa ndundu eyini eco ayu 'diyi ma tambaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'akabi akarikubaasa kureetwa emibazi y'obuhangwa, abakugu omu by'amagara nibahabura abantu kwegyendesereza. N'eky'omugasho abakazi abaine enda kumanya oburungi bw'ebintu ebitarikushushana ebi barikubaasa kukoresa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of worrying about her child's persistent cough, she finally decided it was time to seek professional help. With a heavy heart, she made her way to the hospital, hoping for answers.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga yeeraliikirira olw'okusesema kw'omwana we, yasalawo okufuna obuyambi bw'abakugu. Ng'omutima gumuzitooweredde, yagenda mu ddwaliro ng'asuubira okufuna eby'okuddamu.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me bedo ki lworo I kom lutino ne matye ka yweyo, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me nongo kony pa ludiro. Ki cwer cwiny madit tutwal, en ocito I ot yat, ki gen me nongo lagam.

lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia asi otiza be e'yo eri ma mva ma ombelea ri ma dria, asizu 'du asi kini sa'wa ca 'bani azakoma esuzu 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi vu ra. Candi amborusi, eri mu drile arojoa, asi 'baza be e'yo omvizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okwerarikirira ahabw'okusesema kw'omwana we, akahendera yasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okusherura obuhwezi bw'abakugu. N'omutima gw'oburemeezi, akagyenda omu irwariro, aine amatsiko g'okugarukwamu.

eng_prompt: After months of fundraising and community support, the local organization finally secured the necessary resources. With a clear vision in mind, they applied for financial assistance to bring their dream project to life.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okusonda ssente n'obuyambi okuva mu kitundu, ekitongole ky'ekitundu kyamala ne kifuna ebyetaago. Nga balina ekirooto ekitangaavu mu birowoozo, baasabye obuyambi bw'ensimbi okutuukiriza pulojekiti yaabwe ey'ekirooto.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me jogo cente ki miyo kony ki lwak, dul me tedero onongo jami ma mite. Ki neno maleng I wigi, gulego pi kony me lim me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aituk ikapun keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, abu erionget loka atutubet kodum iboro lu ekotoi. Keda aomisioit na ecai, apotu kesi ilipata agangat na ikapun kanu aitodolikin airujasia kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani robia trazu azini atita ongulumu eyini ri ma vutia, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'da esu asizu afa 'bani lele 'diyi. Egata kililiru be yi ma dria, yi a'i azakoma robianiri otita yini orobi yini 'diyi 'bazu idriru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okushorooza esente n'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, ekitongore ky'ekyaro kikahendera kyabona ebirikwetengwa. Baine enteekateeka nungi omu biteekateeko byabo, bakashaba obuhwezi bw'esente kureeta ekirooto kyabo omu nkora.

eng_prompt: After months of renovations and improvements, the final touches have been completed. Community members are eager to explore the new resources and facilities available to them.

lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia 'bani afa 'diyi edezu o'diru azini otuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba de e'yo asizuri 'bo. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi avasi afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhunduuza n'okutereeza ebyombeko, emirimo y'ahamuheru yahwa. Abantu b'omukyanga baine ekihika ky'okushwijuma ebintu ebisya n'eby'okukoresa ebirikuba biriho.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and outreach, the team finally secured commitments from several generous donors. With their combined efforts, they raised enough funds.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'okutuusa obubaka, ttiimu yasembayo okufuna obweyamo okuva mu bagabi b'obuyambi abawerako. Olw'amaanyi gaabwe ag'awamu, baasonze ssente ezimala.

lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini e'yo nzezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu owita eyi engazu 'ba afa fepi 'diyi vu. Okpo yini tualurisi, eyi tra robia capirisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuhikwaho obuhwezi, tiimu ekahendera yaatunga obuhwezi kuruga omu bagabirizi b'obuhwezi baingi. Ahabw'amaani gaabo, bakarundaana esente ezirikumara.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the organization as differing ideologies clash. As a result, members of the political party are fighting against themselves.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitongole ng'endowooza ez'enjawulo zilwanagana. N'ekivuddemu, bammemba b'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi balwanagana bokka na bokka.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I dul enoni pien tam mapat-pat tye ka lweny I kingi. Macalo adwogi ne, lumemba me dul me cungu iwi bye ne gitye ka lweny ikingi kengi.

lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu amuti 'da ma alea e'yo ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, memba amuti politikini 'diyi a'di 'diria yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kitongore ahabw'okurwanagana kw'ebiteekateeko bitari bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abanyakibiina ky'obutegyeki nibarwanagana.

eng_prompt: Despite their extensive campaign efforts and strong grassroots support, the candidates faced significant challenges. As the results came in, it became clear that their message had not resonated with the voters.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baakola kakuyege ow'amaanyi era nga balina obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva wansi, abeesimbyewo baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Ebyava mu kulonda bwe byafuluma, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obubaka bwabwe tebwali busiimiddwa balonzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki yub me bito kwi matek tutwal ki cwak ma aa ki bot lwak, lucungu ne gunongo peko mapol. Ikare ma adwogi ne obino, nen atyer kamaleng ni kwena meggi pe oyomo cwiny lubol kwir.

lgg_prompt: Yi ma ti odaza okporu 'diyi ma talasi azini atita okporu engazu o'bi eselea 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi fu dri e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi be ra. O'duko efupi 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini o'duko yini 'diyi awini 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma asi ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuronda akaruuru k'amaani n'obuhwezi bw'amaani, abesimbireho bakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ebyarugire omu bigyezo ku byaizire, kikarebeka butunu ngu obutumwa bwabo bukaba butarikushemeza abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, the stakes have never been higher for the administration. With polls showing a tight race, the president is strategizing to rally support among voters.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okulonda esembera, emigabo gy'obukulembeze tegibanga waggulu nga bwe kiri kati. Olw'okuba okulonda kulaga nti waliwo okuvuganya kwa maanyi, pulezidenti akoze enteekateeka okukungaanya obuwagizi mu balonzi.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, jami ma tye I cing gamente pe obedo dit tutwal I kare mukato angec. Ki kwir ma nyutu ni pyem tye matek tutwal, ladit lobo tye ka yubu yoo me nongo cwak ikin lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosete apakio nuka aseo, mam apugan ejai ationis naepol noi. Keda aseo na itodunit ebe ejai abolobol naepol noi, euta lokapolon akwap aitemonokin iwaitin lu aituk agangat kanejaas aseak.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo ri si, e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'dini ku. E'yo opetaa ni e'dazu a'bala okporu ni be risi, purezidenti ni otuta eyi 'ye atita trazu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, ebikwatiraine n'obwebembezi nibyeyongyera. Ahabw'okuteera akaruuru okurikworeka okuhayahayana kw'amaani, omwebembezi w'eihanga aine oburyo bw'okurundaana obushagiki omu babateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Frustration has been growing among the populace as they feel their needs are being ignored. Many believe that the current administration has failed to address the pressing issues facing the community.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongedde mu bantu nga bawulira nga ebyetaago byabwe bibuusibwa amaaso. Bangi balowooza nti gavumenti eriwo eremereddwa okukola ku bizibu abantu bye boolekaganye nabyo.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny tye ka mede ikin lwak pien giwinyo ni pe kitye ka tamo I kom miti gi. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni gamente matye kombedi pe twero cobo peko mapigi tego ma lwak tye iye.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kanejaas itunga naarai epupete kesi ebe mam epalunit ipudesia kec. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epiko eyaitene loakwana aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ri e'bi tu 'ba eyi ma eselea eyini egazu kini 'ba fe eyini afa eyini le 'diyi ku. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini driceza curu'do ri o'bi e'yo okporu ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza ko ti.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bantu ahabwokuba nibateekateeka ngu ebyetengo byabo tibarikubifaho. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu obwebembezi oburiho obwahati buremirwe kukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa abantu.

eng_prompt: Authorities have launched an investigation into allegations of misconduct. As a result, the former police chief is in custody.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza batandise okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti waliwo emize emibi. N'ekyavaamu, eyali omuduumizi wa poliisi ali mu kaduukulu.

lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'bo. E'yo 'disi, polisi ma drile andra okuri arujoa.

eng_prompt: After years of community service and activism, he decided it was time to take his commitment to the next level. With a strong vision for change, he is now entering the political arena.

nyn_prompt: Abebembezi b'amahanga, nibakira kwejumba omu nkwatanisa y'amahanga, okubaasa kuhamya enkoragana n'okukwatanisa. Nk'emwe aha bujunanizibwa bwabo, ba purezidenti baine obushoborozi bw'okugyenda aheeru y'eihanga kukora emirimo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In light of recent economic reforms, the government has implemented new policies to encourage foreign investment. As part of these measures, certain protections have been established for investors.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nnongoosereza mu by'enfuna ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko, gavumenti etaddewo enkola empya okukubiriza abasigansimbi okuva ebweru w'eggwanga. Ng'ekimu ku bisaanyizo bino, obukuumi obumu buteekeddwawo eri bamusigansimbi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka ma otimme cokcok-ki I tenge me lim ki biyacara, gamente okatti ki cik manyen me cuku cwiny lutim biacara ma aa ki lobo ma woko. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, kiketo jami mogo me gwoko lutim biacara.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka ikapun, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aisinyikokit itunga luka akwapin ace aswam ikapun. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, itemokinitai ayuwara nejaas agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata e'yo robia ni ma alia o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi atita fezu 'ba lonyi vuti alezani engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba o'ba tambaza azi 'diyi 'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka y'eby'entaasya eyabaireho juba,gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro ebisya by'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga. Nk'emwe aha mihanda egi, hariho eby'okwerinda ebiteirweho ahabw'abashubuuzi b'esente.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies have reported a rise in criminal activity in recent months. As a result, officers have intensified their patrols and enforcement efforts.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bitegeezezza nti obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongedde mu myezi egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, abasirikale bongedde okulawuna n'okukwasisa amateeka.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik guwaco ni tim aranyi omede I dwe ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, abili omedo rwom me tic gi me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Apotu iriongeta lu ikisila olimosi ebe eyatakinos aswamisio nuka abilibilio naka ikisila kolapio luatuboros. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipolisin kiyatakisi aswamukec naka aanyanar ka aitup ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu ra mba agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi otu e'yo eyi ma angu andrita ni 'diyi tualu okpo eyini 'bazu azita eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that acts of kindness reflect one's true character. In a world where generosity is often overlooked, the impact of charitable giving stands out.

eng_prompt: The community is coming together to support a great cause. Everyone is encouraged to participate and help raise funds for those in need.

eng_prompt: It is essential for all team members to understand the importance of maintaining consistency in our processes. Adhering to established protocols ensures that we achieve our goals effectively.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating unrest in the city, local authorities called for a coordinated response. As tensions rose, it became clear that a unified approach was necessary to restore order.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera mu kibuga, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baasaba wabeewo okukwatagana. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, kyafuuka kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola ey'awamu yeetaagibwa okuzzaawo obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me tim gero matye kamede i boma madit, lutela me tedero gulego ni omyero dano weng gutii kacelo. I kare ma telle omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero dano weng guribe me kelo ber bedo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ma omvitaa, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ai e'yo eyi ma aza kozu tualu. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma 'ye ti ecita e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria eyini ani e'yo otuzu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of escalating tensions and unrest, local leaders finally convened a meeting to address the community's grievances. Through dialogue and compromise, they managed to stop the protests.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'obunkenke n'obutabanguko byeyongedde, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatuula olukiiko okukola ku kwemulugunya kw'abantu. Nga bayita mu kuteesa n'okukkaanya, baasobola okukomya okwekalakaasa.

lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi omve asizu mitingi e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. Trayi e'yo nzeza ma aliasi, eyi o'bi ngiringiri 'da atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakahendera baayeta orukiiko kukora aha kwetomboitwa kw'abantu. Barikurabira omu kugaaniira n'okwikiriza, bakabaasa kuzibira obweshaaringo.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing concerns about the project's direction and the lack of consensus among team members, management decided to take a step back. As a result, the meetings were suspended.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku ngeri pulojekiti gy'egenda mu maaso n'obutakkaanya mu bammemba ba ttiimu, abaddukanya pulojekiti baasalawo okudda emabega. N'ekyavaamu, enkiiko zaayimirizibwa.

teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka epurojekt keda amamut acamanara kanejaas imeban luka etimu, abu eyaitene koseu ainyekikin. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiekikinai airiamununeta ngun.

eng_prompt: Recent investments and policy reforms have sparked growth across multiple industries. As a result, the economy is showing signs of recovery and development.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi gyebuvuddeko n'enkyukakyuka mu nkola bireeseewo enkulaakulana mu makolero ag'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ebyenfuna biraga obubonero bw'okudda engulu n'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I biyacara ma otime cokcok-ki kacel ki kelo aloka-loka I cik okelo dongo lobo I tenge mapat-pat mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, tenge me lim tye ka nyutu lanyut me roc ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun keda aijulanakineta nuka ikisila nes ayau apol kotoma okampuni luipu. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitodun ijenuneta luka aitojokaar keda apol.

eng_prompt: Many entrepreneurs are eager to tap into the potential of emerging markets, but they often face significant challenges. In particular, navigating the complexities of the Ugandan business landscape can be daunting for newcomers.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi bangi beetegefu okukozesa obusobozi bw'obutale obujja, naye batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Okusingira ddala, okutambulira mu mbeera enzibu ey'ebyobusuubuzi mu Uganda kiyinza okuba ekizibu eri abapya.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara mapol tye ki miti me tic ki jami matye I cuk matye ka dongo, ento ipol kare ginongo peko madongo. I yo acel-acel, yenyo yoo me timo biacara mapat-pat I lobo Uganda twero bedo tek tutwal ki jo ma pud gubino manyen.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi agwelanarak luipu aitwasam apedor naka isokonin lu eyaunete, konye ejaas kesi keda atiokisio nuepolok. Kacut, aitodolikin nuka ibiasaran luko Uganda etiono noi kanejaas luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ba tujari 'yepi karakara 'diyi ava be e'yo cuu efupi o'diru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ayuzu, te eyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu sa'wa driasi. Tutunisi, e'yo ewaru tujari 'yezu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eco adri ewaru 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi dri ra.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the retirement policies for public servants have been a topic of discussion among policymakers. Many believe that a mandatory retirement age can help bring in fresh talent and ideas to the government.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enkola y'okuwummula abakozi ba gavumenti ebadde nsonga ya kukubaganya birowoozo mu bakola amateeka. Bangi balowooza nti okuteekawo emyaka egy'okuwummulirako mu gavumenti kisobola okuyamba okuleeta ebitone n'ebirowoozo ebipya mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, cik me weko tic pa lutic pa gamente obedo gin ma lucungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka lok iye. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni mwaka me weko tic twero konyo kelo diro ki tam manyen I gamente.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ainapeta nuka aiyengun kanu eswamak luka apugan eraas nu ineritere. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ekisil loka ikar luka aiyengun ingarakini ayangaun itunga luitetiak keda aomisio nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, azita azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ma ava liza azi kuzu ri e'bi ovu e'yo nzeza ru 'ba azita sipi 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini eli 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma li ava azi kuzu ri eco fe 'ba talanta be azini egata be o'diru 'diyi eji gamete ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, ebiragiro by'okuhuumurira abakozi ba gavumenti bitwire nibigambwaho omu bakozi b'ebiragiro. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu emyaka y'okuhuumuriraho abantu omu mirimo neebaasa kuhwera omu kureeta entaranta n'ebiteekateeko ebisya omu gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing economic challenges and development needs, the government has outlined an ambitious financial plan. This year's fiscal strategy aims to address key sectors such as infrastructure, health, and education.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okweyongera n'ebyetaago by'enkulaakulana, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka y'ensimbi ennene. Enteekateeka y'ebyensimbi ey'omwaka guno eruubirira kukola ku bintu ebikulu ng'ebizimbe, ebyobulamu n'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me biacara matye kamede ki miti me dongo lobo, gamente okatti ki yub me lim madit tutwal. Yub me lim me mwaka ni tye ki miti me tic i kom tenge mapigi tego calo gedo, yot kom ki kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun keda ipudesia luka apol, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuepolok nuka ikapun. Alosikinet naka ekaru kalo naka ikapun erai aitemokin iriongeta luapolok kwape nat adukena, angaleu keda asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi pie, gamete 'ba otita azi okporu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria. Otita e'yo robia ni eli 'disi ri le esele okporu ekile afa ayuzaru 'diyi, alata azini onita le 'diyi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebyetaago by'entunguuka, gavumenti eteireho enteekateeka y'esente nungi. Enteekateeka y'eby'empiiha ey'omwaka ogu negyenderera kukora aha nshonga nkuru nk'ebyombeko, eby'amagara hamwe n'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Investments in transportation, utilities, and communication systems are essential for fostering growth in various sectors. As communities enhance their infrastructure, they create a more conducive environment for businesses to thrive.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu byentambula, n'ebyempuliziganya bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. Ebitundu bwe byongera ku bikozesebwa, bitondawo embeera ennungi eri bizinensi okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub me wot, tic ki kubbe obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo I tenge mapat-pat. Ka lwak tye ka ilo malo rwom me gedo gi, gi kelo kabedo maber pi biacara me dongo.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma alosit, aitwasam iboro, keda arucokina eraasi nuepolok noi kanu aitopolor apol kotoma atutubena nuegelegela. Arai itojokar itunga aiboisio kec, epote kesi aitolomun ejautene loejok kanu agwelanar apoloun.

nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'engyenda, eby'okukoresa hamwe n'empurizagana, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho entunguuka omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ebyanga kubirikutunguura ebyombeko byabyo, nibireetaho embeera nungi y'eby'obushubuzi kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: The organization has identified several key areas for improvement. As a result, various projects are under implementation.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kizuudde ebintu ebikulu bingi ebyetaaga okulongoosebwa. N'ekivuddemu, pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ziteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Dul ne otyeko nongo kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero gutim iye aloka-loka. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka keto yub mapat-pat itic.

eng_prompt: Despite various efforts to boost revenue and control spending, the country's financial challenges persist. As a result, economic planning often leads to a shortfall in funds.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'enjawulo ow'okutumbula omusolo n'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya, okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyensimbi mu ggwanga kukyaliwo. N'ekivuddemu, okuteekerateekera eby'enfuna kitera okuvaako ebbula ly'ensimbi.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini robia ayuza ma omgbo esizu ra ti, e'yo ewaru robia ni kari ma alia 'diyi nga po'di ci. E'yo 'disi, otuta e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria ri ni tutuni fe robia ma ako ni.

eng_prompt: In a world where choices shape our lives, it's crucial to recognize the impact of our decisions. Accountability is a fundamental principle that guides our interactions and behaviors.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi okusalawo gye kukyusa obulamu bwaffe, kikulu nnyo okumanya ebiva mu kusalawo kwaffe. Embalirira ye misingi emikulu egobererwa mu nkolagana yaffe n'enneeyisa.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma tam ma wamoko aye yubo kwo wa, pire tek tutwal me niang adwogi me tam ma wamoko. Nyutu kor tic obedo cik ma doro kit ma wawinye kwede ki kit ma watimo kwede jami.

teo_prompt: Kotoma ogurupu kere arai aiboisit adio, ejaas aomisio nuegelegela keda aomisio nuegelegela. Iponesio luegelegela luka aomisio eyangaunete ipegeta keda ipegeta luejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kani ongulumu ciri ma alea, e'yo ndundu eyi tualu egata ndundu eyi pie 'diyi nga efu ra. Egata ndundu 'diyi tuni e'yo onzeza kililiru azini agbatara eji.

eng_prompt: As cities continue to grow and attract more residents, the demand for real estate has skyrocketed. This surge in interest has driven up property prices significantly.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okukula n'okusikiriza abatuuze bangi, obwetaavu bw'amayumba bweyongedde. Okweyongera kw'amagoba kuleetedde ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya ennyo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma citi tye kamede ki dongo ki kelo dano mapol I kabedo gi, miti me nongo odi dong omede tutwal. Medde pa magoba eni oweko wel odi omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos isitei apol ka ayangaun itunga luipu, apolor noi eipuda lo itogoi. Apol naka ameda naka ikapun nes eyataki itiaisinei luka itogoi.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo eyini muzu zozu dika eyini muzu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ejizu dika, e'yo 'bani lezu angu eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma omgbo tu uru. Orodri tupi 'di fe aje angu ma dria 'diyi tu uru.

eng_prompt: With a vast portfolio of investments and successful business ventures, his financial acumen is unmatched. Many people admire his ability to turn ideas into profitable enterprises.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba alina ebintu bingi by'ataddemu ssente ne bizineesi ennungi, talina gw'ayinza kugeraageranyaako mu by'ensimbi. Abantu bangi beewuunya obusobozi bwe obw'okufuula ebirowoozo bye bizinensi ez'amagoba.
ach_prompt: Ki jami mapol ma en oketo I biyacara, ngec ma en tye kwede I lok me lim pe rom ki pa ngat mukene. Dano mapol tye ki miti madit tutwal I kom kit ma en loko kwede tamme me doko biacara ma kelo magoba.
teo_prompt: Keda ikapun luipu luipikakinit ngesi keda ibiasaran luekeriaka, emamei itunganan yenepedori ajenun ngesi kowai lo ikapun. Eminas itunga luipu apedorit ke aijulakin aomisio toma aswamisinei nu iswamaete ameda.

eng_prompt: To ensure accountability and track progress, companies require their staff to submit regular updates. This practice helps maintain transparency and fosters effective communication within the organization.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa embalirira n'okulondoola enkulaakulana, amakampuni geetaaga abakozi baago okuwaayo ebipya buli kaseera. Enkola eno eyamba okukuuma obwerufu n'okutumbula empuliziganya ennungi mu kitongole.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni ki nyutu kor tic gi ki bene neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede, dul mapat-pat mito ni luticgi gubed ka miyo ngec manyen kare ki kare. Tim man konyo me neno ni jami weng tye atir dok bene kelo lok maber ikin dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun ka airereonor apol, ekotosi ikampunin eswamakakec aijukar iboro luitetiak duc. Ingarakinit aswamisioit na aidar aica ka aitopolor einer kotoma atukot.

eng_prompt: The government is in the process of finalizing its annual financial plan. As part of this process, various sectors are evaluated to determine their funding needs.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti eri mu kaweefube w'okumaliriza enteekateeka yaayo ey'ebyensimbi ey'omwaka. Ng'ekitundu ku nkola eno, ebitongole eby'enjawulo byekenneenyezebwa okuzuula ebyetaago byabyo eby'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Gamente tye I yub me tyeko yub me lim meggi me mwaka ki mwaka. Macalo but yub man, ki ngiyo tenge mapat-pat me niang ngo ma mite pi nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Ejai apugan ainapeta nuka angetakin ainapeta nuka ikapun luka ekaru. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, ewanyunono iriongeta luegelegela kanu ajenun ipudesia kec luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni otita e'yo robia ni eli vusi 'diyi ma otita asizu ri ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba esele ndundu eyi ma ale andri eyini ani robia esuzu ra ri esuzu.

eng_prompt: With a diverse range of crops and livestock, the agricultural sector plays a crucial role in providing employment and sustenance for the majority of the population. As a result, the country's economic stability heavily relies on the success of its farming practices.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebirime n'ebisolo eby'enjawulo, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola omulimu munene mu kuwa abantu emirimu n'okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna by'eggwanga bisinziira nnyo ku buwanguzi bw'enkola zaayo ez'okulima n'okulunda.
ach_prompt: Ki jami apita ki dyangi ma padi padi, tenge me pur timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo tic ki kwo ki dano mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, ber bedo pa lobo I tenge me lim jenge tutwalle I kom diro me pur matye katime maber.
teo_prompt: Keda iraan keda ibaren luegelegela, iswamai erionget loka akor aswam naepol noi kanu aijaikin itunga luipu aswamisinei keda aijar. Kanuka ngun, ainapakina naka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok ejai kotupitete akiro nu akoru.
lgg_prompt: Ori azini anyapa karakara 'diyisi, esele agrikica niri ni azi okporu nga azi fezu azini idri nyaza fezu 'ba abari yi dri. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ewaru e'yo lonyi ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbazuri yi ati e'yo agirikica yini 'diyi ma drile suzuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihingirwe n'amatungo g'emiringo mingi, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza abantu emirimo n'okutuuraho. N'ekyarugiremu, obutereera omu by'entaasya y'eihanga, nibureberera aha businguzi bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Many studies have shown a strong correlation between childhood adversity and long-term emotional well-being. As a result, individuals raised in difficult environments often struggle to find happiness in their adult lives.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kungi kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'ebizibu by'abaana n'embeera ennungi ey'ebirowoozo ey'ekiseera ekiwanvu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abaakulira mu mbeera enzibu batera okulwana okufuna essanyu mu bulamu bwabwe obw'obukulu.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto kubbe matek ikin peko ma lutino nongo ki kit ma giwinyo kwede pi kare malac. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma gudongo I kabedo matek pol kare gi nongo peko me nongo yom-cwiny ikare gi me dongo.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuipu eidicane loepol noi kiding atiokisio nuka idwe keda aijar naka aojau naepol. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu epolounitos kotoma aiboisio nuetioko etiono adumun aiyalama kotoma aijar kec nakolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyi ecipi e'yo ewaru anzi nyiri eyini esu 'diyi ma eselea tualu e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa ezu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ezo'ba angu ewaru ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi dri ci ayiko esuzu eyi ma edri 'ba 'wara 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Many fans gather in pubs and homes to watch their national teams compete on the world stage. The excitement and pride associated with international tournaments often overshadow local league matches.
lug_prompt: Abawagizi bangi bakungaana mu bbaala ne mu maka okulaba ttiimu zaabwe ez'eggwanga nga zivuganya ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna. Essanyu n'amalala ebikwatagana n'empaka z'ensi yonna bitera okubuutikira emipiira gy'omunda.
ach_prompt: Lucwak tuku mapol gure I bar ki gangi pa dano me neno tuku pa team odilo me lobo gi I pyem me wilobo. Yomcwiny ki awaka matye I pyem tuku me lobo mawoko ipol kare balo pyem tuku me lobo kany.
teo_prompt: Egangitok luipu etukonokinos obaan keda oreria kanu asesen itimunukec luka akwapuwok lueboloboloete kotoma akwapin nukokinga. Aiyalama keda aiyalama na ikamanara keda abolobol naka akwapin nukokinga epalunit noi adepar aboliasio nuka akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Ba atita fepi karakara eyi tra eyi pari ewa mvuzu 'diyi ma alea azini aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea eyi ma amuti kari ni 'diyi ndrezu abala kari eyivile 'diyiniri ma alea. Ayiko saaru azini afusi avita kari eselia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi tuni avita avita kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abahagizi baingi nibateeranira omu mabaara n'omu maka gaabo kureeba tiimu zaabo z'eihanga nizihayahayana aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona. Okushemererwa n'okwetunguura ebirikukwatanisa n'empaka z'amahanga goona, buriijo nibishweka emizaano y'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: As the financial crisis deepens, many are questioning the stability of the nation's economy. Analysts are closely examining the government's fiscal policies and revenue streams.
lug_prompt: Ng'obuzibu bw'ensimbi bweyongera, bangi babuusabuusa obutebenkevu bw'ebyenfuna by'eggwanga. Abakugu mu by'enfuna beekenneenya nnyo enkola za gavumenti ezikwata ku by'ensimbi n'ensimbi eziyingira mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me lim tye ka mede kwede, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom dongo pa lim me lobo man. Ludiro ma kwedo lok kom lim gitye ka ngiyo kit ma gamente tiyo kwede ki lim kacel ki yoo me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor ationis naka ikapun, epedorete itunga luipu aomit ebe mam edumune loka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok ebuni ainapakina. Eutasi ipiriotin airereor ainapeta nuka apugan nuka ikapun keda ewai lo edumunere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ni tuzu uru, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi azita gameteni e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri azini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'esente ku burikweyongyera, baingi nibabangaanisa obusingye bw'eby'entaasya y'eihanga. Abacencuzi bariyo nibacondooza kurungi ebiragiro bya gavumenti ebirikukwata ahaby'empiiha hamwe n'oburugo bw'esente.

eng_prompt: The economic situation in Uganda has become increasingly challenging in recent years. As a result, the government has sought loans from various international partners to support its development projects.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenfuna mu Uganda yeeyongedde okusoomoozebwa mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti esoose kwewola ssente okuva mu nsi ez'enjawulo okuwagira pulojekiti zaayo ez'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki peko me lim I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ka gamo lim den ki bot dul mapat-pat me lobo mawoko me konyo yubgi me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Ejautene loka ikapun ko Uganda erai lo etiono noi kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, emoi apugan ilonin kama ejaasi ipaupa luka akwapin ace kanu aigang ipurojektin lu apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri eca ewaru eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, gamete e'bi gbanza eyi esu engazu amuti kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi vu atita fezu otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'eby'entaasya omu Uganda eyeyongyeire kugumizamu omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti eshabire za rooni kuruga omu banywani b'amahanga agatari gamwe okuhwera purogyekiti zaayo ez'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Each year, the government outlines its financial priorities and plans for the upcoming fiscal period. This process involves careful analysis and collaboration among various departments and agencies.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka gavumenti eraga ebiruubirirwa byayo eby'ensimbi n'enteekateeka zaayo ez'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Enkola eno ezingiramu okwekenneenya n'okukolagana n'obwegendereza wakati w'ebitongole n'ebitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, gamente nyutu jami ma en mito timo ki yubbe pi mwaka me lim matye kabino ni. Yub man kwako ngiyo ki winye I kin dul mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kangol ekaru, itodunit apugan nu ekoto ngesi aswam kanu ikapun ka aitemonokineta nuka ekaru loka ikapun lo ebunit. Imoriarit ainapeta ngun airereonor ka aiswamanara kiding iriongeta keda atukona nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli alu alu vusi, gamete ni e'yo erini lele robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria azini otita erini 'diyi e'da eli robiani emupi ri ma alia. Otita 'di ma alea e'yo eti ondaza kililiru azini ti icita esele ndu ndu azini amuti ndundu yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka,gavumenti neeyoreka enteekateeka n'ebigyendererwa byayo omu by'empiiha eby'omwaka ogurikwija. Enkora egi neetwariramu okushwijuma n'okukwatanisa ahagati y'ebitongore ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Government officials are entrusted with the responsibility of managing taxpayer money. However, when they fail to uphold this duty, serious consequences can arise.
lug_prompt: Abakungu ba gavumenti baweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okuddukanya ssente z'omuwi w'omusolo. Naye bwe balemererwa okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa buno, wabaawo ebizibu eby'amaanyi ebivaamu.

lgg_prompt: Ba fe azi'ba gameteni 'diyi dri azi robia 'ba musoro ofepi 'diyiniri ma tambazu. Kani si, eyi ka azi 'di 'ye ku, e'yo onzi eyi eco efu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi ba Gavumenti, nibaheebwa obujunanizibwa bw'okureeberera sente z'omushoro. Kwonka, ku baremirwe kukora omurimo ogu, ebirugyemu nibibaasa kuba eby'amaani.

eng_prompt: The government faced increasing pressure to address the economic challenges affecting the nation. In response, the finance minister announced that a supplementary budget would be introduced to provide additional funding for critical programs.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti yayolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa okweyongera okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okukosa eggwanga. Mu kwanukula, minisita w'ebyensimbi yalangirira nti embalirira ey'ennyongereza ejja kuteekebwawo okuwa ensimbi ez'ennyongereza ku pulogulaamu enkulu.
ach_prompt: Gamente onongo lyeto madit tutwal me tyeko peko me biacara ma tye ka yelo lobo. Macalo lagam, minista ma loyo lok kom lim owaco ni kibinyuto byek lim mukene me medo lim I yub mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan kodum aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetirorit akwap. Kanu abongokin, abu eminisita loka ikapun kolimo ebe eponio aitolomun ebajet kanu aijaikin ikapun luipu kanu ainapeta nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Gamete esu e'yo okporu e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma dria. Omvitaniria, minisita e'yo robia ni 'diyi niri azi kini 'ba nga otita aje robia ni 'diyi e'do robia fezu otita orodriru 'diyi dri dika.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ekatunga oburemeezi obweyongyeire kukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburikuteganisa eihanga. Omu kugarukamu, minisita w'eby'empiiha akarangirira ngu embariirira eyongyeirweho neija kutandikwaho okureeta esente ezindi aha puroguraamu ez'omugasho.

eng_prompt: The role of the Inspector General of Government is crucial for maintaining accountability and transparency within the administration. Understanding the appointment process is essential to grasp the independence and authority of this position.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'omuduumizi wa gavumenti mukulu nnyo mu kukuuma embalirira n'obwerufu mu bukulembeze. Okutegeera enkola y'okulondebwa kwa mugaso okutegeera obwetwaze n'obuyinza bw'ekifo kino.
ach_prompt: Tic pa inspector general of government pire tek tutwal I gwoko kor tic ki ada I tenge me tela. Niang kit ma kiyero kwede dano pire tek tutwal me niang twero ki twero pa tic man.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka ekaanyanaran lokapolon loka apugan erai naepol noi kanu aidar eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda aica kotoma apugan. Amisiikin epone loeseunere itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amisiikin aipuga keda apedorosio nuka adoketait kana.
lgg_prompt: Azi ꞌba gameteni inspector general ruri niri eri orodriru eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma dria azini eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu ri ma vata eri orodriru e'yo driwala ni azini okpo pari 'di ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'orikukurira gavumenti n'ogw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda embaririra n'oburingaaniza omu bwebembezi. Okwetegyereza enkora y'okutoorana abantu n'eky'omugasho munonga, okwetegyereza okwetegyeka n'obushoborozi bw'omwanya ogu.

eng_prompt: Despite his impressive qualifications, his behavior often leaves much to be desired. Many have noticed that he tends to interrupt others and dismiss their opinions.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'alina ebisaanyizo ebyewuunyisa, enneeyisa ye ereka bingi eby'okwegomba. Bangi bakirabye nti atera okusala abalala mu bigambo n'agaana endowooza zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en tye ki kwan mamwonya tutwal, kit mege pol kare weko jami mapol me miti. Dano mapol guneno ni en maro ngolo lok pa jo mukene dok cayo tamgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda asioman naepol noi, mam iponesioke iswamaete ejok. Apotu itunga luipu kojenutu ebe etapit ngesi aibil akiro nuka luce kosodete acamun aomisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu onita onyiru be ra ti, adriza erini 'diyi tuni e'yo lepi 'diyi ku. Ba karakara eyi esu ndre kini eri le 'ba azi 'diyi ma ti oga azini egata eyivile 'diyi 'be te.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho emishomo ye mirungi, emicwe ye neekira kureka bingi by'okwetenga. Abantu baingi bakareeba ngu aine omuze gw'okucwekyereza abandi n'okushazamu ebiteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered in anticipation, the atmosphere buzzed with excitement and curiosity. I took my seat, eager to hear the leader's thoughts on the nation's future.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu bakungaanidde mu ssanyu, embeera yabadde ejjudde essanyu n'obwagazi. Natuula mu kifo kyange nga nneesunga okuwulira endowooza z'omukulembeze ku biseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano gugure, cwinygi obedo yom dok gubedo ki miti me ngeyo jami mapol. Abedo I kabedona ki miti matek me winyo tam pa latela ne I kom anyim pa lobo man.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukokin, apotu itunga luipu opotu keda aiyalama naepol noi. Abu eong iboikin eong, akoto noi aipup aomisio nuka engarenon kanuikamunitos ingaren naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: O'bi yini trazu yi ma eselea asi 'baza be, angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayikosi azini ava be saaru. Ari ma vile kiti avasi egata drice'ba 'da ni kari ma ewu drialeri ma dria 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku abantu baabaire bateeranire hamwe, abantu bakaba bashemereirwe kandi baine ekihika ky'okumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Nkashutama, nyine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebiteekateeko by'omwebembezi ahari nyensya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Throughout her life, she has always been driven by a vision of success and achievement. As she reflects on her goals, she feels a strong sense of determination to reach new heights.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu bwe bwonna, bulijjo abadde akulemberwa okwolesebwa kw'obuwanguzi n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Bw'alowooza ku biruubirirwa bye, awulira obumalirivu obw'amaanyi okutuuka ku ntikko empya.

eng_prompt: The annual pilgrimage to Namugongo has always been a significant event for many, drawing thousands of faithful from across the region. Tragically, last year’s journey was marred by unforeseen challenges that led to a heartbreaking loss of life.
lug_prompt: Okulamaga kwa buli mwaka e Namugongo kubadde kwa mugaso nnyo eri bangi, okusikiriza enkumi n'enkumi z'abakkiriza okuva mu bitundu byonna. Eky'ennaku, olugendo lw'omwaka oguwedde lwayonoonebwa okusoomoozebwa okwabadde tekuteeberezebwa okwaviirako okufiirwa obulamu.
ach_prompt: Wot me limo kabedo me Namugongo mwaka ki mwaka obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal bot dano mapol, ma kelo luyee mapol tutwal ki I but lobo man mapat-pat. Ki gum marac, wot me mwaka ma okato obedo ki peko mapol ma oweko dano mapol otoo.
teo_prompt: Alosit Namugongo kangolikaru erai ibore yen epol ajokis kanejaas itunga luipu, ido ingalauni itunga ilukumin luka aiyuunikec kotoma aiboisio kere. Nukaiturur, alosit naka ekaru loatubor abu komunar keda atiokisio nu mam aomitai eyangaunit atwaniar aijar.

nyn_prompt: Okutaayaaya Namugongo buri mwaka, kitwire kiri eky'omugasho ahari baingi, ekirikureeta enkumi n'enkumi z'abaikiriza kuruga omu kicweka kyona. Eky'obusaasi, orugyendo rw'omwaka oguhwaire rukacumbagirwa oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho obwarugiremu okufeerwa amagara g'abantu.

ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nywako lok I kom anyimgi, lunyom ne dong guwinyo ni gitye atera me timo gin mukene I kingi. Gubedo piny kacel, cwinygi obedo yom dok bene gubedo ki lworo, me tyeko lok matut I kom cikke meggi.

lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini agbatara gbazu eyi ma ewu drialeri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba iri 'diyi esu asizu eyi ngonde muzu e'yo eyi ma eselea ri 'yezu. Ruki va tualu ayiko be te asi otiza be e'yo yini yi owizu yi ma eselea 'diyi dezu.

eng_prompt: As conflict escalates and daily life becomes increasingly dangerous, many individuals find themselves desperate for safety and stability. In their search for a better future, they often look beyond their borders for refuge.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukuubagano bweyongera era n'obulamu obwa bulijjo bweyongera okuba obw'obulabe, abantu bangi beesanga nga baggwaamu essuubi ly'obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Mu kunoonya ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso ebirungi, batera okutunula ebweru w'ensalo zaabwe okunoonya obubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ka lweny tye ka mede ki kwo me nino ducu tye ka doko rac tutwal, dano mapol gitye ki miti matek tutwal me nongo gwok ki ber bedo. Ikare me yenyo kwo maber I kare me anyim, pol kare giyenyo luring ayela I kabedo ma gi aa ki ie.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata ingungeta keda aijar naka nginiparan, itunga luipu ekotosi ayuwara keda ainapakina. Kotoma aimo ngaren na ejok, etapit kesi aimo aiboisio nu okinga na akwapukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu azini edri o'du driasi ri ni ecazu e'yo onzi ru, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi asi 'baza be e'yo agei tema ni azini asianzu niri ma dria. E'yo ewu drialeri ma e'yo ndaria, eyi sa'wa driasi angu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ku 'diyi nda.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko ku burikweyongyera n'amagara ga buriizooba kweyongyera kuba ag'akabi, abantu baingi nibeesherurira oburinzi n'obutebekana. Omu kuronda ebiro bya nyensya birungi, nibenda obuhungiro aheeru y'ensharo zaabo.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict and division, the voices of faith and compassion become increasingly important. Many communities look to their spiritual guides for direction and hope.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano n'enjawukana, amaloboozi g'okukkiriza n'okusaasira geeyongera okuba amakulu. Ebitundu bingi bitunuulira abakulembeze baabyo ab'omwoyo okufuna obulagirizi n'essuubi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki apoka-poka, dwon me niye ki kica doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Kabedo mapol giyenyo kony ki gen ki bot lutela gi me cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka ingungeta keda atiakatiaka, epol ajokis noi aiketakin aiyuun keda aitim. Eomitos itunga luipu nejaas engarenok kec luka edini kanu aicoreta keda amuno.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni azini esele coza ni 'diyisi, o'duko a'ita ni azini asi ndriza ni 'diyi eca orodriru tu. Ongulumu karakara eyi 'ba eyi ma drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi vu imbata azini asi'baza esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutaikirizana n'okwebaganisamu, eiraka ry'okwikiriza n'embabazi niryeyongyera kuba ery'omugasho. Abantu baingi nibaronda obuhabuzi n'amatsiko omu b'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: Growing up, I often heard fascinating stories about my family's history in the church. One of the most influential figures in our lineage is my grandfather, who dedicated his life to serving as a bishop.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nkula, nnateranga okuwulira emboozi ezisikiriza ezikwata ku byafaayo by'amaka gaffe mu kkanisa. Omu ku bantu abakulu mu lunyiriri lwaffe ye jjajja wange, eyawaayo obulamu bwe okuweereza ng'omulabirizi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye kadongo, abedo ka winyo ododo mabeco tutwal I kom gangwa I gang lega. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I kakawa obedo dadana, ma odyero kwone me tic macalo bicop.
teo_prompt: Kapolou, apupunit eong akiro nuikamunitos akiro nukolo nuka ekaleka kokanisa. Ediopet kotoma otunga luepolok noi kotoma atekerinikosi ngesi kwaruka, loabu koinak aijarake aijaanakin kwape ebishop.
lgg_prompt: Mani zoria, ma eri sawa driasi o'duko ndrizaru e'yo familia mavile 'diyi ma dria kanisa. Ba azi okporu tu familia amavileri ma alea ri ma a'bipi, idri erini 'diyi owipi azi ngazu bisopi ru ri'i.
nyn_prompt: Kukura, nkaba mpurira emboozi ezirikukwata aha byafaayo by'eka yaitu omu kanisa. Omwe aha bantu b'amaani omu runyiriri rwaitu ni shwenkuru, owaheireyo amagara gye kuheereza nk'omureeberezi.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered outside the Capitol, anticipation filled the air. Millions of viewers tuned in from their homes, eager to witness this historic moment.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaanidde wabweru w'ekitebe ekikulu, baali beesunga nnyo. Obukadde n'obukadde bw'abalabi baawuliriza nga bali mu maka gaabwe, nga beesunga okulaba akaseera kano ak'ebyafaayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure I nget ot moko cik, dano mapol gubedo ki miti matek tutwal. Lunen milion mapol gubedo I gangigi, ma cwinygi obedo yom me neno kare man me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kinga naka Capitol, apotu itunga luipu kopuputu aiyalama. Apotu imilionin luka itunga kowanyutu kotoma oreriakec, ekotosi noi asesen apakio nu nuka akiro nukakolo.
lgg_prompt: O'bi yini yi trazu aku ambu Capitolniri ma aliarisi amveleru, asi 'baza ga angu ma aliasi tre. Ba milioni karakara ndre'ba 'diyi emu e'yo ndre engazu aku yini 'diyi ma alia, ava be e'yo adi ni 'diri ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira aheeru y'orurembo rwa Capitol, okushemererwa kwejumbaire omumwanya. Obukaikuru n'obukaikuru bw'abareebi bakahurira kuruga omu maka gaabo, baine ekihika ky'okureeba obwire obu obw'ebyafaayo.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a small town, he was surrounded by traditions and values that shaped his upbringing. Faith played a significant role in his family's life, influencing their daily routines and community interactions.
lug_prompt: Ng'akulira mu kabuga akatono, yeetooloddwa obuwangwa n'empisa ezaamukuza. Okukkiriza kwakola omulimu munene mu bulamu bw'amaka ge, nga kukosa emirimu gyabwe egya buli lunaku n'okukolagana n'abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: En odongo I taun mo matidi, en obedo I kin tekwaro ki jami ma okonye I kare ma en pud tidi. Niye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo pa jo me ode, ma okelo alokaloka I ticgi me nino ki nino ki kit ma gubedo kwede I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Apoloun kotoma otaun lodidi, apotu iponesio keda iponesio luapotu itopoloutu ngesi. Abu aiyuun iswama aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka ekaleke, aitojokaar aswamukec naka nginiparan keda aiswamanara keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini zozu tawuni werea ma alia, eri ma agei te e'yo a'bini azini adriza onyiru erini zozuri ma alia. A'ita 'ye azi okporu idri familia eriniri ma alia, erini e'yo yini 'ye o'du driasi azini e'yo yi 'yezu ongulumu yi ma eselea 'diyi ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Okukurira omu tawuni nkye, akeetorwaho engyenderwaho n'emitwarize y'obuhangwa eyamureeteire okukurira gye. Okwikiriza kukakora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara g'eka ye, okureetaho entwaza yaabo eya buriizooba hamwe n'okukorengana kwabo omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the demand for natural resources continues to rise, various industries are increasingly turning to mining as a solution. However, the consequences of such activities can be detrimental to ecosystems and local communities.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka bweyongera okulinnya, amakolero ag'enjawulo geeyongedde okudda mu kusima eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka ng'eky'okugonjoola. Newankubadde, ebiva mu bikolwa ng'ebyo bisobola okuba eby'obulabe eri obutonde bw'ensi n'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me lonyo ma lubanga aye ocweyo tye kamede kwede, dul mapat-pat tye ka cako tic me golo lonyo me te ngom macalo yoo me cobo peko ne. Kadi bed kumeno, adwogi me tim enoni twero bedo rac tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa ki kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo iboro lu isuban luka Edeke, eutasi icuman luipu aijulakin aibok abar kwape epone loka aitemokin ngun. Konye, atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma aswamisinei kangun emunarete isuban keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa nyakuni 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile turia, okalamvu ndundu eyi curu'do e'do angu nzeza ma alea. Kani si, e'yo efupi 'yeta 'dile 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco ovu onzi e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma dria azini ongulumu angu ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'obugaiga by'omu itaka nibigumizamu nibyeyongyera, amakorero agatari gamwe na gamwe nigahindukira omu by'okutimba eby'omu itaka nk'eky'okukora. Kwonka ebirikuruga omu bikorwa nk'ebyo nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi aha buhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Before embarking on any mining project, it is essential to understand the various factors that influence the feasibility and legality of such operations. This includes assessing the necessary permits, equipment, and environmental considerations.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika pulojekiti yonna ey'okusima eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka, kya mugaso okutegeera ensonga ez'enjawulo ezikulemberamu obutuufu n'obutuufu bw'emirimu egyo. Kino kizingiramu okwekenneenya olukusa olwetaagisa, ebikozesebwa, n'okulowooza ku butonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icako tic mo keken me golo lonyo me te ngom, pire tek tutwal me niang jami mapat-pat matye ka weko tic enoni bedo twero dok malube ki cik. Man kwako niang pi nongo twero me tic, jami tic ki tamo I kom cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Erongo egeuna aswam epurojekt loka aibok abar, ejokuna noi amisiikin akiro nuegelegela nuepedorete aitodolikin aswamisio ngun. Imoriaritos nu airereonor apapulai nu ekotoi, iswamasia keda iboro lu akwap.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba e'doni otita azi lonyi nzezu 'diyi 'ye ku, eri orodriru e'yo ndundu ecopi e'yo nde 'yepi ra azini azita palaa ra 'diyi vazu. Di ma alia e'yo kokobi lepi 'diyi ma ale andrizu, afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie, azini e'yo angu ama agei ri ma dria 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire purogyekiti y'okusima eby'obugaiga bw'omu itaka, ni kikuru kumanya enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho oburemeezi n'oburingaaniza bw'emirimo egyo. Eki nikitwariramu okushwijuma ebirikwetengyesa, ebikwato, hamwe n'ebikwatiraine n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, concerns about water scarcity and quality have prompted increased scrutiny of local resources. As a result, measures were implemented to ensure sustainable management of this vital resource.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweraliikirira ku bbula ly'amazzi n'omutindo gw'amazzi kiviiriddeko okwongera okwekenneenya eby'obugagga by'omu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, enkola zaateekebwa mu nkola okulaba nti eby'obugagga bino ebikulu bikolebwako bulungi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo pi peko me nok pa pii ki rwom me pii oweko dano tye ka ngiyo kit ma pii tiyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoko yoo me gwoko lonyo man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aikidiokus na akipi keda adoketait na akipi einakini aanyanar iboro lu atutubet. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai iwaitin lu eyuaritere iboro lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'yo yi ako ni azini yi ma wura ma dria ri fe 'bani e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu drile. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'du e'yo 'bani ecozu afa orodriru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi n'omutindo gw'amaizi, kireesireho okushwijuma eby'obugaiga by'omubyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, engyenderwaho zikateebwa omu nkora okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga ebi bigumire nibikozesibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: From the moment we are born, our bodies require sustenance to thrive. Engaging in the act of consuming food and beverages is a fundamental aspect of our existence.
lug_prompt: Okuva lwe tuzaalibwa, emibiri gyaffe gyeetaaga okuliisibwa okukula. Okwenyigira mu kulya n'okunywa kintu kikulu nnyo mu bulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma kinywalowa, komwa mito cam wek odong maber. Camo cam ki mato kongo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Ageun na iurunere oni, ipudasi akwan wok inyamat kanu apol. Alomar toma aswamisioit naka ainyam inyamat keda imaten erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu sawa amani osizurisi, rua amavile 'diyi le nyaka ra. E'yo nyaka nyazu azini afa mvuzaru 'diyi ma nyazuri eri e'yo azi okporu ama ma edri ni.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga obu turikuzaarwa, emibiri yaitu neeyetenga okuriisibwa okukura. Okwejumba omu kukoresa eby'okurya n'eby'okunywa n'ekintu kikuru omu magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: As the sun set behind the mountains, casting long shadows over the village, the heroes realized they had only scratched the surface of the mystery that lay before them. With newfound determination, they prepared to face the challenges that awaited in the darkness.
lug_prompt: Ng'enjuba egwa emabega w'ensozi, ng'essa ebisiikirize ebiwanvu ku kyalo, abazira baakitegeera nti baali baakatandika okwetegereza ebyama ebyali mu maaso gaabwe. Olw'obumalirivu obupya bwe baafuna, beetegekera okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okwali kubalindiridde mu kizikiza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto I ngee godi, kun keto tipo maboco I kom caro, oteka ne gunongo ni dong gutyeko ngeyo jami ma obedo I nyimgi. Ki tek cwiny manyen, guyube me lweny i kom peko ma onongo tye ka kurogi I col piny.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kau naka imoru, aipikakin aanyuneta nuapolok toma ocalo, apotu itunga luapolok kojenutu ebe apotu kesi kojenutu iboro luitodunitos kesi. Keda aomisioit naitetet, apotu kesi okapakina aitepeg atiokisio nuejaasi toma amuton.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni ecaria 'be ma vutia, o'duko ezu 'diyi 'be angu caluniri ma dria, 'ba okporu 'diyi esu ra kini yi e'bi lu e'yo yi ma drilea 'diyi ma dria. Asi 'baza o'diru si, eyi otu eyi e'yo ewaru eyini esu angu ini ma alea 'diyi ma ti tazu.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira enyima y'enshozi, gukabiika ebisiikirize aha kyaro, abazira bakareeba ngu bakaba batandikire kumanya ebirikwetegyerezibwa ebyabaire biri omu maisho gaabo. Ahabw'amaani gaabo, bakeeteekateekyera okurwanisa oburemeezi obwabaire nibubarindirira omu mwirima.

eng_prompt: Ever since she saw one crawling on the sidewalk, my daughter has been unusually anxious around anything that resembles a bug. I tried to reassure her, but her fear of caterpillars only seems to grow stronger.
lug_prompt: Okuva lwe yalaba emu nga yeekulukuunya ku mabbali g'ekkubo, muwala wange abadde yeeraliikirira nnyo ekintu kyonna ekifaanana ekiwuka. Nagezaako okumukkakkanya naye yeeyongera okutya enkwale.
ach_prompt: Nicake ma en oneno ngat acel ka pye I teng gudu, nyara obedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom gin mo keken ma nen calo kwidi. Atemo kweyo cwinye, ento lworo ma en tye kwede i kom kwidi tye ka medde ameda.
teo_prompt: Ageun ne awanyunia ngesi idiopet kotoma orotin, ekuriana akooka noi kanu iboro lu eputosi keda ikur. Abu eong atamit aitigogong ngesi, konye abu akuriau ke naka ikur kiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu erini eri ndrezuri ma vutia, ma zi e'bi ovu asi otizaru e'yo ci ekile osasaa le 'diyi ma dria. Ma o'bi eri asi omiza fe ra, te eri ma orisi o'bu yi ma dria ri ni lu tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga obu yaareebire emwe erikutamburira aha rubaju rw'enguuto, muhara wangye atwire aine okwerarikirira okutahikire aha kintu kyona ekirikushushana n'obukooko. Nkagyezaho kumugaruramu amaani, kwonka obwoba bwe bw'enkwanzi bukaguma nibweyongyera.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by young people today, many policymakers are advocating for increased support and resources. As a result, various initiatives have been developed to address their needs.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga leero, abakola amateeka bangi balwanirira obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa ebirala. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zikoleddwa okukola ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Pien gingeyo peko ma bulu tye ka kato ki iye, lutela mapol tye ka cuku cwiny gi me medo kony ki jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapat-pat okati me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak ilolo, eutasi itunga luipu luitolomete ikisila ailip agangat keda iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, etolomun iboro luegelegela kanu aitemokin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba ode eyini esu ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, 'ba karakara azita sipi 'diyi a'di 'di atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu eminyeeto erikushanga, abarikukora ebiragiro nibarwanirira okwongyera obuhwezi n'ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho kukora ahabyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: Many farmers rely on large-scale farming practices to sustain their livelihoods. As a result, they often engage in commercial agriculture to maximize their profits.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi beesigama ku nnima ennene okusobola okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwenyigira mu bulimi obw'ensimbi okusobola okwongera ku magoba gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupur mapol gijenge I kom pur madongo me gwoko kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi pur pi nongo cente wek gumed magoba gi.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu ejarete keda akoru naepol noi kanu aijar kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi alomar akoru na agwelanar kanu aiyatakin ameda kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ma pari yi yi ati ori ezoza ongmbo angirisi 'diyi ma dria yi ma idri ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni e'yo agirikica ni robia esuzu 'diyi 'ye eyini ani orodri eyini esu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibegamira aha buhingi n'oburiisa obw'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru okubaisaho amagara gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwejumba omuby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'obushuubuzi kwenda kwongyera amagoba gaabo.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing need for workforce development, community leaders have prioritized initiatives aimed at empowering the younger generation. As a result, several projects have been put in place to skill the youths.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okukulaakulanya abakozi, abakulembeze b'ebitundu bakulembezza enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula omulembe omuto. N'ekivuddemu, pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ziteekeddwawo okuwa abavubuka obukugu.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ni miti me dongo lutic tye kamede, lutela me kabedo gi guketo cwiny gi I kom yub mapat-pat matye ki miti me tyelo kor joo matino. Macalo adwogi ne, ki keto yub mapol me miyo diro bot bulu.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loepol noi loka aitopoloun eswamak, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kisingarenitos aitogogong atumunak. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ipurojektin luegelegela kanu aitutuonor atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi'ba eyi ma ezota ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo ndundu eyini lezu 'ba oderu 'diyi ma okpo engazu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do otita karakara eyi ondua fezu 'ba ode eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'okutunguura abakozi, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bateireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura eminyeeto. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti nyingi zitandikirweho kutendeka eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: Every year, thousands gather to honor the legacy of those who sacrificed their lives for their faith. The atmosphere is filled with reverence and celebration as the day approaches.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi bakungaana okussa ekitiibwa mu abo abaawaayo obulamu bwabwe olw'enzikiriza yaabwe. Embeera ejjudde ekitiibwa n'okujaguza ng'olunaku lusembera.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, dano mapol gure me woro nying jo ma gu tyero kwogi pi niye gi. Kabedo ne opong ki woro ki kwer ikare ma nino ne cok.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, etukonokinos ilukumin kanu ayongite ngul luapotu kotwakiasi aijarakec kanuka aiyuunikec. Ileleba ejautene keda aibuses keda ainumunum naarai eyapie aparan ngin.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, 'ba alifu karakara eyi oku eyi inzita fezu 'ba eyini eyi ma edri owipi aita eyini risi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Angu nderi ga inzita si tualu ayiko zuza be o'du 'da ni ecazu ogogoru.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi nizeeteerana okuheereza ekitinisa abo abaheireyo amagara gaabo ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo. Embeera eijwire ekitiinisa n'okujaguza ahabwokuba eizooba riri haihi kuhika.

eng_prompt: In bustling urban areas where traffic congestion is common, many people seek alternative modes of transportation. One popular option that has gained traction is the use of Boda Bodas, which are motorcycle taxis.
lug_prompt: Mu bibuga ebirimu omujjuzo gw'ebidduka, abantu bangi banoonya engeri endala ez'entambula. Ekintu ekimu ekimanyiddwa ennyo kye ky'okukozesa Boda Boda, nga zino takisi za pikipiki.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo yoo mukene me wot I boma ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal ma oywek tutwal en aye tic ki boda boda, ma obedo taxi me pikipiki.
teo_prompt: Ko oibuga luejaasi keda itunga luipu luejaasi keda amotokan nuipu noi, emoete itunga iponesio ice luka alosit. Adiopet aseunet naejenara noi nes aitwasam ibodabodan, lu eraasi ipikipikin luka atakisin.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini aa'zu 'ba eyi pie tualu omita nzila ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi geri acizu 'diyi nda. E'yo azi 'bani le saaru 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri Boda Boda eyi ma ayuza ni, eyi takisi pikipiki eyini 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'endembo erimu abantu baingi, abantu baingi nibaronda emiringo endiijo y'engyenda. Ekintu kimwe ekirikumanywa munonga n'okukoresa boda boda, ezirikumanywa nka takisi za pikipiki.

eng_prompt: She has always felt a strong connection to both her parents' cultures. Growing up in a multicultural household, she was exposed to a rich blend of traditions and languages.
lug_prompt: Bulijjo abadde awulira ng'alina enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'obuwangwa bwa bazadde be. Olw'okuba yakulira mu maka agalimu abantu ab'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo, yayigirizibwa eby'obuwangwa n'ennimi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: En obedo ki wat matek ki tekwaro pa lunyodone. Pien odongo I gang ma dano tye ki tekwaro mapatpat, en onongo ngec me tekwaro ki leb mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Amina ngesi duc arucokina keda inonosio luka auriakake. Apoloun kotoma oreria lu atekerin nuipu, abu ngesi kojen nuka inonosio keda angajepisinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eri ebi sawa driasi aa'ta e'yo suruni eri ma tipika iri 'diyi pie ri ma okpo be saaru. Erini zozu aku suruni karakara 'diyi ma alia, eri esu e'yo suruni azini ti karakara 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Atwire naahurira akakwate k'amaani n'eby'obuhangwa bw'abazaire be. Ahabw'okukurira omu maka g'eby'obuhangwa bwingi, akeetegyereza eby'obuhangwa n'endimi nyingi.

eng_prompt: Discrimination remains a pervasive issue in society, affecting individuals in various aspects of their lives. Many face unjust treatment that limits their opportunities and undermines their dignity.
lug_prompt: Okusosola kukyali kizibu kya maanyi mu bantu, kikosa abantu kinnoomu mu mbeera zaabwe ez'obulamu ez'enjawulo. Bangi bayisibwa mu ngeri etali ya bwenkanya ekendeeza ku mikisa gyabwe n'okutyoboola ekitiibwa kyabwe.

teo_prompt: Eringa atiakatiaka erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubet, itolitolete itunga kotoma aijar kec. Etereikina itunga luipu keda amumu na itidisiari arerengusio kec ka aitidisiar angosibib kec.

nyn_prompt: Okushoroora abantu nikukizayo kuba ekizibu omu bantu, ekirikuteganisa abantu omu miringo etari emwe n'emwe y'amagara gaabo. Baingi nibatwarizibwa kubi, ekirikubamaraho emigisha n'ekitiinisa kyabo.

eng_prompt: To ensure everything goes smoothly, I like to plan my tasks in advance. This way, I can avoid any last-minute stress or surprises.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti buli kimu kitambula bulungi, njagala okuteekateeka emirimu gyange nga bukyali. Mu ngeri eno, nsobola okwewala okweraliikirira kwonna oba ebyewuunyisa mu kaseera akasembayo.

teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe elosete iboro ejok, amina eong aitemonokin nu ebeit eong aswam sek. Koipone kalo, apedori eong aitikitik aiyalongong arai aumokinio kotoma apak nawasia.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini e'yo dria yi mu kililiru, ale ma vile azi 'diyi otu drioru. Geri 'disi, ma eco asi omiza azini osuta sawa asizuri ma alia 'diyi atri ra.

eng_prompt: Many countries honor their heroes and remember those who sacrificed their lives for their nation. One such occasion is dedicated to commemorating these brave individuals.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi ziwa abazira baazo ekitiibwa era zijjukira abo abaawaayo obulamu bwabwe ku lw'eggwanga lyabwe. Olumu ku mikolo ng'egyo lwa kujjukira bantu bano abazira.
ach_prompt: Lobe mapol giworo oteka gi dok gi poo I kom jo ma gu tyero kwogi pi lobogi. Yub acel ma kit meno obedo me poo ikom oteka magi.
teo_prompt: Akwapin nuipu eyongitos itunga kec luapolok kosodete aiitun ngul luapotu kotwakiasi aijarakec kanuka akwapukec. Adiopet kotoma opucit kangol erai kanu aiitun itunga lu.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi inzita fe 'ba eyini aa'pi okporu 'diyi dri dika eyi e'yo ega 'ba eyini eyi ma edri owipi kari eyini 'diyi ma e'yosi 'diyi ma dria. O'du alu 'dile 'diyi 'ba 'ba asi driasi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga maingi nigaheereza ekitinisa abazirwanireho kandi gaijuka abo abaheireyo amagara gaabo ahabw'eihanga ryabo. Omurundi gumwe nk'ogwe, nigujaguzibwa kwijuka abantu abo b'obuzira.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and organizing, the big day is almost here. Everyone is buzzing with excitement as they finalize the last details for the celebration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga tuteekateeka, olunaku olukulu lunaatera okutuuka. Buli omu akuba enduulu olw'essanyu nga bamaliriza ebintu ebisembayo eby'okukuza.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki yubbe, nino madit dong cok oo. Dano weng tye ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gitye ka tyeko yub me kwero kwer ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, eyapie aparan naepol. Ejaasi itunga kere keda aiyalama naarai eutasi kesi aitemonokin ainapeta nuka ainumunum.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, o'du ambo 'da eca 'bo. Ba dria eyi ayiko si eyini otita asizu omu 'da ni 'diyi 'yeria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera, eizooba rihango riri haihi kuhika. Buri omwe aine okushemererwa ahabw'okuhendera enteekateeka y'okujaguza.

eng_prompt: Every year, thousands of pilgrims and visitors flock to Uganda to pay homage to a significant historical site. One of the most revered destinations is the Namugongo martyrs shrines, where many seek to learn about the country's rich cultural heritage.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abalamazi n'abagenyi bakungaana mu Uganda okussa ekitiibwa mu bifo eby'ebyafaayo ebikulu. Ekimu ku bifo ebisinga okuweebwa ekitiibwa kye kiggwa ky'abajulizi e Namugongo, abantu gye banoonya okuyiga ku buwangwa bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, lulim kabedo pa lubanga ki wele mapol gibino I Uganda ka woro kabedo ma pigi tego me tekwaro. Kabedo acel ma dano woro loyo aye obedo abila pa lucaden remo me Namugongo, kama dano mapol tye ka yenyo me pwonyo lok kom tekwaro me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, elosenenete ipejok keda ipejok ilukumin toma Uganda ayongite aiboisio nuapolok nuka akiro nukolosek. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nueyongitai noi ngesi aiboisio nuka aiyuunikec nuka Namugongo, ne ekotosi itunga aisisia nuikamunitos inonosio luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, 'ba alifu alifu emu'ba dini ni 'diyi emu kari Uganda niri ma alea inzita fezu angu orodriru adi ni 'diyi dri. Angu 'bani inzi tu 'diyi ma azi Namugongo martyrs shrines ni, 'ba karakara eyi angu 'da ma alea e'yo oni kari 'di ma e'yo suruni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abaramagi n'abagyenyi nibaza omu Uganda kuramya emyanya y'ebyafaayo. Omwe aha myanya erikukirayo kuheebwa ekitiinisa n'ekigombe ky'abajurizi e Namugongo, ahu abantu baingi barikusherura kwega ebirikukwata aha bugaiga bw'eby'obuhangwa bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In the bustling streets of Kampala, many people rely on quick and affordable transportation. One of the most popular options is the boda-boda service, which has become an essential part of daily commuting.
lug_prompt: Mu nguudo za Kampala ezijjudde abantu, abantu bangi beesigama ku ntambula ey'amangu era ey'ebbeeyi. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okwettanirwa kwe kusaabaza bodaboda, ekifuuse ekitundu ekikulu eky'entambula eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: I gudu me Kampala ma dano dwong iye, dano mapol jenge I kom yoo me wot ma yot dok ma wele yot. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye tic ki bodaboda, ma dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I wot me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orotin luipu noi luko Kampala, ejarete itunga luipu keda elose loedit ido loedit etiai. Adiopet koponesio luejenara noi ngesi alosit keda ibodabodan, ido erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma alosit kanginipaaran.
lgg_prompt: Nzila Kampala ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'ba geri acizu mbeleru azini aje kokoru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma azi bodaboda ni, eca curu'do 'ba acipi o'du driasi 'diyi ma azi orodriru ni'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu nguuto za Kampala ezirimu abantu baingi, abantu baingi nibagyendera aha ntambura y'ahonaaho kandi ey'esente nkye. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukoresibwa n'okukozesa bodaboda, oguhindukire omuringo gw'okutamburira abantu buriizooba.

eng_prompt: On a warm summer day, the air is filled with anticipation as pilgrims from all walks of life prepare to commemorate a significant event in history. The vibrant atmosphere is a testament to the enduring legacy of faith and sacrifice that draws them to this sacred site.
lug_prompt: Ku lunaku lw'omusana olw'ebbugumu, empewo ejjudde okusuubira nga abalamazi okuva mu mbeera z'obulamu zonna beetegekera okujjukira omukolo ogw'omugaso mu byafaayo. Embeera ey'essanyu eraga nti waliwo okukkiriza okw'amaanyi n'okwefiiriza ebibasikiriza okujja mu kifo kino ekitukuvu.
ach_prompt: I nino me oro ma lyet tutwal, yamo opong ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma lulim kabedo mapatpat tye ka yubbe me kwero nino ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro. Kwo ma yom-cwiny tye macalo lanyut me bedo tye pa niye ki jalo jami ma okelogi I kabedo man maleng.
teo_prompt: Aparan naemwanar akwap, eleleba akwap keda aiyalama naarai ekapakina ipejok luka aiboisio nuegelegela aiitun nuapolok kotoma akiro nukolosek. Erai ejautene loejok noi aitogogongoret naka aiyuun keda aijar naepol noi naeyangaunit kesi aiboisit na.
lgg_prompt: O'du drizaruri ma alia, oli ga asi 'baza si 'ba emu'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini otuta 'yezu e'yo azi okporu ni ma e'yo egazu. Angu ndrizaru 'di ece kini yi ma a'ita azini yi ma ngulupi owizu 'diyi yi eji angu alatararu 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Aha izooba ry'obwiire ry'obutiti eririkwotsya, empewo eijwire amatsiko nk'abaramagi kuruga omu myanya yoona y'obuhangwa barikweteekateekyera kwijuka omukoro gw'omugasho omu byafaayo. Embeera nungi n'obuhame bw'okwikiriza n'okwefeerereza ebirikubareetera kwija omu mwanya ogu ogurikwera.

eng_prompt: For many, the journey to sacred sites is not just a physical trek but a profound spiritual quest. Through their devotion, they transform the act of pilgrimage into a meaningful expression of faith.
lug_prompt: Eri bangi, olugendo lw'okugenda mu bifo ebitukuvu si lugendo lwa mubiri gwokka naye kunoonya kwa mwoyo. Nga bayita mu kwewaayo kwabwe, bafuula ekikolwa ky'okulamaga okulaga okukkiriza okw'amakulu.
ach_prompt: Ki jo mapol, wot me cito I kabedo maleng pe obedo wot me kom keken ento obedo yenyo jami matut tutwal me cwiny. I yo me woro gi, gi loko tim me limo kabedo pa lubanga me doko nyutu niye gi.
teo_prompt: Kanejaas luipu, alosit aiboisio nu ilito mam erai alosit bon konye erai aingic naepol noi naka aomisio. Kotoma ainakina kec, ijulakinete kesi aswamisioit naka aipejokin aiboisit naka aiyuunikec kwape aitodiaret naka aiyuunikec.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, a significant event takes place each year that honors the legacy of those who sacrificed their lives for their faith. This commemoration draws thousands of pilgrims and visitors from around the world.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, omukolo ogw'omugaso gukolebwa buli mwaka okussa ekitiibwa mu abo abawaayo obulamu bwabwe olw'enzikiriza yaabwe. Ekijjukizo kino kisikiriza enkumi n'enkumi z'abalamazi n'abagenyi okuva mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, yub mo ma pire tek time mwaka ki mwaka me woro nying jo ma gu tyero kwogi pi niye gi. Kwero nino man kelo lulim kabedo mapol ki wele mapol ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejai epucit loejok kangol ekaru kanu aiturit ngul luapotu kotwakiasi aijarakec kanuka aiyuunikec. Ingalauni ainumunum na ilukumin luka ipejok keda ipejok kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo azi orodriru ni eyi 'ye eli driasi inzita fezu 'ba eyi ma edri owipi aita eyini risi 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di ma e'yo egaza ni 'ba emu'ba dini'a 'diyi eji tualu omu emupi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie engazu wudrikuru ma alea ndulu.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okukwatagana, abazannyi n'abakozi bamalirizza okujja awamu. Buli omu musanyufu okutandika pulodyusoni n'okwegezaamu okusooka.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki winye, lutim tuku ki lutic mapat-pat dong tye atera me ribbe. Dano weng tye ki yom cwiny me cako yubo jami ki pwonye me acel.

teo_prompt: Apupokinit ngesi epol noi kanuka ationis naka ikisila, abu ngesi koany ebe ekot ngesi aingarakinio naka ipirioitin. Akaulo naka aingic aseununeta ke, abu ngesi koseu adumun aicoreta nuka ipirioitin.
lgg_prompt: Erini i etumu e'yo ewaru geri azita ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyisi, eri esu ra kini i le azakoma 'ba nita be angiri 'diyiniri ra. E'yo vuti ondaza 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo kini eri sa'wa 'bo 'bani imbata esuzu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu.

eng_prompt: In a world full of challenges and uncertainties, it's essential to stay proactive and seize the moment. Embrace the potential for growth and success that each situation presents.
