nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'okubuzabuza, nikikuru kuguma nitukora n'amaani kandi tukakoresa obwire obu turikuba twine. Yakiira obushoboorozi bw'okutunguuka n'obusinguzi obu buri mbeera erikureeta.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure transparency and foster trust, it is essential to establish clear roles and responsibilities within the project. This will enable effective communication and collaboration among all parties involved.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obwerufu n'okutumbula obwesige, kyetaagisa okuteekawo emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu pulojekiti. Kino kijja kusobozesa empuliziganya ennungi n'enkolagana wakati w'abantu bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami weng tye atir ki dongo gen, pire tek tutwal me keto tic ki tic matye I yub eni. Man obi weko lok ki winye bedo tye ikin dano weng matye I lok eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitopolor amunokina, ejokuna aitolomun aswamisinei nu ecaete ka nu ebeit aswam kotoma opurojekt. Ebuni ngin aingarakin einer loajokan keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu e'yo ada be azini asi'baza ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru azi azini azi otita 'da ma alea 'diyi e'dazu kililiru. Diri nga fe e'yo nzeza kililiru azini ti icita 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: After weeks of uncertainty and unanswered questions, I finally sat down with her to discuss the situation. With a deep breath, she began to share her insights and experiences.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga sitegedde era nga n'ebibuuzo byange tebiddiddwamu, nnasembayo okutuula naye ne tukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera. Ng'assa omukka omungi, yatandika okugabana amagezi ge n'ebyo bye yayitamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bedo ki akala-kala ki lapeny ma pe kigamo, I agiki ne abedo piny kwede me nywako lok I kom ngo matye katimme. Ki yweyo matut, en ocako tito tamme ki jami ma otimme I kwone.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka amamus aomisio keda aingiseta numam abongonokinitai, abu eong iboikin keda ngesi kanu aitemitem ejautene. Keda aimony naepol noi, abu ngesi kogeu aimor aomisioke keda akiroke.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia e'yo 'bani ega kokoru azini zita 'bani omvi kokoru 'diyi ma vutia, ma ri asizu eri be e'yo nzezu e'yo 'da ma dria. Ava 'yazu aliru, eri e'do e'yo erini nile azini e'yo erini isule 'diyi olu.

eng_prompt: As I was researching transportation options in East Africa, I came across various infrastructure developments in the region. This led me to wonder about the specifics of Uganda's railway system.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nnoonyereza ku by'entambula mu East Africa, nnasanga ebintu ebitali bimu ebikoleddwa mu kitundu ekyo. Kino kyandeetera okwebuuza ebikwata ku nkola y'eggaali y'omukka mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka kwedo yoo me wot I but lobo Afrika kunyango, anongo yub mapat-pat me dongo lobo I but lobo man. Man oweko abedo ki ngeng I kom kit ma dul me gar me Uganda tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic nuikamunitos elose ko East Africa, abu eong adum apolo na iboro luipu kotoma aiboisit kangin. Abu ngin ijaik eong aomoom nuikamunitos irotin luka agaali luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo vuti ondazu geri acizu East Africaa 'diyi ma dria, ma esu e'yo angu ezoma ni ndundu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ra. E'yo 'di fe ma dri e'yo egazu e'yo yi 'yepi kari Uganda niri ma alea geri garamusi eyini acizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu naabaire nincondooza aha by'engyenda omuri burugwa izooba bwa Africa, nkashanga entunguuka y'ebyombeko omu kyanga ekyo. Eki kikandeetera okwebuuza enkora y'egaari y'omwika omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: To finance its budget deficit and support various public projects, the government often seeks external funding sources. This practice is common among nations looking to stimulate their economies or manage national debt.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okusasula ebbula ly'embalirira yaayo n'okuwagira pulojekiti za gavumenti ez'enjawulo, gavumenti etera okunoonya ensibuko z'ensimbi okuva ebweru. Enkola eno ya bulijjo mu mawanga aganoonya okutumbula ebyenfuna byaago oba okuddukanya amabanja g'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi nongo cente me culu pi byek me lim ma orem ki culu pi yub mapat-pat pa gamente, gamente pol kare yenyo yoo me nongo cente ki I lobo ma woko. Man obedo tim ma dano mapol timo ikin lobe ma gitye ka yenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me timo biacara gi onyo tic i kom banya gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin ebajet ke ka aigang ipurojektin lu apugan, etapit duc apugan aimo ikapun luka akwapin nukokinga. Erai na ibore yenetapit noi kotoma akwapin nuekotosi aitopolor edumune loka ikapun kec arai aitikitik apesenin nuka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini atita fezu otita o'bi eyini ndundu 'diyi dri, gamete ni tutuni geri robia esuzu engazu amve 'diyi nda. Yeta 'diri tuni kari yi ma eselea lonyi yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu kani ku mari kari yini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti kubaasa kushashurira embaririra yaayo n'okushagika purogyekiti zaayo ez'omutaano, erikukira kuronda oburugo bw'esente kuruga aheeru y'eihanga. Ekikorwa eki n'ekya buriijo omu mahanga agarikwenda kutunguura eby'entaasya n'okureeberera amabanja gaago.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, the pursuit of knowledge has been a driving force behind societal progress. As individuals gain access to education, they are empowered to challenge norms and innovate, leading to transformative changes in their communities.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, okunoonya okumanya kubadde kwa maanyi mu nkulaakulana y'abantu. Abantu bwe bafuna obuyigirize, baweebwa obuyinza okusomooza empisa n'okuyiiya, ekiviirako enkyukakyuka mu bitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, yenyo ngec obedo gin ma okelo dongo lobo. Ka dano acel-acel nongo gum me kwan, ki minigi kero me lweny i kom cik ki diro manyen ma kelo aloka loka I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, aimo acoa nes eyangaunit apol naka itunga. Nepedoriata itunga adumunun asioman, ijaikinio kes agogongu ainingosit nuka inonosio ka aitolomunun iboro luitetiak, ayangaun aijulanakineta kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, lezu ondua esuzu ri ebi ovu okpo ongulumu eyini zozu ri'I. Ba ka 'ba eyi esu onita si, eyi ma okpo esu e'yo a'di 'dizu azini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru, eyini ani ojata ejizu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, okuronda obwengye, nikyo kintu ekirikureeta entunguuka omu bantu. Abantu kubarikutunga obwegyese, nibatunga amaani g'okuhakanisa ebiragiro n'okujumbura, ekirikureetaho empindahinduka omu byanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In the complex landscape of government, the selection of key personnel is crucial for effective leadership. One of the most significant roles in this process is that of the presidential advisors.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya gavumenti enzibu, okulonda abakozi abakulu kya mugaso nnyo eri obukulembeze obulungi. Omulimu ogusinga obukulu mu nkola eno gwe gw'abawabuzi ba pulezidenti.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma gamente tye ki peko mapol tutwal, yero lutic mapigi tego obedo gin ma pire tek pi tela maber. Tic acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo pa lumii tam ki ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka apugan, aseun eswamak luapolok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aingarenikin ejok. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nuepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi nuka ecorak luka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru gameteni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba okporu 'diyi ma opeza eri orodriru driceza kililiru ni. Azi alu orodriru e'yo 'di ma alia ri 'ba embata fepi purezidenti ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebitarikwetegyerezibwa, okuronda abakozi abakuru n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Omwe aha mirimo y'omugasho omu nkora egi n'ogw'abahabuzi ba purezidenti.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and weighing her options, she finally decided it was time to let go of her property. The offer from the investor was too good to pass up, promising a fresh start for her future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'alowooza era ng'alowooza ku ngeri gy'ayinza okukikolamu, yasemba okusalawo nti kye kiseera okuleka ebintu bye. Ekisuubizo okuva eri yinvesita kyali kirungi nnyo okugaana, nga kimusuubiza entandikwa empya ey'ebiseera bye eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki tam I kom ngo ma en twero timone, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me weko jamine. Mic ma aa ki bot latim biyacara ne obedo ber tutwal ma pe twero kwero, kun cikke me cako kwo manyen pi anyim mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomoom ka aomoom nuipedori ngesi aswam, abu ngesi kodum ebe erai apak naka ajalakin iboroke. Ainanakinet naka agwelanaran arai naejok noi mam apedori ainger, aisumun ageunet naitetet kanukoingarenike.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo egazu drinia azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu eri 'du e'yo kini sawa ca 'di afa ivile 'diyi kuzu ja. Afa feza engazu 'ba lonyi vuti ale'baa 'diyi vu ri ndra onyiru tu 'bani ecozu gazu ku, erini so oyo e'dota o'diru ewu drusiri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateeka n'okuteekateeka, akahendera yaasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okureka ebintu bye. Ekiraganiso kuruga owa yinvesita kikaba kiri kirungi munonga, kikaba nikimuraganisa entandikwa nsya y'ebiro bye eby'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing budget deficit, the government has decided to implement a series of fiscal reforms. As part of these reforms, new domestic taxes have been introduced.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'embalirira eryeyongera, gavumenti esazeewo okussa mu nkola ennongoosereza ez'enjawulo mu by'ensimbi. Ng'emu ku nnongoosereza zino, emisolo emipya egy'awaka gitongozeddwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma byek me lim tye ka medde, gamente omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka mapol I tenge me lim. Macalo but aloka-loka magi, kikelo mucoro manyen I lobo kany.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ekadakada loka ebajet, abu apugan itolomu aijulanakineta nuipu nuka ikapun. Kwape ediope kotoma aijulanakineta nu, etolomun isolosinei luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako bajeti ni tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo ojata e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo ojataa 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba e'do musoro o'diru kari ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eshaziremu kukora empindahinduka nyingi omu by'empiiha ahabw'emihendo y'esente eyeyongyeire. Nk'emwe aha mpindahinduka ezi, emishoro misya etandikirweho.

eng_prompt: After extensive public debate and pressure from various advocacy groups, lawmakers have decided to reconsider the controversial legislation. As a result, the social media tax has been removed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu lujjudde n'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo, ababaka ba palamenti basazeewo okuddamu okwetegereza etteeka eririko enkaayana. N'ekyavaamu, omusolo ku mikutu emigattabantu guggyiddwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok mapol I kin lwak ki lyeto ma aa ki bot dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok I kom gamente, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gumoko tamgi me neno cik matye ki apoka-poka. Macalo adwogi ne, kikwanyo mucoro iwi kabedo me nywako lok me intanet.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget loepol noi keda agogong naka igurupun luegelegela, aseutu imeeban airereor ekisil ngol. Kanuka ngun, alemar esolo loka elago.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara ongmbo angirisi o'bi yi ma eselea azini okpo engazu amuti e'yo a'di 'dipi 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo egazu azita 'da ma dria dika. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nze musoro pari o'bi yini e'yo oyuzu 'diyi ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga omu bantu hamwe n'okugyemeserezibwa kuruga omu bibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe, abakiiki b'eishengyero bashaziremu kugaruka bashwijume ebiragiro ebirikuteganisa. N'ekyarugiremu, omushoro aha mikutu ya boona gukihwaho.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the region for weeks, with rumors of an impending assault circulating among the villagers. Many had fortified their homes, hoping to withstand any potential threat.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala wiiki eziwera, n'olugambo lw'okulumba okwali kugenda okubaawo mu byalo. Bangi baali bazimbye bbugwe mu maka gaabwe nga basuubira okuziyiza ekintu kyonna ekiyinza okuba eky'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but piny eni pi cabit mapol, ki lok angeya me lweny ma obedo kabino I kin lutedero. Dano mapol onongo guyubu odi gi matek tutwal, ki gen me cung matek i kom peko mo keken matwero poto atura.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun isabitin luipu, keda akiro nuikamunitos asurokinio naka itunga kocaaloi. Apotu itunga luipu kogolokisi ireria kec, aomit ebe epedorete kesi aitikitik adiokiro kere nuepedorete aitukurian kes.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebi ovu uru angu 'da ma alea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba eyi nga e'yo 'ye ra 'diyi aci angu 'da ma alea 'ba calua 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi si aku eyivile 'diyi ma agei te asi 'baza be e'yo ewaru ecopi eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga kumara esande, n'orugambo rw'okuteerwa okuri haihi kubaho rukajanjaara omu bantu b'omubyaro. Baingi bakaba bateire amabaare omu maka gaabo, barikuteekateeka ngu nibabaasa kurwanisa akabi koona akarikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various societies have engaged in conflicts that often stem from deep-rooted cultural, economic, and territorial disputes. Understanding the underlying factors that lead to these confrontations is crucial for addressing their consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu ab'enjawulo beenyigidde mu bukuubagano obuva ku buwangwa, eby'enfuna, n'obutaka. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako obukuubagano buno kikulu nnyo mu kugonjoola ebizibu ebivaamu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, kabedo mapat-pat gubedo I lweny ma pol kare aa ki I tele me tekwaro, biacara, ki kabedo mapat-pat. Niang tyen lok ma oweko lweny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me lweny i kom adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, alomasi itunga luipu akiro nu ingungeta nu eyangaunitos akiro nu inonosio, nuka ikapun keda nuka alupok. Ajenun iboro lu eyangaununete ingungeta lu epolok noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu ndundu eyi 'ye e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'yo suruni, e'yo robia ni 'diyi, azini e'yo angu ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo e'yoni fepi e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu baingi bejumbire omu ntaro ezirikureetwa entaro z'eby'obuhangwa, eby'entaasya hamwe n'eby'eitaka. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho entaro ezi, n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kurwanisa ebirugiremu.

eng_prompt: After the devastating accident on the highway, emergency services quickly arrived at the scene. Paramedics worked tirelessly to assess the injured and provide immediate care.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje akaaguddewo ku luguudo olukulu, abasawo banguwa okutuuka mu kifo awaagudde akabenje. Abasawo baakola butaweera okukebera abalumiziddwa n'okubawa obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee can me gudu ma otimme I gudu madit tutwal, joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot gu oo I kabedo ne. Lutic yoto kom gutiyo matek tutwal me neno joo ma onongo awano ki miyo kony me yot kom oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas naka erot loapolon, apotu lu engeso kodolokisi aiboisit. Apotu imurok lu adekis iswamata agogongu kanu airereonor ngul lu imusunguna ka aijanakin amukian katipet.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi onzi nzila dria 'da ma vutia, 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea mbeleru. Ba azoru 'diyi nga azi okposi 'ba nya'biliko esupi 'diyi ma rua andrizu azini aro fezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabenje k'amaani aha ruguuto, ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahika juba aha mwanya. Abashaho bakakora n'amaani okushwijuma abahutaziibwe n'okubaha obujanjabi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Despite facing various challenges in its history, Uganda has made significant strides towards stability and harmony. The government and citizens alike have worked diligently to foster a sense of unity and security throughout the nation.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa okungi mu byafaayo byayo, Uganda ekoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi eri obutebenkevu n'obumu. Gavumenti ne bannansi bombi bakoze n'obunyiikivu okutumbula obumu n'obutebenkevu mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed Uganda orwatte ki peko mapol I kare macon, Uganda otimo jami mapol me kelo kuc ki ber bedo. Gamente kacel ki lwak gutiyo matek me kelo ribe ki ber bedo I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Karaida etereikina keda atiokisio nuegelegela kotoma akiro nukolo, eswamaunit Uganda apol kanu ainapakina keda aimorikikina. Apugan keda itunga kes iswamaete kagogongu kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda ayuwara kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru erini esu 'diyi ma talasi, Uganda isu drileba angiri asianzu azini aa'ta tualuri vu. Gamete tualu kari anzi eyi pie nga azi okporu ti ecita azini ageitema ejizu kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi omu byafaayo byaayo, Uganda etungire entunguuka y'amaani omu by'obutebekana hamwe n'obumwe. Gavumenti hamwe n'abatuuragye bakozire n'amaani okureetaho okukwatanisa n'eby'okwerinda omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: The community center has a packed schedule filled with various programs and events. As a result, most of the activities are carried out during the day.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'ekyalo kirimu enteekateeka nnyingi n'emikolo egy'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, emirimu egisinga gikolebwa misana.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan pa lwak tye ki yub mapol tutwal ma opong ki yub ki yub mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, pol pa tic time dyeceng.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi atukot ngin keda ainapeta nuipu noi keda ainapeta nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, iswamao aswamisinei nuipu paaran.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'da ma alea sa'wa 'bani eyi 'yezu ri ga tre otita azini e'yo ndundu eyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo yi 'ye tuni etusi.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'ebyaro, gurimu enteekateeka nyingi n'emikoro mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, emirimo erikukira obwingi neekorwa omubwiire bw'eizooba.

eng_prompt: Despite the country's economic growth in recent years, many citizens continue to struggle with basic needs. This disparity has led to a noticeable gap between the wealthy and the impoverished.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde eby'enfuna by'eggwanga bikulaakulana mu myaka egiyise, bannansi bangi bakyalwanagana n'ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo. Enjawulo eno ereeseewo ekituli wakati w'abagagga n'abaavu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lobo ne odongo I tenge me lim I mwaki ma okato angec, anywali mapol pud tye ka canne ki jami ma mite pi kwo. Apoka-poka man okelo apoka-poka ikin lulonyo ki lucan.
teo_prompt: Karaida apolor edumune loka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok kokaru luatuboros, eringa itunga luipu eutasi ainingosit keda iboro luipudasi kesi. Apotu atiaketait ngin koyangautu atiaketait naepol noi kiding lu abarak keda lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Kari ma zota e'yo robiani ma alia 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi nga po'di dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi pie. Esele coza 'diri fe esele coza 'ba mali be 'diyi ma eselea 'ba alioru 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'ebyentatsya y'eihanga omu myaka egi, abatuuragye baingi nibagumizamu kurwana n'ebyetaago by'abantu. Entaaniso egi ereesireho omwanya gw'amaani ahagati y'abagaiga n'abooro.

eng_prompt: In light of recent global events and rising concerns about national safety, the government has decided to reassess its financial allocations. As a result, significant funding has been directed towards enhancing defense and law enforcement capabilities.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo mu nsi gye buvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda by'eggwanga, gavumenti esazeewo okuddamu okwekenneenya ensimbi zaayo. N'ekivuddemu, ssente nnyingi ziteekeddwa mu kutumbula eby'okwerinda n'okukwasisa amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I wilobo kacel ki lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc I lobo Uganda, gamente omoko tamme me ngiyo kit ma kimiyo kwede cente. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo cente madit tutwal me ilo malo rwom me gwoko kuc ki gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac kotoma akwap kere keda aiyalongong naka ayuwara naka akwap, abu apugan ocam airereor ikapunukec. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ikapun luipu kanu aitogogong ayuwara keda ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi o'diru wudrikuru ma alia azini asi otiza kari ma ageitema ma dria tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete asi e'yo 'du geri erini robia ayuzu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba robia angiri e'yo ageyitema ni azini 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma okpo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho omu nsi yoona hamwe n'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda by'eihanga, gavumenti eshaziremu kugaruka kushwijuma empiiha zaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, esente nyingi zikozesirwe okwongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda n'okukuratira ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: As the chaos unfolded around him, the reporter quickly grabbed his camera and rushed to the location. With adrenaline pumping, he knew he had to document the unfolding events firsthand.
lug_prompt: Akavuyo bwe kaali kamwetoolodde, omusasi yakwata mangu kkamera ye n'adduka mu kifo. Olw'okuba yali yeeraliikirira nnyo, yali akimanyi nti alina okuwandiika ebikwata ku ebyo ebyali bigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kuku kuku obedo tye I kabedo ne, lacoo lok angea ne omako camera ne oyotoyot ci oringo I kabedo ne. I kare ma kome tye ka lyeto matek tutwal, en onongo ngeyo ni myero ocoo lok ma tye ka time.
teo_prompt: Nejaatar amumu nejaas ngesi, abu arotan iyemuto kodum akameranike kosodi akerit aiboisit. Keda aiyalama naepol noi, ajeni ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aiwadik akiro nuiswamasi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni e'doria eri ma ageia, 'ba osisiani 'da 'du i vile kamera mbeleru azini ari pari 'da ma alea. E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu uru risi, eri nii ra kini le i ma si e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi i ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro ku bwabaire buriho, omushaki w'amahuriire akakwata ahonaaho kamera ye yairukira ahu yaabaire ari. Ahabw'okushemererwa kwe kwingi, akamanya ngu aine kuhandiika ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: As the clock struck noon, I settled into my chair, eager to see how the government planned to allocate funds for the upcoming year. The anticipation in the room was palpable as the announcer introduced the key speakers for the budget presentation.
lug_prompt: Essaawa bwe yakubye essaawa mukaaga ez'emisana, nnatuula mu ntebe yange nga nneesunga okulaba engeri gavumenti gye yali eteekateeka okugabanyizaamu ensimbi z'omwaka ogujja. Obweraliikirivu mu kisenge bwalabika ng'omulangira ayanjudde aboogezi abakulu mu kwanjulwa kw'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma cawa ocake I dyeceng, abedo I kom mega, ki miti madit tutwal me neno kit ma gamente tye ki yub me poko cente pi mwaka manyen. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma latit lok angeya okelo ludor lok mapigi tego I kare me nyuto byek me lim.
teo_prompt: Neadounia esawa isawan ikanyape, abu eong iboikin oicolong ka, akoto noi aanyun epone loebeitor apugan aikor ikapun luka ekaru ngol. Apotu itunga lu ajaas agola kowanyutu epone loetegearit alimonokin akiro nuepolok nuka aitodiar ebajet.

nyn_prompt: Eshaaha ku yaahikire aha shaaha mukaaga, nkashutama omu ntebe yangye, nyine ekihika ky'okureeba oku gavumenti yaabaire eteekateekire kugaba esente z'omwaka ogurikwija. Okutegyereza omu kishengye kukareebeka nk'omugambirizi arikworeka abantu abakuru abaabaire nibaza kugamba aha mbariirira y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As a nation located in East Africa, Uganda plays a significant role in regional cooperation and development. The country actively participates in various economic and political initiatives with its neighboring states.

nyn_prompt: Nk'eihanga eriri omuri burugwa izooba bwa Afirika, Uganda neekora omurimo gw'amaani omukukwatanisa n'entunguuka y'ekyanga. Eihanga niryejumba munonga omu mirimo y'eby'entaasya n'eby'obutegyeki n'amahanga agarikuri heihi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing budget deficit, the government has implemented several fiscal measures. As a result, most of the tax rates have been increased this financial year.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'embalirira eryeyongera, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enkola z'ebyensimbi eziwerako. N'ekyavaamu, emisolo egisinga obungi gyongezeddwa mu mwaka guno ogw'eby'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma byek me lim tye ka medde, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me tic ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, kimedo wel mucoro mapol I mwaka me lim man.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread rapidly across the globe, many countries faced significant challenges in managing the health crisis. In response to the urgent need for resources, international organizations and governments stepped in to provide support to nations like Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, amawanga mangi gaayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kukwasaganya embeera y'ebyobulamu. lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu balimi b'omu kitundu n'abazimba, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okugonjoola ensonga. Okusobola okukola ku butakkaanya buno obweyongera, akakiiko ak'enjawulo kaateekebwawo okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka.

eng_prompt: As the fiscal year progresses, unexpected expenses and changes in revenue can arise, prompting the need for additional funding. In this context, it is essential to understand the role of a supplementary budget.
lug_prompt: Nga omwaka gw'ebyensimbi gugenda mu maaso, ensaasaanya etasuubirwa n'enkyukakyuka mu nfuna zisobola okujja, ekireetera obwetaavu bw'ensimbi endala. Mu mbeera eno, kya mugaso okutegeera omulimu gw'embalirira ey'okugattako.

eng_prompt: After observing their actions over the past few months, I've grown increasingly concerned about their motives. It seems like they often prioritize personal gain over honesty and transparency.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza ebikolwa byabwe mu myezi egiyise, nneeyongedde okweraliikirira ebigendererwa byabwe. Kirabika nga bulijjo bakulembeza okwefunira okusinga obwesimbu n'obwerufu.

teo_prompt: Aitolosio na akoru na akerianut ekot itunga lu ekapakina. Kanu ayait aswamisinei nuegelegela ka awanyun ebe iswamaete ejok, adukunit eong eswamak lu emisiaritos.
lgg_prompt: Azi agirikica ni drile suzaru ri ma 'yeta le amuti azi ngapi asi driasi ni. Azi ndundu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini nezu ra kini ma azi nga muke, ma si 'ba azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi ma azi eyi.
nyn_prompt: Okukora emirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'oburiisa kurungi, nikyetenga tiimu eyehaireyo. Okukora emirimo etari emwe n'emwe n'okureeba ngu ninkora gye, ntandikireho abakozi abaine emyoga.

eng_prompt: Namanve has experienced significant economic growth in recent years. As a result, various industries have established operations in the area.
lug_prompt: Namanve efunye enkulaakulana mu byenfuna mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, amakolero ag'enjawulo gatandiseewo emirimu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Namanve odongo I tenge me lim I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, Cuma mapat-pat me yubu jami mapat-pat oyabo ticgi I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Abu Namanve kodum apol naka ikapun kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, adukutu acuman nuegelegela aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Namanve esu zota angiri e'yo robiani ma alia eli agapi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu karakara eyi e'do azi eyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Namanve etungire entunguuka y'amaani omu by'entaasya omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, amakorero maingi gatandikire emirimo omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas of Uganda, access to basic utilities remains a significant challenge. Despite efforts to improve infrastructure, a substantial portion of the population still lacks reliable energy sources.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi mu Uganda, okufuna ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo kukyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi. Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube w'okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa, ekitundu ky'abantu ekinene tekirina nsibuko za masannyalaze ezeesigika.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol me lobo Uganda, nongo jami ma mite pi kwo pud obedo peko madit tutwal. Kadi bed ni kitye ka yele me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak, pol pa dano pwod gi peke ki yoo me nongo mac ma genne.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu ko Uganda, eringa adumun iboro lu itwasamao erai ainingosit naepol noi. Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar adukena, itunga luipu eringa emamiatatar keda aiboisio nuegelegela nuka akim.
lgg_prompt: Angu calo ru kari Uganda niri ma alea karakara 'diyi ma alea, afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. Okpo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi vu nga po'di geri aci esuzu kililiru 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi omu Uganda, okutunga ebintu by'omugasho kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okutunguura ebyombeko, abantu baingi tibakiine burugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: We need to be cautious about what information we share with him. It's important to keep some details to ourselves for now.
lug_prompt: Tulina okwegendereza obubaka bwe tumubuulira. Kikulu okukuuma ebintu ebimu nga byaffe mu kaseera kano.
ach_prompt: Omyero wagwoke ki ngec ma wanywako kwede. Pire tek tutwal ni omyero wagwok lok mukene I kinwa pi kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Ekot oni acoit akiro nu imor oni keda ngesi. Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar akiro ace bon.
lgg_prompt: Le ama ma aa milesi e'yo amani awa eri be 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru e'yo azi 'diyi 'bazu ama ma eselea sawa 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Twine kwegyendesereza amakuru agu turikubagana nawe. N'eky'omugasho okuguma nitumanya ebintu ebimwe hati.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the police have gathered enough evidence to charge the individuals involved. As a result, the suspects will be taken to court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, poliisi ekuŋŋaanyizza obujulizi obumala okuvunaana abantu ssekinnoomu abakwatibwako. N'ekinaavaamu, abateeberezebwa bajja kutwalibwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, abili gunongo caden ma oromo me keto bal iwi ngat ma otimo bal enoni. Macalo adwogi ne, kibitero joo ma byek tye I komgi I nyim kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, atukunitos ipolisin ajenanut naedolit kanu aitepesen itunga luejaasi toma. Kanuka ngun, eponio ayangar luitepesenitai adieket.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, polisi eyi tra e'yo ecopi e'dapi kini 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo 'diyi ji kotia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, poriisi eretsire obujurizi burikumara, okujunaana abantu abaabaire bejumbiremu. Ekyarugiremu, abarikuteekateekwaho nibaza kutwarwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: As we gather for this sacred ceremony, I would like to know more about your spiritual journey. Can you share with me the name that holds significance in your faith?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tukungaana ku mukolo guno omutukuvu, njagala okumanya ebisingawo ku lugendo lwo olw'omwoyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wacokke pi kwer man maleng, amito ngeyo jami mapol I kom wot meggi me cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape imorikikin sio kanuka epucit lo lo alaunan, akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos alosit kon naka aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama oku tualu omu alatararu 'diri ma alia, ale te ni e'yo mini acizu e'yo Munguniri ma dria 'diyi ma dria drile.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikukwatanisa aha mukoro ogu ogurikwera, ninyenda kumanya ebirikukiraho aha rugyendo rwawe rw'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: The investigation has been ongoing for several days, and the community is on edge. As tensions rise, we are anxiously anticipating updates from law enforcement.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kubadde kugenda mu maaso okumala ennaku eziwera era abantu bali ku bunkenke. Nga obunkenke bweyongera, tulindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebipya okuva mu bakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ne obedo tye pi nino mapol dok lwak tye ki lworo. Kit ma telle tye kamede kwede, watye kakuru lok manyen ki bot joo ma gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Elosete aingic ngin adaun aparasia nuipu, ido ekuriaka itunga. Kwape iyata aiyalongong, idarit sio akiro nuitetiak kama ejaasi ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da ebi mu drile o'du karakara eyi ma alea, dika ongulumu eyi aa orisi. E'yo ewaru eyini tuzu 'disi, ama asi 'baza be o'dukoti eyi esuzu engazu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kutwire nikugyenda omu maisho kumara ebiro bingi, kandi abantu boona bari aha rutezyo. Obu obunkenke burikweyongyera, nitutegyereza n'okwerarikirira amakuru kuruga omu b'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: After several complaints from local residents about the rowdy behavior in the park, the police decided to investigate the situation. They found a group of individuals causing a disturbance, and one man stood out for his lack of purpose and disruptive presence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya okuva mu batuuze ku bikolwa eby'effujjo mu ppaaka, poliisi yasalawo okunoonyereza ku mbeera. Baasanze ekibinja ky'abantu kinnoomu nga baleetawo akavuyo, n'omusajja omu yavaayo olw'obutaba na kigendererwa n'okubeerawo kwe okutaataaganya.
ach_prompt: Inge koko mapol ma aa ki bot lutedero I kom tim gero matye I park, abili omoko tamgi me kwedo ngo matye katimme. Gunongo gurup pa dano matye ka kelo kuku kuku, ki lacoo acel onen pi bedo peke pa miti ne ki bedo tye ne ma kelo kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angurian nuipu kanejaas itunga luka atutubet kanu iponesio lu amumu kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang, apotu ipolisin koseutu aingic ejautene. Apotu kesi odumutu egurupu loka itunga luetapit aitolitol akiro, ido idiopetunganan abu kiteleka kanu amamut keda alosikinet keda ajaut ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu 'yeta ngiringiri ru angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri ma dria ri ma vutia, polisi eyi ai e'yo 'da ma eti ondazu. Yi esu ongulumu 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi e'yo ewaru ejipi, azini agupi alu so pa e'yo erini ovuzu e'yo kokoru azini e'yo ewaru ejipi 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu batuuragye aha bikwatiraine n'emicwe y'akaimukiriro omu paaka, poriisi ekasharamu kucondooza aha nshonga egyo. Bakashanga guruupu y'abantu abarikureetaho akavuyo, kandi omushaija omwe akareebeka nk'otaine kigyendererwa n'okureetaho akavuyo.

eng_prompt: The cabinet members gathered for an emergency meeting to discuss the recent policy changes. After reviewing the implications, they unanimously agreed on the necessity of following through with the president's directive.
lug_prompt: Bammemba ba kabineti baakuŋŋaanidde mu lukiiko olw'amangu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka mu nkola ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiyinza okuvaamu, tebakkiriziganya ku ky'okugoberera ekiragiro kya pulezidenti.
ach_prompt: Lumemba me cabinet gugure pi kacokke ma opoto atura me nywako lok I kom aloka loka ma otime cokcok-ki. Ingee ngiyo adwogi ne, guwinye I kom miti me lubu cik pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Apotu imeeban luka ekabinet kiriamunos airiamun na engeso kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta nuka ikisila. Akaulo naka airereor atiokisio, apotu kesi kocamanaros kanu aitup aicoreta nuka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ba minisita ru 'diyi tra eyi mitingi mbeleru ni ma alea agbatara gbazu e'yo ojata o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai ti e'yo 'bani lezu azita purezidenti ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ba memba ba kabineti, baketeeranira hamwe omu rukiiko rw'ahonaaho kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka y'ebiragiro eyabaireho juba. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikubaasa kurugamu, bakaikirizana ngu ekiragiro ky'omwebembezi w'eihanga kishemereire kukuratirwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of avoiding the topic, we finally decided it was time to address our differences. As we sat down together, I knew we were in for a lengthy discussion.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga twewala okwogera ku nsonga eyo, twasalawo nti ekiseera kituuse okwogera ku butakkaanya bwe tulina. Bwe twatuula wansi ffenna, nnamanya nti tugenda kuba n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okuwanvu.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me weyo lok eni, dong wamoko tamwa ni kare dong oromo me tyeko lok me apoka-poka matye I kinwa. I kare ma wabedo piny kacel, aniang ni wabibedo ka lok pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aisac akiro ngun, apotu sio aseutu ebe erai apak naka aitemokin atiokisio kosi. Neautar sio aiboikin nepepe, ajeni eong ebe ibuni sio einer noi.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo 'di kuzu ja, asizu ama 'du asi kini sa'wa ca e'yo ama esele coza ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Amani rizu va tualuri ma alia, ani ra kini ama nga e'yo onze sawa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okwetantara enshonga egyo, tukasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okugonjoora obutaikirizana bwaitu. Ku twashutamiire hamwe, nkamanya ngu nituza kuhanuura obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy trial filled with compelling evidence and witness testimonies, the jury deliberated for several hours. Ultimately, they reached a unanimous decision regarding her involvement in the incident.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okuwozesebwa okuwanvu okujjudde obujulizi obw'amaanyi n'obujulizi bw'abajulizi, abalamuzi baakubaganya ebirowoozo okumala essaawa eziwera. Mu nkomerero, baatuuka ku kusalawo okw'awamu ku bikwata ku kwenyigira kwe mu kabenje.
ach_prompt: Ingee pido matidi ma opong ki caden ki caden, lungol kop guwinye pi cawa mapol. I agiki ne, gumoko tamgi labongo jemo I kom tim ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apupio na apak naepol noi keda aitogogongoret naepol noi keda ajenanut, apotu ikatubok kopegata adaun isawan luipu. Kawasia, apotu kesi kodolokisi aomisio nuikamunitos ajaut ke toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza 'bori ma vutia afa ecetaru azini e'yo 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ni 'diyi pie, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa karakara. Asizu, eyi e'do e'yo 'du ti e'yo erini fizu e'yo 'da ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira orubanja rwabo kumara obwire buraingwa, orwabaire rwijwire obujurizi bw'amaani hamwe n'obujurizi bw'abajurizi, abaramuzi bakahurizana kumara eshaaha nyingi. Ahamuheru, bakahika ahakiteiso kimwe aha bikwatiraine n'okwejumba kwe omuri ebyo ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent controversies surrounding the electoral process, many are questioning the integrity of the upcoming election. Legal experts are now examining the circumstances that might lead to judicial intervention in such matters.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butakkaanya obwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo mu kulonda, bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'okulonda okujja. Abakugu mu by'amateeka kati beekenneenya embeera eziyinza okuviirako abalamuzi okuyingira mu nsonga ng'ezo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle ma obedo tye ikare me yer ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo pa yer matye kabino ni. Ludiro me cik kombedi gitye ka kwedo ngo ma twero weko kot donyo I lok enoni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta luka aseo, mam itunga luipu ejenete abeit naka aseo kana ebunit. Eutasi kwana ipirioitin luka ikisila airereonor ejautene loepedori ayangaun atubon alomar toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega opeta emupi 'diyi ma adriza kililiru ri ma dria ku. Ba onita be e'yo azitani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi curu'do e'yo ecopi fepi 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni fizu e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana oburiho obwahati omu by'oburuuru, baingi nibabangaanisa oburingaaniza bw'akaruuru akarikwiija. Abakugu omu by'ebiragiro hati bariyo nibashwijuma embeera ezirikubaasa kureetera kooti kutaha omu nshonga nk'ezo.

eng_prompt: As the students settled into their seats, I called out the roll to ensure everyone was present. To my surprise, I noticed a peculiar coincidence on the list.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bwe baatuula mu bifo byabwe, nnayita olukalala okukakasa nti buli omu aliwo. Ekyanneewuunyisa, nnalaba ekintu ekyewuunyisa ku lukalala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lutino kwan gubedo I kabedogi, alwongo nyinggi me neno ni dano weng gubedo tye. Abedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma aneno gin mo ma otimme I kin jami ma kicoyo.
teo_prompt: Neautar esisiak aiboikin aiboisio kec, abu eong anyaraun ikiroria kanu awanyun ebe ejai nginitunganan. Kanu aumokin eong, abu eong aany ibore yenitegelikina kotoma aiwadikaeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi yini rizu yi vile kitiarisi, ma omve 'ba ru ru ru 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba dria emu 'bo. Ma dri osutasi, ma ndre e'yo azi e'yo yi 'yepi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi ku batandikire kushutama omu myanya yaabo, nkareeta orukarara kureeba ngu buri omwe ariho. Ekyantangaziise, nkareeba ekintu ky'omutaano aha rukarara.

eng_prompt: Everyone who meets her can't help but smile. Her warm demeanor instantly puts people at ease.
lug_prompt: Buli omu amusisinkana aba n'akamwenyumwenyu. Empisa ze ez'ebbugumu zitereeza mangu abantu.
ach_prompt: Dano ducu ma gurwate kwedgi gibedo ki bwonyo. Kit ma en maro dano tutwal weko dano bedo agonya.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan yeneriamuna keda ngesi epedori aimurimuria. Iponesioke luajokak einakinitos itunga aiyalama katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria eri dri fu'ba 'diyi eco lu gu cinya. Eri ma adriza drizaru ri ni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yere indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe orikumubugana tarikubaasa kureka kumwenya. Emicwe ye y'embabazi neeta abantu aha busingye.

eng_prompt: After years of saving and planning, I've finally decided to take the plunge into homeownership. It's been a dream of mine for as long as I can remember.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutereka ssente n'okuteekateeka okumala emyaka, nsazeewo okuba n'amaka. Kibadde kirooto kyange okuva lwe nzijukira.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me gwoko cente ki yube, dong amoko tamma me bedo ki gang mega. Man obedo lek na pi kare malac tutwal ma wiya poo I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aimono keda aitemonokin, adaun eong aseun ajaut keda etogo. Arai ngol airujasia ka ageun na eong aiitun.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani ma ta mbazu azini otita eyi o'bazu 'bori ma vutia, asizu asi 'du e'yo 'duzu aku ma e'ipiru. E'bi ovu orobi ma vileri'i e'dozu sawa mani ecozu ma e'yo egazuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okubiika n'okuteekateekyera, n'ahamuheru nasharamu kugira enju yangye. Kikaba ekirooto kyangye kumara obwire bwingi nk'oku ndikubaasa kwijuka.

eng_prompt: After years of denial and evasion, he finally found the courage to confront his past. The weight of his guilt had become unbearable, pushing him to seek redemption.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga yeegaana era nga yeewala, yasobola okufuna obuvumu okwolekera ebyayita bye. Omugugu gw'omusango gwe gwali tegusobola kugumira, ne gumusindiikiriza okunoonya okusonyiyibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me kwero ki weyo timo jami, en dong onongo tekcwiny me lok I kom jami ma otime I kare mukato angec. Cwer cwiny me bal ma onongo en tye kwede onongo dong pe twero cirre, ma oweko en ocako yenyo larre.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ainger keda aisac, abu ngesi kodum atiting na aitepeg akiro nukokau. Apolor noi aiyalongongoke, ido abu kisinyikok ngesi aimo alacakinio.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara e'yo a'dazu azini apazu 'bori ma vutia, isu asizu asi 'baza e'yo erini agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo erini i ezaleri ma nziza eca ndra okporu tu erini ani eri omizu truta ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwehakana n'okwetantara, ahamuheru akashanga obumanzi bw'okureeba eby'enyima bye. Oburemeezi bw'okwetomboita kwe bukaba butarikugumisiriza, ekyamureeteire kuronda okucungurwa.

eng_prompt: The debate surrounding the ethics of interrogation techniques has intensified in recent years. Many are questioning the boundaries of law enforcement practices in extreme situations.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwetoolodde empisa z'obukodyo bw'okukuba ebibuuzo kweyongedde mu myaka egiyise. Bangi babuusabuusa obusobozi bw'abakuumaddembe mu mbeera embi ennyo.
ach_prompt: Laro lok I kom yoo me timo lapeny omede tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom kit ma dul ma gwoko cik twero tic kwede I kare ma peko tye mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol noi epeget loikamunit iponesio luajokak luka aingisingisio kokaru lu atuboros. Eutasi itunga luipu abuonokin nuepedorete itunga luka apugan aswam kotoma ojautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara geri 'bani e'yo ozizu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea ra. Ba karakara eyi e'yo zi e'yo 'bani 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbazu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha bikwatireine n'emitwarize y'okubuuza ebibuuzo kweyongyeire omu myaka egi. Baingi nibabangaanisa oburemeezi bw'okukuratira ebiragiro omu mbeera ezigumire.

eng_prompt: Authorities have uncovered discrepancies in the financial records of the local government. As a result, several officials are under scrutiny for potential misconduct.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza bazudde obutakwatagana mu biwandiiko by'ebyensimbi ebya gavumenti z'ebitundu. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu abawerako bali mu kwekenneenyezebwa olw'enneeyisa embi.
ach_prompt: Lutela guyubu lok mapat-pat matye I buk lim pa gamente me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka ngiyo lutic mapol pi timgi maraco.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio odumutu ationis kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun luka apugan naka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, eutai aingic eswamak luipu kanu iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi esu e'yo onzi eyi e'yo robia ni local government ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba karakara eyi ma eti onda e'yo 'yeta onzi eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bajumbwire ebitahikire omu bihandiiko bya gavumenti z'ebyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru baingi bariyo nibashwijumwa ahabw'emitwarize mibi.

eng_prompt: In order to stimulate economic growth, financial institutions play a crucial role in providing funds to individuals and businesses. One of the primary ways they do this is through lending practices.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi bikola omulimu omukulu mu kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu ne bizinensi ensimbi. Engeri emu enkulu gye bakikolamu kwe kwewola ssente.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim, gangi tic me lim timo tic mapire tek tutwal I miyo lim ki dano ki biacara. Yo acel madit ma gitimo kwede man obedo miyo lim den.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun, iswamaete iriongeta luka ikapun aswam naepol noi kowai lo aijaikin ikapun mama ejaasi itunga keda ibiasaran. Epone ediopebon loiswamaete kesi ngun ngesi kowai lo aijaun ilonin.
lgg_prompt: Lezu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, angu robia ta mbazu 'diyi azi okporu nga robia fezu 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni azini tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri. Geri yini 'diri 'yezu okporu 'diyi ma azi eri geri mari fezu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya, ebitongore by'esente nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza abantu sente hamwe na bizinesi. Omuringo gumwe ogu barikukoramu eki n'okuguza abantu esente.

eng_prompt: With a busy schedule and constant interruptions, I struggled to find time for anything beyond the essentials. As a result, I only managed to watch the news headlines.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba nnabanga n'eby'okukola bingi era nga n'emirimu gyange gitataaganyizibwa buli kiseera, kyanzibuwalira okufuna obudde okukola ebintu ebirala ng'oggyeko ebyo ebikulu. N'ekyavaamu, nnasobola okulaba emitwe gy'amawulire gyokka.
ach_prompt: Ki jami mapol ma atiyo ki kare ki kare, anongo tek tutwal me nongo cawa me timo jami mukene mapat ki jami ma pigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, aneno wiye-wiye me lok angeya keken.
teo_prompt: Keda aswam naepol noi keda aitolitol, abu eong ationikin adumun apak kanuka iboro ice luetapit eong aswam. Kanuka ngun, apedori eong asesen akiro nuka iyemuto bon.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa mani ovuzu azi be tualu e'yo 'bani ma asi ogazu 'diyi pie, ma dri ci sa'wa esuzu e'yo azi 'diyi 'yezu aga e'yo orodriru 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, ma o'bi lu e'yo dria dria 'diyi ndre.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu nkaba nyine bingi by'okukora hamwe n'okutaataaganisibwa, nkatunga obwiire bw'okukora ebintu ebindi bitari eby'omugasho munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, nkabaasa kureeba emitwe y'amakuru yonka.

eng_prompt: The economic impact of the pandemic has been felt across various industries. As businesses struggled to adapt to the new reality, layoffs became increasingly common.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna ebikoseddwa ekirwadde bbunansi biwuliddwa mu makolero ag'enjawulo. Bizinensi bwe zaalwana okumanyiira embeera empya, okugoba abantu mu mirimu kweyongera.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma poto pa gemo eni okelo i kom biacara mapatpat. I kare ma biacara tye ka tute matek me ngiyo ki kwo manyen, rweny pa dano I tic omedde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Amuna na adeka naka ekorona ejai toma okampuni luegelegela. Kwape etionikinit ibiasaran acamanar keda ejautene loitetet, apotu itunga luipu kotwakiasi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo azo 'dezaniri 'yepi e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'bi i e'da okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea. Tujari yini dri ciria e'yo o'diru 'diyi be, 'ba eyi ofuzu azi'a ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi omu by'entaasya bw'endwara ruranda nsi buhurirwe omu makorero agatari gamwe na gamwe. Obu bizinesi zaabaire nizirwana okumanyiira embeera ensya, okubingwa omu mirimo kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: As the economy continues to grow and job opportunities increase, urban areas are becoming more attractive to the population. This trend is particularly evident among the younger generation seeking better education and lifestyle options.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna byeyongera okukula n'emirimu gyeyongera, ebibuga byeyongera okusikiriza abantu. Enkola eno yeeyolekera nnyo mu bantu abato abanoonya obuyigirize obulungi n'engeri y'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara tye ka dongo ki gum me tic tye ka mede, kabedo me boma tye ka doko ber tutwal ki dano. Tim man nen tutwalle ikin jo matino matye ka yenyo kwan maber ki yoo me kwo.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor apol naka ikapun keda aswamisinei, eyatakinos aiboisio nuka itaunin mama ejaasi itunga. Ecai na noi kanejaas atumunak lu ekotosi asioman na abeit ka aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni tuzu ri ni mu drile azini drileba azi ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eca curu'do ndrizaru o'bi eyidri. E'yo 'di e'da tuni 'ba oderu 'diyi ma eselea lepi onita muke azini geri aa'zu edriru 'diyi lepi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya ku birikugumizamu nibikura kandi n'emirimo neyeyongyera, emyanya y'omu ndembo neyeyongyera kureetera abantu okushemererwa. Omuringo ogu nigureebeka munonga omu bantu bato abarikusherura obwegyese burungi n'emituurire mirungi.

eng_prompt: Collaboration fosters creativity and innovation, allowing individuals to combine their strengths. By pooling resources and ideas, teams can tackle challenges more effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana kutumbula obuyiiya n'obuyiiya, ekisobozesa abantu ssekinnoomu okukwataganya amaanyi gaabwe. Nga bakungaanya ebintu n'ebirowoozo, ttiimu zisobola okwanganga okusoomoozebwa mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Winye weko dano tiyo ki diro manyen, weko dano ribo kero gi. I yo me ribo jami ki tam, dul mapat-pat twero lweny I kom peko mapat-pat I yoo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina itopolori acoa ka acoa naitetet, ijaikini itunga aimorikikin agogongu kec. Kowai lo aimorikikin iboro keda aomisio, epedorete itimun aitemokin atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita ni e'yo ndundu eyi edezu ri ma omgbo otu, dika eri fe 'ba eyini okpo eyini 'diyi ecizu tualu. Afa ndundu eyi trazu tualu egata eyi pie, amuti eyi eco e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa nikureetaho obuhangahanga n'okujumbura, ekirikwikiriza abantu okukoresa amaani gaabo. Za tiimu zaaba nizikorera hamwe, nizibaasa kukora aha buremeezi omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: Before finalizing any deal, it's crucial to understand all the terms and conditions involved. Always take the time to review documents carefully to avoid any potential misunderstandings.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kumaliriza ddiiru yonna, kikulu nnyo okutegeera amateeka n'obukwakkulizo byonna ebizingirwamu. Bulijjo wefunire akadde okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko n'obwegendereza okwewala obutategeeragana bwonna obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe I tyeko winye mo keken, pire tek tutwal me niang cik weng matye iye. I kare weng kwany kare me ngiyo ki diro waraga wek pe iwinye marac.
teo_prompt: Eringa itolomuna adio acamanar, ejokuna noi amisiikin ikisila keda nutupitono kere. Koinak duc apak aanyanar apapulai ejok kanu aitikitik amamus acamanar.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi 'duni e'yo azi asizu ku, eri orodriru e'yo dria azini azita yini 'diyi vazu. Le mi ma 'du sa'wa sa'wa driasi kokobi eyi ma ale andrizu geri kililiru si e'yo erita ako ni 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Otakahendeire endagaano yoona, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikwetengwa n'ebirikwetengwa. Twara obwire okushwijuma ebihandiiko n'obwegyendesereza okwetantara obutetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: Employment opportunities play a crucial role in economic development. When individuals secure jobs, they gain access to resources that enhance their quality of life.
lug_prompt: Emirimu gikola kinene nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. Abantu bwe bafuna emirimu, bafuna ebyetaago ebitumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Tic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I dongo lobo. Ka dano acel-acel onongo tic, ginongo yoo me nongo jami ma twero yubu rwom me kwogi.
teo_prompt: Arerengesio nu aswam iswamaete ejok noi kotoma apol naka ikapun. Arai edumununete itunga aswamisinei, edumunenete kesi iboro lu itojokaret aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Drileba azi ni 'diyi azi okporu nga zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia. Ba ka azi esu, eyi afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Emirimo neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entaasya. Abantu ku barikutunga emirimo, nibatunga ebintu ebirikubongyera aha mutindo gw'emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: As factories continue to expand their operations, the release of harmful substances into the air and water has become increasingly prevalent. This growing concern has raised alarms among environmentalists and communities alike.
lug_prompt: Nga amakolero geeyongera okugaziya emirimu gyago, okufulumya ebintu eby'obulabe mu mpewo ne mu mazzi kweyongedde. Okweraliikirira kuno okweyongera kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu balwanirizi b'obutonde bw'ensi n'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Cuma me yubo jami tye ka medde ki dongo, balo jami maraco I yamo ki pii bene tye ka medde tutwal. Lworo man matye kamede tye ka kelo lworo ikin joo ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki lwak bene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos acuman aiyatakin aswamukec, eyatakinos iboro luededeng kokwam keda akipi. Apolou na na aiyalongongo ayangau aiyalongong kanejaas itunga lu eyuwaritos ejautene lo akwap keda aiboisio kere.
lgg_prompt: Pari afa edezu 'diyi ni mu drile azi ngazu 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu, afa onzi 'diyi ofuzu oli ma alia azini yi ma alia ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Asi otiza ma omgbo tupi 'diri eji asi otiza 'ba angu ama agei ri ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea tualu ongulumu eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Amakorero ku garikugumizamu nigashanjuura emirimo yaago, okurekura ebintu eby'akabi omu mwanya n'amaizi kweyongyeire. Okwerarikirira oku kweyongyeire kureesire okwerarikirira omu bantu abarikurwanirira obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'abantu ba buriijo.

eng_prompt: As we face increasing threats from climate change and pollution, it is crucial to consider our impact on the planet. Many people are beginning to question the effectiveness of current conservation efforts.
lug_prompt: Nga twolekaganye n'obulabe obweyongera okuva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'obucaafu, kikulu nnyo okulowooza ku ngeri gye tukosaamu ensi. Abantu bangi batandise okubuusabuusa obulungi bw'enteekateeka z'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi eziriwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka neno peko matye kamede macalo adwogi me alokaloka pa piny ki balo kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwogi ma watye kwede I kom lobo. Dano mapol tye ka cako bedo ki akala-kala I kom kit ma tic me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina oni keda aitukurianeta nuepolok nuikamunitos aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda ekwam, ejok aomoom nuepedorete oni aswam kotoma akwap. Egeunete itunga luipu abuonokin ajokis naka ewai lo idarere isuban.
lgg_prompt: Ekile ama dri fu e'yo ori gbaza tupi e'yo angu mile ma ojata ni azini angu ezoni 'diyisi, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani eco 'ye angu 'di ma dria ri ma dria ra. Ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo okpo 'bani 'ba sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma orodri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikutunga akabi akarikweyongyera kuruga omu mpindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'okusiisikara kw'obuhangwa, n'eky'omugasho kureeba oku turikukoresa ensi. Abantu baingi batandikire kubanganisa omugasho gw'enteekateeka y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa eriho hati.

eng_prompt: Wetlands have often been viewed as underutilized land, leading to significant development efforts. As a result, various sectors have taken advantage of these areas for industrial expansion.
lug_prompt: Entobazi zitera okutwalibwa ng'ettaka eritakozesebwa bulungi, ekiviiriddeko enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikozesezza ebifo bino okugaziya amakolero.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye pol kare kineno calo ngom ma pe kitiyo kwede maber, ma oweko dongo lobo obedo tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, tenge mapat-pat gutiyo ki kabedo magi me dongo cuma mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc asesen isama kwape alupok numam itwasamao ejok, ido eyangauni apol naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etosomata iriongeta luegelegela arerengu na aiboisio nu kanu aitopolor icuman.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'bi angu yiru 'diyi ndre ekile nyaku 'bani ayule kililiru ku 'diyiru, e'yoni fe angu ezoma ma omgbo ni tuzu. E'yo 'disi, esele ndundu eyi 'du drileba angu 'diyi ma alea okalamvu eyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ebisharara bitwire nibitwarwa nk'eitaka eritarikukoresibwa kurungi, ekirikureetera entunguuka y'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebitarikushushana bikoreise emigisha y'emyanya egi kutunguura amakorero.

eng_prompt: Wetlands provide a unique ecosystem that supports diverse plant life. These areas are particularly suitable for cultivating certain types of crops.
lug_prompt: Entobazi ziwa obutonde obw'enjawulo obuyimirizaawo ebimera eby'enjawulo. Ebifo bino birungi nnyo okulimirako ebika by'ebirime ebimu.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye obedo kabedo ma cwec ma ikabedo mapatpat bedo iye. Kabedo magi ber tutwalle me pito kodi mukene.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete isama aiboisio nuegelegela nu igangitos iraan luegelegela. Ejokuka aiboisio nu kanu akoru ikorion ice.
lgg_prompt: Angu yiru 'diyi afa idri nyazani wura ndusi 'diyi fe afa nyakuni ndundu 'diyi ma ta mbapi. Pari 'diyi onyiru tuni ori azi 'diyi ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Ebisharara nibitereza eby'obuhangwa eby'omutaano ebirikushagika ebimera bitari bimwe na bimwe. Emyanya egi nikirungi munonga okuhingamu ebihingirwe ebimwe.

eng_prompt: To maintain healthy crops and ensure a good yield, I have to implement extensive irrigation practices. The climate in my region can be quite dry, making water a crucial resource for my farming operations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma ebirime nga biramu n'okukakasa amakungula amalungi, nnina okuteekawo enkola z'okufukirira mu bungi. Embeera y'obudde mu kitundu kyange eyinza okuba enkalu ennyo, ekifuula amazzi ekintu ekikulu mu byobulimi byange.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko jami apita ma komgi yot ki nongo kac maber, omyero aket yub me kiro pii I tic I rwom ma lamal. Piny ma ikabedo wa twero bedo otwo tutwal, ma weko pii bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic me pur mega.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar iraan lu engalete ka awanyun ebe iswamaete ikorion ejok, ekot eong aitegear aicokicok akipi. Erai ekuse loka ikwamin aiboisitika lo akwap lo eok, ido ijaikit akipi kwape ibore yenepol noi kanu akoru ka.
lgg_prompt: Ori ma rua ma ta mbazu kililiru azini ani afa ofule onyiru 'diyi esuzu, le ma 'ba geri yi ogbizuri 'yeta ma alia. Angu mile angu mavileri ma alea ri eco ovu e'wizaru tu, e'yo fepi yi ni aa'zu orodriru e'yo amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebihingirwe bigumire biri birungi n'amasharuura marungi, nyine kuta omu nkora emihanda mingi y'okwitirira. Embeera y'obwire omu kyanga kyangye neeba nkye munonga, ekirikureetera amaizi kuba eky'omugasho omu buhingi n'oburiisa bwangye.

eng_prompt: As the country faced a surge in COVID-19 cases, the president prepared to address the nation. Concerned citizens tuned in, eager for updates and guidance on the ongoing health crisis.
lug_prompt: Ng'eggwanga lyolekaganye n'okweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe, pulezidenti yeetegekera okwogera eri eggwanga. Bannansi abakwatibwako baawuliriza, nga beesunga okufuna ebipya n'obulagirizi ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona omede, ladit lobo oyube me lok ki lwak. Anywali ma paro pigi gubedo ki miti me nongo ngec manyen ki tira i kom peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda eyatakinet naka adekasinei nuka COVID-19, abu lokapolon akwap itemok einer keda akwap. Apotu itunga lu epodokitos kopuputu, ekotosi adumun akiro nuitetiak ka aicoreta nuikamunitos ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni dri fu e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu risi, prisdent otu i e'yo nzezu kari ni. Kari anzi asi'baza be 'diyi e'yo eri ma dria, ava be o'dukoti esuzu azini imbata esuzu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga ku ryatungire okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19, purezidenti akeeteekateekyera kugambira eihanga. Abatuuragye abarikufayo, bakaba nibenda kumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho n'obuhabuzi ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho.

eng_prompt: After months of searching for a suitable location, the developers finally settled on a plot of land that seemed affordable. However, they soon discovered that the area had significant drainage issues.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egiwera nga banoonya ekifo ekituufu, abazimbi baasobola okusenga ku ttaka erirabika nga ery'ebbeeyi. Kyokka, mu bbanga ttono baakizuula nti ekitundu kyalimu ebizibu by'amazzi amakyafu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me yenyo kabedo maber, ludiro me gedo dong gucako bedo I ngom ma wele yot tutwal. Ento, oyot-oyot gunongo ni kabedo ne tye ki peko me pii ma mol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aimo aiboisit naedolit, apotu itunga luitolomete alupok kodumutu alupok nuepataka. Konye apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe ajaasi aiboisit ngin keda ationis naepol noi naka akipi.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani angu kililiru ndazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba angu ezo'baa 'diyi asizu aku 'du angu azi e'dapi aje kokoru ni ma alia. Kani si, eyi esu mbeleru kini angu 'da ma alea e'yo eyi okporu 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi barikuronda omwanya ogurikwetengwa, abahingi bakahendera batunga eitaka eririkwetengwa. Kwonka, bakareeba ngu omwanya gukaba gwine oburemeezi bw'amaizi.

eng_prompt: Many citizens feel disillusioned with their leaders. Time and again, promises made during campaigns seem to vanish once they take office.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi baggwaamu essuubi olw'abakulembeze baabwe. Enfunda n'enfunda, ebisuubizo ebikolebwa mu kakuyege birabika nga bibulawo nga batuuse mu woofiisi.
ach_prompt: Anywali mapol cwinygi pe yom ki lutela gi. Tyen mapol cikke ma gimiyo ikare me bito kwir nen calo rweny woko kace gucako tic.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi engarenok kec. Apakio nuipu, isumununeta lu iswamao kapak naka ikampeins esubit bala emunarete akaulo naka alomar oyapesi.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi ma asi eza e'yo eyi ma drice'ba eyini 'diyisi. Sa'wa driasi, e'yo 'bani owizu 'ba yini ti odaza 'yeria 'diyi e'de yi ma alia 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi tibarikushemererwa n'abebembezi baabo. Obwire n'obwire, ebiraganiso ebikozirwe omu hururu z'oburuuru, nibireebeka nk'ebirikuhwaho bwanyima y'okutwara ofiisi.

eng_prompt: With vast fields stretching as far as the eye can see, he has dedicated his life to agriculture. Over the years, his hard work and determination have transformed the land into a thriving enterprise.
lug_prompt: Olw'ennimiro ennene ennyo, obulamu bwe abumalidde mu bulimi n'obulunzi. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, okufuba kwe n'obumalirivu bimufudde bizinensi.
ach_prompt: En odyero kwone me pur pien poto ne dwong adada. Pi mwaki ma okato angec, tic matek kacel ki tek cwiny ma en obedo kwede oweko ngom eni odoko biacara madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Keda amisirin nuipu noi nuepedorete akonye asesen, einakinit ngesi aijarake toma akoru. Kokaru lu atuboros, aswamuke keda agogongu kijulakisi alupok ngun araun ebiasara lo ejokuna noi.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma amvu angiri tupi angu mile ni ecozu ndrezuri ma alia 'diyisi, eri owi i ma idri e'yo agirikicani 'diyi 'yezu. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, azi okporu erini nga tualu asi 'baza be 'diyi oja angu 'di tujari onyiru ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwingi, atwire amagara gye omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Kumara emyaka mingi, okukora n'amaani kwe n'obwegyendesereza bwe, bihindwire eitaka ry'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: After months of uncertainty and anxiety about his health, he finally decided to get tested. The results shattered his world, leaving him in a state of despair.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obuteekakasa n'okweraliikirira ku bikwata ku bulamu bwe, kyaddaaki yasalawo okwekebeza. Ebyavuddemu byasannyalaza ensi ye, ne bimuleka mu mbeera y'okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki lworo I kom yotkom mege, lacen en omoko tamme me pime. Adwogi ne obalo kwone tutwal, oweko cwinye otur adada.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyalongong keda aiyalongong kanuka angaleuke, abu ngesi kodum ainwakio. Apotu akiro ngun itolitolutu akwapuke, kojalakisi ngesi kotoma aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani aa'zu asi otiza be azini asi otiza be e'yo eri ma rua ala ma dria 'bori ma vutia, asizu asi 'du e'yo 'bani eri ma rua o'bizu ra. E'yo efupi 'diyi eza eri ma wudrikuru erini ani eri kuzu asi nyoza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira aha magara gye, akahendera yacwamu kukyeberwa. Ebyarugiremu bikashiisha ensi ye, kyamusiga omu mbeera y'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: As the world continues to grapple with the ongoing pandemic, many people are seeking to understand the transmission methods of the virus. This knowledge is crucial for implementing effective prevention strategies.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yeeyongera okulwanagana n'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, abantu bangi banoonya okutegeera engeri akawuka gye kasaasaanamu. Okumanya kuno kwa mugaso nnyo mu kuteeka mu nkola enkola ennungi ez'okwetangira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki two ma opoto ni, dano mapol tye ka mito niang kit ma two eni kobo kwede. Ngec man pire tek tutwal pi keto yub me gengo nyayo two I tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit akwap kere ainingosit keda adeka naka ekorona, eutasi itunga luipu aimo amisiikin epone loekorere adeka. Erai acoa na naepol noi kanu aitegear iwaitin lu itikitikere adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni mu drile a'di 'dizu azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri be, 'ba karakara eyi le geri azo 'da ni i erezu 'diyi va. Ondua 'diri orodriru geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.

eng_prompt: The government has made significant investments in healthcare infrastructure to improve treatment options for patients. One of the key facilities established as part of this initiative is a specialized center for cancer care.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etaddemu ssente nnyingi mu by'obujjanjabi okusobola okulongoosa obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde. Ekimu ku bifo ebikulu ebyateekebwawo ng'ekitundu ky'enteekateeka eno ye ddwaliro erijjanjaba kookolo.
ach_prompt: Gamente oketo lim madit tutwal I odi yadi me yubu yoo me tic pi lutwo. Gangi tic acel ma pire tek ma kiyubu macalo but yub man obedo ot yat pa lutwo cancer.
teo_prompt: Ebwaiki apugan ikapun luipu noi toma aiboisio nuka amukian kanu aitojokar amukian naka adekak. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuapolok nuetolomunitai kanu aswam ngun ngesi adekis naka ekansa.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'ba robia angiri afa ayuzaru arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri ri ma omgbo otuzu. Pari azi okporu 'bani e'do e'yo 'di ma aziru ri arojo 'ba azo cancer niri be 'diyi ma tambazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eteire esente nyingi omu bitongore by'eby'amagara kwenda kwongyera aha bujanjabi bw'abarwaire. Emwe aha myanya y'omugasho eyateirweho nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, n'eirwariro ry'abarwaire ba kokoro.

eng_prompt: In order to provide optimal care for patients, healthcare institutions must prioritize their infrastructure. This includes ensuring that they have access to advanced technology and essential medical supplies.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuwa abalwadde obujjanjabi obulungi, amalwaliro galina okukulembeza ebikozesebwa. Kino kizingiramu okukakasa nti bafuna tekinologiya ow'omulembe n'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Pi miyo kony maber tutwal ki lutwo, odi yadi omyero guket yub me tic i kom lutwo obed gin ma pire tek. Man kwako neno ni gunongo diro me tet manyen ki jami tic me ot yat mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijanakin adekak amukian najokan, ekot adekisia aisingarenit adukena kec. Imoriaritos nu awanyun ebe edumunenete kesi etatai loakwana keda iboro lu amukian lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri muke ndeni, le pari arojo eyini 'diyi ma 'ba okpo afa eyini ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma alia, le 'ba ma ne ra kini eyi eco afa tekenologia ni o'diru 'diyi esu tualu afa arojo ni orodriru 'diyi pie ra.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive world, it is essential for young people to actively seek out experiences that can shape their futures. By embracing new challenges and possibilities, they can build valuable skills and connections.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'okuvuganya, kya mugaso nnyo abavubuka okunoonya obumanyirivu obusobola okubumba ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Mu kukkiriza okusoomoozebwa okupya n'ebisoboka, basobola okuzimba obukugu obw'omugaso n'enkolagana.
ach_prompt: I lobo me pyem matek me kare-ni, pire tek tutwal pi bulu me yenyo ngec ma twero yubu anyimgi. Ki jolo peko ki gum manyen, gitwero yubu diro ki kubbe ma ber tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia a'bala ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba oderu 'diyi dri e'yo ndundu eyi esuzu eyini ani ewu ewu ewu drialeri ma alea ra. E'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi ai'zu, eyi eco ondua orodriru 'diyi esu tualu 'ba eyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, nikikuru munonga eminyeeto okusherura eby'okumanya ebirikubaasa kubareetera ebiro byabo by'omumaisho. Kubarikwakiira oburemeezi n'oburemeezi obutsya, nibabaasa kwombeka emyoga n'emikago y'omugasho.

ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me penyo pi visa, omyero abed ki caden ma nyutu ni atye ki lim ma oromo. Lacungu pi ot moko cik owaco ni omyero acwal waraga mapol, ma I kingi obedo lok ma aa ki I beng.
teo_prompt: Kwape epone loka ailip aiwadikaeta, akoto eong aitodun aitogogongoret ebe ejai eong ikapun luedolitos. Abu abwoikiniton apugan kolimok eong ebe ibusakinit eong aijukar apapulai nuipu, aimoriarit akiroka nuka aingadis naka ikapun.

eng_prompt: In legal proceedings, parties often seek clarification on their rights and options following a decision. One common question that arises is whether there are grounds to challenge or contest a court ruling.
lug_prompt: Mu misango gy'amateeka, enjuyi zitera okunoonya okulambikibwa ku ddembe lyazo n'ebirala bye zisobola okukola oluvannyuma lw'okusalawo. Ekimu ku bibuuzo ebitera okubuuzibwa kiri nti oba waliwo ensonga z'okuwakanya oba okuwakanya ensala ya kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ikare me winyo lok I kot, joo matye ki adot ipol kare gipenyo niang matut I kom twero gi ki gin ma gitwero timone inge moko tam. Lapeny acel ma dano maro penyo en aye kace tyen lok tye me kwero onyo kwero ngolo kop ma kot omoko.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the students eagerly awaited their academic reports. When the results were finally released, they were anxious to see how their efforts had been recognized.

ach_prompt: En ipol kare nywako tam manyen ki lureme, ma kelo yomcwiny ki miti. Kadi bed kumeno, ka odok ilok me timo gin mo, en bedo ki lworo dok pe moko tam.

eng_prompt: I've always been drawn to vibrant hues, but there's something about one color that stands out to me. Whenever I see it, I feel an instant sense of warmth and energy.

eng_prompt: In the complex world of politics, motivations often run deeper than public service. Many individuals enter the arena with personal ambitions that can overshadow their commitment to the electorate.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi enzibu ey'ebyobufuzi, ebisikiriza bitera okuba eby'amaanyi okusinga obuweereza bw'olukale. Abantu bangi bayingira mu kisaawe n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe eby'obuntu ebiyinza okubuutikira obweyamo bwabwe eri abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I lobo me cungu iwi bye matye ki peko mapol tutwal, miti pa dano ipol kare bedo lamal loyo tic pa lwak. Dano mapol donyo I pyem tuku ki miti gi ma twero balo miti gi I kom lubol kwir.

eng_prompt: After months of declining sales and increasing employee dissatisfaction, the board of directors convened to discuss the future of our leadership. Tensions were high as everyone speculated about the potential consequences of their decision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukendeera kw'ebyamaguzi n'obutali bumativu bw'abakozi obweyongera, olukiiko lwa badayirekita lwatudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'obukulembeze bwaffe eby'omu maaso. Obunkenke bwali bungi nga buli omu ateebereza ku biyinza okuva mu kusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol ma cat odok piny ki lutic ma cwinygi pe yom, dul pa ludor dul ne gubedo kacoke me nywako lok I kom anyim pa lutela wa. Lworo obedo tye matek tutwal I kare ma dano weng obedo ka byeko adwogi me tam ma gumoko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aikidiokor agwelanar keda amamut aiyalama naka eswamak, apotu lukapolok lu eyaitok iriamunos kanu aitemitem ingaren naka engarenok wok. Apol noi aiyalongong naarai apotu itunga kere opodokinit nuikamunitos nuepedorete atakanun kanuka aseunetekec.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia afa oziza ma omgbo esizu azini azi'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu 'bori ma vutia, board of directors eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu driceza amavile ri ma ewu drialeri ma dria. Ngiringiri ndra uru 'ba dria ni e'yo egazu e'yo yini 'dule 'diyi ma vutiari ma dria.

eng_prompt: After years of rigorous training and hands-on experience in various media outlets, she has honed her skills in reporting and storytelling. Her dedication to uncovering the truth and delivering accurate information has earned her recognition in the field.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'atendekebwa era ng'alina obumanyirivu mu mikutu gy'empuliziganya egy'enjawulo, yeeyongedde okukuguka mu kukola amawulire n'okunyumya emboozi. Obumalirivu bwe mu kuzuula amazima n'okuwa amawulire amatuufu bumufunidde okumanyibwa mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me pwonye matek ki ngec ma en obedo kwede I odi poko ngec mapat-pat, en omedo diro ne me coyo lok angeya ki tito lok angeya. Dyerene me niang lok ada ki miyo ngec matir oweko en oywek tutwal I kabedo ne.

Eri ma ava e'yo ada ma e'dazu azini o'dukoti kililiru 'diyi fe erini e'yo 'yezu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutendekwa n'okukoresa emikono omu mikutu y'amahurire etari emwe n'emwe, atungire emyoga ye y'okuhandiika n'okugamba ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Okwehayo kwe omu kujumbura amazima n'okuheereza amakuru agahikire kimureesire okumanywa omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Listeners eagerly tune in each week to catch their favorite show. With a dedicated fan base, the excitement builds as the weekend approaches.

eng_prompt: With a passion for music and a keen business sense, she decided to invest in the broadcasting industry. Over the years, her hard work and dedication paid off, leading her to establish a successful media empire.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali ayagala nnyo ennyimba era ng'ayagala nnyo eby'obusuubuzi, yasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu by'empuliziganya. Emyaka bwe gyagenda giyitawo, okufuba kwe n'okwewaayo kwe byavaamu ebibala, ekyamuviirako okutandikawo obufuzi bw'amawulire obulungi.

eng_prompt: After experiencing frequent data overages and slow speeds, I realized that my internet usage had outgrown my current plan. To avoid the hassle of monitoring my data, I now prefer to purchase unlimited internet bundles.

eng_prompt: After losing his job last month, his financial situation has become increasingly dire. With bills piling up and no steady income, he feels the weight of his responsibilities pressing down on him.

eng_prompt: As the year comes to a close, communities around the world begin to embrace the festive spirit. Families gather to decorate their homes and share traditions that have been passed down through generations.
