nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'omutaano, abantu b'amaani omu kibiina ky'obutegyeki bashaziremu kuruga omu karuuru akarikwija. Empindahinduka egi eretsireho oburemeezi bw'obwebembezi omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: Amid growing tensions and allegations of misconduct, a group of concerned citizens gathered to voice their frustrations. They claimed that the integrity of the electoral process had been compromised, leading to widespread distrust in the official outcomes.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke obweyongera n'ebigambibwa ku mpisa embi, ekibinja ky'abatuuze abakwatibwako baakuŋŋaanye okulaga obwennyamivu bwabwe. Baagamba nti obwesimbu bw'enkola y'okulonda bwali bufiiriddwa, ekiviiriddeko obuteesigagana mu bivudde mu kulonda ebitongole.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle tye ka mede ki adot me tim maraco, lwak mapol gugure me nyutu cwer cwiny gi. Guwaco ni ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir pe obedo ber, ma oweko dano mapol pe tye ki gen I kom adwogi yer ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyalongongo keda aitoroneta nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok, apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos kanu aitodun aiyalongongokec. Apotu kesi kotemasi ebe emunaritai ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo, ido abu koyangau amunokina mama ejaasi akiro nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi tu 'diyi ma eselea e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba eyi ma adriza onzi 'diyi pie, ongulumu azi kari anzi asi otiza be 'diyi tra eyi e'dazu e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi 'diyi. Eyi 'yo kini e'yo onyiru e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea ri eza i ra, e'yo 'da fe 'ba karakara eyini asi 'bazu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'emicwe mibi, guruupu y'abantu abarikwerarikirira baketeeranira hamwe kworeka oburemeezi bwabo. Bakagira ngu oburingaaniza bw'eby'oburuuru bukaba butaine mugasho, ekyareteire abantu baingi obuteesiga ebyarugire omu buruuru.

eng_prompt: The economic impact of the lockdown has been devastating for many households. As businesses closed and jobs were lost, the struggle to provide basic necessities became a harsh reality for numerous families.
lug_prompt: Ebizibu by'ebyenfuna ebyava mu muggalo bibadde bibi nnyo eri amaka mangi. Bizineesi bwe zaggalwawo n'emirimu ne gibulawo, okulwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo kyafuuka kizibu eri amaka mangi.
ach_prompt: Loro piny okelo peko madit tutwal I kom gangi mapol. I kare ma biyacara oloro dok tic orweny, peko me nongo jami ma mite ikwo odoko peko madit tutwal pi gangi mapol.
teo_prompt: Amuna na agolokinio naka akwap erai naepol noi mama ejaasi ikalia luipu. Neagolokinor ibiasaran ido kotwakiasi aswamisinei, abu ainingosit naka adumun iboro lu itwasamao araun naetiono noi mama ejaasi ikalia luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo angu ti opizaniri 'yepi e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi eza aku karakara yi ra. Tujura yini opizu azini azi yini avizurisi, e'yo ewaru afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi fezu ri eca e'yo ewaru familia karakara eyini.
nyn_prompt: Okukingwaho kw'eihanga kureesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu maka maingi. Eby'obushuubuzi ku byagiire nibikinga kandi abantu bakafeerwa emirimo yaabo, oburemeezi bw'okutunga ebyetengo by'omutaano bukagumaho omu maka maingi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, tensions have escalated over ownership and usage rights of land in various regions. As a result, there are land disputes in the Northern part of Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okusika omuguwa kweyongedde ku bwannannyini n'eddembe ly'okukozesa ettaka mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo enkaayana z'ettaka mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, telle omede tutwal I kom twero me bedo rwed ngom ki tic ki ngom I but lobo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lara ngom tye I kumalo me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta kanuikamunitos apedorosio nuka alupok kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejaas ingungeta luka alupok ko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea e'yo nyaku ma e'ipi ni azini drilemgbo nyaku ayuza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ngiringiri nyaku ma dria 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahabw'obwannannyini n'obugabe bw'okukoresa eitaka omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho entongane z'eitaka omu kicweka ky'amatemba ga Uganda.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions among the community members, the leaders recognized the urgent need for dialogue. They decided to address the concerns surrounding the land disputes that had been affecting the area for months.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu bantu b'ekitundu, abakulembeze baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuteesa. Baasazeewo okukola ku kweraliikirira okwetoolodde enkaayana z'ettaka ezibadde zikosa ekitundu okumala emyezi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamedde I kin lwak, lutela ne gunongo ni lok omyero obed tye oyot-oyot tutwal. Gumoko tam gi me cobo peko me lara ngom ma obedo ka yelo kabedo eni pi dwe mapol.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongong naka itunga luka atutubet, apotu engarenok kojenutu eipud loka aineranara katipet. Apotu kesi ocamutu aitemokin atiokisio nuikamunitos ingungeta lu alupok lu ajaas aiboisit kanu ilapio.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi esu e'yo nzeza ma orodri mbeleru. Eyi ai e'yo asi otiza e'yo ngiringiri nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu angu 'da ma alea mba 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu bantu b'ekyanga, abebembezi bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okuteisa. Bakasharamu kukora aha nshonga ezirikukwata aha ntongane z'eitaka ezaabaire ziteganiise ekyanga kumara ameezi maingi.

eng_prompt: Please mark your calendars for an important discussion regarding property boundaries. We need everyone's input to ensure a smooth process.
lug_prompt: Bambi teeka akabonero ku kalenda zo okufuna okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'omugaso ku nsalo z'ebyobugagga. Twetaaga buli omu okubaako ky'awaayo okulaba ng'enteekateeka egenda bulungi.
ach_prompt: Tim ber i ket alama I kalenda mamegi pi nywako lok mapire tek I kom wang ngom. Wamito tam pa dano weng me neno ni tic owoto maber.
teo_prompt: Kilipit iwadika ikalendakon kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos ikoruo luka iboro. Ikoto oni aomisio nuka nginitunganan kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Kirikiri le mi ma 'ba kalafe kalenda mivile 'diyi ma dria e'yo nzezu e'yo orodriru e'yo boda ni 'diyi ma dria. Le 'ba dria ma fe egata eyini ani e'yo 'yezu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Nyabura we teeka akamanyiso aha kalenda yaawe okubaasa kugamba aha nsharo z'ebyobugaiga. Nitwetenga obuhwezi bwa buri omwe, okureeba ngu ebintu byagyenda kurungi.

eng_prompt: Local authorities have been meeting with community leaders to address the growing tensions over land ownership. As a result, preparations to solve land disputes in Amuru are ongoing.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ebyalo babadde basisinkana abakulembeze b'ekitundu okugonjoola obunkenke obweyongera ku bwannannyini ku ttaka. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka z'okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka mu Amuru zigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gubedo ka rwate ki lutela me tedero me tyeko telle matye I kom twero me ngom. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me tyeko laro lok me ngom I Amuru tye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Iriamununos apedorosio nuka atutubena keda engarenok luka atutubet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata kanu alupok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi aitemonokineta nuka aitemokin ingungeta luka alupok ko Amuru.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ebi dri fu drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie e'yo asi omiza ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika niri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, otuta e'yo nyaku ma dria Amuru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro, batwire nibabugana abebembezi b'ebyaro, okukora aha nshonga z'obugabe bw'eitaka. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka z'okumaraho entongane z'eitaka omuri Amuru nizigyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The community has expressed concerns about the potential disruption caused by the event. Many residents believe that the exercise could negatively impact their daily lives and routines.
lug_prompt: Abantu balaze obweraliikirivu ku kutaataaganyizibwa okuyinza okuva ku mukolo. Abatuuze bangi balowooza nti ekyo kiyinza okukosa obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko ma yub eni bikelo. Lutedero mapol tye ki niyee ni tic man twero balo kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aitolitol epucit ngol. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epedori aswamisioit ngin aitolitol aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo ewaru omu 'da ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi ega kini e'yo 'di eco eyi ma edri eyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabanguko oburikubaasa kureetwa omukoro. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu ekikorwa eki nikibaasa kuba eky'akabi aha magara gaabo ga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, concerns have been raised about the effectiveness of the current regulations. Many believe that the existing framework does not adequately represent the interests of the members.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, okweraliikirira kubadde kuleetebwa ku bukugu bw'amateeka agaliwo. Bangi balowooza nti enteekateeka eriwo kati teyakiikirira bulungi byetaago bya bammemba.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo obedo tye I kom tic pa cik matye kombedi. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni yub matye kombedi pe cung pi miti pa lumemba.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta nupac, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ikisila kalu ejaas. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe mam ainapeta nu ejaas ejaas keda ipudesia luka imeban.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba ece asi otiza e'yo azita sawa 'disi 'diyi ma orodri ma dria ra. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini otita curu'do 'diyi eceni e'yo memba eyini lele 'diyi kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezihweireho, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha bukoryo bw'ebiragiro ebiriho hati. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu enkora eriho hati terikujwekyera kurungi ebyetengo bya ba memba.

eng_prompt: As part of his graduate research, he sought to understand the underlying ideologies that shaped contemporary politics. To achieve this, he made an in-depth study of the political party.
lug_prompt: Ng'omu ku kunoonyereza kwe okw'akamalirizo, yagezaako okutegeera endowooza eziri emabega w'ebyobufuzi eby'omulembe guno. Okutuukiriza kino, yakola okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo but kwed mege me digiri, en oteme me niang tam mapat-pat matye I te loc me cungu iwi-bye I kare-ni. Me cobo man, en otimo kwed matut I kom dul me cungu iwi bye ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma aingicike naka angetakin esomero, abu ngesi kotam amisiikin aomisio nuepedorete aitolomun epolitikis loka apakio nu. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, abu ngesi kisisia epate ngol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza erini onita univasiti niri ma alea ri ma azi ru, eri nda e'yo politiki ewu curu'do 'diyi ma alea 'diyi vazu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri 'ye e'yo vuti ondaza amuti politikiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'ekicweka ky'okucondooza kwe, akateeraho kwetegyereza ebiteekateeko ebirikutegyeka eby'obutegyeki eby'obunaku obu. Okuhikiiriza eki, akakora okucondooza kurungi aha kibiina ky'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Despite efforts to promote peace and reconciliation in the region, longstanding tensions among various groups have persisted. As a result, the cycle of violence continues to affect the lives of many in the area.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube w'okutumbula emirembe n'okutabagana mu kitundu, obunkenke obumaze ebbanga mu bibiina eby'enjawulo bukyaliwo. N'ekivuddemu, obutabanguko bweyongera okukosa obulamu bw'abantu bangi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tute tye me kelo kuc ki mato oput I but lobo man, telle matye I kin dul mapat-pat pud tye. Macalo adwogi ne, tim gero tye ka medde ki balo kwo pa dano mapol I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitopoloritor ainapakin keda acamanar kotoma aiboisit, eringa ingungeta lu apak naepol noi kiding igurupun luegelegela iswamasi. Kanuka ngun, inyikokinitos amumu aitolitol aijar naka itunga luipu kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba asianzu azini truta ejizu angu 'di ma alea ra ti, erita ako ongulumu ndundu eyini aa'zu ewu ezu 'bo 'diyi ma eselea ri nga po'di ci. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi mu drile 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri eza.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okureetaho obusingye n'okugarukana omu kyanga, obutaikirizana ahagati y'ebibiina ebitarikushushana bukiriho. N'ekyarugiremu, obwimukiriro nibugumizamu kuteganisa amagara g'abantu baingi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Residents of Tororo District are eagerly anticipating the upcoming elections. Preparations are underway, but the official voting process has not commenced.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu disitulikiti y'e Tororo beesunga okulonda okujja. Enteekateeka zigenda mu maaso naye okulonda okutongole tekunnatandika.
ach_prompt: Lutedero me Tororo gitye ka kuro yer matye kabino ni ki mit kom. Yub tye kawot anyim, ento yub me bolo kwir pwod pe ocake.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina itunga luko disitrikt loko Tororo aseo na ebunit. Ejaas aitemonokineta, konye mam ber ainapeta nuka aseo ageun.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi distrikiti Tororo niri ma alea 'diyi opeta emupi 'diyi te avasi. Otuta yi mu drile, te e'yo voti 'bezuri e'doni nga ku.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye ba disiturikiti y'e Tororo, bategyereize akaruuru akarikwiija. Enteekateeka ziriyo nizigyenda omu maisho, kwonka oburuuru butakatandikire.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising between local vendors and the city council over new regulations. As a result, many of the vendors still fight the city council authorities.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati w'abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu n'akakiiko k'ekibuga ku mateeka amapya. N'ekivuddemu, abatembeeyi bangi bakyalwanagana n'abakulira ekibuga.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo kamedde ikin lucat me tedero ki lutela me boma madit pi cik manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, lucat mapol pwod gilwenyo I kom lutela me city council.
teo_prompt: Apolor ingungeta kiding agwelanarak keda ekansulo lo esite kanu ikisila luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, eringa agwelanarak luipu ejie keda apedorosio nuka ekansulo loka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako e'bi tu 'ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea kanisulu aku ambu city niri be e'yo azita o'diru 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma karakara yi nga po'di a'di 'di drice'ba aku ambu city council ni 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'abashubuzi b'omubyaro hamwe n'akakiiko k'orurembo ahabw'ebiragiro ebisya. N'ekyarugiremu, abashuubuzi baingi nibarwana n'ab'obushoborozi omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: In their desperate attempts to make a living, street vendors often find themselves in precarious situations. When law enforcement arrives, panic sets in, leading to reckless decisions that put their safety at risk.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okweyimirizaawo, abatunzi b'oku nguudo batera okwesanga mu mbeera embi. Abakuumaddembe bwe batuuka, wabaawo okutya, ekiviirako okusalawo mu ngeri ey'obulagajjavu okuteeka obulamu bwabwe mu matigga.
ach_prompt: I tute gi matek me nongo cente, lucat iteng gudi ipol kare nongo gipe ki kwo maber. Kace abili obino, lworo bedo tye, ma weko gimoko tam magoro ma keto ber bedo gi I peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam kec naepol noi naka aijar, etapit agwelanarak luka orotin adumun awate kec toma ojautene loetiono noi. Neadolunia ipolisin, ebuni akurianu, ido eyangauni aseununeta nuepedorete aimusung ayuwara kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa ozi'ba nzila dria 'diyi eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea sa'wa eyini lezu eyi ma edri esuzu risi. Ba azita ma ta mba'baa 'diyi ka eca 'bo, asi otiza ni e'do, dika e'yo 'duza okpo kokoru 'diyi eji eyi ma agei tema e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abarikuguza ebintu aha nguuto, omu kugyezaho kwabo kw'amaani okubaisaho amagara gaabo, nibashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Abarikukwasa ebiragiro ku barikuhika, nibatandika kutiina, ekirikubareetera kukora ebitarikwetegyerezibwa ebirikuteeka amagara gaabo omu kabi.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings and fines from local authorities, many street vendors remain undeterred. Their presence has sparked ongoing debates about the balance between urban commerce and public order.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okulabula kungi n'engassi okuva mu b'obuyinza, abatembeeyi bangi tebakwatibwako. Okubeerawo kwabwe kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okugenda mu maaso ku bwenkanya wakati w'ebyobusuubuzi mu bibuga n'obutebenkevu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutela me tedero gumiyo cik ki pwod mapol, lucat ma iteng gudi pud tye ki lworo. Bedo tye gi okelo laro lok matye kawot anyim ikin biacara me boma ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai keda aitac ikapun luipu kanejaas apedorosio nuka atutubet, mam agwelanarak luka irotin ekuriaka. Ajaut kec eyauni epeget lo elosi akonye loikamunit eidicane loejai kiding agwelanar keda ainapakina naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza karakara eyi ma dria tualu panga eyi pie engazu drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi vu ra ti, 'ba afa ozipi nzila tia 'diyi ma karakara eyi nga po'di asi otiza kokoru. E'yo yini ovuzu alenia ri fe agbatara muzu drile e'yo tujarani aku ambu cityniri ma eselea azini o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi n'okushashura engaro kuruga omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro, abashuubuzi b'ahanguuto baingi tibarikwerarikirira. Okubaho kwabo, kireesireho okuhanuura okurikugyenda omu maisho ahagati y'ebyobushubuzi omu ndembo hamwe n'obutereera omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents of gun violence have raised significant concerns among citizens and lawmakers alike. As a result, there is a growing consensus that current regulations are insufficient to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Ebikolwa by'obutabanguko bw'emmundu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko bireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bannansi ne mu babaka ba palamenti. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo okukkaanya okweyongera nti amateeka agaliwo tegamala kukuuma bantu.
ach_prompt: Tim gero me muduku ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lworo madit tutwal ikin anywali ki luwang lwak I ot moko cik. Macalo adwogi ne, winye tye ni cik matye kombedi pe romo gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuka amumu naka imudun nes eyaunit aiyalongong kanejaas itunga keda imeeban luka airabet. Kanuka ngun, ejai acamanara naepol noi ebe mam ikisila lu ejaas kwape kwana edolitos kanu ayuwar itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri osu eyini 'ye o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza okporu kari anzi eyi ma eselea 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi ai ra kini azita sa'wa 'disi 'diyi cani e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri 'yezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro bw'embundu bukareetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bantu hamwe n'abany'eishengyero. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho okwikiriza ngu ebiragiro ebiriho hati tibirikumara kurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: Despite the clear guidelines set forth by military regulations, the General made a controversial decision that raised eyebrows among his peers. Many were left questioning his motives and the implications of his actions.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ebiragiro by'amagye byali bitegeerekeka bulungi, Genero yakola okusalawo okwali kwawukana ne banne. Bangi baalekebwa nga babuusabuusa ebigendererwa bye n'ebiva mu bikolwa bye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik ma aa ki bot mony niang maber tutwal, jenerol omoko tam ma okelo apoka-poka ikin lutic luwote. Dano mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom miti ne ki adwoki me tim ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aicoreta nuecaete kotoma okisila luka ajore, abu lokapolon kiswamau aseunet naepol noi naetapit itunga luka ajore. Aponi kojalakinai luipu aingiseta nuikamunitos alosikineteke keda nuepedorete aswamuke.
lgg_prompt: Azita e'yo marani ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, generali 'da 'du e'yo 'duza asi otiza fepi 'ba eri ma agyipi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi dri ra. Ba karakara eyi ku eyi e'yo egazu e'yo erini le 'ye 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa kurungi omu biragiro by'amahe, Genero akakora encwamu y'omutaano eyareesireho okwerarikirira omu bagyenzi be. Baingi bakasigara nibabangaanisa ebigyendererwa bye hamwe n'ebyabaire nibireetwa ebikorwa bye.

eng_prompt: In the ever-changing landscape of modern careers, many individuals find themselves navigating a series of professional transitions. One such individual is a man whose journey through various occupations reveals the challenges and triumphs of adapting to new roles.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'emirimu egikyuka buli kaseera, abantu bangi beesanga nga batambula mu nkyukakyuka z'emirimu eziwerako. Omu ku bantu ng'abo ye musajja ng'olugendo lwe okuyita mu mirimu egy'enjawulo lulaga okusoomoozebwa n'obuwanguzi bw'okumanyiira emirimu emipya.
ach_prompt: I kare me aloka-loka ikit me tic ma ite kare ni, dano mapol nongo gitye ka wot I aloka-loka me tic mapat-pat. Ngat acel ma kit meno obedo lacoo ma wot mege I tic mapat-pat nyutu peko ki loc me ngiyo ki tic manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulanakineta nuka aswamisinei nuka apakio nu, itunga luipu ewanyunete kesi elosi aijulanakineta nuka aswam. Idiopetunganan kangol ngesi etunganan loajaasi keda aswamisinei nuegelegela itodunit atiokisio keda aitelekaareta nuka acamanar keda aswamisinei nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo oja'ba sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba karakara yi yi isu yi ma ngulupi yi ojazu e'yo azi ni 'diyi ma alia. Ba alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi agupi azi erini acizu azi ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'da e'yo ewaru azini drile suza 'bani azi o'diru 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'emirimo y'omurembe egi, abantu baingi nibeeshanga bari omu mpindahinduka y'emirimo. Omwe aha bantu nk'abo n'omushaija orikurabira omu mirimo ye etarikushushana, orikworeka oburemeezi n'obusinguzi bw'okumanya emirimo misya.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving marketplace, staying ahead requires innovation and adaptability. Recognizing this, he has sought out new tools and strategies to enhance his entrepreneurial ventures.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akatambula amangu, okusigala mu maaso kyetaagisa obuyiiya n'okukyusakyusa. Olw'okumanya kino, anoonyezza eby'okukozesa ebipya n'obukodyo bw'okutumbula emirimu gye egy'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal I cuk, bedo anyim mito diro manyen ki diro me timo jami mapat-pat. Ki niang man, en otyeko yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me biacarane.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka esokoni loka lolo, ibusakinit jo aitegear iboro luitetiak. Kanu ajenun ngun, aimo ngesi iboro luitetiak keda iwaitin lu itopoloritor ngesi nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo cuu ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, aa'zu drile ri le e'yo o'diru 'diyi azini e'yo yi ojazu o'diru 'diyi. Erini e'yo 'di nizu 'boria, eri nda afa ayuzaru o'diru azini geri o'diru 'diyi tujari erini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'erizooba akarikugyenda omu maisho, okuguma omu maisho nikyetengyesa okujumbura n'okukoresa oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe. Bwanyima y'okumanya eki, akasherura eby'okukoresa ebisya n'oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi bye.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, he submitted his innovative business plan to the competition. The anticipation built as the finalists were announced, showcasing the brightest talents in the industry.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yawaayo enteekateeka ye ey'obusuubuzi eri abavuganya. Okusuubira kwajjawo ng'abawanguzi b'empaka z'akamalirizo balangirirwa, nga balaga ebitone eby'ekitalo mu mulimu guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwinye, en ocwalo yub me biacarane manyen bot lupyem. Lworo obedo tye ikare ma kicwalo nying joo ma otyeko pyem I pyem me agiki, ma onyuto talanta mabeco loyo weng I tenge enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu ngesi ijaik epulani loka ebiasarake loitetet mama ejaasi abolobol. Apotu itunga lu eomitai ebe epote kesi aitodiar itunga luepedorete alomar toma aboliasio nuka awasia, itodunitos atalantan nuejokuka kakere kotoma okampuni kalo.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, eri fe i vile otita tujarani o'diru 'diyi a'bala 'yezu. Asi 'baza ma omgbo tu 'ba pa tupi avita asizuri ma alia 'diyi ni e'dazu talanta onyiru ndeni okalamvu 'di ma alia 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukora n'amaani, akaheereza enteekateeka ye y'eby'obushubuzi omu mpaka. Okutegyereza kweyongyeire ahabw'okurangirira abarikuza omu mpaka z'akamaririzo, barikworeka etaraanta ezirikukirayo obwengye omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in the career aspirations of the younger generation. Many are seeking alternative paths to traditional employment, driven by innovation and a desire for independence.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu bigendererwa by'abato mu mirimu. Bangi banoonya amakubo amalala mu kifo ky'emirimu egy'ennono, nga bakubirizibwa obuyiiya n'okwagala okwefuga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I miti pa joo matino. Dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me tic mapat ki tic macon, ki miti me bedo agonya.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma aswam naka atumunak. Eutasi luipu aimo iponesio ice luka aswamisinei nuka apakio nukolo, kanu aitolomunun iboro luitetiak keda eipud loka aipugaikin bon.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ojata e'dapi ra 'diyi ebi ovu e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyini asi 'bazu e'yo onitani 'diyi ma dria ci. Ba karakara eyi geri ndundu eyi nda azi oku 'diyi ma paria, e'yo eyi edezu o'diru azini leta eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bigyendererwa by'eminyeeto omu mirimo yaabo. Baingi nibasherura emiringo endiijo y'okukoresa okukira ey'obuhangwa, ahabw'okujumbura hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwetegyeka.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing tensions in the region, government officials have prioritized addressing local grievances. As part of this initiative, the minister will be in Northern Uganda to solve land disputes.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obugenda mu maaso mu kitundu, abakungu ba gavumenti bakulembezza okukola ku kwemulugunya kw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisita ajja kubeera mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me telle matye kawot anyim I but lobo eni, lutic pa gamente guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyeko koko pa lutedero. Macalo but yub man, minista obi bedo I kumalo me Uganda me tyeko laro lok me ngom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu elosi akonye kotoma aiboisit, apotu eswamak luka apugan isingarenitos aitemokin angurian nuka itunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni eminisita ajaut Nyakoi nako Uganda aitemokin ingungeta luka alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi 'ba asi e'yo ewaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, minisita 'da ni mu adri kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke oburiho omu kyanga, abakuru omu gavumenti bateire omutima aha kukora aha kwetomboita kw'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisita naija kuba ari omu matemba ga Uganda kumaraho entongane z'eitaka.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been rising in the community about the increasing number of properties changing hands. Many residents are worried that local resources are being exploited for profit.
lug_prompt: Obweraliikirivu bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu olw'omuwendo gw'ebizimbe ogweyongera okukyusa emikono. Abatuuze bangi beeraliikirivu nti eby'obugagga by'omu kitundu bikozesebwa okufuna amagoba.
ach_prompt: Lworo tye ka mede ikin lwak pi wel odi ma tye ka loke. Lutedero mapol tye ki lworo ni jami me tedero kitye ka tic kwedgi me nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotunga kanu aijulanakineta nuka itogoi. Iyalongongosi itunga luipu ebe itwasamao iboro luka atutubet kanu ameda.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'bi tu ongulumu eyi ma alea e'yo angu eyi ma ru ojazu 'diyi ma kalafe ni tutu ri ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi asi otiza be kini 'ba afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ayu orodri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kutwire nikweyongyera omu bantu ahabw'omuhendo gw'ebintu ogweyongyeire kuhinduka emikono. Abatuuragye baingi berarikiriire ngu eby'obugaiga by'omubyaro nibikoresibwa kuronda amagoba.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been growing concern about the behavior of public officials. Many citizens feel disillusioned by the actions of those in power, leading to a lack of trust in leadership.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku nneeyisa y'abakungu ba gavumenti. Bannansi bangi baggwaamu essuubi olw'ebikolwa by'abo abali mu buyinza ekiviirako obuteesiga bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo tye ka mede I kom tim pa lutic pa gamente. Anywali mapol cwinygi pe yom pi tim pa jo matye I loc, ma oweko pe gigeno tela.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanu iponesio luka eswamak luka apugan. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi aswamisio nuka ngul luejaasi toma apugan, ido ijaikini kesi amamut amunokina aingarenikinio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu adriza azi'ba gameteni 'diyiniri ma dria. Kari anzi karakara eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'ba opi dria 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyisi eyini ani asi 'bazu driceza eyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho okwerarikirira aha micwe y'abakozi ba gavumenti. Abatuuragye baingi nibamara amaani ahabw'ebikorwa by'abo abari omu bwebembezi, ekirikubareetera obuteesiga bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Recent surveys indicate a growing discontent among the younger population in Uganda regarding their political leadership. Many feel that the appointed Ministers do not adequately represent their interests or address their concerns.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga obutali bumativu obweyongera mu bavubuka mu Uganda ku bikwata ku bukulembeze bwabwe mu byobufuzi. Bangi bawulira nti baminisita abaalondebwa tebakiikirira bulungi byetaago byabwe oba okukola ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu cwer cwiny matye kamede ikin jo matino I lobo Uganda I kom tela gi me cung iwibye. Dano mapol tamo ni luminicta ma kicimo gi ni pe gi cung pi miti gi onyo cobo peko gi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit amamut aiyalama kanejaas atumunak ko Uganda kanuikamunitos engarenonekec loka politikis. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam iminisitan lu eseunitai ebwoikitos ipudesia kec ejok arai bo aitemokin atiokisio kec.

Ba karakara eyi ega kini minisita 'bani ope 'diyi pa tu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma paria kililiru ku dika eyi ma e'yo eyi ma aza ko ku.

eng_prompt: As the seasons change and the year draws to a close, certain patterns begin to emerge. It's fascinating how history tends to repeat itself in predictable ways.
lug_prompt: Ebiseera bwe bikyuka n'omwaka bwe gugenda guggwaako, ebintu ebimu bitandika okulabika. Kyewunyisa engeri ebyafaayo gye biddibwamu mu ngeri etegeerekeka.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kare me poto pa mwaka tye ka lokke ki kare ma mwaka tye ka tum, jami mukene cako time. Tye me yom cwiny tutwal I kom kit ma jami ma otime con nongo tye ka timme ite kare macon.
teo_prompt: Ne ijulakinor apakio nuka ekaru, epote iponesio ice aswam. Erai ibore yenitegelikina epone loipedoria akiro nukolo abongokin koipone kalo ejenuna.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti yini i ojazu azini eli ni i deria, e'yo azi yi e'do efu. Eri ndrizaru geri e'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ni yi 'yezu yi ma ngulupi dika geri 'bani nile ra 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Obwire ku burikuhinduka kandi n'omwaka ku gurikuhika aha muheru, ebintu ebimwe nibitandika kureebeka. Nikishemeza oku ebyafaayo birikubaasa kwegarukamu omu miringo etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the nation's overall progress and development, significant disparities remain in various regions. Many communities continue to struggle with poverty and lack of basic resources.
lug_prompt: Wadde eggwanga lyeyongedde okukulaakulana, waliwo enjawulo mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Ebitundu bingi bikyalwanagana n'obwavu n'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.

teo_prompt: Karaida apolor akwap keda apol, eringa ejaas atiakatiaka kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Inyikokitos itunga luipu ainingosit keda ibakor keda amamus na iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Kari ma zota azini zota ma talasi ti, esele coza amboru 'diyi awi angu ndundu eyi ma alea. Ongulumu karakara eyi mu drile a'di 'dizu alio be azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako be.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka n'entunguuka y'eihanga okutwarira hamwe, obutabanguko bw'amaani bukiriho omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ebyanga bingi nibigyenda omu maisho n'obworo hamwe n'eibura ry'ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In a region where job opportunities are scarce, many families struggle to make ends meet. As a result, they have turned to the local stone quarries as a primary source of income.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu emirimu gye gitono, amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, baddukidde mu birombe by'amayinja eby'omu kitundu ng'ensibuko y'ensimbi enkulu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma tic nok iye, gangi mapol tye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gucako tic ki ka golo kidi macalo yoo me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisit na ikidioko aswamisinei, etiono ikalia luipu aijar. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi olototo aibok amoru kwape epone loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani drileba azi ni 'diyi esuzu were, familia karakara eyi dri ci afa dria esuzu. E'yo 'disi, eyi oja eyi pari oni ogbazu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea geri eyini robia esuzu ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ahu emirimo etari mingi, amaka maingi nigarwana kwebaisaho. N'ekyarugiremu, bahindukire bakaza omu kirombe ky'amabaare nk'oburugo bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After hearing rumors about the unusual happenings in the area, he decided it was time to investigate further. Determined to uncover the truth, he planned a trip to the village.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira olugambo ku bintu ebitali bya bulijjo ebyali bigenda mu maaso mu kitundu, yasalawo nti kye kiseera yeeyongere okunoonyereza. Olw'okuba yali amaliridde okuzuula amazima, yakola enteekateeka okugenda mu kyalo.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok angea I kom jami matye katimme I kabedo enuni, en omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me mede ki kwedo lok. Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me niang lok ada, en oyubbe me cito I caro.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup akiro nuikamunitos iboro lumam etapit aswam kotoma aiboisit kangin, abu ngesi kotema ebe erai apak naka aingic akiro ngun. Apodokinit aingic abeit, abu ngesi itemok alosit ocalo.
lgg_prompt: Erini o'duko erizu e'yo yi 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca e'yo eti ondazu drile. Asi 'baza be e'yo adari esuzu, eri otuta 'ye acizu caloa.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira engambo ezirikukwata aha bintu ebitari bya buriijo ebyabaire nibibaho omukyanga ekyo, akasharamu ngu obwire buhikire kwongyera kucondooza. Ahabw'okwenda kumanya amazima, akatebeekanisa oruramburo rw'okuza omu kyaro.

eng_prompt: As nations strive for progress and economic growth, the balance between development and sustainability becomes increasingly crucial. Prioritizing the health of our ecosystems can lead to long-term benefits for both the environment and society.
lug_prompt: Nga amawanga galwanirira enkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna, enkola y'okukwatagana wakati w'enkulaakulana n'okuyimirizaawo ebintu yeeyongera okuba ey'omugaso. Okukulembeza obulamu bw'obutonde bw'ensi kisobola okuvaamu emiganyulo egy'ekiseera ekiwanvu eri obutonde bw'ensi n'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobe tye ka tute matek me dongo ki dongo lobo, rwate ikin dongo lobo ki dongo lobo tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Keto ber bedo pa cwec ma orumuwa obed gin ma pire tek twero kelo ber pa cwec ma orumuwa ki lwak pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kwape iswamaete akwapin nuka apol keda apol, epol ajokis noi aimorikikina kiding apol keda apol. Aingarenikin nuka angaleu naka isuban wok epedori ayangaun ameda naka apak naepol kanuka akwap keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kari yini dri ciria e'yo angu ezoma ni azini zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia, esele coza angu ezoma ni azini e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ni eca orodriru tu. Angu amavile 'diyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazuri eco fe orodri sa'wa ezu angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi dri tualu ongulumu eyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga ku garikugyezaho kutunguuka n'okutunguuka omu by'entaasya, oburinganiza ahagati y'entunguuka n'okutunguuka nibweyongyera kuba obw'omugasho. Okwebembeza amagara g'obuhangwa bwaitu nikibaasa kureetaho emigasho y'obwire bureingwa ahabw'obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'abantu.

eng_prompt: Local authorities have expressed growing concern over the alarming trend of sexual violence in the region. Community leaders are calling for urgent action to address the increasing number of reported incidents.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera olw'okutulugunyizibwa mu by'okwegatta mu kitundu. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okumalawo omuwendo gw'obumenyi bw'amateeka ogweyongedde.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gunyutu lworo I kom tim me tim gero I kom mon ki coo I but piny eni. Lutela me kabedo gitye ka lego ni myero kitim gin mo oyot-oyot me lweny i kom peko matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet itodutu aiyalongong naepol noi kanu amumu na aelo kotoma aiboisit. Ekotosi engarenok lu atutubet aswamisio nu atipet kanu aitemokin enaaba loka abilibilio naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ngiringiri ali o'bazu ri ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai e'yo eyi 'yezu mbeleru e'yo 'bani olu 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabanguko omu by'okuteerana omu kyanga. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga nibashaba ngu habeho ekyokukora ahonaaho, okureeba ngu omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukora ebihagaro ogweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent allegations and widespread outcry, community leaders have come together to address the urgent need for accountability. They believe that every victim deserves to have their voice heard and their suffering acknowledged.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigambibwa gyebuvuddeko n'okwekalakaasa okwabaddewo, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakwataganye okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'embalirira. Balowooza nti buli atulugunyizibwa agwanidde okuwulira eddoboozi lye n'okubonaabona kwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki adot ma okato cokcok-ki ki koko mapol ma obedo tye, lutela me tedero guribe kacel me cobo miti matek tutwal me nongo kor tic. Gitye ki niyee ni dano weng ma peko otimme i komgi omyero ki winyo dwon gi dok bene ki niang can ma gitye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aitoroneta nupac keda angurian nuipu, apotu engarenok luka atutubet imorikikinos kanu aitemokin eipud loka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ibusakinit nginitunganan yenejaasi keda ationis apupun keda aijen ationis ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi emu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nde 'yezu mbeleru ri ma aza kozu. Yi a'i ra kini le 'ba dria e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi ma o'duko ma eri ra azini le 'ba ma ega e'yo candi eyini esu 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiteekateeko ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwetomboita kw'abantu baingi, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakwatanisa kukora aha nshonga y'okureetaho embaririra. Nibarikwikiriza ngu buri muntu orikuteganisibwa ashemereire kuhurirwa n'okubonabona kwe kumanywa.

eng_prompt: In a bid to improve their performance, the national football federation announced a major change in leadership. Fans and analysts alike are eager to see how the new head coach will impact the team's strategy and morale.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gwabwe, akakiiko akaddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu ggwanga kalangiridde enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu bukulembeze. Abawagizi n'abekenneenyi bonna beesunga okulaba engeri omutendesi omuggya gy'anaakwatamu enteekateeka ya ttiimu n'empisa.
ach_prompt: I yub me medo rwom me ticgi, dul ma doro tuku odilo I lobo Uganda owaco ni myero kilok tela gi. Lucwak tuku kacel ki lutim kwed gitye ki miti madit me neno kit ma lapwony odilo manyen obiloko kwede yoo me tic ki cwiny pa lutuku.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae kec, abu erionget loka abolia naka emopira kolimo aijulanakineta nuapolok kotoma eingarenone. Ekapakina egangitok keda angicak aanyun epone loepedoriata etuutooron loitetet aitodolikin ainapeta keda iponesio luka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Otita azi eyini ecozu eyi ma agata otuzu, amuti mupira tuza ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi azi ojata okporu eyi ma driceza ma alea ni. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi pie avasi ndrezu 'ba imbapi avita ni o'diru ri ni nga amuti avita ni 'diyi ojazu geri kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'okutunguura emikorere yaabo, ekibiina ky'omupiira gw'ebigyere eky'eihanga kikarangirira empindahinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi. Abahagizi hamwe n'abacencuzi beine ekihika ky'okureeba oku omutendeki omusya arahindure enkora ya tiimu hamwe n'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the region for months, as local residents expressed their frustration over government land policies. Many feared that their homes and livelihoods were at risk due to the Minister's aggressive land acquisition efforts.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala emyezi, ng'abatuuze b'omu kitundu balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'enkola ya gavumenti ku ttaka. Bangi baatya nti amaka gaabwe n'eby'okweyimirizaawo byali mu matigga olw'okufuba kwa minisita okw'amaanyi mu kugula ettaka.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but piny eni pi dwe mapol, lutedero onyuto cwer cwiny gi I kom cik me ngom pa gamente. Dano mapol gubedo ki lworo ni gangi gi kacel ki kwo gi tye kama rac pi yub pa minista me nongo ngom.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun ilapio, itunga luka atutubet itodunitos amamut aiyalama kec kanuka ainapeta nuka alupok nuka apugan. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe ejai oreria kec keda aijarakec ationis naarai ekot eminista adumun alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu angu 'da ma alea mba karakara, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku e'yo azita gamete ni e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyisi. Ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi kini aku eyivile 'diyi azini geri eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alea e'yo minisita ni e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yezu nyaku eyi jezu risi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga kumara ameezi, abatuuragye booreka okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabw'ebiragiro bya gavumenti ebirikukwata ahaitaka. Baingi bakaba nibatiina ngu amaka gaabo n'emituurire yaabo bikaba biri omu kabi ahabw'amaani ga minisita g'okutunga eitaka.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a surge in land disputes in Northern Uganda, prompting local communities to voice their concerns. As tensions escalated, women took the lead in organizing protests to defend their rights and protect their ancestral lands.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera mu nkaayana z'ettaka mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda, ekireetedde abantu b'omu kitundu okwogera ebibaluma. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, abakyala be baakubiriza mu kutegeka okwekalakaasa okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe n'okukuuma ettaka lya bajjajjaabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, tele me ngom omede tutwal I kumalo me Uganda, ma oweko lwak me tedero gucwalo koko gi bot lwak. I kare ma telle omedde, mon otelo wii yub me jemo me gwoko twero gi ki ngom pa kwaro gi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta luka alupok ko Nyakoi nako Uganda, ido abu ijaik itunga alimor aiyalongongokec. Neyatakinor atiokisio, apotu angor kisingarenata aitemonokin aidiya kanu aigang apedorosiokec ka aidar alupok nuka lukapapaakec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ngiringiri nyaku ma dria kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra, erini fezu 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi oluzu. Erita ako ni tuzu uru, oku eyi 'du driceza e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi otuzu a'di 'dizu drilemgbo eyivile 'diyi ma dria azini angu eyi ma a'bi eyivile 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, hakabaho okweyongyera kw'entongane z'eitaka omu matemba ga Uganda, ekirikureetera abantu b'omubyaro kugamba ebirikubateganisa. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, abakazi bakebembera omu kutebekanisa obwesharingo kurwanirira obugabe bwabo n'okurinda eitaka ryabaishenkurubo.

eng_prompt: During their visit to Uganda, the team of journalists sought to uncover the local stories that often go untold. They arrived in Gulu, eager to document the experiences of the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kukyala kwabwe mu Uganda, ttiimu y'abannamawulire yagezaako okuzuula emboozi z'omu kitundu ezitera obutawulirwa. Baatuuka e Gulu nga baagala nnyo okuwandiika ku bye bayitamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me limgi I lobo Uganda, lucoo lok angea guyenyo yoo me coyo lok angeya me tedero ma pol kare pe kitito. Gu oo I Gulu ki miti me coyo jami ma otimme I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aipejonokec Uganda, abu etimu loka arotak iyemuto kotam aikamun akiro nuka atutubet na mam etapit alimun. Apotu kesi kodolokisi Gulu, ekotosi aiwadika akiro nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sawa yini muzu omuru kari Uganda niri ma alea risi, amuti 'ba osisia ni 'diyi o'bi o'duko angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ofu e'yo 'bani nze ku 'diyi ma dria. Eyi eca Gulu'a ava be e'yo eyini esu ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi osizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutaayaaya kwabo omu Uganda, tiimu y'abanyamakuru ekagyezaho kushohoza ebirikukwata aha byaro ebitarikukira kugambwa. Bakahika omuri Gulu, baine ekihika ky'okuhandiika ebyabaireho omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After a tense night of counting ballots, citizens eagerly awaited the results. As the clock struck midnight, anticipation filled the air across the nation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiro eky'obunkenke eky'okubala obululu, bannansi balindirira n'obwagazi ebyava mu kulonda. Essaawa bwe yakubye ssaawa mukaaga ez'ekiro, abantu mu ggwanga lyonna baali beesunga nnyo.
ach_prompt: I ngee kwano kwi I dyewor ma obedo tek tutwal, anywali me Uganda obedo kakuru adwogi yer. Ikare ma cawa ogoyo cawa abicel me dyewor, dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akware naepol noi naka aimar abootin, apotu itunga idaritoto akiro nuelomunete. Neautar esawa ainom kiding kware, apotu itunga luka akwap kere kopuputu aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'bani voti lazu asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, kari anzi eyi te agata eyi avasi. Sawa ni cazu sawa azia inisi, asi 'baza ga kari 'di ma alea dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurahura akaruuru nyekiro, abatuuragye bakategyereza ebyarugire omu karuuru. Eshaaha ku yaahikire shaaha mukaaga z'ekiro, abantu omu ihanga ryona bakaba nibateekateeka.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set over the bustling city, the anticipation in the air was palpable. The venue was abuzz with supporters and media, eagerly awaiting the arrival of the candidates.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa ku kibuga ekyali kijjudde abantu, waaliwo okweraliikirira kungi mu bbanga. Ekifo kyabadde kijjudde abawagizi n'abamawulire nga beesunga okutuuka kw'abeesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto i kom boma madit ma dano dwong iye tutwal, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Kabedo ne opong ki lucwak ki lucoo lok angea ma gitye ka kuro oo pa lucungu.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror kotoma oibuga loepol noi, aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma okwam. Apotu egangitok keda arotak iyemuto kilelebunos aiboisit aidar adolun naka abwoak.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria e'dezu aku ambu cityniri ma dria, asi 'baza angu ma alia ri e'da i. Pari nderi ga tre 'ba atita fe'baa azini 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi pie, eyi te 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma emuta avasi.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga aha rurembo orwabaire rurimu abantu baingi, okushemererwa kukarebeka omu mwanya. Omwanya gukaba gujwire abahagizi n'abanyamakuru, barinzire okuhika kw'abeesimbireho.

eng_prompt: In a show of solidarity and support for the administration, key officials gathered for the annual conference. Among them, the deputy elect to the president made a notable appearance.
lug_prompt: Mu kulaga obumu n'obuwagizi eri obukulembeze, abakungu abakulu baakuŋŋaanidde mu lukungaana olutegekebwa buli mwaka. Mu bo, omumyuka wa pulezidenti omulonde yeeyoleka mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa.
ach_prompt: I nyutu ribe ki cwak pi tela, lutic mapigi tego gugure pi kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. I kingi, lalub kor ladit lobo ma kiyero oywek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun aimorikikina keda agangat nejai eyaitene, apotu eswamak luapolok kotukokinos kanu atukonokin naka ekaru. Kokidingikec, abu atupiton lokapolon akwap loeseunitai kitodiar noi.
lgg_prompt: E'dazu ti ecita azini atita e'yo driceza ni 'diyi dri, azi'ba okporu 'diyi tra yi okuza eli vusi ri ma alia. Yi ma eselea, 'ba 'bani pele purezidenti ma endru ru ri e'da 'ba dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kworeka okukwatanisa n'obuhwezi ahabwebembezi, abakuru baketeeranira omu ruteerane rw'omwaka. Omuri bo, omuhwezi wa purezidenti otoorainwe akareebeka munonga.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a surge in violence and unrest across the nation. Citizens are expressing their concerns about safety and security, prompting an urgent investigation into the underlying causes.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti ebikolwa eby'obukambwe n'obutabanguko byeyongedde mu ggwanga lyonna. Bannansi balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bikwata ku bukuumi n'obutebenkevu, ekireetera okunoonyereza okw'amangu ku bivaako.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma okato cokcok-ki onyuto ni tim gero ki kuku kuku tye ka mede I lobo man. Anywali tye ka nyutu lworo gi i kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo, ma oweko timo kwed oyot tutwal I kom ngo ma okelo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu ebe iyata amumu keda amumu kotoma akwapuwok kere. Eutasi itunga aitodun aiyalongongokec kanu ayuara keda ayuwara, ido isinyikokit aingic atipet nu eyangaunitos ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo kari 'di ma alea ndulu ra. Kari anzi eyi asi otiza eyi e'da ageitema eyini ri ma dria, e'yo 'di fe 'bani e'yo nde ma eti ondazu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kubaho, nizooreka okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko omu ihanga ryona. Abatuuragye nibooreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahaby'okwerinda, ekirikureetaho okucondooza ahonaaho ahabirikubireeta.

eng_prompt: In a highly competitive election, tensions were running high among the electorate as they awaited the final outcome. Recognizing the growing unease, the electoral commission decided to take proactive measures to keep the public informed.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okwabaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi, obunkenke bwali bungi mu balonzi nga bwe balindirira ebyava mu kulonda okusembayo. Nga balaba obutali butebenkevu obweyongera, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaasazeewo okubaako kye kakolawo okutegeeza abantu.
ach_prompt: I yer ma obedo ki pyem matek tutwal, telle obedo tye ikin lubol kwir ma gubedo kakuru adwogi yer ne. I nge niang peko matye ni, dul madoro yer omoko tamgi me timo gin mo me niango lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo naejaasi keda abolobol naepol noi, ajai ingungeta noi kanejaas itunga lueseunete. Kanu ajenun amumu na iyata, abu erionget lo aseo kitutub nu ebeit aswam kanu aitijenikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa a'bala be okporu ni ma alia, asi otiza ri ri 'ye uru 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea yini e'yo asizuri te ria. E'yo ewaru ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepi ri 'du e'yo 'du e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu o'bi eyini o'dukoti fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru omubarikuteera akaruuru barikutegyereza ebyarugire omu karuuru. Ekitongore ky'eby'oburuuru kukireeba obutabanguko obweyongyeire, kikasharamu kukora kyona ekirikubaasika kumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: In a recent community meeting, local leaders expressed their concerns about the proposed land amendment bill. Following this discussion, the church issued a statement regarding their stance on the issue.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bbago ly'etteeka ly'ettaka erirongooseddwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, ekkanisa yafulumya ekiwandiiko ku nsonga eyo.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom lok ma kimito kelo me loko cik me ngom. Ingee nywako lok man, kanica okati ki lok I kom tam gi I kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos ekisil loka alupok. Akaulo naka aitemitem akiro ngun, abu ekanisa kitolomu akirokec nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini ebipi o'diru ri ma alea, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo azita e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ojazu ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza 'diri ma vutia, kanisa ofu e'yo yini pa sozu e'yo nde ma dria ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'abantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'ebiteiso by'okutereeza eiteeka ry'eitaka. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura, ekanisa ekashohoza ekihandiiko ekirikukwata aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Community leaders and activists gathered to discuss the implications of the new legislation. Concerns about its potential impact on local rights and freedoms prompted a call to action.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ekitundu n'abalwanirizi b'eddembe baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwata ku mateeka amapya. Obweraliikirivu ku ngeri gye buyinza okukosaamu eddembe n'eddembe ly'abantu mu kitundu kyaleetawo omulanga gw'okukola.
ach_prompt: Lutela me kabedo kacel ki lulweny I kom gamente gugure me nywako tam I kom adwoki pa cik manyen ne. Lworo I kom adwoki ne I kom twero ki bedo agonya pa lutedero okelo lwongo me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok keda egangitok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos ikisila luitetiak. Akiro nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata ngun aitolitol apedorosio keda ailajara naka itunga abu koyangau aiwororio.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tualu 'ba a'di 'dipi ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie eyi tra agbatara gbazu e'yo azita o'diru 'da ni 'diyi ma dria. Asi otiza e'yo erini eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria drilemgbo azini driwala angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri fe 'ba eyi ai e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'ebyaro hamwe n'abarikurwanirira obugabe bw'abantu, baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bikwatiraine n'ebiragiro ebisya. Okwerarikirira oku kirikubaasa kukora aha bugabe n'obugabe bw'abantu kikareetaho okwetwa kukora.

eng_prompt: Local officials have approved the plans for a state-of-the-art correctional institution. As a result, construction of the new big prison facility is underway.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyalo bakkirizza enteekateeka z'ekkomera ery'omulembe. N'ekyavaamu, okuzimba ekkomera eppya eddene kugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guyee yub me yubu ot buc manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, gedo me gang buc manyen madit tye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka atutubet itigogongoto aitemonokineta nuka aduketait naitetet naka isibei. Kanuka ngun, elosi aduko naka ejera loitetet loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai otita arujo o'diru ni 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, arujo ambu o'diru 'da ma sita ni mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu byaro, baikiriize enteekateeka y'okwombeka ekihome ky'omurembe. N'ekyarugiremu, okwombeka ekihome ekisya ekikuru kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Due to recent changes in sentencing laws, the state has seen a significant increase in the inmate population. As a result, the prison facility will need to expand its capacity to accommodate those serving long sentences.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko mu mateeka agakwata ku bibonerezo, omuwendo gw'abasibe mu ggwanga gweyongedde nnyo. N'ekyavaamu, ekkomera lijja kwetaaga okugaziya obusobozi bwalyo okusobola okusuza abo abali mu bibonerezo ebiwanvu.
ach_prompt: Pi aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I cik me ngolo kop, wel lumabuc omede tutwal I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, mabuc omyero omed kero gi me gwoko lumabuc matye I buc pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aijulanakineta nuka ikisila luka atubokinio, eyatakinos iwenan luipu noi kotoma akwap. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aiyatakin aiboisit naka awenis kanu aiperikin ngul luejaasi toma apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru azita e'yo liza ma dria 'diyisi, kari nderi ndre 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra. E'yo 'disi, arujo 'da ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'empindahinduka ezabaireho omu biragiro ebirikukwata aha bibonerezo, omubare gw'abasibe omu eihanga gweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu,ekihome nikiija kwetenga kwongyerwamu amaani, okubaasa kutwariramu abo abarikumara emyaka mingi omu bihome.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the market has been flooded with counterfeit goods, undermining the integrity of legitimate brands. As a result, various organizations and companies have banded together to combat this growing issue.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, akatale kajjudde ebyamaguzi ebijingirire, ekityoboola obwesimbu bw'ebyamaguzi ebituufu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole n'ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikwataganye okulwanyisa ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, cuk opong ki jami acata ma pe obedo ada. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat kacel ki dul mapat-pat guribbe kacel me lweny i kom peko man matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, elelebunos isokonin keda iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luipu keda ikampunin imorikikinos nepepe kanu aitikitik ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, cu 'di ma alea afa edeza enzoru 'diyi ga tre, e'yo 'bani afa edeza wura kililiru 'diyi ma e'yo onzi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi tualu amuti karakara eyi pie ti eci eyi a'di 'dizu e'yo 'di be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, akatare keijwire ebintu ebitahikire, ekirikutuma ebintu ebitahikire bitabaho. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bingi n'ebitongore bikwatanisize kurwanisa oburemeezi obu obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Despite increased regulations and consumer awareness, the issue of counterfeit goods remains a significant challenge. Many brands continue to struggle with the prevalence of imitation items that undermine their reputation and sales.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'amateeka geeyongedde n'okumanyisa abaguzi, ensonga y'ebintu ebijingirire ekyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi. Amakolero mangi gakyagenda mu maaso n'okulwanagana n'obungi bw'ebintu ebijingirire ebityoboola erinnya lyago n'okutunda kwago.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik tye ka medde ki rweyo lwak i kom jami acata ma pe obedo ada, lok me jami acata ma pe obedo ada pud tye peko madit tutwal. Dul mapat-pat mapol pud tye ka lweny ki jami mapat-pat ma pe obedo ada ma balo nyinggi ki catgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyatakina ikisila keda aisisianakino naka agwelak, eringa ationis na iboro luarokok erai naepol noi. Inyikokinitos iponesio luka iboro luipu ainingosit keda iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit luepedorete amunar ekirorikec keda agwelanarikec.
lgg_prompt: Azita ma omgbo tuzu azini imbata 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria ri ma talasi, e'yo afa edeza enzoru 'diyi niri nga po'di e'yo azi okporu ni i. Afa edele wura ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi nga po'di dri ci e'yo afa edele wura ndundu eyivile 'diyi ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu azini afa oziza ma omgbo esizu ri be.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing demand for skilled legal professionals, he initiated a new training initiative. His vision was to enhance the quality of legal education and ensure that graduates were well-prepared for the challenges of the profession.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent youth unemployment statistics and rising mental health concerns, community leaders are urging immediate action. As a result, the lawmakers have been asked to prioritize matters of the youth.

lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'okwenyigira kw'abavubuka mu kukola ebiseera by'omu maaso. N'ekyavaamu, abategesi baakuŋŋaanya abakugu n'abakulembeze okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbulaamu obukulembeze n'obuyiiya mu bavubuka.

eng_prompt: As the election results are contested, many are left wondering about the timeline for resolving disputes. Understanding the judicial process is crucial for those affected by the outcome.

eng_prompt: In many democratic countries, the electoral process is governed by specific laws and regulations. Understanding the various legal disputes that can arise during this process is crucial for ensuring fair elections.
