ach_prompt: I lobe mapol matye ki loc alwak, yub me bolo kwir tye ki cik mapat-pat. Niang lok mapat-pat makwako cik ma twero aa I kare me yub man pire tek tutwal pi neno ni yer obedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu nuejaasi keda aseo, ejaasi ainapeta nuka aseo keda ikisila luitegelikina. Amisiikin ingungeta luegelegela luka ikisila lu epedorete alomun kapak kana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aseo.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara democratic ru 'diyi ma alia, e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria azita azini azita ndu ndu yi ci. E'yo esele coza e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo opetaa ni kililiru ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi againe oburingaaniza, enkora y'okuteera akaruuru neebemberwa ebiragiro ebitarikushushana. Okwetegyereza entongane z'ebiragiro ezitarikushushana ezirikubaasa kubaho omu bwire bw'okuteera akaruuru, n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu akaruuru kabaho omu buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the recent parliamentary elections, numerous reports of irregularities and discrepancies have emerged. As a result, public trust in the electoral process has significantly diminished.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okulonda kwa paalamenti okwakaggwa, alipoota nnyingi ez'obutali bwenkanya n'obutakwatagana zifulumye. N'ekivuddemu, obwesige bw'abantu mu nkola y'okulonda bukendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I ngee yer pa luwang lwak I ot moko cik ma okato cokcok-ki, adwoki me kwed mapol I kom tim maraco ki apoka-poka obedo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, gen pa lwak I kom yub me yer odok piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aseo naka airabet napac, apotu iripotan luipu luka abilibilio naka ikisila keda abilibilio naka ikisila kolomutu. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto amunokina naka itunga toma ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Opeta koloseni ni 'diyi ma vutia, o'duko e'yo onzi azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi efu karakara. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi ma asi'baza e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'akaruuru k'abajwekyerwa omu ishengyero akahweireho, hariho ripoota nyingi ezirikworeka oburemeezi n'obutaikirizana. N'ekyarugiremu, obwesigye bw'abantu omu by'oburuuru bukyendeire munonga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the rapid expansion of urban areas and the increasing demand for agricultural land have sparked discussions among policymakers. As a result, stakeholders have recognized the need for a comprehensive legal framework to address land use and ownership issues.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okugaziwa kw'ebibuga okw'amangu n'obwetaavu bw'ettaka ly'obulimi obweyongera bireeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bakozi b'amateeka. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'okussaawo enkola y'amateeka okutwalira awamu okusobola okukola ku nsonga z'enkozesa y'ettaka n'obwannannyini.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dongo pa boma madongo ki dongo pa miti me ngom me pur okelo nywako lok ikin lutela. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma timo tic mapat-pat guniang ni omyero ki ket cik mapol me tyeko lok me tic ki ngom ki twero pa wegge ngom.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol naka aiboisio nuka itaunin keda eipuda lo alupok nu akoru eyangaunit epeget kanejaas itunga luitolomete ikisila. Kanuka ngun, ejenete itunga ebe ibusakinit aitolomun ikisila luitegelikina kanu aitemokin ationis naka alupok keda ikulepek alupok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu tawuni eyini tupi mbeleru 'diyi tualu e'yo 'bani lezu angu amvu 'yazu 'diyi ma dria ri eji e'yo nzeza 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma si azita eyi e'yo nyaku ayuza ni azini e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okujanjaara kw'endembo hamwe n'okwetenga kw'eitaka ry'obuhingi n'oburiisa kweyongyeire, kireesireho okuhanuura ahagati y'abakozi b'ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, abu kirikukwataho bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okutandikaho ebiragiro by'okukora aha nshonga z'okukoresa eitaka hamwe n'obwannannyini.

eng_prompt: As urban development accelerates and populations grow, disputes over property boundaries and land use have become increasingly common. Many communities are struggling to navigate the complexities of land ownership and zoning regulations.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeeyongera n'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera, enkaayana ku nsalo z'ebyobugagga n'okukozesa ettaka zeeyongedde. Ebitundu bingi birwana nnyo okutambulira mu buzibu bw'obwannannyini ku ttaka n'amateeka agakwata ku kugabanya ettaka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo me boma tye ka mede ki wel dano bene tye ka mede, telle I kom wang ngom ki tic ki ngom bene tye ka mede tutwal. Kabedo mapol tye ka tute matek me niang kit me tic ki cik mapat-pat makwako twero pa ngom.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakin apol naka itaunin keda apol naka enaaba loka itunga, eyatakinos ingungeta kanu ikoruo luka alupok keda aitwasam alupok. Eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit aitodolikin nuka alupok keda ainapeta nuikamunitos alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu, ngiringiri e'yo boda eyi ma dria azini nyaku ayuza ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci e'yo kongolokoru e'yo nyaku ma e'ipi ni azini azita angu awazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'endembo ku erikweyongyera n'omuhendo gw'abantu kweyongyera, entongane aha nsharo z'eby'obugaiga hamwe n'okukozesa eitaka kweyongyeire. Ebyanga bingi nibirwana kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'obwannannyini bw'eitaka hamwe n'ebiragiro by'okugabira abantu eitaka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the influence of ethnic identity has become increasingly prominent in Kenyan society. Many communities continue to prioritize their tribal affiliations over national unity.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obusosoze mu mawanga bweyongedde mu bantu b'e Kenya. Ebitundu bingi bikyagenda mu maaso n'okukulembeza ebika byabwe okusinga obumu bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me kaka tye ka dongo tutwal I kabedo me kwo pa dano me lobo Kenya. Kabedo mapol tye ka mede ki keto dit pa kaka gi maloyo ribe me lobo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi atiakatiaka naka atiakatiaka naka atekerin koKenya. Inyikokinitos itunga luipu aisingarenit atekerin kec adepar aimorikikina naka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suru suru ni 'diyi ma okpo eca e'yo okporu ni ru o'bi Kenya ni 'diyi ma eselea. Ongulumu karakara eyi mu drile e'yo eyini aa'zu suru eyi ma eselea 'diyi 'du okporu aga ti ecita kari eyi ma eselea ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, okushoroora omu nganda kweyongyeire omu bantu ba Kenya. Ebyanga bingi nibigyenda omu maisho n'okwebembeza enganda zaabo kukira okukwatanisa kw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the country as political rivalries intensified. As the election date approached, fears of unrest grew among the population.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu ggwanga ng'okuvuganya mu byobufuzi kweyongera. Olunaku lw'okulonda bwe lwasembera, okutya kw'obutabanguko kweyongera mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I lobo man I kare ma pyem me cung iwibye omedde. I kare ma nino me yer tye cok, lworo me lweny omedde ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma akwapuwok naarai apolor abolobol naka epolitikis. Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, apolor akuriau naka amumu kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu kari ma alia a'disiku baka seza politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu uru. O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri si, ori ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu o'bi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bweyongyeire omu ihanga, ahabw'obutaikirizana omu by'obutegyeki kweyongyera. Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ryahikire haihi, okwerarikirira kw'obutabanguko kweyongyera omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Concerns over escalating unrest have prompted researchers to investigate the underlying causes of the turmoil. As a result, an in-depth study on recent violence in the country is being carried out.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira olw'obutabanguko obweyongera kuleetedde abanoonyereza okunoonyereza ku biviiriddeko obutabanguko. N'ekyavaamu, okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku butabanguko obubaddewo mu ggwanga kukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo pi lweny matye kamede oweko lukwed gukwedo ngo ma okelo lweny enoni. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye katimo kwed matut I kom tim gero ma otime I lobo kany.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalongongo kanu aiyatakin naka amumu isinyikokisi angicak aingic iboro lu eyangaunitos amumu. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolot aingic naepol noi naikamunit amumu napac kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma dria ri fe 'ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi ma vuti onda e'yo e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo eti onda e'yo ngiringiri ni kari ma alia o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, kireesire abakyondoozi kucondooza aha nshonga z'obutabanguko. N'ekyarugiremu, okucondooza aha butabanguko obwabaireho omu ihanga, kuriyo nikukorwa.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous outreach efforts and community meetings, there has been a noticeable lack of engagement from residents. This disconnect has led to growing frustrations on both sides regarding local governance.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo kaweefube w'okubunyisa amawulire n'enkiiko z'ekitundu, wabaddewo obutakwatagana okuva mu batuuze. Enjawukana eno ereeseewo obwennyamivu obweyongera ku njuyi zombi ku bikwata ku bukulembeze bw'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub tye mapol me rweyo lwak kacel ki kacoke mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat, lutedero pe gubedo ki miti. Apoka-poka man okelo cwer cwiny I tenge aryo weng I kom tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aswamisio nuka aitodolikin itunga keda airiamununeta nuka itunga, mam itunga luka atutubet iswamaete ejok. Amamus na arucokina ayangau aiyalongong kotoma aiboisio kere nuikamunitos epugae loka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'dukoti edrizu ongmbo angiri si azini mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea ra ti, e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma ako e'dapi ra. E'yo erita ako ni 'diri fe e'yo candi ni tuzu kala iri 'diyi ma eselea e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani maingi g'okuhutuura abantu hamwe n'enkiiko z'abantu b'omubyaro, abatuuragye tibarakozire kyona ekirikwetengwa. Obutakwatanisa obu, buretsireho okwetomboita aha mbaju zombi ahaby'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: Recent threats and violent incidents targeting local officials have escalated, prompting urgent discussions among the city council. As tensions rise in the community, the safety of those in leadership positions has come into serious question.
lug_prompt: Okutiisatiisa n'ebikolwa eby'obukambwe ebibadde bikolebwa abakungu b'ebyalo gye buvuddeko byeyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amangu mu lukiiko lw'ekibuga. Ng'obunkenke bweyongera mu kitundu, obukuumi bw'abo abali mu bifo by'obukulembeze buzze mu kubuusabuusa okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma okato cokcok-ki, bura ki tim gero i kom lutic me tedero omede tutwal, ma oweko dul me city council gubedo ka lok i kom lok eni oyot-oyot tutwal. Kit ma telle tye kamede I kin lwak, ber bedo pa joo matye I tela dong oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu aitukurianeta keda amumu kama ejaasi eswamak luka atutubet kiyatakinos, ido abu koyangau aineranara kiding ekansulo loka eibuga. Kwape iyata aiyalongong kotoma atutubet, abu ayuwara naka ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuka eingarenone kopotu aomisio nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Ori gbaza o'diru azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi azi'ba aku eselesi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra, e'yo 'di fe e'yo nzezu okposi kanisulu aku ambu city niri ma eselea. Erita ako ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma tambaza eca e'yo eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okutiinatiinisa hamwe n'obutabanguko oburikugyenderera abakuru b'ebyaro kweyongyeire, ekirikureetaho okuhanuura okw'amaani omu kakiiko k'orurembo. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera omu bantu, oburinzi bw'abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi, butandikire kubuzibwabuzibwa.

eng_prompt: Activists gathered outside the state capitol, rallying support for their cause. Despite the government's attempts to impose restrictions, the community remains determined to challenge the proposed legislation.
lug_prompt: Abalwanirizi b'eddembe ly'obuntu baakuŋŋaanidde wabweru w'ekibuga ekikulu eky'eggwanga okukungaanya obuwagizi ku lw'ensonga yaabwe. Wadde nga gavumenti egezaako okuteekawo obukwakkulizo, abantu basigala bamalirivu okuwakanya etteeka eriteeseddwa.
ach_prompt: Lulweny I kom gamente gugure I nget gang tic madit pa gamente me cuku cwiny dano me cwako tic gi. Kadi bed ni gamente tye ka yele me keto kigeng, lwak pud tye ki miti me kwero cik ma kimito kelo.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka apugan kotukokinos kinga naka aiboisit naeyait ainapeta nuka apugan, aituk agangat kanuka akeswam. Karaida etamit apugan aitikitik ainapeta, ekapakina itunga aitepeg ekisil ngol.
lgg_prompt: Ba a'di 'dipi e'yo politiki ni si 'diyi tra eyi aku ambu kari niri ma alea ri ma alea amve atita trazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Gamete ni tro o'bizu e'yo azita ni 'diyi 'bazu ra ti, ongulumu eyi nga po'di asi 'ba e'yo 'bani lezu azita 'da ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abarwanirizi b'obutegyeki baketeeranira aheeru y'orurembo rwa Capitol, barikuronda obushagiki ahabw'eshonga zaabo. Oihireho okuteeraho kwa gavumenti kutaho ebiragiro, abantu bagumiizemu kuhakanisa ebiteiso by'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Amid growing allegations of corruption and abuse of power, the government has faced increasing pressure from the public for accountability. In a surprising turn of events, law enforcement has intensified its crackdown on high-profile figures.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bigambibwa okweyongera eby'obuli bw'enguzi n'okukozesa obubi obuyinza, gavumenti efunye akazito okuva mu bantu okuwa embalirira. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, abakuumaddembe beeyongedde okufufuggaza abantu ab'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma byek me camcana ki nywaro tic ki twero tye kamede, gamente tye ka nongo lyeto madit tutwal ki bot lwak me miyo kor tic gi. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, dul ma gwoko cik omedo kero gi me lweny i kom dano ma oywek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitoroneta nuka amidicio naka apiyai keda aitolitol apedorosio, etereikina apugan keda agogong naka itunga kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Koipone kalo itegelikina, apotu ipolisin kitogogongoto aswamukec mama ejaasi itunga luejenara noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo ni azini opi nyaza ma ayuta geri onzi si 'diyi ma talasi, gamete isu okpo engazu o'bi yi vu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma okpo 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'ebiteekateeko by'obushomankuzi n'okukozesa kubi obushoborozi, gavumenti etungire oburemeezi kuruga omu bantu. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, ab'eby'obutegyeki bongyeire amaani omu kucondooza abantu b'amaani.

eng_prompt: As the global focus on environmental responsibility intensifies, entrepreneurs are increasingly aware of the importance of sustainable practices. However, navigating the complexities of eco-friendly operations can be daunting for startups.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi yonna yeeyongera okussa essira ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'obutonde bw'ensi, abasuubuzi beeyongera okumanya obukulu bw'enkola eziwangaala. Newankubadde, okutambuza emirimu emizibu egy'obutonde bw'ensi kiyinza okuba ekizibu eri ebitandisi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom cwec ma orumuwa, lutim biacara bene dong gitye ka niang ber pa yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Kadi bed kumeno, tic matek tutwal me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa twero bedo tek tutwal ki joo matye ka cako ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape epodokinito akwap kere nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap, ejenete itunga lu agwelanar ajokis naka aswam iboro lu iswamaete ejok. Konye, aitodolikin aswamisinei nuepedorete aitwasam ejok ejautene lo akwap erai na etiono noi kama ejaasi itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni asi 'bazu e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma dria ri ni tu uru, 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ni e'yo orodri 'yeta angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. Kani si, e'yo ewaru e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eco adri ewaru 'ba e'dopi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ensi yoona aha bujunaanizibwa bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi neyeyongyera, abashubuzi beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okukoresa emiringo y'obuhangwa. Kwonka, okukora emirimo erikuhwera eby'obuhangwa, nikibaasa kuba ekizibu aha batandikireho.

eng_prompt: In Kenya, the democratic process relies heavily on a structured electoral system. To ensure fairness and transparency, a designated body oversees the organization and management of elections.
lug_prompt: Mu Kenya, enkola ya demokulasiya yeesigamye nnyo ku nkola y'okulonda entegeke. Okukakasa obwenkanya n'obwerufu, akakiiko akalondeddwa kalondoola enteekateeka n'enzirukanya y'okulonda.
ach_prompt: I lobo Kenya, tela pa lwak jenge tutwalle I kom yub me bolo kwir ma kiyubu maber. Me neno ni lok weng tye atir, dul ma kicimo en aye doro yub ki doro yer.
teo_prompt: Ko Kenya, ejai aseo naepol noi kotupitete ainapeta nuka aseo. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ka ecai, ejaasi atukot naeyait ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Kari Kenya niri ma alea, geri o'bi eyini ecozu opeta eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Lezu kililiru azini e'yo ada be ri nezu, amuti azi 'bani ope ni e'yo otuza ni azini e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma driceza ma pamvu one ni.
nyn_prompt: Omuri Kenya, enkora ya demokurasiya neyesigama munonga aha nkora y'eby'oburuuru. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza, ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa nikireeberera entebekanisa n'obwebembezi bw'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the tension in the room grew palpable, he felt a mix of anxiety and anticipation. With everyone around him eagerly awaiting the outcome, he knew that his reaction could sway the mood significantly.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kisenge, yawulira obunkenke bw'okweraliikirira n'okusuubira. Olw'okuba abantu bonna abaali bamwetoolodde baali balindirira ebyavaamu, yali akimanyi nti engeri gye yali yeeyisaamu yali esobola okukyusa embeera y'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde I ot ne, en obedo ki lworo madit tutwal. Kit ma dano weng ma orumu tye kakuru adwogi ne, en onongo ngeyo ni tim mege twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I cwiny dano.
teo_prompt: Neapolor aiyalongong kotoma agola, abu ngesi kopup aiyalongong keda aiyalongong. Keda itunga kere luiboiete keda ngesi idaritete akiro nuelomunete, ajeni ngesi ebe epedori epone loiswamai ngesi aijulakin iponesio luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako jo ale aliza ma alia ri ni tu uru, eri etumu asi otiza azini asi 'baza be. Ba dria eri ma ageia 'diyi ni e'yo asizu ri tezu avasi, eri nii ra kini e'yo erini 'ye ri eco o'bi yi ma e'yo oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu kishengye, yahurira okwerarikirira hamwe n'okushemererwa. Ahabw'okugira ngu boona abaabaire bamwetooroire bakaba bategyereize ebireije kuruga omu bigyezo, akakimanya ngu oku yaabaire naakora kikaba nikibaasa kuhindura emiteekateekyere yaabo.

eng_prompt: Authorities have launched an investigation into the financial activities of a prominent businessman. As a result, he is being accused of defrauding Bank of Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza batandise okunoonyereza ku mirimu gy'ebyensimbi egy'omusuubuzi omututumufu. N'ekyavaamu, avunaanibwa ogw'okubba bbanka enkulu eya Uganda.
ach_prompt: Lutela gucako kwed I kom tic me lim pa latim biyacara mo ma oywek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye kakok I kome pi kwalo Bank of Uganda.
teo_prompt: Ageutu apedorosio aingic aswamisinei nuka ikapun luka etunganan loejenara noi loka ebiasara. Kanuka ngun, itoroniaritai ngesi kanu akoko aingadis naka ikapun nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza 'ye 'yeta robia ni 'ba tujari 'yepi okporu ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba to eri e'yo ero robia ta mbazu omvele Bank of Uganda ri onyazu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza aha mirimo y'esente y'omushuubuzi orikumanywa. N'ekyarugiremu, najunanwa okwiba Bank of Uganda.

eng_prompt: As organizations seek more effective ways to address disputes, various strategies are being evaluated. One approach gaining attention is the use of mediation to facilitate dialogue between conflicting parties.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebitongole byenoonya engeri ennungi ey'okugonjoolamu enkaayana, obukodyo obw'enjawulo buli mu kwekenneenyezebwa. Enkola emu efuna okufaayo kwe kukozesa okutabaganya okwanguyiza enteeseganya wakati w'abantu abakontana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma dul mapat-pat tye ka yenyo yoo maber me tyeko telle mapat-pat, yoo mapat-pat tye kawot anyim. Yoo acel ma tye ka nongo miti en aye tic ki diro me laro lok ikin dul mapat-pat matye ka lweny.

eng_prompt: During the discussions about resolving the conflict, the parties were encouraged to consider mediation as a viable option. However, the accused person expressed strong reservations about participating in the process.

ach_prompt: Ikare me nywako lok i kom cobo peko enoni, kicuku cwiny dano weng me neno laro lok macalo yoo maber. Kadi bed kumeno, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye onyuto lworo madit tutwal I kom bedo tye I yub eni.

eng_prompt: In a tragic turn of events, the nation mourns the passing of a brave soldier who dedicated his life to protecting Uganda's sovereignty. His sacrifice serves as a poignant reminder of the ongoing struggles faced by those who serve in the armed forces.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'entiisa, eggwanga likungubaga olw'okufa kw'omujaasi omuzira eyawaayo obulamu bwe okukuuma obwetwaze bwa Uganda. Okwewaayo kwe kujjukiza nnyo entalo ezigenda mu maaso abo abaweereza mu magye ze basanga.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko madit tutwal, lobo tye ka kumo pi too pa lamony ma cwinye tek ma odyero kwone me gwoko loc ken pa Uganda. Dyere tye macalo lanyut maber tutwal I kom peko matye katimme I kom lumony.

eng_prompt: Throughout his political career, he played a significant role in shaping the party's policies and direction. His influence was felt across various levels of government, making him a prominent figure in the political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu mirimu gye gyonna egy'ebyobufuzi, yakola omulimu munene mu kukola enkola n'obulagirizi bw'ekibiina. Obuyinza bwe bwawulirwa ku mitendera gya gavumenti egy'enjawulo, ekimufudde omuntu omututumufu mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en obedo I tenge me cung iwibye, en okonyo tutwal I yubu cik ki yoo me tic pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne. En obedo ki twero I kom gamente mapat-pat ma oweko en odoko ngat ma oywek tutwal I lok me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak ke kere naka politikis, abu ngesi iswama aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ainapeta keda aingarenikinio naka epate. Aponi kopupunai apuganike kotoma adokena nuegelegela, ido abu koinak ngesi araun itunganan yenitegelikina kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis.

lug_prompt: Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda baakuŋŋaana okumujjukira, okugabana emboozi n'okuseka wakati mu nnaku yaabwe. Ng'enjuba egwa, baakola enteekateeka z'okumujjukira mu ngeri eyoleka omwoyo gwe omulungi.
ach_prompt: Lurem ki lugang gugure me woro wiye, nywako lok ki nyero kadi bed ni gubedo ki arem cwiny. Ikare ma ceng tye ka poto, guyubu yub me kwero too pa nyakoni ma nyutu cwiny ma en tye kwede.

eng_prompt: After conducting extensive research and gathering all relevant information, she felt it was essential to document her findings. Her thorough analysis aimed to provide clarity and insight into the complex issue at hand.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent trade disruptions, the government has established a framework to address the concerns of affected businesses. As part of this initiative, a joint verification committee will decide on which Ugandan traders shall be compensated.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okutaataaganyizibwa kw'ebyobusuubuzi gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti etaddewo enkola y'okukola ku kweraliikirira kw'abasuubuzi abakoseddwa. Ng'ekitundu ky'enteekateeka eno, akakiiko ak'awamu akanoonyereza kajja kusalawo abasuubuzi ba Uganda abanaaliyirirwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me biacara ma otimme cokcok-ki, gamente okatti ki yoo me cobo peko pa biacara ma onongo peko. Macalo but yub man, dul ma ribbe me ngiyo kit ma lucat wil me lobo Uganda omyero ki culgi kwede.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okumala ebbanga eddene okwalimu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, akakiiko akafuga omupiira gw'ebigere mu Uganda kaatuuka ku kusalawo okw'amaanyi. Abakwatibwako okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanye okulonda ku bukulembeze bw'ekibiina obw'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me yer ma opong ki pyem ki laro lok matek tutwal, dul ma doro tuku odilo I lobo Uganda omoko tam mapire tek tutwal. Dano ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat gugure me bolo kwir I kom tela me dul enoni I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aseo naejaasi keda abolobol naepol noi, abu atukot naeyait emopira koUganda kodolok aseunet naepol noi. Apotu itunga luka aiboisio nuegelegela kotukokinos kanu aseun engarenone lo oingaren loka atukot kangin.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteera akaruuru akarikumara obwire buraingwa kandi akarimu okuhayahayana n'okuhanuura kw'amaani, ekitongore ekirikutegyeka omupiira gw'ebigyere omu Uganda kikahika aha kusharamu kw'amaani. lug_prompt: Olw'ebyafaayo ebingi n'abawagizi abangi, omuzannyo guwangudde emitima gy'obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu. Buli wiikendi, ebisaawe bijjula abawagizi abajjumbidde okuwagira ttiimu zaabwe ze basinga okwagala.

eng_prompt: The recent political climate in the region has prompted many citizens to reassess their travel plans. As tensions rise in the lead-up to the elections, people are increasingly seeking safety and stability across borders.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyobufuzi gye buvuddeko mu kitundu eviiriddeko bannansi bangi okuddamu okwetegereza enteekateeka zaabwe ez'entambula. Ng'obunkenke bweyongera mu kulonda, abantu beeyongera okunoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu okusukka ensalo.
ach_prompt: Lok me cungu iwi bye ma otimme cokcok-ki oweko anywali mapol oloko tamgi I kom yubgi me wot. Kit ma telle tye kamedde I kare me yer, dano tye ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo I wang lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuka epolitikis kotoma aiboisit kangin einakini itunga luipu airereor ainapeta kec nuka alosit. Kwape iyata aiyalongong kotoma apak naka aseo, eutasi itunga aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni angu 'di ma alea o'diru 'diyi fe kari anzi karakara eyini otuta eyini acizu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo ewaru eyini tuzu opeta eyi ma drilia 'diyisi, o'bi eyi curu'do asianzu azini asianzu nda boda mile eyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Amid escalating tensions and uncertainty in the region, many individuals sought safety and stability elsewhere. As a result, a significant number of cargo drivers made the difficult decision to leave Kenya.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke n'obutali butebenkevu obweyongera mu kitundu, abantu bangi baanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu awalala. N'ekyavaamu, abavuzi b'emigugu bangi baasalawo okuva e Kenya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle ki peko tye ka mede I but lobo man, dano mapol guyenyo gwok ki ber bedo I kabedo mukene. Macalo adwogi ne, ludwo mutoka ma tingo jami mapol gumoko tam matek tutwal me weko lobo Kenya.

teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, apotu ekomiti kitetemoto akiro nuka epolitikis kotoma akwapuwok. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta, aponi koinakinai ngesi aitodun akiro nuapolok nuikamunitos aseo.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, komiti 'da eyi agbatara gba e'yo politiki ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo otita 'da ma azi ru, 'ba fe erini azi e'yo okporu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko,akakiiko kakahanuura aha ntunguuka y'eby'obutegyeki omu ihanga. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka, akaheebwa omurimo gw'okushwijuma ebintu ebikuru ebyabaireho omu karuuru.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the financial strain on the local government has become increasingly evident. As a result, officials are now grappling with the alarming rise in unpaid taxes.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuzibu bw'ensimbi ku gavumenti z'ebitundu bweyongedde. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu kati balwanagana n'okweyongera kw'emisolo egitasasuddwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, peko me lim ma gamente me tedero tye kwede tye ka medde. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic kombedi tye ka lweny ki mede pa wel mucoro ma pe kiculu.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi ationis naka ikapun mama ejaasi apuganisinei nu okwap. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kwana eswamak ainingosit keda aiyatakinio naka isolosinei lumam etacitai.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni gamete ele 'diyi ma dria ri e'bi eca e'da saaru. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi curu'do dri ci e'yo musoro 'bani ofele kuri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, oburemeezi bw'esente aha gavumenti z'ebyaro bweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, abakungu obwahati nibarwanagana n'emishoro etashashwirwe erikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In a climate of widespread economic disparity, many individuals are finding loopholes in the financial regulations. As a result, some traders are taking advantage of the corrupt system not to pay their taxes.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'obutafaanagana mu byenfuna, abantu bangi basanga ebituli mu mateeka g'ebyensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abasuubuzi abamu beeyambisa embeera y'obuli bw'enguzi obutasasula misolo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye mapol tutwal, dano mapol tye kanongo goro I cik ma doro lok kom lim. Macalo adwogi ne, lucat wil mukene tye katic ki gum me camucana me kwero culu mucoro gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka amamus aimorikikina kotoma ikapun, eutasi itunga luipu adumun aibucare kotoma ikisila luka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, eutasi agwelanarak aitosom arerengu na ecamusana kanu mam aitac isolosineikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo onzi eyi esu azita robia ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma azi eyi geri anyamgbolo ni 'di ayu eyini ani eyi ma musoro ofezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutakwatanisa omu by'entaasya, abantu baingi nibashanga oburemeezi omu biragiro by'eby'empiiha. N'ekyarugiremu, abashuubuzi abamwe nibakozesa omugisha gw'obushomankuzi obutashashura emishoro yaabo.

eng_prompt: The authorities had been monitoring their activities for weeks, suspecting that something illegal was afoot. When the time was right, they decided to conduct a surprise raid on the location.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza babadde balondoola emirimu gyabwe okumala wiiki, nga bateebereza nti waliwo ekimenya amateeka ekyali kigenda mu maaso. Ekiseera bwe kyatuuka, baasalawo okukola ekikwekweto eky'ekikangabwa mu kifo ekyo.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ka ngiyo ticgi pi cabit mapol, ki byek ni gin mo ma turu cik tye ka time. Ikare ma kare ne oromo, gumoko tamgi me timo mony atura I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Aanyanarete apedorosio aswamisio kec adaun isabitin luipu, aomit ebe ejai ibore yenimam ekisil ecamakinit. Neadolunia apak naedolit, apotu kesi koseutu asurokin aiboisit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi 'diyi ebi e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma pamvu one sabiti eyi ma alea, egazu kini e'yo azita palaa ku ni eyi 'ye i. Sawa ka ovu kililiru 'bo, eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu angu 'da ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi babaire nibareebuuza emirimo yaabo kumara esande nyingi, barikuteekateeka ngu haine ekitahikire ekyabaireho. Obwire ku bwahikire, bakasharamu kutahirira omwanya.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in the community as both groups vie for access to the limited natural resources. Recent discussions have revealed differing perspectives on the use and ownership of the forest.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu ng'ebibinja byombi bivuganya okufuna eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka ebitono. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa kulaga endowooza ez'enjawulo ku nkozesa n'obwannannyini bw'ekibira.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lwak ikare ma gurup aryo egoni gitye ka pyem me nongo lonyo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tam mapat-pat I kom kit me tic ki rwod bunga.
teo_prompt: Eyatakinos ingungeta kotoma atutubet naarai eboloboloete igurupun ngun kere kanu adumun iboro luikidioko luka Edeke. Ineresinei lu atuboros itodunitos aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos aitwasam keda ikulepek ekibira.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu ongulumu eyi ma alea ekile ongulumu iri 'diyi a'bala 'yeria afa nyakuni were 'diyi esuzu. Agbatara o'diru 'diyi e'da egata ndundu eyi ma dria e'yo oce ayuza ni azini 'ba eyi ma eipika eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bantu ahabw'okugira ngu guruupu zombi nizihakanisa eby'obuhangwa. Okuhanuura okuhweireho kworeka enteekateeka ezitari zimwe aha nkoresa n'obwannannyini bw'ekibira.

eng_prompt: The city has been facing increasing traffic congestion, prompting the need for extensive infrastructure improvements. As a result, the budget for urban development projects has skyrocketed.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kibadde kyolekaganye n'omujjuzo gw'ebidduka ogweyongera, ekireetedde obwetaavu bw'okulongoosa ebintu ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, embalirira ya pulojekiti z'okukulaakulanya ebibuga erinnye nnyo.
ach_prompt: Boma ne obedo ka nongo mutoka mapol tutwal ma oweko mite ni omyero ki yub jami mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, byek me lim pi yub me dongo boma omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etereikina eibuga keda eipues loka amotokan, ido ngin einakini eipud loka aitojokar iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, apolor noi ebajet loka ipurojektin lu itopoloere itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ebi dri fu omita mutukari eyini tupi 'diyiniri be, e'yo fepi lezu 'ba ma otu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, bajeti otita angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyini ri tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rwiine omwijuzo gw'ebiiruka ogweyongyeire, ekirikureetaho ekyetengo ky'okutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, embaririra ya purogyekiti z'entunguuka omu ndembo eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Exploring new destinations has always been a passion of mine. There's something magical about discovering stunning landscapes and vibrant cultures.
lug_prompt: Okulambula ebifo ebipya bulijjo kibadde kintu kye njagala ennyo. Waliwo ekintu eky'ekyewuunyo ku kuzuula ebifo ebyewuunyisa n'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Limo kabedo manyen obedo gin ma amaro mada. Tye gin mo mamwonya tutwal I kom nongo kabedo mamwonya tutwal ki tekwaro ma beco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Amina eong noi aingic aiboisio nuitetiak. Ejai ibore yenitegelikina kanu ajenun aiboisio nuibusiak keda inonosio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Angu o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu ri ebi ovu e'yo mani le sa'wa driasi ri'I. Afa azi wura onyiruni angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi ma e'yo esuzu tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza emyanya misya nikyo kintu eki naakunzire munonga. Hariho ekintu ky'omutaano omu kujumbura ebishushani ebirikutangaaza hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Concerns about law enforcement practices have been growing in recent years. Many communities are increasingly alarmed by reports of excessive force used by officers during routine encounters.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira ku nkola y'okukwasisa amateeka kubadde kweyongera mu myaka egiyise. Ebitundu bingi byeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'amawulire agakwata ku kukozesa amaanyi agasukkiridde abaserikale mu kulwanagana okwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lworo I kom tic pa abili tye ka mede I mwaki ma okato ni. Lwak mapol tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom adwoki me tic ki teko ma abili tiyo kwede I kare me lweny matime kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongongo kanu ikisila lu ikisila kokaru lu atuboros. Ipu itunga lu ekuriaka noi kanu iripotan lu itwasamaete ipolisin agogong naepol noi kapak naka airiamun.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria ri e'bi tu eli agapi 'diyi ma alia. Ongulumu karakara eyi ma asi otiza tu e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini polisi eyi okpo ayu sa'wa eyini eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira aha bikwatireine n'okukuratira ebiragiro kweyongyeire omu myaka egi. Ebyanga bingi nibyeyongyera okwerarikirira ahabw'amahurire g'amaani maingi agarikukoresibwa ba ofiisa omu kurwanagana okwa buriijo.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires a deep understanding of the needs and concerns of the community. When leaders make decisions, they must consider how those choices impact the lives of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwetaagisa okutegeera mu bujjuvu ebyetaago n'ebiruma abantu. Abakulembeze bwe bakola okusalawo, balina okulowooza ku ngeri okusalawo okwo gye kukosaamu obulamu bw'abantu be bakiikirira.
ach_prompt: Tela maber mito niang matut I kom miti ki peko pa lwak. Ka lutela gumoko tam, omyero gutam i kom kit ma tam meno gudo kwede kwo pa lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan ekoto amisiikin iboro ka ipudesia luka itunga. Neiswamaete engarenok aseununeta, ibusakinit kesi aomoom epone loepedoriata aseununeta ngun aijar naka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le 'ba ma va e'yo ongulumu eyini le azini e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi. Drice'ba eyi ka e'yo pe 'bo, le eyi ma ega e'yo 'da eyini 'ye 'ba angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ma edri ojazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo n'ebirikuteganisa abantu. Abeebembezi ku barikukora encwamu, bashemereire kuteekateeka oku encwamu egyo erikukwata aha magara g'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: From a young age, the girls showed a natural talent for creative arts, often experimenting with fabric and hairstyles. Their passion for crafting beautiful looks and garments quickly turned into a remarkable proficiency.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu myaka emito, abawala baalaga ekitone ky'obutonde mu by'emikono, nga batera okugezesa engoye n'enviiri. Okwagala kwabwe mu kukola engoye ezirabika obulungi kwafuuka mangu obukugu obw'ekitalo.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma gitino, lutino anyira gunyuto talanta me cwec manyen, ipol kare gi pimo bongo ki yer wic. Mar meggi me yubu ruk maleng odoko diro maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ageun edisiak, apotu apesur itodutu atalanta naka aitolomun aputosia, aitetem keda igoen keda itim. Amina kec naka aiswamaun igoen luibusiak abu koraun acoa naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu eli werea si, ezoanzi 'da eyi e'da feta Munguni fe eyini e'yo edezu 'diyi ma dria, eyini tutuni e'yo o'bizu bongo eyi ma dria azini dribi edeza eyi pie. Leta yini afa ndrizaru 'diyi edezu azini bongo ndrizaru 'diyi ma dria ri eca mbeleru ondua onyiru ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga omu myaka emito, abaishiki bakooreka etaraanta y'obuhangwa omu by'emikono, barikukoresa emyenda hamwe n'emishoro y'eishokye. Rukundo yaabo y'okukora eby'okureebeka n'emyenda mirungi, ekahinduka omurimo gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: The professor spoke quickly, using terminology I wasn't familiar with. As I listened, I felt more and more lost in the complex concepts being discussed.
lug_prompt: Pulofeesa yayogedde mangu, ng'akozesa ebigambo bye nnali simanyiiko. Nga bwe mpuliriza, nneeyongera okuwuubaala mu ndowooza enzibu ezaali ziteesebwako.
ach_prompt: Profeca ne oloko oyot, kun tiyo ki leb ma pe angeyo. I kare ma abedo ka winyo lok, awinyo calo atye ka keng ngec I kom lok matego ma gitye ka lok iye.
teo_prompt: Abu epurofesa kiner katipet, itosomai akiro nu mam eong ajeni. Neipupia eong, abu eong apupi ebe mam eong ajeni akiro nuetapit aitetem.
lgg_prompt: Imbapi sukulu lapi angiri 'da nze e'yo mbeleru, erini e'yo nzezu geri mani nile ku 'diyisi. Mani e'yo eriria, ma etumu drile e'yo ewaru 'bani e'yo onze 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Purofeesa akagamba juba, arikukoresa ebigambo ebi nabaire ntarikumanya. Ku naabaire nimpurikiza, nkaba ninyehurira ntarikumanya enshonga z'omutaano ezabaire nizigambwaho.

eng_prompt: I just finished dinner and was wondering what to do next. I feel like catching up on the latest events.
lug_prompt: Naakamala okulya ekyeggulo era nga nneebuuza eky'okukola ekiddako. Njagala okumanya ebigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Pud atyeko cam me otyeno keken dok onongo atye ka tam I kom ngo mukene ma myero atim. Amito niang jami matye katimme kombedi.
teo_prompt: Adau eong angetakin ainyam inyamat luabong ido aomit eong nu ebeit eong aswam. Akoto eong adumunun akiro nuitetiak nu iswamasi.
lgg_prompt: Ma de nga lu nyaka ondresi 'bo azini ri ma e'yo ega e'yo ma 'ye drile ri ma dria. Ma ma asi nga e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Naaherize kurya kyakiro kandi nkaba ninyebuuza ekindi kukora. Ninyenda kumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As the population continues to grow, the demand for housing and infrastructure is increasing. This presents a unique opportunity for investment and expansion in various sectors across the country.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera okukula, obwetaavu bw'amayumba n'ebintu ebirala byeyongera. Kino kiwa omukisa ogw'enjawulo ogw'okusiga ensimbi n'okugaziya mu bitongole eby'enjawulo okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano tye ka mede kwede, miti pa odi ki jami mukene bene tye ka mede. Man kelo gum maber tutwal me keto lim I tenge mapat-pat I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga, iyata eipuda lo itogoi keda iboro. Einakini ngin arereng na itegelikina kanu aipikakin ikapun keda aitanyanyar aiboisio nuegelegela kakwap wok.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni mu drile turia, lezu jo eyini tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Diri drileba wura ndu ni fe lonyi vuti aleza ni azini angu ezoma ni esele ndundu kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugumizamu nibeyongyera, ekyetengo ky'amaju n'ebyombeko nikyeyongyera. Eki n'omugisha gw'omutaano gw'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi n'okushanjuura eby'obushubuzi omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe okwetoroora eihanga.

eng_prompt: As I drove through the city, I couldn't help but notice the varying conditions of the vehicles around me. Many seemed to be struggling just to stay on the road.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nvuga mu kibuga, nnalaba embeera y'emmotoka ezaali ezeetoolodde. Bangi baalabika nga balwana okusigala ku luguudo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka dwoyo motoka I dye citi, aneno kit ma mutoka ma orumuwa tye kwede. Dano mapol nen calo gitye ka yele me bedo I gudu.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong airenge kotoma oibuga, mam eong apedori aingarakin aanyun ejautene lo egelegela loka amotokan nuejaasi keda eong. Esubit bala etiono itunga luipu asalakin orot.
lgg_prompt: Mani mutukari ti ojizu aku ambu cityniri ma aliarisi, ma econi ndra e'yo ndundu mutukari ma ageia 'diyi ni 'diyi ndre ku. Ba karakara eyi e'da kile eyi dri ci aa'zu nzila dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nvuga omu rurembo, nkaba ntarikubasa kwetantara kureeba emicwe y'ebiiruka ebyanyetorwaire. Baingi bakaba nibareebeka nk'abarikuteganisibwa kuguma aha ruguuto.

eng_prompt: After months of researching and test-driving various models, we finally made a decision. Our old car was no longer reliable, and we needed something more spacious for our growing family.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunoonyereza n'okugezesa mmotoka ez'ebika eby'enjawulo, kyaddaaki twasalawo. Emmotoka yaffe enkadde yali tekyesigika era twali twetaaga endala esingawo obunene eri amaka gaffe agaali geeyongera obunene.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwoyo motoka mapatpat pi dwe mapol, dong wamoko tamwa. Mutokawa macon onongo dong pe gene, dok onongo wamito mutoka mukene madit tutwal pi jo me gangwa ma onongo tye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic ka airenge amotokan nuegelegela, apotu sio adautu aseunet. Mam bobo emotoka wok loemojongit ejokuna noi, ido apotu sio akoto ibore yenepol noi kanuka ekale wok loepoloi.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo vuti ondaza ma alia azini mutukari esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma ti ojiza ma alia, ama asizu asizu e'yo 'du ra. Ama vile mutukari okuri ovuni asi'baza be ku, dika ama le afa azi angiri familia ama vile tupi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza n'okugezesa emotoka z'emiringo etari emwe, tukaheza twacwamu. Emotoka yaitu enkuru ekaba etakibaasa kugumizamu, kandi tukaba nitwetenga ekindi ky'omwanya muhango ahabw'eka yaitu eyabaire neyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials launched an extensive awareness campaign. This initiative aimed to educate citizens about effective hygiene practices and social distancing measures.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatandikawo kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okusomesa bannansi ku buyonjo n'okwewa amabanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gucako yub me rweyo lwak. Yub man obedo me pwonyo lwak i kom kit me gwoko lengo ki bedo mabor ki dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aisisianakino. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aisisianakin itunga nuka aila ka alaikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita imbata fezu o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo ra. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu kari anzi eyini imbata fezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria azini geri eyini eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara batandikireho ehururu y'okumanyisa abantu. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kwegyesa abantu ebikwatireine n'eby'obuyonjo hamwe n'okwetantara abantu.

eng_prompt: After years of dreaming about rural life, I finally decided to invest in agriculture. My passion for farming led me to explore various livestock options, and I found my niche.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga ndowooza ku bulamu bw'omu byalo, nnasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu bulimi n'obulunzi. Okwagala kwe nnalina mu kulima kwandeetera okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okulundaamu ebisolo era ne nfuna ekifo kyange.
ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me bedo ki lek I kom kwo me caro, dong amoko tamma me keto cente I pur. Mar ma atye kwede pi pur oweko aneno jami mapat-pat me gwoko lee, dok anongo kabedo mega.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka airujasia nuikamunitos aijar naka ocaloi, abu eong aseun aipikakin ikapunuke toma akoru. Amina eong nu akoru abu koyangau eong aingic iwaitin lu aipit ibaren luegelegela, ido abu eong adum aiboisitika.
lgg_prompt: Eli ma alia orobi 'yezu e'yo aa'zu calo'a ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, asizu asi 'du e'yo lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu agirikica ma alia. Leta mani e'yo ori ezozaniri ma dria ri fe ma ni geri anyapa ta mbazu ndundu 'diyi ma ale andri, azini ma isu afa mani leleri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi ninteekateeka aha magara g'omubyaro, nkacwamu kuta esente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ekyetengo kyangye ky'obuhingi n'oburiisa kikampwera kushwijuma emiringo y'oburiisa etari emwe n'emwe, kandi nkashanga omwanya gwangye.

eng_prompt: In any decision-making process, it is essential to consider all perspectives and evidence. Striving for objectivity is crucial to ensure that the outcome is just and equitable.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yonna ey'okusalawo, kya mugaso okulowooza ku ndowooza zonna n'obujulizi. Okunoonya obwenkanya kya mugaso nnyo okulaba nti ebyavaamu biba bya bwenkanya era bya bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kare me moko tam mo keken, pire tek tutwal me neno jami weng ki caden weng. Tute matek me bedo ki ada obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni adwogi ne obedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseunet, ejokuna noi airereor aomisio kere keda ajenanut. Aswam kagogong kanu aitodolikin akiro ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna.

teo_prompt: Kwape sio aanyanar epone loepedoriata akiro nuka angaleu itunga, ejokuna noi amisiikin iponesio luegelegela luka adekasinei nuetiroritos itunga. Kacut, akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos ejautene lomam ikopas kaneejai itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma e'yo ondrezu ongulumu eyi ma dria, eri orodriru onita fezu azo ndundu 'ba alu alu eyini candi fepi 'diyi ma dria. Tutunisi, ma ava be e'yo azo 'bani eyi erepi 'ba eyi ma eselea ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitucondooza aha bikwatiraine n'ebikwatiraine n'ebyamagara omu bantu, ni kikuru kwetegyereza endwara ezitarikushushana ezirikuteganisa abantu. Okukira munonga, nyine ekihika ky'okumanya ebikwatiraine n'embeera ezitarikuturira kuruga aha muntu kuza aha mugyenzi.

eng_prompt: In many households, traditional roles often dictate who takes on the responsibility of earning a living. This dynamic can lead to varying family structures and expectations regarding financial support.
lug_prompt: Mu maka mangi, emirimu gy'obuwangwa gitera okulagira ani atwala obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okweyimirizaawo. Enkyukakyuka eno eyinza okuleetawo enjawulo mu nsengeka y'amaka n'ebisuubirwa ku nsonga y'obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I gangi mapol, tic me tekwaro ipol kare nyutu anga matye ki twero me nongo cente me kwo. Aloka-loka man twero kelo aloka-loka ikit ma gangi tye kwede ki miti gi ikit me nongo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oreria luipu, iboro lu atekerin kes itodunitos ingai bo eyangauni aswam naka aijar. Epedori ngin ayangaun aiboisio nuegelegela nuka ikalia keda nu eomitai kanu agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Aku karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo a'bini 'diyi 'ba a'di ni e'yo afa nyazu ri 'du ni. E'yo 'di eco fe familia eyini aa'zu wura ndundu eyi ma alea dika eyi ma egata robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka maingi, emirimo y'obuhangwa niyo erikureetaho obujunanizibwa bw'okureeberera amagara. Enkora egi neebaasa kureetaho entekateka y'amaka etarikushushana hamwe n'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana ebikwatiraine n'obuhwezi bw'esente.
